original: Our efforts were effective at first, but the pirates became more organized in response. Now they have one big pirate group, under their powerful leader.
translated: 那最厉害的海盗就是那叫普赛依的家伙吗？

original: And that leader is Captain Blood?
translated: 就是那样。结果回到了原点。

original: Totally. He's bad news, and needs a righteous butt-kicking.
translated: 我说莱文，普赛依是谁

original: All right. Your help is most welcome.
translated: 好吧，希望这次你也能助我们一臂之力。

original: Awesome! You're the best, Dad!
translated: 谢谢。首领！

original: How many times have I-Look, just remember that we're asking for help, not depending on it.
translated: 你可以借助他的力量，但不可依赖于他的力量。

original: Totally, Dad. I'll take care of Captain Blood myself! I've been practicing in my video games!
translated: 好的，我会牢记的。我一定会凭我的力量打倒普赛依的。

original: Um, good to have you along, Leon. Thank you, Prime Minister.
translated: 太好了。莱文。谢谢。首领。

original: Can't wait to show you my mad skills! Aww yeah! Hey, lemme know when you're ready.
translated: 嗯？这次就拜托你了。我还有很多事情要告诉你，准备好的话就跟我说。

original: Here, this is a gift for you. Let's do this!
translated: 好，你拿着这个，这礼物给你是为了让我们一起好好加油。

original: I must ask that you look after my son, Leon. He's just too...eager. Yes, that's the word. Eager.
translated: 莱文就拜托给你了。也许是因为还小所以好像有些欲望高胀。

original: Don't worry. I've seen him fight and I know he'll be fine.
translated: 请别担心。根据我一直在旁的观察来看，我觉得他一定能出色地完成任务的。

original: C'mon, Dad! Just give the word and I'll tear Captain Blood up. No sweat!
translated: 首领，交给我的话，我就去击退普赛依。

original: Hm? You? But you JUST came back from battling the Delfinos.
translated: 嗯？你吗？你和阿库旁多战斗回来都还没过多久呢

original: (Yeah, that's right.)
translated: (是的。说得对。)

original: But...but...I really wanna fight pirates!
translated: 但是海上贸易不是我们最核心的最重要的部分嘛

original: Hm. A noble cause, to be sure. However, I fear that Captain Blood may be just a touch out of your league.
translated: 正因如此才更那个。当然你出色地阻挡了阿库旁多，但是普赛依跟阿库旁多小混混们可不一样。

original: (That's right. Leon needs more training...)
translated: (对的。莱文还需要再修炼修炼……)

original: B-but... What if I go with #h0#? I can watch #h0#'s back, and jump in to do some world-class swashbuckling! ...Supervised, of course.
translated: 可，可是……就是那样！我和#h0#一起去。#h0#的能力相当优秀一定能起到很大帮助的。

original: (Wait, what? Why me...)
translated: (嗯？可是，这家伙干嘛连我也……！！)

original: You disappoint me. I thought you were beyond begging others for help. Do I need to suspend your allowance again?
translated: 又想借他人之手吗！！像你这样的家伙终究是没有发展可能的！！每次期待你会有所表现的时候就立刻让我感到失望！！

original: (Ugh, not this again... I'd better get this over with.)
translated: (呃，怎么又是这种情况……吉尔伯特首领的话也有他的道理，可是这对我来说也是一个机会。)

original: Prime Minister, I'll go with Leon.
translated: 首领，我和莱文一起去。

original: Don't be ridiculous. You've already done more than enough for us.
translated: 上一次也是接受了你的帮助。这次要凭我们自己的力量来完成。

original: I've done enough as allies. This time I want to help as a...friend...of Leon's.
translated: 上次我也说过了，虽然是友邦国家，但这次我作为莱文的朋友也想拜托你。

original: Hm... When you say it like that, I'm inclined to...
translated: 嗯……如果这么说的话让我考虑考虑。

original: All right, off to the dock.
translated: 好了，我也现在就去码头吧。

original: Oh my, we meet again.
translated: 哎呀，又遇见了呢。

original: Ahh! Geez... What are you doing behind me?
translated: 呃啊！吓了我一大跳！！干嘛呀，在别人背后干嘛呢！

original: You were just in my way.
translated: 就是路过的时候看见了而已。

original: I see. Well then, let me get OUT of your way. I'm sorta busy so...
translated: 原来如此。那么就请继续路过吧。我很忙失陪……

original: You're heading out to deal with the pirates?
translated: 你要去讨伐海盗吗？

original: Yes. Why? Interested?
translated: 是的，是那样的。怎么了？你感兴趣吗？

original: Deary me, no. Why would I be interested in such a crude, barbaric voyage? You enjoy yourselves.
translated: 哦呵呵，怎么会呢。我怎么会对那种低俗又野蛮的事情感兴趣呢。那我就告辞了

original: ...Crude? Barbaric? Whatever. I really should head to the dock.
translated: …………低俗？野蛮？这人真是……算了。赶紧去码头吧。

original: Hey, you made it! I was gonna leave without you. Where's my stuff?
translated: 啊，来啦。我拜托的东西呢？

original: Kentucky at the General Store told me they deliver.
translated: 嗯，可是我在杂货店听说可以送货的呀。

original: No kidding! Man, they should, like, advertise that. Anyway, I got everyone together. Ready to roll? Er, sail?
translated: 嗯，可以那样的啊。船员们和佣兵们都已经到齐了。好像可以出发了。如何？

original: (Changing the subject, huh?) Yup. I'm all set.
translated: (这家伙竟调转话题。) 嗯，我也准备好了。

original: Righteous! I'll meet you at the dock.
translated: 好的，那就在码头见吧。

original: What are you doing here?
translated: 你在这儿干嘛呢？
啊，你说过是要讨伐海盗还是什么的对吧。

original: Ah, you said something about eliminating pirates, right?
translated: 可是你能做到吗？看上去佣兵人数也不多，而且没个能值得信赖的人……

original: Are you sure you can do it? You're crew doesn't exactly look the fittest.
translated: 哎？走吧？走去哪儿？

original: ...Fine, you can come.
translated: 都到这时候了你就直接说吧。想一起去。

original: What? W-whatever do you mean?
translated: …………虽然我是个大忙人，但是你坚持需要帮助的话，我就答应你吧。走吧。

original: Just say it, you want to go on the voyage with us.
translated: …………这女孩到底干嘛的呀。可是……我随便接收下来没问题吗。让她跟莱文说一声他会看着办的吧。

original: Hey, you're late! Getting cold feet?
translated: 搞什么。怎么这么迟才来。

original: Nah, I was...delayed.
translated: 啊，对不起，出了点小事。

original: Hm, whatever. You sure you're ready? We're gonna be on a boat. A boat!
translated: 小事儿？嗯，算了。赶紧上船吧。都准备好了吧？这次离开很长时间回不来的，需要的东西可都带齐了。

original: As captain, I have important stuff to do. Hang on.
translated: 好了，我作为船长有事要处理就先进去了。

original: No prob. Let's go.
translated: 没问题。去吧。

original: Oh? Another coincidence.
translated: 喔啦啦，这真巧啊。

original: Ah... I'm sorry. I was careless. I should've told you first.
translated: 啊……对不起。我太轻率了。我应该先和你商量一下的。

original: Yes, that's right! We're friends but I AM the captain of this ship. All cute girls have to go through me!
translated: 那样才对。虽然我们是朋友，但是我现在的身份是这艘船的船长啊。任何小事都应该先向我报告……

original: Oh my, what kind of ship is this? It's quite tasteless. Are we running low on cash?
translated: 哎呀，这船怎么造的这么没品味啊？是为了控制在便宜的价格范围内吗。
听你一说我觉得莱文你说得对。虽然是朋友关系也该公私分明。我好好跟她说让她下船，你就别操心了。

original: Leon, you're absolutely right. I should have given it a second thought. I'll tell her nicely and get her off the ship right away.
translated: 嗯？什么事？你应该不会是要我做这低贱的船务吧？

original: Excuse me...
translated: 不，那倒不是的。其实是想对你说抱歉……

original: Hm? What is it? I hope you don't expect me to do any swabbing.
translated: 虽然是抱歉的话，但是今后也许会发生一些危险的事情。关于这点希望你能理解。

original: No, it's not that. I'm, um, well...
translated: 我以为你要说什么呢。那个我早就想到了。我要是被抓了一定不会麻烦你来救我的，你就别担心我了，担心担心那边吧。如果没别的事我就失陪了。

original: After the big fight today, would you like to go out with me?
translated: 莱文怎么说的？你让她下船也行。和我也没什么深交，不过是比你多见过一次罢了。

original: ...Wha... Ha. Ha ha. Hahahahaha! Oh...oh my goodness... That's rich. Ahem. I tell you what...we'll talk again after the fight. IF you survive. Now, if you're done talking, I'm going to have a look around.
translated: 喔呵呵。船已经离港，想下船都难喽。让女孩一个人回去也不安全。反正不管怎样你知道那么回事就行了。

original: Leon, what are you doing?
translated: (不管怎么说，好像了解了又貌似完全不了解的家伙。变来变去的。)

original: Ahh, jealous? Yeah, she totally digs me. Can't just let a lady go by herself, y'know. It's a big, bad world out there.
translated: 喂。我有话跟你说。

original: Everyone, make this thing go faster! Captain Blood isn't gonna swashbuckle himself!
translated: 好了，赶紧动起来吧。没时间了。就现在这一刻说不定普赛依又在袭击某条商船了。

original: Hey, Leon.
translated: 欢迎你。第一次来到我们船上吧？虽然是用商船改造的船，但是样子还是有些变了吧。不过说到底还是艘商船而已。

original: Welcome aboard! It might look like just a merchant ship, but...okay, it's just a merchant ship.
translated: 可是你有什么事吗？有什么要办的事情吗？

original: Anyway, what's up? You have your serious face on.
translated: 我还没来得及跟你说，这位是要搭乘这船的人。所以尽管迟了但是还是应该跟你说一声才是

original: I let someone aboard without asking you first. I know it's late but I wanted to let you know.
translated: 你在说什么呀？谁要乘船？

original: What? Who's on board?
translated: 啊……其实我也不知道她名字呢。可是你应该认识她的。她的实力好像也还行。

original: Ah... I actually don't know her name, but it's not like you don't know her and she's pretty good at...
translated: 你说什么？你现在让一个连名字都不知道的人随便搭乘我们船吗？实力不是重要的。重要的是航海不是开玩笑的。

original: What? You let a GIRL on board and didn't tell me?! What is WRONG with you? Is she cute? Does she like handsome swashbucklers with names that start with L?
translated: 喂，莱文。

original: The pirates are getting away! Good riddance!
translated: 近处的海盗们逃跑了！！

original: Nooooo, my glory! We can't let them go!
translated: 吼吼，该轮我上场了。我要用我的魔法把整条船 #r#e全部毁掉#k#n

original: It's my turn to show you what I can do. I'll #r#etear the ship apart#k#n with my magic.
translated: 唔哇！！等等等等等等等一下！！

original: Ah! Wait, wait, wait, WAIT!
translated: 干嘛拦着我？

original: Why?
translated: 那个叫普赛依还是叫什么的家伙还没有出现呢。那些家伙们肯定是往普赛依所在的根据地方向逃跑了，我们就这么跟过去不是更好吗？

original: Captain Blood isn't here yet. They'll lead us back to him, so we should just follow along!
translated: 对的，果然是人才啊！赶紧跟上去！！

original: Brilliant! Let's do the following thing!
translated: 呃嗯……真可惜啊。

original: Hm... That's too bad.
translated: 不能让他们跑掉！！！

original: It's quiet...TOO calm. I hope the pirates are saying their prayers and kissing their...something...
translated: 怎么这么宁静。该不会是海盗们有所察觉撤退了吧。

original: Who knows. It's only been a couple days, so let's wait it out.
translated: 说不准哦。说不定会那样呢。但是才没过几天再等等看吧。

original: Hm... Sure. But are you ready to take on the pirates at any minute?
translated: 嗯……就那样吧。你做好了随时和海盗交战的准备吗？

original: Pirates! Pirates! Don't let them near!
translated: 是海盗！！海盗出现了！！

original: They're here! Oh BOY!
translated: 终于上钩了！！

original: The pirates are boarding the ship! Tell them to wipe their feet first!
translated: 海盗们朝我们商船过来了！！

original: Let's go, #h0#! FOR THE AWESOME!
Are we all safe?
translated: 大家都没事吧？

original: I think so. Not much damage on our part yet.
translated: 嗯，到目前为止损伤好像并不大。

original: Those pirates really know their way around the ocean...
translated: 是因为是海盗，所以航海技术果然更胜一筹吗？

original: Of course, they move around a lot more than merchant ships.
translated: 就是那样。比起商船移动起来迅猛地多了。

original: Captain Blood's ship is in sight!
translated: 普赛依果然出现了。准备好了吗？

original: Captain Blood is here. Ready?
translated: 海盗们从普赛依的船涌来了！！

original: Oh, no! Pirates from Captain Blood's ship are boarding! And they didn't ask permission first!
translated: 好的，痛快地干一场吧！！

original: All right, let's do this!
translated: 看见普赛依的船了！！

original: Ugh! He's pretty strong. Ha, I'm impressed!
translated: 呜哦！岂有此理，这么厉害的家伙我真是很久没遇到了！

original: Yeah, no kidding. These guys are serious.
translated: 彼此彼此。果然是和海盗小毛头有些不一样啊。

original: Yar, but this brawl be far from over, matey.
translated: 你打算搞什么鬼。不管你做什么现在对你来说都毫无胜算了。

original: Oh, what now? Spoiler alert, you're not going to win.
translated: 来吧，还是乖乖地束手就擒吧。

original: Yeah, spoiler! You're dumb!
translated: 你知道我是怎么坐上海盗王之位的吗。

original: ...Do ye know how I got me captain's hat?
translated: 现在说那些有什么用。

original: ...You're not wearing a hat.
translated: 比其他海盗佣兵技术更好？射击技术更高？都不是的。我能成为海盗王是因为……

original: Yar, it be a metaphor! Anyway, was it me clever tactics? Me sharp eye for shootin'? Nay, it be...
translated: 我对情况判断和我的腿脚比较快而已。

original: Me lightnin'-quick wits! Har har har!
translated: 呼。但是还没结束呢。

original: These pirates are way tougher than those ones before! Maybe they'll come work for my dad...
translated: 果然是受了普赛依的指挥的家伙们更有组织性了！

original: Not a chance, scallywag!
translated: 你是海盗王普赛依！！

original: Captain Blood! I hate that guy!
translated: 能把我们赶到这里，实力还算是够可以得啦。但是玩笑就开到这为止了。

original: Ye did well to make it this far, but the pleasure cruise ends here! Yar har har!
translated: 到底谁不行等着瞧就知道了！#h0#！准备好了吗！？

original: We'll show you what we've got! #h0#, ready?
translated: 把海盗们从这海峡赶出去！！

original: Let's wipe their butts! I mean...GO!
translated: 好的，痛快地干一场吧！！

original: Let's do some fightinnnnnnnng!
translated: 谢谢你的称赞。

original: Is everyone alive?
translated: 大家都活着吗。

original: The ship's seen better days, but the crew seems okay.
translated: 嗯，船只好像受到很严重的破坏，但人员好像并没有伤亡。

original: The old monster must've been toying with us. It didn't even come up outta the water. Maybe it was just trying to give us high fives, kraken-style.
translated: 呼，深海巨妖并没有全力扑来真是万幸。它连头都没有探出来。看来它不是要吃我们，只是跟我们开个玩笑而已。

original: I guess we got lucky.
translated: 原来是我们运气好。

original: No kidding, #h0#. You play with the Grosso, you might just get smashed to Polpo, right? Haha! Because Polpo sounds like pulp.
translated: 不管怎样，#h0#多亏有你在啊。尽管是开玩笑，深海巨妖开的玩笑对人类来说可就是关乎生死的玩笑了。

original: #h0#! Help me! Save my life!
translated: #h0#！！快来帮忙！！

original: Everybody calm down! Relax your core!
translated: 大家都镇定点儿！！

original: Are you all right Leon? Oh, GROSS, there's kraken juice everywhere!
translated: 莱文！！没事吧？那些令人作呕的腿脚都是什么呀

original: Grosso Polpo's no joke! It ate my dad's favorite fruit barge last year. Don't let your guard down!
translated: 深海巨妖是海洋的霸主！请小心，不要死了哦！

original: Everyone step back. I don't want anyone being swept out to sea.
translated: 你到时候可不能反悔哦。好吧，那就退后吧。不想一起被卷走的话。
还活着吗……
可，可能……恐怕不行了吧。

original: Yikes... I wonder if they made it.
translated: 不知怎么的有些同情他。

original: Umm... That seems unlikely.
translated: 你，报酬可不能少了我的啊。

original: Where are the pirates?
translated: 话说回来，那海盗该怎么办呢？

original: Pirate? Captain Blood!
translated: 海盗？啊……普赛依！！

original: Oh yeah! I was staring at the boat on the horizon like, 'who's flying that pirate flag?' I totally forgot about Captain Blood. Haha!
translated: 普赛依那家伙在哪？因为深海巨妖的出现我都没心思顾及他了。

original: He's getting away!
translated: 像老鼠一样悄悄地逃跑了，往那边去了。

original: He must have a really fast ship. My dad's sailboat is that fast. Should we go get my dad's sailboat?
translated: 怎么搞的，什么时候跑那么远去了！！赶紧去追吧！！

original: There's no time. He's gone for now.
translated: 那是不太可能。用商船追海盗船那是不可能的。

original: Awww, we almost had him! I want him! I want to get him!
translated: 就这样失之交臂了吗……几乎就要抓到他了。切。

original: I suppose I will have to do this.
translated: 好像该轮到我登场的时候了吧。怎么样……要我帮忙吗？

original: What are you gonna do? Swim out there and catch him? Are you hiding a jet ski under those robes?
translated: 你打算怎么办呢？你不会是打算游泳追过去吧

original: Don't be so naive... and what is a jet ski?
translated: 怎么会有这么低俗的人啊。

original: Stop calling me naive!
translated: 什么，你说什么……(这女人做什么都说是低俗……)

original: Shall I handle this for you? There will be a fee.
translated: 怎么办呢？要不要我出马。当然你得给我适当的报酬。

original: You can catch the pirate?! That's awesome! My dad's got lots of money.
translated: 呃嗯……好吧，就拜托你了。

original: Oh... Hey... What's up?
translated: 我就在此告辞了。

original: It's time we went our separate ways.
translated: 我还打算问个名字什么的呢……

original: How about a name first?
translated: 嗯？怎么了？问到名字你打算干嘛？

original: What would you do with her name?
translated: 啊，没，没什么。就那个……赶紧去报告吧。

original: I'd probably say it sometimes, maybe to you. Because we're friends now, right?
translated: 真是个奇怪的家伙。嗯？村里怎么这么乱糟糟的呢？

original: Man, these people... Hey, why's everybody running around like crazy?
translated: 就是啊。有什么事吗。那有我们商团的船员。去问问他有什么事。

original: I dunno, I thought there might be a sale on pies or something. My buddy is standing over there, if you want to know.
translated: 请问村里在搞什么活动吗？

original: Is there an event in town or something?
translated: 哎哟，莱文大人你来了呀。你来得正是时候！

original: Leon, you're back just in time!
translated: 有什么事么？为什么这么乱糟糟的。

original: What's with the commotion? Are they throwing a party for me?
translated: 其实海本王国又派人来了！

original: The Heaven Empire sent somebody here again!
translated: 海本王国？那些傲慢的家伙又打算来说什么可笑的话？

original: The Heaven Empire? What are those annoying snobs up to now?
translated: 你说海本王国。你在说什么啊？

original: What is the Heaven Empire?
translated: 啊……#h0#你还不知道啊。你等一小会儿再跟我说话。我整理一下思绪再跟你说明。

original: Haha, #h0#! You don't know anything! I'll tell you later. I can't stop thinking about that pie I talked about.
translated: 啊对了，这是在普赛依船上发现的东西。就当作是谢谢你帮助我送你了。

original: Oh, hey! I found this junk on Captain Blood's ship! Do you want it?
translated: 啊……那个……

original: Well the pirate guy is gone, I guess. Let's go tell dad! He'll be so excited. I know I am!
translated: 好了，海盗王也剿灭了，现在可以回程了吧。得赶紧跟爸……首领大人报告这好消息才行。

original: Change the heading! We head for San Commerci!
translated: 调转船头！目的地桑凯梅尔兹！！

original: Aye-Aye! Just let me get my navigating scarf on...
translated: 是，遵命！！

original: Prime Minister, we chased down the pirates.
translated: 首领大人，海盗讨伐队现在归航了。

original: Welcome back. I am pleased to see you unharmed. This means your mission was successful?
translated: 快来。看到你没事我可真高兴。看你的表情，任务很好地完成了啊。我说的对吧？

original: Yes... sort of. Mostly. Leon and I were able to take down the pirates, with some help.
translated: 是的，你说对了。有了莱文的卓越指挥我们比想象中更轻松地击退了敌人。

original: Good, good. The open sea lanes are important for this city.
translated: 嗯，那真是万幸。多亏了你们，现在海上交易也会进一步好转了。

original: Are you feeling okay, Prime Minister? Is that Heaven Empire business bothering you?
translated: 首领大人你的脸色不太好，是因为海本王国的原因吗？

original: You've heard? Rumor moves swiftly in Commerci. Yes, the Heaven Empire's visit troubles me.
translated: 你听说了吗？你不提我还正在为那个头疼呢。我真是琢磨不出这又会出什么事儿。

original: Would you go back and turn in the report for us?
translated: 反正我们两人在这里怎么说也说不出答案来。我整理一下扫尾工作，你可以先去向首领大人报告吗？

original: I'll be right behind you in a minute!
translated: 那么就拜托你了。我也马上就跟去。

original: What would your lord emperor have of you, you mean?
translated: 好的，您既然先开口提了，我也就直言相告了。

original: First, you will only trade with the allies of the Heaven Empire, and all trade items will come from a list of approved materials. Every transaction will have a 1% tariff levied upon it as tribute to the glory of the empire.
translated: 首先，凯梅尔兹共和国在和与海本王国建交的其他国家进行贸易时，只能交易我国指定的品目，并且我国要收取售价的1%作为酬金。

original: That's crazy!
translated: 你说什么？那是什么！！

original: Hear him out.
translated: 等会，先听完他说的。请继续。

original: Second, the Heaven Empire will require a standing order of goods, and citizens, to be delivered at such times as his grace see fit.
translated: 好的，第二点是，和我们海本交易时，有关交易包含的所有项目都必须由我们管理。

original: Third, the sea lanes used by Commerci for trade will be considered the domain of the Heaven Empire. Therefore, the emperor will have free use of these routes, and ships sailing within them will be subject to random inspections.
translated: 第三，现在贵国使用的航线实际上是在海本王国的管辖下，希望你们能够支付航线使用的费用。

original: Fourth, as a show of our favor, we will take one child from each trade family to reside in the empire for a period of 10 years. They will be raised as one of ours, and to learn of our advanced technology. Kept close, and safe, so long as our peace remains. It is a most gracious offering.
translated: 第四。两国从今以后绝不相互猜忌并坚信两国之间的友谊深厚。因此我们为了向凯梅尔兹共和国表达我们的诚意，我们将提供给能代表凯梅尔兹的首领亲属作为贵宾到我国留学的机会，可以花10年来学习我们的先进技术。

original: I will have your signature.
translated: 我说完了。您意下如何？

original: Hm...
translated: 呃嗯……

original: This is not happening!
translated: 这是什么无厘头的话啊！！

original: This is your son, yes?
translated: 嗯？这位是……？

original: I'm Leon Daniella, the second son of the Prime Minister, and pride of the Commerci Republic!
translated: 我是凯梅尔兹共和国首领吉尔伯特·达尼尔拉的二儿子莱文·达尼尔拉！

original: I know who you are, young man. I've heard tale of your adventures. You are said to be an excellent ship captain...
translated: 见到你真的非常荣幸。关于莱文大人的传闻我已是耳熟能详了。优秀的船长……

original: Oh, really? Thanks-- HEY! Don't kiss up to me!
translated: 吵死了！你胆敢在那里玩花招啊！

original: I am not kissing up, I am here to carry out a mission of peace that concerns both of our countries.
translated: 耍花招，您这话说得太过分了吧。我是为了促进两国之间的和平而来的。

original: You call that peace? Ha! You walk in here with a deal that would make us your slaves, and you call it peace? You'd better get outta here now, before I stick the rest of you in that top hat!
translated: 和平？哈！让我们成为你们这些家伙的附属国就是你所指的和平吗！再不赶紧给我滚出去的话，我就让你尝尝凯梅尔兹的厉害！

original: Prime Minister Gilberto, this hostility in your care is less than flattering. I will return tomorrow for your response. I hope that it will be the right one.
translated: 这这……可不能这样啊。吉尔伯特首领。今天我们就先告辞了。明天再来拜见您。那时希望能听到您的答复。希望您会给我一个肯定的回答。

original: That guy was making me MAD! Sorry, dad, but I have to go take care of some stuff and punch walls.
translated: 哼，放肆的家伙。首领大人，我还有事没有处理完先告辞了。

original: Ah, but the wait is finally over.
translated: 政治王国使节团到了，要让他们进来吗？

original: The envoy from the Heaven Empire envoy is here. You want me to let him in?
translated: 你好吗。我是担负海本王国的使节任务而来的，我叫西温。

original: Hello. I am Zion, and I have been sent as the voice of the Heaven Empire.
translated: 见到你很高兴。我是凯梅尔兹共和国的首领吉尔伯特·达尼尔拉。好吧，就请说说你有什么事情这么远道而来到凯梅尔兹吧。

original: It is a pleasure to receive the Heaven Empire in our humble city. I am Gilberto Daniella, the Prime Minister of the Commerci Republic, and your host. Please tell me what kind of--
translated: 好吧，这次我们有一个提议想给凯梅尔兹。

original: We have a proposal for Commerci.
translated: 提议，请问是什么提议。

original: A proposal? What type of proposal?
translated: 我们两国虽然已经认识了很长时间，但是并没有正式的建交。我们国王陛下一致认为贵国和我们一衣带水，今天想在这里和贵国缔结真正意义上的和约。

original: The people of Commerci have long remained in my great lord emperor's favor, paying proper tithe and reverence to his divine right. Yet we have very little formal history. I visit today as an offering of peace.
translated: 我当然也是不想与海本王国保持距离。但是说到条约的话，应该有什么必要条件吧。你能说说是怎样的条件吗？

original: I welcome his peace. The people of Commerci are rather fond of our neighbors in the Heaven Empire, and I am certain we can prosper together. What are the terms of your peace?
translated: 也差不多该来了吧。

original: Who are you?
translated: 谁呀。

original: Are you Vaughn Tremier?
translated: 请问是班·特来敏吗？

original: Of course I am. Who are you?
translated: 我是，可是你是哪位？

original: I am just the messenger. Prime Minister Gilberto sent me with a letter.
translated: 我是跑腿来给你送吉尔伯特首领的书信的。

original: A letter from GILBERTO?! Let me see it.
translated: 吉尔伯特？是什么书信？快给我看看。

original: Did you deliver the letter?
translated: 来啦。见到班·特来敏了吗？

original: Yes, but...
translated: 是的，见到了。可是……

original: He didn't take it well?
translated: 可是？

original: I don't know if that letter was supposed to be funny, but he was laughing a lot. He... he said that you made the mess, you have to clean it...
translated: 那个……虽然我不知道书信的内容，但是其中的议事被断然地拒绝了。说全部都是首领的责任让您自己看着办……

original: What? That fool! This isn't some petty grudge. This threatens our entire nation!
translated: 什么？那是我为了自己好才那样做的吗！！

original: He said he was too busy managing his union to help.
translated: 说商团的事务繁忙所以没法帮忙。

original: That... that vindictive child! Thinking of his coin purse when our very freedom hangs under a knife! I knew he wanted my job, but I never though he would sink to this.
translated: 他的意思是商团的事情比国家的事情更重要吗？呵呵，没看出来啊，真是可耻的人啊！其实那人一直盯着我的位子呢。果然拒绝帮忙。

original: I'm sorry, I must be alone. Go get some rest.
translated: 反正我知道了。辛苦你了。赶紧去休息吧。

original: Assassins!
translated: 这家伙是受过训练的暗杀者！

original: What is this commotion?!
translated: 这里发生了什么事啊！！

original: I think it came from over here!
translated: 好像是那边！

original: This is getting complicated. We leave, now.
translated: 麻烦了。先撤退。

original: I guess this would be a bad time to bring up the peace treaty from the Empress. Maybe a walk around San Commerci would clear my head...
translated: 现在也不是马上谈论女皇大人的和平条约的时候……应该没有要做的事情。该借此机会逛逛桑凯梅尔兹。

original: Arrrrgggghhhh!!
translated: 呃啊啊啊！！

original: Huh? What was that?! It sounded like a person screaming! Maybe east?
translated: 嗯？那是什么？？怎么会有惨叫声……好像是东边发出来的声音……

original: That scream came from the east, near #b#m865020000##k.
translated: 到村子东边#b#m865020000##k去看看。

original: Wait! What are you doing here? Also where is here?
translated: 这是哪儿啊？啊，你是……！！。

original: Somewhere far from San Commerci.
translated: 这是离桑凯梅尔兹很远的地方。

original: Wow, you're so helpful. You're always helping us out. You're pretty awesome.
translated: 谢谢你帮助我。每次我遇到考验的时候你都给予了我帮助。

original: I am not your guardian angel. I'm trying to collect the payment you owe me.
translated: 我并不是想帮你才那样的。不过你会给我谢礼的吧？

original: Oh, yeah, right... Well, I just gotta clear up this thing with my dad first. Maybe you could tell me who you are, and that would help?
translated: 那当然啦。但是……你不能告诉我你到底是谁吗？

original: Yeah, what's going on here, lady? You're using some pretty advanced magic.
translated: 你，且看你竟然会使用这么高难度的快速移动魔法应该不是平凡人。

original: Hmm...
What are you doing here? Causing some sort of... Is that the envoy from the Heaven Empire?!
translated: 嗯？你怎么也在这里？你在这里干嘛呢？不对，那人……那不是海本的使节团吗？

original: Why is that jerk on the ground? I didn't put him on the ground.
translated: 怎么躺在那里啊？#h0#究竟怎么回事？

original: Well... Uh, I... That is...
translated: 等会！！那人，已经死了？

original: Wait!! Is he D-D-DEAD?!
translated: 我知道了！是你这家伙干的！！从别的地方来的家伙，你究竟对凯梅尔兹有什么恶意竟然杀死了别的国家的使节团！！

original: Is he?
translated: 等等！我没杀他！

original: It was YOU! You killed the envoy! You're a saboteur! The outsider has doomed us all!
translated: 吵死了！你这家伙！！您在干嘛呢。吉尔伯特首领！！你打算放任杀人犯逃跑吗？

original: What?! I didn't kill anyone! I'm against killing. I am anti-kill!
translated: 请稍等！#h0#没理由会杀人的！

original: Quiet! I know it was you! What are you Daniella fools doing?! Are you going to defend this murderer?!
translated: 你竟然袒护从外地来的杀人犯！你这是要干什么！

original: #h0# can't be the murderer?! That's crazy, right? You're not the murderer, are you? No, of course not, haha!
translated: 你只会仅仅凭状况就去断定不认识的人是杀人犯吗

original: You are siding with a foreigner you barely know?!
translated: 你这家伙！！现在看来你们是一伙的啊！！吉尔伯特首领！你儿子现在所作所为难道不是叛逆行为吗？！

original: Hey man, you're the one jumping to conclusions. My dad told me that was bad business.
translated: ……把两人都逮捕了

original: Oh! I get it! You are in this together, aren't you?! Prime Minister Gilberto! Your son is committing high treason!
translated: 首领！！

original: ...Arrest them both.
translated: 搞，搞什么呀这是！！眼，眼睛！！我的眼睛看不见了！！

original: D-dad?!
translated: 请冷静点！这只是暂时的！这是有谁在搞鬼了！

original: W-What is going on?! My eyes! I've been blinded by these fiends!
translated: 你在干嘛呢？你想被拖走吗？

original: Calm down, Vaughn! It's only a distraction.
translated: 哦哦，哦，哦

original: Are you fools TRYING to get arrested?
translated: 啊，那个……

original: Oh... uh... not really?
translated: 你说什么？真的吗？

original: I think that was the last of them...
translated: 所幸好像已经全部击退了……

original: Are you okay? Are you hurt? Can I get you a soda or something?
translated: 你没事吧？没受伤吧？

original: Oh... I-I'm fine... Wait, did you hurt your hand?
translated: 啊……哦……我没事。受伤了……哎呀，手受伤了。

original: It's just a scratch. One of them was chewing on me a little, but I bit him back, haha!
translated: 没关系。没什么大不了的。刚才被咬了一下。哈哈……

original: You should be more careful! Even a small wound can get infected.
translated: 你还说没关系。即使是小伤口放任不管的话也会变严重的。

original: Would you two just smooch and get it over with? Yeesh.
translated: 哦？喔呵呵。所以呢，最终你的身份是……

original: Umm... Ahem... So anyway... If you can tell me your identity... Unless you wanna do the thing my best friend sidekick just said...
translated: 你们……干嘛呢。

original: My identity will not help you two get out of your current situation.
translated: 即使知道了我是谁好像也不能改变各位的处境啊。

original: I like to know who my allies and my enemies are.
translated: 虽然是那样，但也得搞清楚是谁帮助了我们呀，不是吗。

original: Hey, what if I pay you double? I mean, seriously, my dad is LOADED.
translated: 那就这样吧。如果你告诉我你是谁，我给你双倍的谢礼。

original: Oh... Really? How much can you pay me right now?
translated: 吼哦……那可真是很有吸引力哦。可是你现在有能力支付那笔金额吗？

original: Uh, maybe just like half now, half later? I've gotta save SOME cash... what if I find a house I need to buy?
translated: 呃……其实现在眼前是有点困难……好像只能给你一半的金额。

original: A fair deal, my name is...
translated: 好吧。其实我是……

original: Wait. We're in danger! Lupos!
translated: 等会！！我感到这附近有很重的杀气！是狼群！快做好准备！！

original: Aww, man, I HATE Lupos! Don't let them bite this beautiful lady!
translated: 这里有狼群？？先赶紧消灭掉吧！得把女性的安全放在第一位！

original: There, are you happy now?
translated: 好了，准备好了吗。

original: Heeeeey!
translated: 噢噢……。

original: Leon? Did you just black out? Lady, I have no idea who you are.
translated: 莱文你怎么了？已经见到你真面目了，现在就介绍一下你的来历吧。

original: You STILL can't just trust me? After everything I've done?
translated: …………我这样做了你都还认不出我吗？所以说男人啊……

original: My name is #bClaire Tremier#k. I am the heiress to the Tremier Merchant Union.
translated: 我的名字是 #b克莱尔·特来敏#k。我是特来敏商团的独生女。

original: Tremier? That little weasel that called me a murderer?!
translated: 你说特来敏？你是说让我受冤屈的那个特来敏吗？！

original: That little WEASEL is my father.
translated: 是的。班·特来敏。那是我爸爸。

original: What is your game here?
translated: 这又是葫芦里卖什么药来着？

original: My game? I don't like your tone...
translated: 葫芦里卖什么药，你这说法真低俗。

original: Well, what are you going to do about it?
translated: 等会，#h0#！先听听特来敏小姐怎么说。究竟是怎么一回事。她也许也有什么隐情呢。

original: Whoa, #h0#, relax! Miss Tremier obviously has some good reasons for what she's doing. Let's hear her out, and listen to her pretty voice.
translated: 好的，那就听听吧。

original: Fine, but this had better be good.
translated: 你说什么？

original: Is it really that important that you find out who I am?
translated: 我是谁真的有那么重要吗？

original: Hey. We have a bond. You and me, I want us to be open with each other. Like, I just peed myself a little when that wolf bit me. See? You go.
translated: 我们可是互相救过命又互相帮助的关系嘛。以后也那样就好了。所以我希望我们能明确一下关系。

original: I hope you're ready for a surprise...
translated: 好吧。既然你都这么说了，我就告诉你吧。你做好吃惊的准备了吗？

original: Take this.
translated: 好吧，哎咦。

original: My father will do anything anything to protect me... ANYTHING.  And that is the problem. He's attempting to marry me to the ruling family of the Heaven Empire.
translated: 父亲是为了我的幸福什么都肯去做的人。但是那份心意有些过头了。父亲想把我嫁到海本王族去。

original: NOT COOL!
translated: 嫁过去！！？？

original: I have been studying with the Heaven Empire's royal family for some time now, but I hate it there. They are a cruel, and backwards society, and I want to marry for love. And...
translated: 是的，所以父亲把我送到了海本王族人们接受教育的地方去留学。可是我讨厌那样。也讨厌没有爱情的婚姻，连海本王国的思想都让我讨厌。还有……

original: And?
translated: 还有？

original: And... And... I want to be a magician!
translated: 还有？其实我想系统地学习魔法！

original: A magician? Seriously?
translated: 学魔法？

original: Oh, I know it's a foolish reason to give up an empire, but it is the only thing that makes me happy. I've been studying magic in secret since I was six!
translated: 是的，成为冒险岛世界最出色的魔法师是我的梦想。所以我一个人偷偷地自学了。

original: Hence the awesome magic show on the ship...
translated: 啊哈，所以你才会用那么多魔法啊。

original: Yes, but there's a limit to how much I can learn on my own. I've decided to study abroad, but I can't tell father. But... I don't know how to pay for it... So...
translated: 是的，可是自学总会到达极限的。所以我决心瞒着父亲到魔法王国去留学。但是我这个年纪的女孩一个人想挣到那么大笔的留学费用有点难以实现。所以……那个……

original: You're playing bodyguard for us to make the money... I get it.
translated: 啊，好了，你不说我也明白了。我明白你的意思了。

original: Yes, I suppose I am.
translated: 好的，谢谢你。会实现的。

original: So, any idea why your dad wants to make me out as a murderer?
translated: 可是克莱尔小姐的父亲为什么咬定我是杀人犯呢？

original: No. That was... unexpected. I would have to assume it has something to do with his communications with the Heaven Empire though.
translated: 是啊。这我也不是很清楚，我想或许跟海本王国有所关联。父亲最近好像给海本王族寄去了很多礼物和书信。

original: You don't get to tell me when to talk. You should be thanking me for saving your worthless life.
translated: 我需要谢谢你肯听我说吗？你们还记得我是救过你们的恩人吗？

original: Of course I'm thankful for that... but it doesn't make you trustworthy. You could just be protecting us for some bigger scheme.
translated: 关于那点是要谢谢你。但是知道你是班·特来敏的女儿之后不得不与你划清界线也是事实。

original: Fine, hold on to your mistrust like a child with a blanket, but listen to me.
translated: 也对。那也不是不能理解的。那我就说明一下吧。现在要听吗？

original: As I was trying to tell you, I am Vaughn Tremier's daughter, and sole heiress to the Tremier Merchant Union. I am his only daughter, and my mother passed away when I was born, so he's a bit protective of me.
translated: 刚才也说了我是班·特来敏的独生女。母亲呢在生我的时候就去世了。所以父亲非常宝贝地养育了我。

original: Then why are you sneaking around town?
translated: 你生得金贵，为什么这么遮头盖脸地过日子？

original: That SHOULD be obvious...
translated: 嗯…… 该从哪说起呢……

original: Get out of here! We'll get them later!
translated: 呜。不是省油的灯啊。撤退！

original: I'll catch you! I was born to do this!
translated: 等着瞧！

original: Leon, STOP! You have to stop rushing into things!
translated: 莱文别追了！又想上那些家伙们的当吗？

original: But... But...
translated: 咳呃……

original: What's going on? Where's Claire?
translated: 出什么事了？克莱尔去哪儿了？

original: I got ambushed! Some guys with crazy ninja faces came and I was like, 'BOOM no way guys stop it!' and then I attacked, but they were like, 'jump on his back and mess him up!' and now Claire's gone!
translated: 你去抓狼的时候有些奇怪的家伙们来过。不分青红皂白地扑过来，我就一味地抵挡，然后就发现特来敏小姐不见了！

original: Do you think she ran away? Or was she kidnapped? Maybe she doesn't like my cologne. Do I wear too much cologne?
translated: 是逃去哪儿了吗？还是被抓走了呢？我真是个笨蛋！！怎么都没想到保护特来敏小姐！！

original: Calm down, Leon. She'll be fine.
translated: 别自责了，莱文。她不会有事的。

original: We have to find her before something happens!
translated: 赶紧去找找她吧！

original: You'd be better off worrying about your own lives.
translated: 现在担心你们自己的小命才是更明智的。

original: Who are you?
translated: 谁呀！

original: You won't be alive long enough for that to matter.
translated: 那个你们没必要知道。反正你们马上就要从这世界上消失了。

original: You're one of the assassins who attacked the Heaven Empire envoy!
translated: 你们这些家伙是暗杀海本王国使节团的家伙们啊！！

original: You got me! Now prepare to meet your maker.
translated: 呼，醒悟吧！

original: Yes! You are so smart! Let's look for Claire!
translated: 好吧！谢谢了！那么赶紧去找特来敏小姐吧。

original: Let's take it slow, and head after them. They have to know that Claire is a Tremier, and that means they won't hurt her.
translated: 就往那些家伙消失的方向慢慢地搜寻过去吧。那些家伙如果知道她的身份的话，是不会轻易伤害她的。

original: I definitely saw them running off into the forest. Let's be as quiet as the wind.
translated: 好吧。那些家伙消失的方向好像还得往森林里面去呢。

original: Calm down. We can catch up to them.
translated: 莱文先让心情平复下来。

original: I just get so excited in my brain. I'm all fired up! I've got the vigor in my heart.
translated: 对，你说得对。我太激动了。谢谢你，多亏你让我恢复了理智。

original: But we need to think about what we're going to do and use some strategies.
translated: 首先，想想接下来我们该怎么做。

original: We have two missions, sidekick. First up, clear our names, because people think we're bad, and we are NOT bad. Second, rescue Claire and make her my girlfriend.
translated: 现在留给我们的任务有两个。首先为了洗脱罪名我们得找到真正的罪犯。还有搜救特来敏小姐。

original: I'm sorry to say it, #h0#, but Claire comes first. She's way prettier than you. Besides, chicks dig outlaws.
translated: 所以说……虽然对#h0#感到抱歉，但是我想先搜救特来敏小姐。当然你的罪名我貌似也摆脱不了干系。但是我还是认为应该先搜救特来敏小姐。

original: You can work on that other thing, but I'm going after her right now. Don't try to follow me!
translated: 并不是非要你与我同行。从现在起我们从头行动也没关系

original: Um, I actually think we could just do both things at the same time.
translated: 嗯……不对，这两件事好像有很多的相关联的地方。

original: What?! That's crazy. Claire doesn't know anything about assassinating guys. She's too nice to know assassins.
translated: 有关联？你是说使节团的暗杀和特来敏小姐绑架事件有关联吗？

original: The guys we saw after Claire disappeared were the same guys I saw when the envoy was attacked. If we can catch them, we can clear our names.
translated: 我也不太确定。但是绑走克莱尔的家伙们和使节团尸体旁边的家伙们穿着同样的衣服。所以救出克莱尔说不定也能找到为我们洗脱罪名的办法。

original: There's some bad energy nearby... and look how those guys are dressed.
translated: 好像就在这附近了。我感觉到杀气了。啊，那儿全是穿同样服装的家伙们。

original: Are you ready to go find Claire?
translated: 你做好去找克莱尔的准备了吗？

original: They were headed towards the #b#m865030200##k. Let's go!
translated: 估测了一下那些家伙逃跑的方向，往#b#m865030200##k方向逃跑的可能性较大。我们往那边去看看吧。

original: Whew, I think we did it.
translated: 呼，好像消灭得差不多了。

original: Hurry, let's go inside.
translated: 走，赶紧去里面找找看吧。

original: They must be the gatekeepers.
translated: 那些家伙们看上去是这地方的守卫。

original: There are too many of them out there to just be guarding a gate.
translated: ……如果说是守卫的话这人数也太多了吧？

original: Maybe the gate is made of gold... Whatever the case, we've gotta beat them up. This... is what I was born to do.
translated: ……不管怎样不干掉他们的话就无法通过这里了。先把能看到的都干掉。

original: I'm taking you suckers down!
translated: 我们比比看谁干掉的更多吧？走吧！

original: Claire, my darling, keep watch. This might be amusing.
translated: 虽然我想让你走，但你应该不会听我的话……那就只能。

original: What are you on about?
translated: 你想干嘛。

original: My deadly trap was broken... how?!
translated: ……我的黑影杀阵……居然被击破了。

original: That was a close one. I thought that trap was going to get us.
translated: 非同一般的杀阵。击破它是得花些力气。

original: We lost him! Arg!
translated: 真可惜那家伙好像逃跑了。

original: Don't worry about it, Leon. We have his boss. Isn't that right, Zion? I think it's time we had a little talk.
translated: 好了，那么叫西温什么的那位。现在该听听你说的了吧。

original: Nothing, nothing. Il Capo?
translated: 也没什么。喂，暗杀团团长
该到显示你的实力的时候了。

original: Dispose of them.
No problem.
translated: 什么？什么呀。

original: What? Who's this guy?
translated: …………这是不可能活着逃出来的。

original: W-we knew that Gilberto would reject our peace treaty.
translated: 我当然知道吉，吉尔伯特大人会拒绝和平条约的。

original: Why did you even propose them if you knew they'd be rejected?
translated: 原来是有计划的行动啊。如果那样的话，明知道会被拒绝还来提议的理由是什么呢？

original: M-my assassins believed that... that linking the Prime Minister of Commerci to the assassination of a peace envoy would be disastrous with the other nations...
translated: 好的，如，如果拒绝了王国的和约后，愤怒的凯梅尔兹首领杀死了海本王国的使节这样的消息传开了……

original: And then they'd all turn their backs on us! You were trying to break us down and isolate us!
translated: 周围的所有势力都会孤立凯梅尔兹共和国的。

original: T-that was His Grace's plan, yes.
translated: 就，就是那样。

original: We're going to march back to town, and you're going to tell everyone what you just told me.
translated: 好的，你得把这事实在首领面前再完完整整地重复一遍。

original: Y-yes... but you must offer me asylum.
translated: 当，当然了。

original: U-unacceptable...
translated: 你为什么要装死？你的目的是什么！

original: Why did you fake your death?
translated: 我应该没有义务回答你的问题吧？而且，你们应该没有权利抓住我不放吧？

original: I don't have to answer your questions. You have no right to hold me here!
translated: (这家伙，嘴巴还挺紧！#h0#，你能让这家伙开口吗？)

original: (#h0#, do you think you can get him to talk?)
translated: 喂，莱文，人质没必要有头发吧？还有这个难看的胡子。

original: Hey Leon. Hostages don't need their hair, right? Or their creepy little mustaches?
translated: 是啊，完全没必要啊。其实衣服也没必要吧？

original: No, I don't really see why they would. Hey, they don't need their clothes either!
translated: 是啊，把头发和胡子全部剃掉，衣服也脱下来，那他估计就不能逃跑了，这个主意不错啊。让我看看，拔胡子应该用镊子吧……

original: Yeah, if this guy was bald AND naked, he'd be too embarrassed to leave. I think i've got a tweezer in my bag here...
translated: 其实那些像要暗杀我的人是我的手下。

original: It was the assassins' idea! They are the ones who forced me to fake my own death.
translated: 看来你现在才想说啊。

original: See? That was easy.
translated: 该死……！

original: Are you okay Claire? Did they hurt you? I will fight anyone who hurt you!
translated: 特来敏小姐你原来在这里啊。你没事吗？没有受伤吗？

original: I'm fine. I'm glad you're both alive.
translated: 是的，我没事。你们好像也没事呢。

original: I'm glad you're alive too, Claire. Just in general.
translated: 是的，托你的福我们也没事。

original: What happened to Zion and his henchmen?
translated: 西温的部下们怎么样了？

original: I've got some bad news... Zion was assassinated. We couldn't save him.
translated: 他们你就不用担心了。只是…… 可惜最后西温还是被杀了。

original: Zion is... dead?
translated: 怎么会这样……

original: But we're all alive!
translated: 不管怎样大家都没事真是万幸。

original: So s-should we go? I don't feel safe here.
translated: 现在就去，去了就行了吧。

original: Yeah, let's leave..
translated: 好吧，现在就去吧。

original: Wait, where's Claire?
translated: 等会，特来敏小姐去哪了？

original: She is safe. One of my men escorted her away before the battle.
translated: 啊，刚刚战斗前我怕克莱尔小姐被卷进来，把她送到外面去了。

original: She's likely in #b#m865030300##k.
I see, then let's go.
translated: 原来是那样。那么我们也赶紧出去吧。

original: Let's go see Gilberto.
translated: 好吧，赶紧带到吉尔伯特首领那儿去吧。

original: I don't think so.
translated: 那样可不行。

original: Gah!
translated: 呃啊！

original: Zion! Wake up Zion!
translated: 糟糕，西温呢！重要的证人消失了！

original: ...He's gone. Maaaaan, how are we going to clear our names?!
translated: 这下麻烦了，现在要如何才能洗脱罪名呢？

original: We let our guard down, and now... what are we going to do?
translated: 稍微放松一下竟然就发生这样的事情！将来的事情也让人担心呐……

original: We at least have to find Claire.
translated: 嗯……啊！如此特来敏小姐也叫人担心呢！得赶紧出去看看！

original: Where did Zion say she was?
translated: 刚刚西温说克莱尔在哪里？

original: #b#m865030300##k. Let's move.
translated: 说大概会在#b#m865030300##k。赶紧走吧。

original: This is like the barriers the Delfinos were using...
translated: 是这里吗？这是……这好像是跟我原来见过的阿库旁多的结界是同种类的结界。

original: Let's see if we can get through.
translated: 那样的话，从这进去就是另一个地方了吧。

original: Let's return to San Commerci.
translated: 赶紧一起回桑凯梅尔兹吧。

original: Yes, we should... wait. I sense something...
translated: 请稍等。我感觉到了什么。

original: What do you mean?
translated: 感觉？你感觉到了什么啊？

original: There's an ominous presence nearby...
translated: 说不上来……虽然不知道是什么，但是是种不祥的感觉。

original: If Claire says she feels ominous, we have GOT to check it out.
translated: 特来敏小姐说感觉到什么，我也好像有所感觉似的。#h0#我们稍微查看一下四周如何？

original: Okay... Claire, where do we go?
translated: 嗯，就看看吧。而且说是不祥的感觉，就这么走的话真是有点不踏实。克莱尔你是在哪儿感觉到的呢？

original: It's nearby. It's been there from the start, but I thought it was the assassins at first.
translated: 好像就在这附近。其实从一开始我就感觉到了，那时还以为是因为西温和暗杀团员们的原因呢。

original: Then we'd better look around.
translated: 那么就得以这为中心四周找找看看了。

original: The sense of evil here is overwhelming... it's like I can't breathe... Something powerful is down here.
translated: 呃，非同一般的杀气。好像胸口被压着一样的压迫感。里面貌似有什么强大的东西。

original: I'd better get back to town for now. I have to prove my innocence before it's too late.
translated: 先撤吧。现在首先要洗脱嫌疑。

original: Whew, I can finally breathe again! It was nasty in there...
translated: 呼呼，从结界出来好像活过来了。

original: Claire, do you think you were sensing this barrier?
translated: 特来敏小姐。是这个结界吗？

original: I believe so. It certainly feels the same... dark and nefarious.
translated: 应该就是这里。从这儿能感觉到强烈的不好的气息。

original: #h0#, it's time for us to go in, and and take a look.
translated: 嗯…… 原来如此。进去看看吧。#h0#，赶紧进去调查调查吧

original: Let me take this one alone. You stay here.
translated: 好吧。但是就我一个人进去。你留在这里。

original: What? I was BORN to do this!
translated: 嗯？你干嘛要一个人进去啊？

original: You weren't born to do anything! Just stay here and watch Claire.
translated: 谁知道里面有什么。而且你一起进去的话我不放心克莱尔的安全。

original: Oooooh, I get it. Nice move, sidekick. I'll stay here with Claire.
translated: 嗯。好吧，知道了。但是如果发生什么事的话，你不要逞强马上出来。

original: Great, yes. I'm going in.
translated: 嗯，知道了。好了，那我进去喽。

original: Sir.
translated: 首领大人。

original: You've returned...
translated: 啊，你！

original: What'd you find?
translated: 回来啦。如何？结界里面有什么吗？

original: I didn't go too far in, but there's something mean in there. It felt like something was trying to kill me with its mind.
translated: 我没有往深处去所以也不太清楚。我只到了结界的入口就感到了非同一般的杀气就没再往里去了。

original: Whoa, good thing you came back. Let's just get back to my dad in San Commerci and fix this whole thing up.
translated: 做得好。再往深处去如果发生什么事的话就麻烦了。好了，那我们回桑凯梅尔兹吧？

original: Yeah, let's go back. I think we could all use a rest.
translated: 好吧，赶紧回去吧。克莱尔也累了。

original: I-I can't face my father. I'll go as far as the city gates...
translated: 我呢……就到入口就行了。因为我可不能碰见我父亲……

original: Okay, let's go.
translated: 啊，那就那样吧。好了，走吧

original: It's all true.
translated: 这人说的话都是事实。

original: C-Claire?! What are you doing in San Commerci?!
translated: 啊，这不是……克莱尔你怎么到这儿来了……！！

original: This is your daughter, is it not, Vaughn?
translated: 原来是班·特来敏的女儿克莱尔啊。

original: Hello, Prime Minister Daniella.
translated: 是的，您好吗。首领大人。

original: Why are you here? You should be in the Heaven Empire! Your studies!
translated: 你怎么会来这里？你现在不是在海本王国留学……

original: I'll tell you more later father. For now, you have to know that everything this person says is true. I saw it all. Zion tried to silence them...
translated: 我的事情日后在另作禀报，父亲。首领大人，这人说的话全部都是事实。我也在一旁听得真真切切的，西温想陷害这几位的事实。

original: Is that so?
translated: 那是事实吗？

original: Zion kidnapped me, father, but these two rescued me from his grasp.
translated: 是的，是事实。我还被他们绑架，多亏这几位的帮助才逃脱出来的。

original: K-kidnapped?!
translated: 绑，绑架？？岂，岂有此理……

original: Thank you for the information, Claire. Now, Vaughn, would you say that these two have proven their innocence, or do you mistrust even your own daughter?
translated: 请镇静。特来敏。谢谢你重要的证言，克莱尔小姐。多亏了你救了两位差点儿枉受冤屈的年轻人。班·特来敏。你认为呢？你不会连你女儿的话都不相信了吧？

original: I... Fine. Claire, come with me!
translated: 呃呃……好吧。先就那样吧。克莱尔！你跟我来！

original: Until we meet again...
translated: 那么我就告辞了。下次再见。

original: Sir, I have something to tell you.
translated: 您好吗。首领。我有话对您说。

original: How DARE you come back here?!
translated: 你这些家伙还有什么脸面到这地方来啊！

original: Why are you here?
translated: 吉尔伯特首领，没有必要听他的。还不赶紧逮捕他们，干嘛呢。

original: Gilberto, there's no point in listening to this nonsense! Why aren't you arresting them?
translated: 就算该抓的时候就抓，先听听他们说什么有何不妥。你说说什么事情？

original: Why are you so afraid to hear what they have to say, Vaughn? Please, say what you've come to say.
translated: 西温一开始实际上并没死，他是在装死。

original: Zion, the delegate from the Heaven Empire, faked his death.
translated: 是的，这都是为了孤立凯梅尔兹共和国而计划的阴谋。

original: Faked?
translated: 是的，对外说海本王国提出了和约，但是凯梅尔兹反对，还杀死了使节团。最终，凯梅尔兹共和国就会被冒险岛世界的各个地方责难和孤立。

original: It was part of a plot to isolate Commerci from the other nations of Dawnveil.
translated: 那是什么荒唐的阴谋论啊！

original: A conspiracy...
translated: 呃嗯……那叫西温的人现在在哪？

original: Yes. They wanted it to look like he was assassinated for bringing a peace treaty to you. The other nations wouldn't know how unfair the treaty had been.
translated: 虽已成功抓捕…… 但最终又被海本的暗杀者杀死了。

original: This is utter nonsense!
translated: 那么你的意思是现在是真的死了吗？

original: Where is the envoy now?
translated: 这种谎话王！毫无证据空口无凭来骗我

original: We... we captured him, but a real assassin got to him before we could get to San Commerci. It had to have been someone from the Heaven Empire...
translated: 你有什么想说的？

original: So he is lost to us for good now?
translated: 他是装死？

original: Correct.
translated: 孤立的阴谋？

original: This is ridiculous! This yarn wouldn't be fit for a children's book!
translated: 是的，是那样的。

original: Definitely suspicious, but with no hard evidence, there's not much I can do.
translated: 虽然有嫌疑，但是没有证据证言，无法公开抗议。

original: If only I could have saved Zion...
translated: 是的，关于那一点真的是很可惜。如果有西温就好了。

original: That man chose his fate. Consorting with assassins is a dangerous game, and betraying them is downright foolish. Anyway, you and I have more pressing matters to discuss.
translated: 已经是过去的事了有什么办法呢。别再想了。比起那个我有话对你说。

original: We do?
translated: 您有话对我说，是什么事呢？

original: Give me a short moment, would you?
translated: 嗯……你能过一会儿再来找我说话吗。我整理一下思绪

original: I knew you were innocent. I'm glad that we could prove it.
translated: 真是万幸。洗脱了嫌疑。

original: I'm glad we could work everything out too. I felt bad that Leon got swept up in this.
translated: 是啊，真是万幸啊。我也就算了，害莱文你也一起受冤枉我心里真是过意不去呢。

original: The course of a man's life is decided by their behavior in moments of peril. This will be good for my son. I only hope he can forgive my betrayal as a father...
translated: 虽然现在才这么说毫无意义，但是其实我是一直相信你的。当然我儿子莱文就更不用说了。

original: You're the leader of the Republic. I think he'll understand that you had to do what was best for the nation.
translated: 我理解的。身为共和国的首领也是无可奈何的事。

original: I hope. Can you tell me more about what happened with the Heaven Empire envoy?
translated: 关于海本使节团的事情你能再详细说说吗？

original: Sure. It was actually Claire who rescued us before we were arrested.
translated: 是，其实我们被捕前救出我们的人就是克莱尔·特来敏。

original: She used magic to save you?
translated: 那时使用那魔法的人就是克莱尔啊。

original: Yes, she's pretty good at it, actually. We were hiding out in the forest on the outskirts of San Commerci, but Claire was abducted.
translated: 是的，我们逃到了凯梅尔兹外围的大森林里，在那里克莱尔小姐被一伙人给绑架了。

original: And the abductors were assassins from the Heaven Empire?
translated: 那绑匪们就是海本王国的暗杀团吗？

original: I'm not 100% sure, but Zion was ordering them around. He said they were the ones who came up with the plot.
translated: 虽然一直都是推测，但是应该是那样的。因为西温称之为自己的部下。

original: Hmmm... But for all we know, they could be an independent group, or mercenaries. And with Zion gone, there is no way to find out.
translated: 嗯……但是也说不定是哪里雇来的暗杀公会的家伙们。反正西温死了就再也无从而知了。

original: Hey, there's Leon! And... Claire? What are they up to?
translated: 啊，那是莱文啊。嗯？克莱尔。好像正在对话呢……

original: You've been embroiled in our politics against your will, but I have one more favor to ask you.
translated: 嗯，都整理好了。不是别的事，我有件事想委托你可以吗？

original: Is it about Leon? I don't think I can fix him.
translated: 委托我吗？是和莱文一起做的事情吗？

original: No, no. Leon is... he will grow into himself. I have a more subtle task for you. Will you hear me out?
translated: 不是，与莱文无关只是拜托你的事情。因为貌似只有你能完成。你要听吗？

original: Sure, what can I do?
translated: 是，虽然不知道是什么事情，但是只要是我能力所及的事情我就听您的。

original: You're quite kind, haha. Could you deliver this letter to Empress Cygnus.
translated: 果然够豪放，呵呵。你能把我给你的书信转交给你们的希纳斯女皇吗？

original: Empress Cygnus? What... is it?
translated: 啊？给希纳斯女皇大人吗？什么……。啊……难道是！！

original: It's a peace treaty, though I assure the terms are fair and equitable, haha. I would like to propose an alliance between our peoples.
translated: 是的。是我作为凯梅尔兹的首领代表凯梅尔兹给希纳斯女皇传递的和平提议书信。怎么样？可以吗？

original: Whoa... Of course! I'll read it to her a thousand times if I need to!
translated: 啊……那当然啦。当然啦！不管几次都可以！

original: You have been a strange and welcome visitor, #h0#. I hope to see you again soon. Leon will be waiting for you at the harbor.
translated: 那么就拜托你了。去冒险岛世界的船已经准备好了。去码头，莱文在那里等你呢。

original: Thank you, sir. I'll come back and visit soon!
translated: 谢谢。首领大人。我这就赶快去向女皇大人转达这好消息，以后再来拜见您。

original: See that you do.
translated: 一路顺风。

original: Uh, Miss Claire, can I bother you for a moment?
translated: 是#h0#。如此看来我还没介绍过我的名字呢。

original: Oh, you... What is your name?
translated: 啊，是的，#h0#。有什么事吗？找我有事吗？

original: Sorry, I guess I never introduced myself. I'm #h0#.
translated: 啊，这是莱文让我转交给你的。

original: I guess not. What do you need from me, #h0#?
translated: 啊，好的。谢谢你了。辛苦你了。

original: Leon asked me to give you this.
translated: 克莱尔，请稍等。

original: Oh, yes, that does look like his brutish scrawl. Thank you very much.
translated: 嗯？啊…那……

original: ...I'll be going.
translated: ……。那么我先告辞了。

original: Hey, Leon.
translated: 嗯？啊，你来啦。我听首领说了。准备好的话……

original: Hm? Oh, hey, sidekick. I heard from dad. When you're ready...
translated: 怎么回事。两人是什么关系啊。

original: Wait... What did I just see? What's going on between you two?
translated: 嗯？啊……你是说克莱尔小姐吧？

original: Hm? Oh, you mean Miss Tremier?
translated: 怎么回事……怎么回事怎么回事……称呼从#r特来敏小姐#k变成了#b克莱尔小姐#k了呢。这是怎么回事。两人究竟发生了什么事。

original: Wait, wait, wait. What happened to all the girlfriend talk?! What's going on?!
translated: 啊……哈哈……不就是更亲近了一些而已嘛。

original: We, uh, we just decided to, like, get to know each other. She says I have to be more gentlemanly.
translated: 就算是那样眼神也非比寻常啊。好好把握吧。

original: Wait, does she actually LIKE you? Like, like-like?! Go get her, man!
translated: 少来了。我现在还有好多事要做好多东西要学呢。我知道我自己在很多方面都非常不足以至于还不能够对另一个人的人生负责。

original: She and I both have a lot of stuff we want to do in life before we bring a new person into our families. We're gonna take it slow...
translated: (结婚……我还没说到结婚呢……)

original: I... wasn't talking about marriage... But whatever works.
translated: 啊，对了，离出航貌似还有一些时间。不忙的话能拜托你件事吗？

original: Hey, I've still got to round up my crew before we set sail. Can you do one last thing for me?
translated: 这种情况下有事拜托我。说吧什么事。

original: A favor? What is it?
translated: 呃，呃嗯。其实刚刚我想把这封信给克莱尔小姐的，但是丢了魂了结果没把信给她。你替我转交给她吧。可能又马上要去海本王国了，你得赶紧了。

original: W-well. I wrote a letter for Miss Tremier, but we got so caught up saying goodbye that I forgot to give it to her. Could you take it to her before she leaves for the Heaven Empire?
translated: 你亲手交给她去岂不更好？现在被拖去海本王国的话，就不知道什么时候能再见了。

original: Are you sure you don't want to give it to her yourself? You don't know when you'll see her again.
translated: 我当然也想亲手交给她啦。刚刚分手我就已经开始想她了。

original: Oh, man, you think she'd give me a kiss? No, Leon, no! That's not what a gentleman would do. I think. Ohh, I miss her eyes...
(I think I'm going to vomit...)
translated: 但是现在还不是时候。我要变成更帅的男人再出现在她面前。还有，两人各在远方思念对方也很浪漫不是吗？哈哈

original: It's better if you do it. I'll become a better man and win her the right way. It's more romance novely that way, right? Haha!
translated: 啊啊，好吧，我知道了。我会支持你的，你这家伙。

original: Uggghhhh fine. Just leave me out of the next round.
translated: 莱文。

original: Hey, you're back! Was she swooning over me? No, Leon, that's not gentlemanly. But was she?
translated: 哟，你来啦。书信转交给她了吗？

original: I gave her your letter.
translated: 嗯。我亲手转交的。你放心。

original: Did she read it? Did she look happy? Was she touching her hair? You can tell a girl likes you if they touch their hair!
translated: 好吧，有什么反应呢？高兴吗？

original: (Leon, you are so clueless!) Oh... yeah... totally... all kinds of hair touching. And she asked me to give this to you.
translated: 哦……嗯…那……当然啦……(莱文你真是的……) 啊，还有让我把这个交给你。

original: YES! What is it?
translated: 这是什么？

original: Man, I don't know! You open it.
translated: 那我就不知道喽。你拆开来看看啊。

original: Let... me... see... What is this?
translated: 哪呢……。啊，这是……？这是什么呢？

original: Looks like some kind of charm.
translated: 好像是什么符似的。

original: It must be a good luck, no harm charm! I will never let this leave my person. Ever.
translated: 噢，看来是保佑平安的符咒！我要随身携带！

original: Maybe just wear it like half of the time... (I really hope that thing is not cursed.)
translated: 好了，真是万幸。(就没必要告诉他是试验品而已了吧。希望那可千万别是诅咒，而得是祝福的符文。)

original: Hey, uh, when are you leaving?
translated: 这会儿马上父亲准备好就要离开了。

original: As soon as my father is ready.
translated: 看来班·特来敏大人要一起去了？

original: He's going too?
translated: 是的。他好像担心说不定又中途在哪消失了似的。

original: Yes, I believe this whole business with the kidnappers has put him on edge. He's barely let me go to the bathroom by myself, haha.
translated: 原来如此。那也别放弃自己的梦想。成为大魔法师的梦想。

original: But you're not going to give up, right? On being a magician?
translated: 谢谢你。有空的时候我自己会继续筹集资本……不是，是学习。

original: Of course not! That's ridiculous. I will continue to collect money... and knowledge, so long as I can.
translated: (这姑娘，如此的话又该离家出走了。)

original: (She is totally going to run away again.)
translated: 你没什么话要我转告莱文吗？现在离开的话想见面可就难了。

original: Is there anything you want me to tell Leon? Just in case you don't see him again?
translated: 嗯？应该是那样吧。我也没什么要说的呢。

original: Leon? No. I said my goodbyes.
translated: …………？？？你会想他都没关系吗？

original: You're not going to miss him?! I thought you two were like...
translated: 啊？为什么？啊，当然也不会完全不想他啦。

original: Why would I miss him?
translated: 原，原来如此。(莱，莱文你这家伙……呵呵)

original: Right, right... Why indeed? (Leon, you poor thing!)
translated: 啊，那么能请你把这个转交给他吗？

original: Actually, could you give him this?
translated: 知道了。我会转交给他的。

original: Sure, no problem. I'll make sure he gets it.
translated: 我尝试着做的。那就拜托你了。

original: It's... it's a new spell I'm testing out. I hope it works for him.
translated: 克莱尔何时离开呢。

original: Whew! It's feels like ages since I've been somewhere familiar.
translated: 咻~感觉好久之后才回到了熟悉的地方啊。

original: Where yuh been?! I thought y'uns was fish food.
translated: 看来你平安回来了啊？

original: Oh... SERIOUSLY?! Parbell? You're alive?! What are you doing here?
translated: 啊，你是……探险家帕尔巴特？你在暴风雨中没有受伤吗？

original: Hah! Do I looks like a feller what would get done in by such a bitty little storm? Ol' Parbell's seen plenty worse than that on the high seas!
translated: 哈哈哈！我这么伟大的探险家怎么可能在那点困难下就屈服呢？那点风浪我已经经历了几千次了！

original: About before... I know it weren't the safe n' cozy voyage I promised, so consider yerself off the hook fer that reward yuh promised me.
translated: 虽然那不是一趟舒适的航行……但是啊，我之前说的回报什么的就算了吧，反正我也没能履行约定，把你从凯梅尔兹带回明珠港。

original: Were you waiting here for me? How did you know I'd be back?
translated: 那你为什么还在这里等我啊。

original: Ain't no way a lil' bitty storm like that would leave yuh swimmin' with the fishes. Not if yuh got half the gumption of Ol' Parbell! I's afraid I didn't have much time to look for y'un what with my boat in pieces. But I heard yuh were safe from Mayor Berry, so I went ahead n' booked passage back here.
translated: 首先，你在那种风浪中不可能死，安全到达了凯梅尔兹，那我的工作就算完成一半了！当然，因为船被毁了，我回到这里也花了点功夫，但我是不能到凯梅尔兹去找你了。我也有苦衷，请你理解。

original: (Ugh... You're going to have to complain about this to Neinheart when you return to Ereve.)
translated: (……回到圣地后我一定要和南哈特好好理论一下。)

original:
I figures yer gonna want a lift back to see that Empress Syggus o' yers. It's only fair I take y'un there fer free in mah new boats. 
#b(You will be moved to Ereve if you accept.)#k
translated:
即便如此，那个老学究的委托我也不能无视，我就只能尽力帮你了。我能带你轻松地前往圣地，你现在要去圣地吗？
#b(接受时立刻前往圣地)

original: The weather's pretty fair today, I reckon we won't run afoul o' no trouble.
translated: 这次没问题了！走吧！

original: We're all ready to set sail. Did you get everything?
translated: 已经做好了远行的准备了吗。行李都带好了吧？那就出发吧？

original: All right, time to set sail! Our destination: Lith Harbor!
translated: 出发吧！目的地是明珠港！

original: Captain Blood!
translated: 我正等着你们呢。

original: I've been waitin' for ye!
translated: 普赛依！

original: W-what the...? He's gone. How'd he do that?
translated: 怎，怎么回事。瞬间消失了。去哪儿啦？

original: Leon, look!
translated: 莱文看那里！

original: He's already on his ship! Poop! We were so close!
translated: 不知何时已经回到了自己的舰船上去了嘛。岂有此理！到嘴的鸭子飞了！！

original: What now? That felt like our best shot, but he still got away. I don't think following him to his base is a good idea...
translated: 怎么办呢？就这么放弃太可惜了，但是对方可是被称为海盗王的男人啊。随便进入敌人的根据地会……

original: But, but, we can't give up now! I can't go back empty-handed! I'll never get my allowance at this rate!
translated: 我也知道。可是到目前为止见过无数的普赛依远征队。但一次也没有成功过。现在这是我们走运。如果现在放弃的话说不定就再也没可能了。

original: Look, I know this is probably Captain Blood's trap, leading us into his base like this. You don't have to come, but I'm going. For me, for my dad, and for Commerci!
translated: 这也许是普赛依布下的陷阱。你不和我一起去也没关系。但是我要去。为了我，为了我们的商团，为了凯梅尔兹！

original: Well, when you say it like that, I'm in!
translated: 嗯……那么好吧。我也和你一块去。

original: Really? I thought traps were bad things.
translated: 真的吗？也许可能就像你说的那样是陷阱呢。

original: It's okay. I'm pretty used to this kind of thing.
translated: 啊哎，没关系。我自己会想办法逃出来的。

original: Shall I come too?
translated: 我也一起去吧？

original: No. You stay behind, guard the ship, and think about our date.
translated: 你就别去了。你留下来守好这条船。

original: All right, #h0#! Let's move out! I got the door!
translated: 好了，#h0#走吧！我来开条活路！

original: Hold up. I'm going in there alone.
translated: 等会，你在这儿等着。那地方我要一个人去。

original: What? No! I didn't come all this way to watch someone else beat the boss!
translated: 你说什么呢。你一个人去置身死地，让我装作视而不见吗？

original: Leon, think about it. You're the captain of this ship. What if something happens while the captain is away? You have to put your crew first.
translated: 我说莱文。你现在是这船的舰长。舰长如果离开了这船万一发生什么事的话可怎么办。我们必须得顾虑到万一若是发生不测的情况啊。

original: Yeah, but... I want glory!
translated: 虽说是那样……可是也……

original: Shh, I know. But a captain's glory comes from doing his duty.
translated: 作为舰长你必须守住船。

original: ...This sucks.
translated: ……拜托你了。

original: Your pirating days are over!
translated: 现在我就让你们这些家伙的海盗行为到达截止日期。

original: Hahaha! Ye've walked into th' belly a' th' beast and ye don't even know it!
translated: 嗯？见过这么脑袋不灵光的朋友吗。看来你还不太明白你现在的处境啊。

original: That's what you think, scurvy-face! Thanks for bringing your guys along so I can mop the floor with them all at once.
translated: 才不呢，我可是非常清楚呢。我要抓的家伙们全部聚集在这里，反而是我们要说声谢谢呢。

original: Puff up ye chest, wee seagull. I'll gift ye a right whippin' ye'll never forget!
translated: 哼，真是个趾高气昂的家伙。我就等着看你能装得意装到什么时候。

original: (This guy... I'm going to swab his decks!)
translated: (话是那么说，可是该怎么办呢。现在就立马攻击吗？

original: Ye won't scrape ME off like some blasted barnacle. Th' gods 'o th' sea be on me side!
translated: 见鬼。我怎么能就这么被捕……。嗯？哈哈哈……。难道是海之神的祝福要降临于我。

original: W-what is that noise?
translated: 刚刚突然是什么声音？

original: G-G-G-Grosso Polpo! Did anybody bring kraken repellant?!
translated: 是，是深海巨妖！！大家快躲开！！

original: What's happening? Is the ship in danger?
translated: 那是什么。我们舰船出什么事了吗？

original: 'Tis me old matey, #r#eGrosso Polpo, outlaw of the sea#k#n!  	What's ye move, landlubber?! Fight me 'n face th' sea? Or save ye pretty bucko from th' kraken?
translated: 看来是遭到#r#e海里的暴徒深海巨妖#k#n袭击了。好了，打算怎么办呢。你现在好像不是在这儿跟我你推我搡玩摔跤的时候哦。

original: Leon! Arg! I've gotta save him.
translated: 呃哦……先去救莱文吧。

original: He's through the #e#bportal up front#k#n. Blast it!
translated: 通过#e#b前面的传送#k#n过去。

original: Yaarrr... me throbbin' head... how...
translated: 呜哦……我竟然中招了……

original: Give it up and hand yourself over. I'll make sure they go easy on you.
translated: 好啦，现在可以放弃乖乖地束手就擒了吧。

original: Ah, I see you're back. You look like you've had a rough time of it.
translated: 你来了啊，从你的脸上就能看到你很辛苦啊。

original: Yeah, thanks to a certain somebody.
translated: 真是多亏了某人啊。

original: Oh? Well, I hope you dealt with that person appropriately.
translated: 什么某人啊，你这说的像是有哪个人特意让你受苦了啊。你的表情似乎是在说我就是那个人啊？

original: Uh... Anyway, remember how you said you'd arranged my passage to Commerci? Turns out nobody ever paid Parbell. Also, the boat sinking halfway there wasn't exactly what I signed up for.
translated: ……究竟帕尔巴特是什么人，你给了他什么才让他带我到凯梅尔兹的？还有，一开始去凯梅尔兹的船本身……

original: Huh? I didn't give you Parbell's ruby? Strange... I rarely forget things like that. As for your having to get a little wet, I deeply apologize. The next time your Empress wants to call for your help, I'll be sure to remind her you only perform duties that are convenient.
translated: 请你不要再说这些没营养的话了。最终你不是没什么损失吗？而且还交到了好朋友。当然，我并没有预料到这一点。

original: #b(...I'm detecting serious notes of sarcasm in this apology.)#k
translated: #b(……我感觉这次也被这个人玩弄于股掌之中啊。)#k

original: In any case, you've performed your mission admirably, as always. This is precisely why I push you around.
translated: 总之，辛苦你了。委托你做事的时候，总是有好结果呢。看来这就是意外之喜吧。

original: Oh my, that was a slip of the tongue. What I meant was 'this is why I push you to greatness.' Don't misunderstand.
translated: 哎呀，我说错了，这都是你有实力的结果啊。

original: #b(...I forgot to ask the Empress to give Neinheart a scolding...)#k
translated: #b(……我居然忘了让女皇教训南哈特……)#k

original:
It may not be enough but be reward enough for your service, but this is a gift from the Empress for all your hard work. 

#b#i2049702:##t2049702##k
#b#i2431935:##t2431935##k
#b#i2431936:##t2431936##k

Oh! And one more thing. This was attached to the letter you brought from Commerci. You should take good care of it.

#b#i1142981:##t1142981##k
translated:
还有，你从凯梅尔兹带来的书信里，还附有这样的东西。你可得好好保管它。

#b#i1142981:##t1142981##k

original: #h0#, I'm glad to see you are well.
translated: 你来了啊，#h0#。我正在等你。

original: Heya, Empress? I just got back.
translated: 您好，女皇大人，我刚刚回来。

original: I was beginning to get worried. You were out of touch for a while.
translated: 再次见到你，我很高兴。你这段时间过得如何？其实之前有段时间没能联系上你，我还担心来着。

original: Yeah, I guess I got stuck in a sticky situation.
translated: 是的，发生了很多事情。虽然我在那里结交了新的朋友，但是我也被卷入了很多复杂的事件中，发生了一些让人头疼的事情。

original: Oh my! I trust that everything went well in Commerci?
translated: 真是辛苦你了。那么，凯梅尔兹实际上是个怎样的地方？

original: Eventually, yes. It was a lot like the rest of Maple World, fresh air, beautiful sights, and good people... Punctuated by occasional bouts of insanity and evil.
translated: 嗯，那里比我想象中要更加充满活力。绿色大自然和凉爽的风……秀丽的风景……在那里生活的许多人……还有他们专属的许多事情……

original: It sounds like a very splendid place. I look forward to visiting someday.
translated: 真是个美丽的地方啊，我以后也想去一次呢。

original: Yeah, let's put a hold on that. I DO have a letter for you though. It's from the Prime Minister of the San Commerci, their big capital.
translated: 啊，这是凯梅尔兹共和国首领大人的亲笔信。他让我交给女皇大人。

original: #face0#For me?
translated: #face0#给我吗？

original: I didn't read it, but I think it's a peace treaty.
translated: 是的，因为这是给女皇大人的信，所以我不知道里面的内容，但我想这应该是为了和平的信件。

original: If it is, you have done a great thing for Maple World. Thank you.
translated: 原来如此，真是辛苦你了。看来我把这件事委托给#h0#真是太正确了。这个成果将帮助凯梅尔兹共和国和整个冒险岛世界。这都是#h0#的功劳。

original: Sure thing!
translated: 您过奖了。

original: I thank you for proving I was right to have faith in you, #h0#. Your friendship means a great deal to me.
translated: 这次你也没有辜负我的期待，真的谢谢你。#h0#，你的存在一直都是我的巨大支柱。

original: #face2#You look weary. You should go get some rest. I could use a nap myself.
translated: #face2#之前发生了那么多辛苦的事情，请你好好休息吧……到我再次需要#h0#的帮助之前哦，呵呵。

original: Oh, I had something prepared for you, a small token of my thanks. I left it with Neinheart.
translated: 对了，我为#h0#准备了小礼物。请你去找南哈特吧。

original: Calling the Alliance. The Black Wings are operating deep within the mines below Edelstein. Something fould is afoot. Need help in #m310010000# immediately. Please Accept
translated: 隶属于联盟的所有人，我来介绍一下埃德尔斯坦地下矿山发生的事件。在黑色之翼内部好像发生了很大的变化。我需要你的帮助。请马上到#m310010000#来。你想现在移动吗？

original: Thank you for coming. I'll explain more about the underground mine situation, but first... You know who this is?
translated: 感谢你来到埃德尔斯坦。因为必须告诉联盟下属的各位，所以才突然和你联系。我就简单地为你说明一下埃德尔斯坦地下矿山发生的事情。首先……你知道左边的人是谁吗？

original: I know that face!
translated: ……那个人是……！

original: You should. She is the founder of the Black Wings and the commander of the Black Mage's Army...
translated: 你的猜测是对的。是的，她就是黑色之翼的创始人和领导者，黑魔法师的军团长……

original: Orchid.
translated: 奥尔卡？

original: She is the reason our city was taken. She is the one who masterminded the theft of the Seal Stones, attacked Mercedes... That such a small girl could have caused so much havoc...
translated: 是的，他就是占领埃德尔斯坦并夺取能源，在冒险岛世界各地夺取封印石，攻击联盟成员双弩精灵的人……军团长奥尔卡。

original: She's been quiet for a while now, so I knew there must be trouble brewing. The Black Wings appear to have had a coup.
translated: 我说后来她怎么就销声匿迹了……看来是有原因的。黑色之翼内部，以及军团长的构成都发生了巨大的变化。

original: We've pieced together some information suggesting that Orchid was ousted from her position. We're not sure why, but there has been a huge shake-up in the command structure of the Black Wings.
translated: 老实说，我们也没有完全掌握所有的情况……根据军团长奥尔卡的陈述和在地下矿山研究所中发现的痕迹，我们推测出了一些情况，所以才将联盟的人召集了起来。

original: It all seems to have begun when Orchid was betrayed by the scientist...
translated: 好了，我来为你说明一下，军团长奥尔卡到底发生了什么事，以及我们所了解到的事件的真相。说明可能会有点长……但是这是非常重要的事情，希望你能注意听。

original: Welcome to connecting to the Evolution System Enhancement Mode. This mode supports a stronger training program. Beginning guide now.
translated: 欢迎连接到进化系统强化模式. 进化系统强化模式能够支持更大强度的训练程序. 进化系统强化模式说明现在开始.

original: Initiating system enhancement mode. Would you like to operate the Evolution System? You will be connected to a much more enhanced virtual world.
translated: 进化系统强化模式开始. 确定要实施进化系统吗? 连接到强化后的虚拟世界.

original:
What took you so long?! You better not have been rooting through my things!
#b
#L0#I wasn't, but I found this letter up there by the potion box... It's from some guy named Chromile.#l
translated:
怎么这么慢？该不会是趁我不在的时候，在哪儿偷懒吧？让你去拿的东西呢？
#b
#L0# ……在这里……还有，我在阁楼里捡到了这封信。好像还没看过……好像是个叫库洛姆的人寄来的……#l

original: What?! Who told you you could touch that?!
translated: 你说什么！！快给我！干嘛随便碰别人的东西？

original: Another great day with the old man...
translated: 呜呜……今天又被骂了……

original: Huh? What's that?
translated: 嗯？那是什么？

original: It was like... a small shining light...
translated: 哇！！刚才那是什么？我看见了……一道明亮的光……？

original: Are you done cleaning yet? I suppose it looks moderately presentable in here. What are you looking at? Go organize the shelves!
translated: 怎么这么慢？磨磨蹭蹭的～打扫完了吗？现在好像稍微好一点了。看什么看？打扫完了的话，快来帮我整理东西！

original:
Where's the eggs? I told you to get eggs. If you broke them... Wait a second, what happened to you?
 #b
#L0# Uh, well, you know how you told me not to mess with Bigby? Well... I kinda... He got out.#l
translated:
鸡蛋拿来了吗？没打碎吧？等等，怎么成了这个样子？发生了什么事？
#b
#L0#嗯……“沃尔夫”突然攻击了我……然后……“沃尔夫”逃走了。#l

original: What?!! I swear to every deity I can think of, you will starve to death if that dog is not in my yard by dinnertime.
translated: 什么！“沃尔夫”逃走了？你这没用的东西！！今天不许吃饭！！如果找不到“沃尔夫”，你也别回来了！

original: Do you see, Neinheart? This child must be the descendant of the Knight of Light.
translated: 是的，女皇陛下说的总是对的。虽然还有很多不足之处，但这个少年好像确实继承了光之骑士的血。

original: I suppose the Empress is correct. You will have to learn the ways of a true knight, shopkeep. Your skills with a broom won't get you far on the battlefield.
translated: 我父亲是光之骑士？我会成为光之骑士？我只是个平凡的少年。连名字都没有……

original: My father was the Knight of Light? What does that even mean? I'm just an ordinary kid...
translated:
选择权在你。但是你生来就带有光明之血，最好不要和自己的命运对抗。为了你，同时也是为了冒险岛世界。
你愿意跟我走吗？

original:
The choice is yours. Listen to your heart. The voice of destiny will guide you down the correct path. For the good of your own soul, and the good of the world...
Will you come with me?
translated: 你好像需要个名字。就用“从光明中诞生的人”的意思，起名叫#b#e“米哈尔”#k#n如何？好像很适合你。现在和我一起到圣地去吧。没有比那里更适合让你成为光之骑士的了。

original: Now you're a REAL knight. Would you like to take your Job Advancement?
translated: 米哈尔，你已经完成了考验吗？

original: You need inventory space.
translated: 你现在觉醒了更强的力量，继续走在光之道路上吧!

original: Cygnus is safe and the knights will be back to normal soon, I've even heard some of them referring to you as the new Chief Knight. It looks like you have no choice but to take up my proposal.
translated: 米哈尔，你已经完成了考验吗？

original: You need inventory space.
translated: 你已经觉醒了最终的力量，为了贯彻光之道路，今后继续努力吧!

original: Congratulations on passing your trials, do you want to become one of my knights?
translated: 米哈尔，祝贺你通过了成为实习骑士的所有考试。我随时可以任命你为实习骑士。你想现在成为实习骑士吗？

original: You need inventory space.
translated: 你现在获得了实习骑士的资格。祝贺你。我给了你一些SP，请你去试着使用看看。

original:
Welcome to Ereve! This is the safest and most peaceful place in all of Maple World. Empress Cygnus keeps it nice all the time!
You're #b#h ##k, right? Here to join the #p1064023# Knights. I'm your guide, #p#. All the Noblesses in town come to me first!
translated:
欢迎来到圣地！这里是冒险岛世界最和平、最安全的地方。是女皇希纳斯统治的土地！
你的名字是……啊，是叫#b#h0##k吧？很高兴见到你！我一直在等你。你来这里，是想成为#p1101000#骑士团的一员吧？我叫#p1102004#。我奉女皇之名，在这里为像你这样的初心者提供指导。

original: You need to get over to the Knight's Orientation right away. They're getting started already. Follow me, okay?
translated: 具体的事情以后再说，你先到新骑士团员欢迎会去看看吧。先去那里和其他修炼教官打个招呼。请跟我来。

original: This is the ceremony where we welcome all the newbie knights. We need to find Training Instructor Kiku. He's gotta be around here somewhere...
translated: 这是为了欢迎新加入的骑士团员而举行的欢迎会。嗯，在哪儿呢？我想介绍个人给你认识。修炼教官奇库在哪儿呢？这里人太多，不太容易找到……

original:
Having a hard time finding Kiku? You should use that NPC button next to your map! Just click on Kiku and you'll see an arrow!
Hurry up and go say hi before he gets grumpy!
translated:
请看画面左上方。点击小地图UI右侧的NPC按钮，会显示该地图上的NPC名字。请点击其中的奇库。那样的话，小地图上就会用箭头显示奇库的位置。
请你找到奇库，去和他打个招呼。

original: Did you meet up with Kiku? He seems tough, but he's a total softy.
translated: 你去和奇库打过招呼了吗？#h0#，我们这些教官会让你成为一名优秀的骑士。

original: The orientation's almost over. You wanna go ahead and get started on your training?
translated: 欢迎会差不多该结束了，让我们开始修炼吧。做好心理准备了吗？

original:
I don't know if they told you during the orientation, but we're here to fight the Black Mage. Right now, you're not fit to fight a black mop. I'm gonna fix that.
You ready for some action?
translated:
你也知道，我们冒险骑士团是冒险岛世界的女皇希纳斯为了对抗黑魔法师而建立的。我们忠于女皇，正在为了阻止即将醒来的黑魔法师而积蓄力量。
我看你好像需要大量的修炼才行……不过别担心，我们这些教官会把你打造成一个合格的骑士。

准备好了吗？

original: You listening? Pay attention!
translated:
奇姆负责骑士团的各种训练。你再去见见奇姆。
啊，按#e#b快捷键Q#k#n，可以通过#e#r任务信息窗#k#n再次确认任务内容。希望你能记住。有什么不清楚的地方，一定要确认一下，这样才不会出问题。

original:
It doesn't look like you put your hat on yet... Press the #bHotkey I#k to open the inventory window, #rthen double-click on the equipment#k.
You can see what you have equipped by pressing the #bHotkey E#k.
translated:
穿戴装备的方法很简单吧？
#h0#，你的力量越强大，就越需要与之相匹配的武器和衣服，装备会让你变得更加强大。

original: Isn't putting on equipment easy? That's a good thing because you'll need WAY better gear if you want to be a real knight! Always keep an eye out for new stuff.
translated: 奇努来了呢，他会向你说明你所必须知道的内容的，虽然会有些无聊，不过还请你一定要认真听。

original: I like to give all the new recruits a little gift when they come to Ereve. It's important that the recruits look up to snuff, you know? Hit the #bI key#k to open up your inventory when we're done talking. Double click on that hat I gave you!
translated: #h0#，为了欢迎你来到圣地，我想送你一份小礼物。装备道具的方法很简单。请按#b#e快捷键I#k#n。那样你的背包窗就会打开。稍等一下，你的性子还挺急的嘛？请听我说完之后再试。因为帽子还在我的手中。用快捷键I打开背包窗后，双击帽子，即可把它装备到身上。你想现在试试吗？

original: I am Kinu. I will get you up to speed on Ereve's history. Now, go on and sit! I teach best when my students are shorter than me!
translated: 我来晚了吗？你好。我是负责教授圣地历史的奇努。干嘛站在那里？快过来坐下。

original: Why are you still standing? That is not what a well-behaved student would do.
translated: 走到椅子前面，按快捷键x，就可以坐到椅子上。

original: Tis a pleasure to welcome ye to the knights.
translated: 我是闪电骑士团长，我叫胡克。听说过我的名字吗？我的名气很大，当然应该知道吧？

original: How kind! Thank you!
translated: 别害羞。见到平时崇拜的人，紧张也是难免的。你对闪电骑士——奇袭者感兴趣吗？对了，你叫什么来着？

original: Anything ye need, ye come straight to me, ol' Hawkeye, captain of the Thunder Breakers. I beg ye pardon, but what was ye name again? I plumb forgot already.
translated: 胡克，这位新骑士团候补生的名字叫#h0#。现在招呼打完了，请你快走吧。

original: Hawkeye, the new recruit's name is #h #! Now, shoo!
translated: 我还有很多话要说呢。我的传奇经历……！

original: I promise, I won't forget yer name the next time we meet.
translated: 好了，我要继续往下讲了。再见。

original: Wonderful. Now, off you go, Hawkeye!
translated: 刚才说到哪儿了？新骑士团员训练结束后，就能被任命为修炼骑士，决定自己的道路。光之骑士、火之骑士、风之骑士、黑暗骑士、闪电骑士……必须选择属于自己的道路。

original: Finally! Where was I? Oh yes, once your initial training is over, you will choose your knightly path and be promoted to Knight-in-Training! The paths you can pick from are Light, Fire, Wind, Lightning and Darkness.
translated: 骑士团的任务是保护女皇，击败黑魔法师，保护冒险岛世界的和平。此外，我们还需要对付黑魔法师的追随者黑色之翼，执行搜集情报的任务等。

original: As a Cygnus Knight, your duty will be to protect the Empress, defeat the Black Mage, spy on his henchmen, and keep peace in Maple World. Simple, yes?
translated: 今天的课程就到这里。下一项训练……请你去问问奇姆。

original: I've given you enough to ponder. Go speak with Kimu for your next lesson.
translated: 嗯？我好像没……

original: Your first lesson will be about Ereve. Ereve is a floating island, held aloft by the Empress's powers. It has remained stationary for a number of years but once floated about Maple World like a ship.
translated: 首先，我来介绍一下圣地。圣地是女皇统治的蕴含着魔法力量的岛，一直漂浮在空中。根据需要，我们现在暂时停留在这里。本来应该在冒险岛世界来回巡视，就像船一样。

original: Right now, we're focused on gathering up information on the Black Mage and preparing our forces to face him. It's some serious business, lemme tell you.
translated: 现在的情况不是很好。我们现在停留在这里，注视着黑魔法师的一举一动，并积极培养与之对抗的力量。

original: The knights themselves are gathered into 5 groups, based around the Spirits of Light, Fire, Wind, Lightning, and Darkness. Each group is led by a Chief Knight and... Oh, here is one now. Hello Hawkeye.
translated:
嗯，此外……冒险骑士团分为五个组织，分别可以使用光、火、风、闪电、黑暗精灵的力量。由五位骑士团长率领着冒险骑士团……？
嗯？胡克，你干嘛又到我的课堂上来？

original: Ahoy! I wanted to welcome the new knight in person. I must give ye my apologies, for I left the muffins I baked ye on my ship.
translated: 我是想看看新骑士团员的教育进行得怎么样。说不定新加入的人，是我闪电骑士团长胡克的崇拜者呢。

original: Hawkeye, this is highly unorthodox!
translated: 胡克，这个样子让我感觉很为难。

original: Yar, have a heart, Kinu. Don't ye remember yer first day with the knights? Wasn't it a mite overwhelming without a friend?
translated: 奇努，你好像应该先把我介绍给新骑士团员吧？先打个招呼吧？

original: I suppose I could bend the rules this once. #h #, meet Hawkeye, the Chief Knight of Lightning.
translated: 胡克，打完招呼你就得走哦。#h0#，这位是闪电骑士团长胡克。虽然我觉得没必要非得认识他，不过你还是先跟他打个招呼吧。

original: A knight's gotta be strong, right? I mean, you guys have some really tough missions. So, you ready for your next training session?
translated: 干得好。很简单吧？对于骑士团员来说，保持充沛的体力是必须的。因为需要执行很多艰难的任务。让我们继续下一项训练吧。

original: Chin up! No slouching! I'm going to whip you into shape!
translated:
我是负责战斗训练的奇赞。你叫#h0#，对吧？
希望你能继续努力。你想现在开始吗？

original: Do you even know how to hold a sword?! Press the #rCtrl key#k to perform a basic attack! Do it now! In the Drill Hall! Defeat #b3 #o9300730##k monsters and show me I'm not wasting my time!
translated: 我先来教你最基本的攻击方法。最基本的攻击方法是#r使用Ctrl键的普通攻击#k。走到怪物附近，按Ctrl键，就可以发动攻击。不消耗血量和魔量。你去试试看吧。在演武场中#b消灭3个#o9300730##k。

original: Okay! You've earned a 30 second re-hydration break! Drink this, and don't faint on me!
translated: 看到你努力训练的样子，我感到很欣慰。你应该很快就能成为修炼骑士了。训练了这么长时间，是不是有点累了？这里有凉爽的饮料，你先喝一点，休息一下。来，拿着。

original: Press the hotkey I to open your inventory, then double-click to enjoy your cool refreshment! And you WILL enjoy it!
translated: 按快捷键I打开道具背包窗之后，用鼠标双击饮料，即可使用凉爽的饮料。

original:
Did you enjoy the drink? You better have! It is the special concoction of my people, the Piyo Tribe!
Now... Pop quiz! Do you remember how to fight? Defeat 3 #o9300730#  monsters and bring me 3 #t4000489# items!
translated:
饮料的味道还不错吧？不知道合不合你胃口。那是我们哔吆非常喜欢的果汁。
好了，让我们重新开始训练吧？这次是复习！刚才学习的内容你还没忘记吧？
你去消灭3个#o9300730#，搜集3个#t4000489#。

original: What do you mean, you don't know what to do! Press the Ctrl key to perform a basic attack! What do you mean, I forgot to tell you how to pick up items? Just press the Z key!
translated: 普通攻击！按Ctrl键攻击怪物。嗯？怎么拾取羽毛？哎呀，我没告诉你吗？不好意思。按Z键，就可以把道具捡起来。

original: Your basic attacks no longer make me want to cry. It is time to teach you something more advanced!
translated: 基本攻击你好像确实已经学会了。这次让我来教你更深奥的攻击方法吧。

original: Hey, everyone. You having fun with your training, #h0#? Kimu, Kizan, can I speak to you for a moment?
translated: #h0#，训练还行吧？继续努力。奇姆、奇赞。你去和他们谈谈……

original: #h0#! Take a break! That's an order!
translated: #h0#，你先休息一下吧。

original: (Kiku whispers to the others.)
translated: #h0#，你在这里稍等一下。我很快就会回来。不要一个人到处乱逛！
(嘀咕嘀咕嘀咕)

original: (*chirp, chirp*)
translated: (嘀哩哩哩……嘀嘀……)

original: Look! It's a bird! Is it talking to me?
translated: 嗯？哪里突然出现了一只小鸟？

original: *chirp, chirp, chirp*
translated: (嘀哩哩，嘀嘀，嘀哩哩哩……)

original: OMIGOODNESS! I can understand birds! I must be some sort of superhero. It... wants me to follow it. I'm sure Kizan won't mind.
translated: 我难道有听懂鸟语的能力吗？！我好像听到它在说跟我走……反正在这里等着也挺无聊的，在奇赞回来之前，先跟过去看看吧？

original: Ah, you must be one of my new recruits.
translated: 你好。是想成为骑士的人啊。

original: My name's #h0#. I love Ereve. It's so pretty here.
translated: 是的，我叫#h0#。我还是第一次到这个庭院来。圣地有很多美丽的地方。

original: Oh, yes. Ereve is lovely, and so peaceful. Has your training been difficult?
translated: 圣地是个和平而美丽的地方。训练难吗？

original: Nothing I can't handle. Maple World better get ready, because I'm about to save it so hard.
translated: 是的，虽然还有很多不足，不过我一定会克服各种困难！成为一名优秀的骑士！我想用自己的双手，守护冒险岛世界的和平。

original: (She smiles.) Your enthusiasm is reassuring. The suffering of so many weighs heavily upon me... I hope you can help me ease their pain.
translated: (露出微笑)不管是多么艰难的路，我们都必须勇往直前。这种时候更加需要大家齐心协力。

original: Yeah, um, I'm sorry. Who are you again? You don't look like much of a knight...
translated: 但是，你是谁？从穿着看，好像不是冒险骑士团的成员……

original: My name is...
translated: 是的，我是……

original: Don't listen to ol' Neinheart, #h0#. Ye may as well introduce yerself to the other Chief Knights while yer here.
translated: 别太在意南哈特的话，#h0#。在成为修炼骑士之前，你就见到了我胡克，还有希纳斯女皇和其他骑士团长们，感觉怎么样？你不想自我介绍一下吗？#h0#，快点自我介绍一下吧～！

original: Oh, um, sure. My name's #h0#. I'm here to become a knight, defeat the Black Mage, save Maple World, and, just recently, be a spokesperson for bird-kind.
translated: 大家好，我，我叫#h0#。是接受了女皇的召唤之后来到这里的。我想成为一名勇敢的骑士，击败黑魔法师，守护冒险岛世界！

original: Big aspirations for such meager amounts of skill. May the shadows keep you safe until you learn some humility.
translated: 你的梦想还挺大的嘛。希望你能成为一个能解决自己事情的人。别给我们惹麻烦。我是黑暗骑士团长伊卡尔特。

original: Oh, give the kid a break! Welcome to Ereve! We'll meet again more formally soon.
translated: 我是火之骑士团长奥兹。欢迎来到圣地。你是从哪里来的呢？

original: Not if the kid doesn't finish training first... Becoming a knight takes a lot of hard work and dedication.
translated: 奥兹，你的问题还真多。我在你身上感觉到了不错的风。我是风之骑士团长伊莉娜。愿好运与你同在。

original: I hate to break up the party, but we have a meeting to get to. Sorry, kid. I'm sure we'll get a chance to talk more later.
translated: 我是光之骑士团长米哈尔。希望不要放松警惕，努力自我修炼。身为骑士团的成员，必须展现出自己的意志来。#h0#，很快我们还会见面的。自我介绍就到这里……你快回去吧。

original: Yer right, Mihile. We've got to get goin', #h0#. Keep up with yer trainin'.
translated: 知道了，米哈尔。#h0#，我还有急事，没时间再谈了。我们先走了～你努力修炼吧。

original: Ah, #b#h0##k, isn't it? I am #p1101002#, strategist for our young Empress. You will be seeing much more of me in the future.
translated: 你好，#b#h0##k。欢迎加入冒险骑士团。我的名字是#p1101002#?伯恩?卢比斯坦。职务是女皇的谋士。以后我们会经常见面，你至少得记住我的名字才行。呵呵……

original: Shouldn't you be in training? What urgent matter brings you here, #h0#? Did Kiku send you with dire news?
translated: 不过你来这里干什么？#h0#？你现在应该正在修炼才对。

original: Nah. A bird told me to follow it, and I ended up here!
translated: 啊，这个……有一只小鸟突然出现，我跟着小鸟就……

original: #h0#, are ye sure ye didn't follow me here to collect yer welcome muffins? I'm sorry, but someone ate them.
translated: 哈哈哈哈，#h0#。没想到你还挺幽默的。你是因为见过我之后，忘不了我帅气的样子，所以跟过来了吗？

original: And they were delicious. But enough chatter, we have work to do, Hawkeye. Let us go.
translated: 这里太乱了。先和女王一起回去吧。

original: It was lovely to meet you, #h0#. I sincerely hope that you become a knight of courage and wisdom.
translated: #h0#，能见到你，真的非常高兴。下次再见。希望你能成为一名勇敢、虔诚的骑士……
