original: I have my doubts. Not even promoted to knight-in-training and already nosing about the Empress's quarters for no good reason. Unacceptable!
translated: 虽然你是骑士团的一员，但还不是骑士。别说正式骑士，你连修炼骑士的任命都没有获得。你觉得自己可以这样随便乱跑吗？希望你能集中精神修炼。

original:
You haven't forgotten my last lesson, have you?! Pretty Ctrl to perform a regular attack!
Time for the next lesson! Ready?!
translated:
刚才教你的东西，应该还没忘记吧？用Ctrl键攻击怪物的方法，是普通攻击。看你好像还没忘记的样子，我来继续教你下面的内容。
准备好了吗？

original:
Skill attacks! They dish out the pain! Open your Skill window by pressing the K key to access your skills.
You'll get more skills once you're more experienced, so never stop training!
translated:
这次是技能攻击。可以用比普通攻击更强的力量攻击敌人。你先按快捷键K，打开技能窗。
通过修炼让自己变得更强，就能使用更多的技能，因此勤奋修炼非常重要。

original: THERE YOU ARE! I told you not to move! You're going to pay for that. Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but one day, when you're on a particularly annoying mission, know that I've secretly arranged it. Now get back to the Drill Hall!
translated: 你在这里啊。我都找你半天了。我不是让你别到处乱跑的吗？这次新加入的训练生真会给我添乱。让我们重新回到演武场去，学习技能攻击的方法吧。

original: Elemental Slash is useful, so use it often!
translated: 用元素斩击消灭掉怪物了吗？非常好。嗯，好的，现在你好像可以成为修炼骑士了。

original: I supposed you're about ready to become a Knight-in-Training. I'll send you to the Test Site, and remember, no slouching!
translated: 现在基本训练全部结束了。只要通过简单的测试，你就能成为修炼骑士了。我马上把你送到考场去。一定要好好考哦～不及格就得重新接受教育！

original: Try attacking a monster using your skills! Drag them to a hotkey to make them more convenient!
translated: 现在试着用技能去攻击怪物吧。把技能添加到快捷栏中，使用起来会更加方便。只要把想要使用的技能用鼠标拖放到快捷栏里就行。

original: Now use #rElemental Slash#k to defeat #b5 #o9300731##k monsters!
translated: 你去用#r元素斩#消灭#b5个#o9300731##k吧。

original: Do you have the Proof of Exam items?
translated: 3个考试的证物拿来了吗？

original: Yay! I'm so happy! You're every bit as amazing as I knew you'd be! Here, take this chair. I made it for you! Sit on it when you're tired, and you'll get your HP back faster! I slipped it into your Set-up inventory!
translated: 啊哈～果然名不虚传。考试合格了。我送给你的椅子，是我亲手制作的。希望你能好好使用。累了的时候，可以坐在上面休息一下，血量就会快速回复。应该已经放到背包设置栏中了，你可以去确认一下。

original: #b*tap, tap, whirrrr, bang, bang*#k
translated: #b(怦怦……)#k

original: EEEEEEEK! Don't sneak up on me like that! I almost sliced my tail off! Anyway, I'm #p1102007#! You ready to begin the test?
translated: ……啊！吓死我了！我快要忙死了，没发现有人过来。你就是#p1102006#所说的那个初心者？很高兴见到你！我叫#p1102007#。你想现在开始考试吗？并不难，只要好好记住之前学过的就行。

original: It's easy, easy, easy! See those boxes? Break them! Then defeat the monsters that pop out! You'll get some Proof of Exam items if you do! Whee!
translated: 考试很简单。看到那边的箱子了吗？破坏掉箱子之后，就会有怪物出现。消灭掉怪物之后，可以获得考试的证物。

original: Just use #bregular attacks to break the boxes#k! Then use #bskills to defeat the monsters#k! I need 3 Proof of Exam items!
translated:
嗯？你问打破箱子的办法？啊，箱子仅对普通攻击起反应。
所以你用#b普通攻击打碎箱子#k，对#b怪物还是用技能攻击#k更方便些！你去收集3个考试的证物吧。

original:
Hey, you're looking pretty good, #h #. I think I'll promote you to Knight-In-Training.
Just follow the arrows, and they'll lead you to the Empress.
translated:
#h0#，这段时间你一直在努力修炼。好像比最初见到你的时候强多了～其他人对你的评价也很不错……现在你好像具备了成为修炼骑士的资格。
女皇在圣地的中心，你到那里去就行。沿着箭头走。

original: Prove me right, #h #.
translated: 希望你能成为一名优秀的骑士……

original: I'm shocked. You actually possessed the perseverance to make it to level 10. As a matter of course, I'm promoting you to Knight-In-Training, but first tell me, which knight's path do you intend to take?
translated: 你已经达到了10级，说明你很努力。很好。你现在已经超出了初心者的境界，我认可你有正式成为修炼骑士的资格。但在这之前，我想先问你一个问题。你想选择哪条骑士之路呢？

original: There are 5 different paths. I don't believe in second chances, so once you pick, I won't allow you to change your mind.
translated: 骑士之路不止一条。在前面等待着你的，一共有五条路……选择哪条路是你的自由。但至少不要让自己后悔。

original: This is a significant decision. Take time to think it over.
translated: 看来你已经很清楚自己该走哪条路了。那很好。现在就看你自己的选择了。

original: My chief knights are over to the left. Speak to them to learn more about each path.
translated: 骑士团长们正在左边等你。先去听听他们的话，然后选择自己想要的路。因为一切都是为了你自己……

original: Congratulations, you are now a Dawn Warrior! I have added 5 AP and 5 SP, enjoy your journey!
translated: 你已经做好选择了吗？选择之后是不能反悔的，所以务必慎重。你真的要选择魂骑士之路吗？

original: Please make more room in your inventory.
translated: 我会将你的身体改造成适合魂骑士的身体。之后如果你想变得更强，可以在属性窗(S键)中提升相应的属性。如果觉得太难，可以使用#b自动分配#k。

original: Congratulations, you are now a Blaze Wizard! I have added 5 AP and 5 SP, enjoy your journey!
translated: 你已经做好选择了吗？选择之后是不能反悔的。请一定要慎重考虑……你真的要选择炎术士之路吗？

original: Please make more space in your inventory.
translated: 从现在开始，你就是一名炎术士了。啊，真让人高兴！我又有了新同伴……对了，我得先分配一些能力给你。

original: Congratulations, you are now a Wind Archer! I have added 5 AP and 5 SP, enjoy your journey!
translated: 你已经选好了吗……？……一旦决定，就无法后悔。慎重的决定可以使人变得贤明。

original: Please make some room in your inventory
translated: 从现在开始，你就是风灵使者了。现在，我会分配给你一些能力……

original: Congratulations, you are now a Night Walker! I have added 5 AP and 5 SP, enjoy your journey!
translated: 你真的决定了吗？……世上是没有后悔药的。希望你慎重考虑。你要选择夜行者之路吗？

original: Please make more room in your inventory.
translated: 从现在开始，你就是夜行者了。为了纪念你成为我们的同伴，我会给你分配一些能力。

original: Congratulations, you are now a Thunder Breaker! I have added 5 AP and 5 SP, enjoy your journey!
translated: 你真的选好了吗？出于谨慎，我必须告诉你，选择之后是不能后悔的。请慎重决定。你真的要选择奇袭者之路吗？

original: Please make more room in your inventory
translated: 从现在开始，你就是奇袭者了！呀呼！闪电骑士团又增加了新成员！对了，我都忘了，得先给你分配一些能力。

original:
#h #, you have done surprisingly well. Do you wish to take the #b Knighthood Exam#k? If you pass, you will become a full-fledged knight. #b
(Note, if you accept, you will be ported to Ereve. Talk to your instructor there.)
translated: #h0#？一转眼你已经等级这么高了，都快认不出来了。任务好像也完成了不少……我觉得你完全有资格参加#b骑士等级考试#k了。怎么样？现在你差不多该从修炼骑士升级为正式骑士了。你说呢？

original: Okay, maybe next time.
translated: 如果你想参加骑士等级考试，可以随时来圣地。各个骑士团长会对你的能力进行测试，如果合格，就会任命你为正式骑士。再见……

original: So you killed all the monsters? Are you ready to advance?
translated: #t4032096#全部带来啦……很好。你具备了成为正式骑士的资格。你想踏上正式骑士之路吗？

original: Please make room in your Equip inventory.
translated: 现在你已不再是修炼骑士。你已经成为了冒险骑士团的正式骑士。

original: Please speak to me after You've defeated all monsters required.
translated: 我给了你一些#bSP#k，并传授了你魂骑士技能中只有正式骑士才能学习的几种技能。希望你能和灵魂一起变得更强。

original: You've defeated the 30 Tigurus! I like how hard you work! Are you ready work even harder by accepting the responsibilities of an official knight?
translated: #t4032097#全都带来啦！真了不起！你具备了成为正式骑士的资格！你想踏上正式骑士之路吗？

original: You have been officially promoted to a Cygnus Knight! I've also given you some AP and SP to work with.
translated: 现在你已不再是修炼骑士。你已经成为了冒险骑士团的正式骑士！

original: Okay, come back later when you've changed your mind.
translated: 我给了你一些#bSP#k，并传授了你炎术士技能中只有正式骑士才能学习的几种技能。希望你能和火焰一起变得更强！

original: You've defeated the 30 Tigurus! I like how hard you work! Are you ready work even harder by accepting the responsibilities of an official knight?
translated: #t4032098#……已经全部确认。你具备了成为正式骑士的资格。你想踏上正式骑士之路吗？

original: You have been officially promoted to a Cygnus Knight! I've also given you some AP and SP to work with.
translated: 现在……你已经不再是修炼骑士。你已经成为了冒险骑士团的正式骑士。

original: Okay, come back later when you've changed your mind.
translated: 我给了你#bSP#k。此外还传授了风灵使者技能中只有正式骑士才能学习的技能。希望你能和风一起不断磨炼。

original: You've defeated the 30 Tigurus! I like how hard you work! Are you ready work even harder by accepting the responsibilities of an official knight?
translated: #t4032099#全部带来啦……不过，就这点小事还不值得我称赞。我确认你拥有成为正式骑士的资格。你愿意成为正式骑士吗？

original: You have been officially promoted to a Cygnus Knight! I've also given you some AP and SP to work with.
translated: 现在你已不再是修炼骑士了。你已经成为了冒险骑士团的正式骑士。

original: Okay, come back later when you've changed your mind.
translated: 我给了你一些#bSP#k。虽然不多，但可以用来学习新传授的技能。你可以和黑暗一起，试验一下夜行者技能中只有正式骑士才能学习的那些技能。

original: You've defeated the 30 Tigurus! I like how hard you work! Are you ready work even harder by accepting the responsibilities of an official knight?
translated: #t4032100#都带来了？嘻嘻嘻！我就知道你一定能行。我确认你具备了成为正式骑士的资格！哈哈，你想成为正式骑士吗？

original: You have been officially promoted to a Cygnus Knight! I've also given you some AP and SP to work with.
translated: 现在你已不再是修炼骑士了。你已经是冒险骑士团的正式骑士。

original: Okay, come back later when you've changed your mind.
translated: 我给了你一些#bSP#k。你现在可以学习奇袭者技能中只有正式骑士才能学习的技能了。这些和闪电结合的强大技能，希望你好好使用。

original: What kind of book can that be... Wow, the book is written by letters I have never seen before.
translated: 到底是什么书啊……啊，这到底是……我还是头一次看见这种文字。一个字都看不懂……

original: But it still looks like something important. I should bring it back to Ereve.
translated: 好像是非常重要的东西，必须尽快送到圣地去。

original: It's chilling.
translated: 怎么感觉阴森森的……

original: What's happening? Where are they appearing from? Try to snatch my book? No! I won't let the Black Wings take that!
translated: 咦，怎么突然有人出现了？！难道是想把书抢走吗？不行！不能让黑色之翼抢走。来吧！！！

original: #h # it is fortunate that you protected the book from the Black Mage. It is a book with tremendous value. I must admit your braveness for this.
translated: #h0#，你守护的那本书是非常重要的东西。绝对不能落入黑魔法师之手……虽然你的力量还比较弱，但你和敌人战斗的勇气令人赞叹。具体的内容，我现在还不方便告诉你。

original: The Queen has appointed you the title of nobility for your actions, do you wish to accept it?
translated: 你解决了这件事，女皇赐予了你新的爵位。你想现在接受爵位吗？

original: #h #, from now on you are an elite member. You will be given quests with higher level, but you will manage.
translated: #h0#，我任命你为高级骑士。从现在开始，你就是冒险骑士团的高级骑士了。随着地位的提高，你必须承担更困难的任务。希望你能继续努力。

original: #h #...  what is this?
This, milady, is the report from Neinheart about the activities of the Cygnus Knights.
translated: 啊，女皇，那是南哈特让我交给你的冒险骑士团活动报告书。

original: Haha, is that wat Neinheart said? It is a recommendation about you. It's all about the process of you getting stronger and the activities done by you...
translated: 呵呵，南哈特是那么说的？这是推荐书。他说这段时间你比任何人都努力，变强了不少。还有，他说你为了骑士团尽了自己的全力。内容就是这些。

original: What did Neinheart write about me?
translated: 我认可你这段时间以来的努力、成就和功劳……我决定授予你新的职位。希望……你能接受。

original: I would like to appoint a title to you for your activities and effort. will you accept this?
translated: #h0#，你拥有面对黑魔法师的勇气。从现在开始，你就是冒险骑士团的信任骑士团长了。希望你能将你的力量用于冒险岛世界的和平……

original: #h #, with your braveness and courage, from now on you are a new captain of the knights. Please use your power to protect the Maple World.
translated: 嗯？南哈特大人？

original:
You have exceeded all our expectations, please take this as a symbol of your Heroism

1x #v##z#
translated:
欢迎你，#b#h0##k。我一直在等你。
你还记得最初来到#b圣地#k的时候吗？修炼教官奇库教你握剑时的情景，至今仍然记忆犹新，没想到一转眼你就变得这么强了。你现在已经足以和#b米哈尔#k、#b奥兹、伊莉娜、伊卡尔特，#k还有#b胡克#k比肩了。

original: How did things go? Oh, I should tell you that the Empress just arrived on Victoria Island. All the other CHief Knights are here as well, but you should never lower your guard. Shall we head out?
translated: 你来啦？女皇殿下刚到金银岛。其他骑士团长也都来了，不过希望你不要因此放松警惕。好了，你想现在出发吗？

original: Wait...Kiku? Why is Kiku here? Goodness, he's injured!
translated: 咦，等等……奇库？奇库怎么突然到这里来了？而且……好像受伤了！大家先停下来！

original: You, the Knight of Cygnus... Can you hear me? If ou can, come to me to hear the truth.
translated: 女皇的骑士……听得到我的声音吗？听到了的话，就来找我……你有知道真相的资格。

original: I have something to give to you.
translated: 我忘了有东西要给你了。

original: This power will help you protect your queen. Now I will leave to seek for a solution. I wish you good luck.
translated: 这份力量会帮助你守护女皇。我要去寻找方法了。愿好运与你同在。

original: Oh, no! I think there's still a child in the forest! Aran, I'm very sorry, but could you rescue the child? I know you're injured, but I don't have anyone else to ask!
translated: 不行，战神……要是抛下孩子我们自己逃掉……就算能活下去也没什么意义！我知道这个要求对你而言很勉强，不过还是请你再考虑考虑！

original: #bThe child is probably lost deep inside the forest!#k We have to escape before the Black Mage finds us. You must rush into the forest and bring the child back with you!
translated: 糟糕！有个孩子被留在森林里了！我们不能丢下孩子就这么逃走！战神……请你救救孩子吧！你伤得这么重，还要你去战斗，我们心里也很过意不去……但只有你能够救那个孩子啊！

original: Don't panic, Aran. If you wish to check the status of the quest, press #bQ#k and view the Quest window.
translated: #b孩子可能在森林的深处#k！必须在黑魔法师找到我们之前，启动方舟，所以必须尽快救出孩子才行！

original: Please, Aran! I'm begging you. I can't bear to lose another person to the Black Mage!
translated: 关键是不要慌张，战神。如果你要查看任务进行状态，按#bQ键#k就能在任务栏中查看。

original: No, Aran... We can't leave a kid behind. I know it's a lot to ask, but please reconsider. Please!
translated: 拜托了，战神！救救孩子吧！我们不能再有人因为黑魔法师而牺牲了！

original: You made it back safely! What about the child?! Did you bring the child with you?!
translated: 呵呵，平安回来了？孩子呢？孩子也带回来了吗？

original: Oh, what a relief. I'm so glad...
translated: 太好了……真是太好了。

original: Hurry and board the ship! We don't have much time!
translated: 赶快上船！已经没时间了！

original: We don't have any time to waste. The Black Mage's forces are getting closer and closer! We're doomed if we don't leave right this moment!
translated: 啊，没错。现在不是感伤的时候。黑魔法师的气息越来越近！似乎他们已经察觉方舟的位置，得赶紧启航，不然就来不及了！

original: Leave, now!
translated: 立刻出发！

original: Aran, please! I know you want to stay and fight the Black Mage, but it's too late! Leave it to the others and come to Victoria Island with us!
translated: 战神！请你也上船吧！我们理解你渴望战斗的心情……不过，现在已经晚了！战斗就交给你的那些同伴吧，和我们一起去金银岛吧！

original: No, I can't!
translated: 不行！

original: Athena Pierce, why don't you leave for Victoria Island first? I promise I'll come for you later. I'll be alright. I must fight the Black Mage with the other heroes!
translated: 赫丽娜，你先出发去金银岛。一定要活着，我们一定会再见的。我要和同伴们一起同黑魔法师战斗！

original: *Sniff sniff* I was so scared... Please take me to Athena Pierce.
translated: 呃呃……吓死我了……快，快带到赫丽娜那边去！

original: We've been digging and digging inside the Ice Cave in the hope of finding a hero, but I never thought I'd actually see the day... The prophecy was true! You were right, #p1201000#! Now that one of the legendary heroes has returned, we have no reason to fear the Black Mage!
translated: 我们一直试图在冰层深处寻找传说中的英雄，不过从没想过真能找到你！预言果然没有错！#p1201000#做出了正确的选择！既然英雄重新回来了，我们就没有必要再惧怕黑魔法师了！

original:
Oh, I've kept you too long. I'm sorry, I got a little carried away. I'm sure the other Penguins feel the same way. I know you're busy, but could you #bstop and talk to the other Penguins#k on your way to town? They would be so honored.

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i2000022# 5 #t2000022#
#i2000023# 5 #t2000023#

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 16 exp
translated:
哎呦，我怎么抓着您聊了这么久？实在是太高兴了……其他的企鹅估计也会像我这样的。虽然知道你很忙，不过在回村子的路上，#b还是尽量和其他的企鹅搭搭话吧#k。有大英雄和他们说话，他们肯定会惊讶得要死！

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i2000022# #t2000022# 5个
#i2000023# #t2000023# 5个

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 16 exp

original: Oh, you've leveled up! You may have even received some skill points. In Maple World, you can acquire 3 skill points every time you level up. Press the #bK key#k to view the Skill window.
translated: 你升级了吗？不知道你有没有得到技能点数？在冒险岛世界，每升1级就能获得技能点数3。按#bK键#k，打开技能栏就可确认。

original: #b(Everyone's been so nice to me, but I just can't remember anything. Am I really a hero? I should check my skills and see. But how do I check them?)#k
translated: #b（对我这么亲切，我却什么都想不起来。我真的是英雄吗？还是先查看一下技能吧……怎么查看技能呀？）#k

original: Hm, what's a human doing on this island? Wait, it's #p1201000#. What are you doing here, #p1201000#? And who's that beside you? Is it someone you know, #p1201000#? What? The hero, you say?
translated: 咦？什么人在岛上……？哎呦，这不是#p1201000#吗？#p1201000#来这里是为了……这人是#p1201000#的朋友吗？啊？你说这人是英雄？
这位原来就是#p1201000#一族数百年间苦苦守候的英雄啊！啊，乍一看倒是和普通人没什么两样……

original: Ah, this must be the hero you and your clan have been waiting for. Am I right, #p1201000#? Ah, I knew you weren't just accompanying an average passerby...
translated: 但是可能是因为你被黑魔法师的诅咒困在冰里几百年时间，所以体力全都消耗完了。#b我给你一个体力恢复药水，请快点喝下去吧#k。

original: Oh, but it seems our hero has become very weak since the Black Mage's curse. It only makes sense, considering that the hero has been asleep for hundreds of years. #bHere, I'll give you a HP Recovery Potion.#k.
translated: 请先喝掉药水，然后再慢慢谈！

original: Drink it first. Then we'll talk.
translated: #b（这药水怎么喝？……不记得了……）#k

original: Wait, are you... No way.... Are you the hero that #p1201000# has been talking about all this time?! #p1201000#! Don't just nod... Tell me! Is this the hero you've been waiting for?!
translated: 和#p1201000#在一起的，难道……难道就是传说中的英雄？#p1201000#！别不耐烦地点头，给我们介绍介绍呀！这位就是传说中的英雄吗？！
……真对不起，太激动了，忍不住嗓门大了些。呜呜～真是令人激动……唉，眼泪都快出来了……#p1201000#这回可开心了。

original: I'm sorry. I'm just so overcome with emotions... *Sniff sniff* My goodness, I'm starting to tear up. You must be so happy, #p1201000#.
translated: 等等……英雄大人怎么能没有武器呢？我听说每个英雄都有自己的独特武器……啊，估计是和黑魔法师战斗的时候遗失了。

original: Wait a minute... You're not carrying any weapons. From what I've heard, each of the heroes had a special weapon. Oh, you must have lost it during the battle against the Black Mage.
translated:
虽然寒碜了点，不过#b先拿这把剑用着吧#k。算是送给英雄的礼物。英雄如果没有武器，岂不是会有些奇怪？

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i1302000# #t1302000# 1个

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 35 exp

original:
This isn't good enough to replace your weapon, but #bcarry this sword with you for now#k. It's my gift to you. A hero can't be walking around empty-handed.
#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i1302000# 1 #t1302000# 

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 35 exp
translated: #b（看自己这技能水平没一点英雄的样子……这把剑感觉也很陌生。以前的我是用剑的吗？这把剑怎么用呢？）#k

original:
Hm... Your expression tells me that the exercise didn't jog any memories. But don't you worry. They'll come back, eventually. Here, drink this potion and power up!
#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i2000022# 10 #t2000022# 
#i2000023# 10 #t2000023# 

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 57 exp
translated:
嗯……看你的表情就知道你啥都没想起来。不过不用担心。说不定这反倒更好。来，这里有一些药水，加油吧！

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i2000022# #t2000022# 10个 
#i2000023# #t2000023# 10个 

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 57 exp

original: #b(Even if you're really the hero everyone says you are... What good are you without any skills?)#k
translated: #b（就算我真的是英雄……一个什么能力都没有的英雄又能有什么用呢？）#k

original: Welcome, hero! What's that? You want to know how I knew who you were? That's easy. I eavesdropped on some people talking loudly next to me. I'm sure the rumor has spread through the entire island already. Everyone knows that you've returned!
translated: 英雄！你好！啊？你难道不知道自己是英雄吗？前面3个人都喊那么大声了，我还能听不见吗？整个岛都知道英雄苏醒的事情了。

original: Anyway, what's with the long face? Is something wrong? Hm? You're not sure whether you're really a hero or not? You lost your memory?! No way... It must be because you were trapped inside the ice for hundreds and hundreds of years.
translated: 咦，你怎么好像不开心的样子？有什么问题吗？啊？不知道自己到底是不是英雄？你失忆了吗？怎么会……看样子是被封冻在冰里数百年来的后遗症。

original: Hm, how about trying out that sword? Wouldn't that bring back some memories? How about #bfighting some monsters#k?
translated: 嗯，既然你是英雄，挥挥剑也许就会想起什么来呢？试着去#b打猎怪兽#k，怎么样？

original: It just so happens that there are a lot of #r#o9300383#s#k near here. How about defeating just #r3#k of them? It could help you remember a thing or two.
translated: 对了，这附近有许多#r#o9300383##k，请击退 #r3只#k试试，说不定你就能想起什么了。

original: Ah, you've also forgotten how to use your skills? #bPlace skills in the quick slots for easy access.#k You can also place consumable items in the slots, so use the slots to your advantage.
translated: 哦，你应该还没有忘记使用技能的方法吧？#b将技能拖到快捷栏上，以方便使用#k。除了技能以外，消费道具也可以拖到这里来方便使用。

original:
Ah, you've brought all the components. Give me a few seconds to assemble them... Like this... And like that... and...
#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i3010062# 1 #t3010062# 

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 95 exp
translated:
材料都拿来了吗？请稍等。这么混合一样…… 

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
#i3010062# #t3010062# 1个 

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 95 exp

original: Here, a fully-assembled chair, just for you! I've always wanted to give you a chair as a gift, because I know a hero can occasionally use some good rest. Tee hee.
translated: 好了，椅子做好了！嘿嘿！就算是英雄肯定也会有需要歇歇的时候，所以我一直想送你一把椅子。

original: A hero is not invincible. A hero is human. I'm sure you will face challenges and even falter at times. But you are a hero because you have what it takes to overcome any obstacles you may encounter.
translated: 我想就算是英雄也不能永远活力充沛，肯定也有疲劳、困倦的时候。但真正的英雄是能够克服万难取得最后胜利的。

original:
Ah, you're the hero. I've been dying to meet you.
#b#L0#(Seems a bit shy...)#l
translated:
英、英雄大人……我一直都很想见你。
#b#L0#（做腼腆状。）#l

original: I have something I've been wanting to give you as a gift for a very long time... I know you're busy, especially since you're on your way to town, but will you accept my gift?
translated: 我从很久以前就想送英雄大人一件礼物……既然今天遇见了英雄，不知英雄能否赏脸收下我这份薄礼？

original: The parts of the gift have been packed inside a box nearby. Sorry to trouble you, but could you break the box and bring me a #b#t4032309##k and some #b#t4032310##k? I'll assemble them for you right away.
translated: 制作礼物的材料放在这附近的箱子里了。劳烦英雄大人找到这个箱子，把#b#t4032309##k和#b#t4032310##k带来给我。然后我就能立刻把礼物做好。

original: Alright, I've done enough explaining for now. Let's move on to the next stage. What's the next stage, you ask? I just told you. Train as hard as you can until you become strong enough to defeat the Black Mage with a single blow.
translated: 还没做好准备吗？那么准备好后再来跟我说一声。

original: You may have been a hero in the past, but that was hundreds of years ago. Even if it weren't for the curse of the Black Mage, all those years you spent frozen in time have stiffened your body. You must loosen up a bit and slowly regain your agility. How do you do that, you ask?
translated: 好了，说明到这里就告一段落，我们要进入下一阶段了。下一阶段是什么？刚才我已经说过了。就是不断的磨练自己直到你拥有足以战胜黑魔法师的实力。

original: Don't you know that you must first master the fundamentals? So the wise thing to do is to begin with #bBasic Training#k. Oh, of course, I forgot that you lost your memory. Well, that's why I'm here. You'll just have to experience it yourself. Shall we begin?
translated: 虽然在几年前你确实是英雄，但这毕竟是很久以前的事情了。就算没有黑魔法师的诅咒，在冰块里封冻了那么久，身体筋骨什么的也没那么灵活了吧？首先要做些准备活动。想知道是怎么样的准备活动？

original: The population of Rien may be mostly Penguins, but even this island has monsters. You'll find #o0100131#s if you go to #b#m140020000##k, located on the right side of the town. Please defeat #r10 of those #o0100131#s#k. I'm sure you'll have no trouble defeating the #o0100131#s that even the slowest penguins here can defeat.
translated: 身体是革命的本钱。英雄也要从基本体力开始训练！……那句话你也知道吧？当然要从#b 基本体力锻炼#k开始练起……啊，你可能不记的了。不过也没关系。尝试一下你就明白了。现在就开始基础体力锻炼吧？

original: What are you so hesitant about? You're a hero! You gotta strike while the iron is hot! Come on, let's do this!
translated: 在这个几乎全是企鹅的岛上，也有几只怪兽。去村子右边的#b冰雪覆盖的原野1#k，就能看到许多香肠嘴雪精灵。请消灭#r10只香肠嘴雪精灵#k。我们这些苯拙的企鹅用啄都能抓的到香肠嘴雪精灵，你总不能还抓不到吧？

original: Shall we continue with your Basic Training? Before accepting, please make sure you have properly equipped your sword and your skills and potions are readily accessible.
translated: 还没做好准备吗？那么准备好后再来跟我说一声。

original: Alright. This time, let's have you defeat #r#o0100132#s#k, which are slightly more powerful than #o0100131#s. Head over to #b#m140020100##k and defeat #r15#k of them. That should help you build your strength. Alright! Let's do this!
translated: 开始基础体力锻炼吧？准备好了？再确认一下剑是否装备好了？技能和药水是否已经托到了快捷栏中？

original: Are you not ready to hunt the #o0100132#s yet? Always proceed if and only if you are fully ready. There's nothing worse than engaging in battles without sufficient preparation.
translated: 很好。下面要去打猎的#r#o0100132#s#k，是比#o0100131#s更厉害一些的怪兽。去#b#m140020100##k抓#r15只#k，这将有助于你的体力提高。体力就是冒险动力的来源！快出去吧！

original: It seems like you're warmed up now. This is when rigorous training can really help you build a strong foundation. Let's proceed with the Basic Training, shall we?
translated: #b(我们的英雄，你这是怎么了？)#k

original: Go defeat some #r#o0100133#s#k in #b#m140020200##k this time. I think about  #r20#k should do it. Go on ahead and... Hm? Do you have something you'd like to say?
translated: 现在，身体筋骨差不多舒展开了吧？这种时候还要进一步加强训练强度才能保证锻炼出过硬的基础体力。来吧，继续基础体力的锻炼吧。

original: Isn't the number getting bigger and bigger?
translated: 这次去#b#m140020200##k消灭#r#o0100133##k试试看。大概消灭#r20只#k就行，将会对你的体力增长大有帮助。快去快去……咦？你有什么话要说吗？

original: Of course it is. What, are you not happy with 20? Would you like to defeat 100 of them instead? Oh, how about 999 of them? Someone in Sleepywood would be able to do it easily. After all, we are training...
translated: ……为什么消灭的怪兽数量越来越多了？

original: Oh no, no, no. Twenty is plenty.
translated: 是要越来越多。难道说20只还不够吗？要不消灭100只试试？哦，这还不够，索性不如像林中之城那样，一口气消灭999只怪兽试试……

original: You don't have to be so modest. I understand your desire to quickly become the hero you once were. This sort of attitude is what makes you a hero.
translated: 不，不用了，这样就够了。

original: #b(If you keep listening, you might end up having to take down 999 of them.)#k
translated: 哎呦哎呦，用不着这么谦虚。我充★分★理解英雄大人渴望赶紧变得厉害起来的心情。真不愧是英雄大人……

original: Please go ahead and slay 20 #o0100133#s.
translated: #b(再这么说下去，搞不好真得让我去消灭999这怪兽了，赶紧接任务得了。)#k

original: #b(You declined out of fear, but it's not like you can run away like this. Take a big breath, calm down, and try again.)#k
translated: 那就拜托你消灭20只#o0100133#。

original: Now, you will undergo a test that will determine whether you're fit or not. All you have to do is take on the most powerful monster on this island, #o0100134#s. About #r50#k of them would suffice, but...
translated: 只要消灭5只就可以了，你怕了吗？

original: We can't have you wipe out the entire population of #o0100134#s, since they aren't many of them out there. How about 5 of them? You're here to train, not to destroy the ecosystem.
translated: 来，让我测试一下，你至今为止的基础体力训练结果。测试方法很简单。这座岛上有一种最强悍凶猛的怪兽，叫呆呆雪精灵，你只要击退它就可以！要是能击退#r50#k只就最好了……

original: #o0100134#s can be found in deeper parts of the island. Continue going left until you reach #b#m140010200##k, and defeat #r5 #o0100134#s#k.
translated: 不过#o0100134#的数量本来就不多，杀掉那么多恐怕不利生态平衡的保持，你消灭5只就差不多了。你看，这训练与自然环境之间是多么滴和谐啊！真是完美啊……

original: Oh, is 5 not enough? If you feel the need to train further, please feel free to slay more than that. If you slay all of them, I'll just have to look the other way even if it breaks my heart, since they will have been sacrificed for a good cause...
translated: #o0100134#在岛的较深处。村子左边的路一直走，就能看到#b#m140010200##k，请去那里消灭#r5只#o0100134#s#k。

original: There isn't much record left of the heroes that fought against the Black Mage. Even in the Book of Prophecy, the only information available is that there were five of them. There is nothing about who they were or what they looked like. Is there anything you remember? Anything at all?
translated: 与黑魔法师战斗的英雄们……有关他们的信息几乎什么都没留下。即使在预言书中也只记载了5位英雄，也没有任何有关他们外貌的描述。你还能记起来些什么吗？

original: I don't remember a thing...
translated: 一点都想不起来了……

original: As I expected. Of course, the curse of the Black Mage was strong enough to wipe out all of your memory. But even if that's the case, there has got to be a point where the past will uncover, especially now that we are certain you are one of the heroes. I know you've lost your armor and weapon during the battle but... Oh, yes, yes. I almost forgot! Your #bweapon#k!
translated: 果然，黑魔法师的诅咒果然很厉害。不过，作为英雄的你肯定和过去应该还会存在某个联系点的。会是什么呢？武器和衣服是不是在战斗中都遗失了呢……啊，对了，应该是#b武器#k！

original: My weapon?
translated: 以前，我们在冰窟中挖掘英雄的时候，发现过一个巨大的武器。我们猜测可能是英雄使用的武器，所以就放在了村子中央。你来来去去的时候没看到吗？#b#p1201001##k……#i4032372#大概是这个样子……

original:
I found an incredible weapon while digging through blocks of ice a while back. I figured the weapon belonged to a hero, so I brought it to town and placed it somewhere in the center of the town. Haven't you seen it? #bThe #p1201001##k...
#i4032372#

It looks like this...
translated: 确实，那个#p1201001#在村子里，看起来是有些奇怪。

original: Come to think of it, I did see a #p1201001# in town.
translated: 没错，就是那个东西。据说英雄的武器是会挑选主人。如果你就是使用#p1201001#的英雄，那么在抓住#p1201001#的刹那，武器应该会有反应的。快去点击#b#p1201001#试试。#k

original: Yes, that's it. According to what's been recorded, the weapon of a hero will recognize its rightful owner, and if you're the hero that used the #p1201001#, the #p1201001# will react when you grab the #p1201001#. Please go find the #b#p1201001# and click on it.#k
translated: 如果#p1201001#有反应，就说明你是使用过#p1201001#的英雄，是#b战神#k。

original: If the #p1201001# reacts to you, then we'll know that you're #bAran#k, the hero that wielded a #p1201001#.
translated: 武器？

original: #b(Are you certain that you were the hero that wielded the #p1201001#? Yes, you're sure. You better grab the #p1201001# really tightly. Surely it will react to you.)#k
translated: #b(你仔细思考了一番...)#k

original: You learned the Back to Rien skill.
translated: #b(让我确认自己是不是使用#p1201001#的英雄？使劲抓住#p1201001#试试，肯定会有什么反映的。)#k

original: #b(You might be starting to remember something...)#k
translated: 学会了返回里恩技能。

original: #b(You need to think about this for a second...)#k
translated: #b（似乎想起来了什么……）#k

original: Voom voom voom voom...
translated: 嗡嗡嗡嗡嗡……

original: #b(The #p1201001# is producing an undulating echo. But who is that boy standing over there?)
translated: #b（#p1201001#在发出嗡鸣声。奇怪，那边的少年是谁？）#k

original: You've never seen him before. He doesn't look human.
translated: #b（以前没见过他啊？怎么看起来不太像人类？）#k

original: Yo, Aran! Do you not hear me? I said, do you not hear me! Ugh, how frustrating!
translated: 喂！战神！还听不见我的声音吗？到底听不听得见？唉，烦死了！

original: #b(Hm? Who's voice was that? It sounds like an angry boy...)
translated: #b（咦？这是谁的声音？怎么听起来像个凶巴巴的少年……）#k

original: Ugh, my only master had to end up trapped in ice for hundreds of years, abandoning me completely, and is now completely ignoring me.
translated: 唉……哪有这样的主人啊？丢开武器在冰窟里睡了几百年，现在连话都听不懂了……

original: Who...are you?
translated: 你是谁啊？

original: Aran? Do you hear me now? It's me! Don't you recognize me? I'm your weapon, #b#p1201002# the polearm#k!
translated: 啊，战神？现在听到我的声音了？是我啊，不记得我了？我就是武器#b长矛 #p1201002##k啊？

original: What's with that suspicious look on your face? I know you've lost your memory, but did you forget about me, too? How could you?!
translated: 不至于吧？这么吃惊？再怎么失忆，总不能连我都忘了吧？太不够意思了！

original: I'm so sorry, but I can't remember a thing.
translated: 不好意思，真的一点都想不起来。

original: Sorry doesn't cut it! Do you know how lonely and bored I was for hundreds of years? I don't care what it takes! Remember me! Remember me now!
translated: 说声不好意思就能算了？！几百年来就我一个人孤苦伶仃地，有多寂寞你知道吗？不管怎样，你快点给我想起来！

original: #b(The voice that claims to be #p1201002#? the #p1201001# is yelling in frustration. You don't think this conversation is going anywhere. You better go talk to #p1510009# first.)
translated: #b（一口一个自己是#p1201001#、#p1201002#的，还越说越生气了。再这么说下去也不会有啥进展，还是先走到 #p1201000#跟前，好好商量商量。）#k

original: How is your training going? Wow, you've reached such a high level! That's amazing. I knew you would do just fine on Victorial Island... Oh, look at me. I'm wasting your time. I know you're busy, but you'll have to return to the island for a bit.
translated: 修炼进展得如何？哟，等级升得这么高了？难怪人们都说济州岛是养马的天堂，金银岛是升级的天堂……对了，现在还不是说闲话的时候。能否麻烦你回岛上来一趟？

original: Your #b#p1201001##k in #b#m140000000##k is acting strange all of a sudden. According to the records, the Polearm acts this way when it is calling for its master. #bPerhaps it's calling for you#k. Please return to the island and check things out.
translated: #b保管在#m140000000##k的你的#b#p1201001##k突然出现了奇怪的反应。据说长矛在呼唤自己主人的时候才会发出那样的反应。#b也许有什么事情要转达给你？#k请速回岛上一趟吧。

original: First you promise to defeat the Black Mage and make me a famous weapon, then you abandon me for hundreds of years, and now you're telling me you don't remember who I am? What the...?! Do you think I'll let you get away with that? You're the one who begged and pined for me!
translated: 曾经是谁说要让我成为击退黑魔法师的传世武器的？结果中了诅咒，自顾自地沉睡了几百年，把我丢在一边不管不顾。……什么？想不起来了？一句想不起来了就想了事？当初苦苦求我，拜托我的时候怎么说的来着……

original: I did tell #p1203000# to make a polearm for me if I could prove my worth.
translated: 说要向#p1203000#证明自己的实力，请他给我一个机会。

original: After all that begging, shouldn't you treat me with a little more love and respect? Ya know, a weapon like me's rare and a wonderful thing. I am the ultimate #p1201001# that can help you defeat the Black Mage. How could you ditch me for hundreds of years...
translated: 没错！当初为了得到我，你低三下四地苦苦哀求。要知道像我这样优秀的武器，你上哪里去找啊？能够和黑魔法师相抗衡的最强的#p1201001#就是我了！结果你却把我扔在冰窟里，一放就是几百年……

original: Hey, I never begged for you.
translated: 什么？没有苦苦哀求？是谁哭着闹着要得到我，甚至不惜双膝下跪苦苦哀求？要不#p1203000#怎么会答应……等等？战神！你难道……难道已经想起来了？！

original: What? You never begged for me? Ha! #p1203000# told me you got on your knees, begged for me in tears, and... Wait a sec. Aran! Did you just remember who I am?!
translated: 有一点点……

original: Maybe a little bit...
translated: ……真不愧是战神啊……呜，呜呜！不，我一点都没有感动！……虽然中了黑魔法师的诅咒，能力尽失，连拿起我的力气都没有了……即便如此，你居然还能想起我，真不愧是我的主人啊！

original: Aran, it is you! *Sniff sniff* Wait, *ahem* I didn't get emotional, it's just allergies. I know the Black Mage has stripped you of your abilities so you probably don't even have the strength to lift me... but at least you remember me! I'm glad that your memory's starting to return.
translated: 就算你失去记忆也还是我的主人。那经过极端训练的身体依然能够记得当初的技能，虽然在冰窟中沉睡了数百年，但这一点我还是很清楚的。好吧，我帮你唤醒你的能力！

original: Evn though you've lost your memory, you're still my master. You endured some very tough training in the past, and I'm sure your body still remembers the skills that got you through those hard times. Alright, I'll restore your abilities!
translated: 你的等级还没有以前那么高，没法帮你唤醒所有的能力。不过，先帮你唤醒一部分的能力，这样将来升级也会更快一些。快点恢复从前的能力吧！

original: Please make some space in your equipment inventory.
translated: 倒也没有苦苦哀求。

original: Oh, have you brought me the Sign of Acceptances? You're stronger than I thought! But more importantly, I am impressed with the amount of courage you displayed when you agreed to take this dangerous weapon without any hesitation. You deserve it. The #p1201001# is yours.
translated: 哎呦～#t4032311#都取回来了？你……比我想象的还要厉害一些嘛。不过，对于随时都可能伤到自己的危险武器，你那种毫不畏惧的爽朗豪放的心态实在是……好吧，#p1201001#就给你了。

original: (After a long time passed, #p1203000# handed you the #p1201001# which was carefully wrapped in cloth.)
translated: #b（过了好一会儿，#p1203000#才郑重地将裹在布里的#p1201001#交给我。）#k

original: Here, this is #p1201002#, the Polearm you've asked for. Please take good care of it.
translated: 这就是专门为你而做的长矛，名叫#p1201002#……以后就拜托了。

original: Hmm... What's a young person like you doing in this secluded place?
translated: 呵呵……年轻人来这么偏僻的地方干嘛？

original: I've come to get the best Polearm there is!
translated: 我想要最厉害的长矛！

original: The best Polearm? You should be able to purchase it in some town or other...
translated: 最厉害的长矛？那种东西在小村子里怎么有卖的……

original: I hear that you are the best blacksmith in all of Maple World! I want nothing less than a weapon made by you!
translated: 我知道你就是冒险岛世界里最厉害的铁匠！我想要你做的武器！

original: I'm too old to make weapons now, but... I do have a Polearm that i made way back when. It's still in excellent shape. But I can't give it to you because that Polearm is extremely sharp, so sharp it could even hurt its master. Do you still want it?
translated: 我这个老头子太老了，哪还能做什么优秀的武器啊。倒是有一支很久以前做的长矛……不过却不能给你。那个家伙太锋利，弄不好连主人都会被伤到。这种武器你还想要吗？

original: Well, if you say so... I can't object to that. I'll tell you what. I'll give you a quick test, and if you pass it, the #p1201001# is yours. Head over to the #bTraining Center#k and take on the #r#o9831006##k that are there. your job is to bring back #b30 Sign of Acceptances#k.
translated: 呵呵……既然你这么说，我这个老头子就试一试你。你去旁边的#b修炼场#k，打败那些#r#o9001012##k，取回#b#t4032311##k#b30个#k给我。我就把#p1201001#交给你。

original: How is the training going? Hm, Lv. 60? You still ahve a long way to go, but it's definitely praiseworthy compared to the first time I met you. Continue to train diligently, and I'm sure you'll regain your strength soon!
translated: 修炼得如何？嗯……60级了……虽然还不够，不过比起当初把你刚从冰窟里挖出来的那个状态要强百倍了。像这样下去，很快你就能恢复从前的实力了。

original: But first, you must head to #b#m140000000##k your #b#p1201001##k is acting weird again. I think it has something to tell you. It might be able to restore your abilities, so please hurry.
translated: 不过，你得先回#b#m140000000##k一趟。你的#b#p1201001##k又出现了奇怪的反应。似乎是有什么话要对你说。说不定能唤醒你的能力也说不定，赶紧回去一趟吧。

original: Anyway, I thought it was really something that a weapon had its own identity, but this weapon gets extremely annoying. It cries, saying that I'm not paying attention to its needs, and now... Oh, please keep this a secret from the Polearm. I don't think it's a good idea to upset the weapon any more than I already have.
translated: 不管怎样，拥有意识的武器还是很厉害的，某个方面来看，那家伙有种很神圣的感觉。如果不听它的，它就会呜呜哭……啊，这种话可一定要对长矛保密。我可不想让它吵得更凶。

original: Did you slay the #o2600111#? Yippy! You're my master, indeed! Now, give me the Red Jade you fuond! I'll reattach it and... Wait, why aren't you saying anything? Don't tell me you didn't bring it back...
translated: 抓到#o9001013#了吗？呵呵呵……真不愧是我的主人！很好，把你找到的#t4032312#给我吧……啊……？怎么不说话？难道……你没找到？

original: What? You didn't bring the Red Jade?! Why not?! Did you forget?! Yikes, I never thought the Black Mage's curse would turn you into a dummy...
translated: 什么？！没找到#t4032312#？怎么会这样？！你忘了吗？啊，怎么……再怎么被黑魔法师诅咒，再怎么被封冻几百年也不能让你变得这么笨啊……

original: No, I can't let this drive me to despair. Now more than ever, I must stay optimistic and alert. Argh...
translated: 不行。我不能绝望。主人糊里糊涂，我可不能糊涂……深呼吸……深呼吸……

original: You can go back if you want, but I'm sure the thief has already fled the scene. You'll just have to make a new Red Jade. You've made one before, so you remember the required materials, don't you? So hurry it up.
translated: 再去找找，反正小偷已经逃走。看来必须重新做#t4032312#了。以前也做过一次，你知道需要哪些材料吧？快去搜集材料……

original: Oh, isn't that... Hey, did you remember how to make the Red Jade? You may be a dummy who has amnesia, but this is why I can't leave you. Now hurry, give me the gem!
translated: 啊！这、这是……你终于想起制作#t4032312#的方法了？啊啊……这就是为什么你再笨再健忘，我也依然对你不离不弃……哎呀，现在不是说这些的时候！快把宝石给我！

original: Okay, now that I have the power of Red Jade, I'll restore more of your abilities. Your level has gotten much higher since the last time we met, so I'm sure I can work my  magic a bit more this time!
translated: 好了，#t4032312#的力量应该可以恢复了，你的能力也需要再唤醒一些。现在你的等级升高了不少，可以被唤醒的能力也更多了！

original: Please make some space in your equipment inventory.
translated: 赶紧恢复以前的能力吧，带上我一起去冒险……

original: *Sob sob* #p1203001# is sad. #p1203001# is mad. #p1203001# cries. *Sob sob*
Wh...What's wrong?
translated: 怎、怎么了？

original: #p1203001# made gem. #bGem as red as apple#k. But #rthief#k stole gem. #p1203001# no longer has gem. #p1203001# is sad...
translated: #p1203001#做好了宝石。#b像苹果一样的红宝石#k。结果#r小偷#k却把宝石给偷走了。#p1203001#宝石没了。#p1203001#好难过……

original: A thief stole your red gem?
translated: 你说小偷偷走了红宝石？

original: yes, #p1203001# wants gem back. #p1203001# reward you if you find gem. Catch thief and you get reward.
translated: 对。必须找回#p1203001#宝石。你要是能帮我找回#p1203001#宝石，我会好好答谢你的。要是帮我抓到小偷，我也会答谢你的。

original: The thief wen that way! Which way? Hold on...eat with right hand, not left hand... #bLeft#k! He went left! Go left and you find thief.
translated: 小偷往那个方向去了。那个方向是……吃饭的手是右手，不吃饭的手是左手……#b左边#k！往左边去就能抓到小偷。

original: How is the training going? I know you're busy, but please come to #bRien#k immediately. The #bMaha#k has started to act weird again... But it's even weirder now. it's different from before. It's... darker than usual.
translated: 最近有没有好好修炼？虽然知道你很忙，不过还是请你回一趟#b#m140000000##k。#b#p1201002##k又出现了奇怪的反应……很奇怪，这次的反应和上次不一样，有点更深厚、更沉重……的感觉。

original: I have a bad feeling about this. Please come back here. I've never seen or heard Maha like this, but I can sense the suffering it's going through. #bOnly you, the master of Maha, can do something about it#k!
translated: 有种不祥的预感……请速速回去。虽然我从来没有见过#p1201002#，也没听过它的声音……不过我可以感觉到它的痛苦。只有#b#p1201002#的主人，你才能解决它的问题#k！

original: Thank you, Aran. If it weren't for you, I would have become enraged and who knows what could have happened. Thank you NOT! It's only your duty as my mster...
translated: 谢谢你，战神。多亏了你，才阻止了我的暴走。真是万幸……！以主人的实力，这点小事当然不在话下了！

original: Anyways, I just noticed how high of a level you've reached. If you were able to control me in my state of rage, I think you're ready to handle more abilities
translated: 现在来看，你的等级已经很高了。既然能够打倒暴走状态下的我……那么唤醒你过去全部的力量也应该是可以的了。

original: Please make some space in your equipment inventory.
translated: 沉睡的技能全都唤醒了……毕竟好久没用了，还需要熟悉熟悉。不过，应该进步会很快的。

original: Your skills have been restored. Those skills have been dormant for so long that you'll have to re-train yourself. but you'll be as good as new once you complete your training.
translated:
喂，你在哪呢？大事不好了！你快来趟#b#m104000004##k吧！
#b#L0# (喂…………！#p1002104#可是一直喊我英雄的…………)#l

original: Even with all that, however, you still have a long way to go until you return to the old you.
translated: #b只要你接受，我就喊你#m104000000##k，你要以最快的速度赶过来！知道吗？

original: Why do I look like this, you ask? I don't want to talk about it, but I suppose I can't hide from you since you're my master...
translated: ……问我怎么会变成这样？……本来不太想说的……不是，当然瞒不过主人你了……

original: While you were trapped inside ice for hundreds of years, I, too, was frozen. It was a long time to be away from you. That's when the seed of darkness was planted in my heart.
translated: ……你被冰封的数百年间，我也被冰在了冰窟里。那么长的时间，没有主人的陪伴……渐渐的，我的心里便出现了黑暗。

original: But since you awoke, I thought the darkness had gone away. I thought things would return to the way they were, but I was mistaken.
translated: 不过，你重新苏醒后，我心中的黑暗也跟着完全消失了。既然主人回来了，心里也没有什么可难过的了。本以为这样就没事了……没想到这只是我的错觉。

original: Please, Aran. Please stop me from becoming enraged. Only you can control me. It's out of my hands now. Please do whatever it takes to #rstop me from going berserk#k!
translated: 拜托了，战神……一定要阻止我。能够阻止我暴走的只有你了。我再也抑制不住内心中的黑暗了！无论如何，一定要#r打败暴走的我#k！

original: It seems like you've started to remember things. Your Polearm must have recognized you. This means you are surely #bAran, the wielder of Polearms#k. Is there anything else you remember? Skills you used with the Polearm perhaps? Anything?
translated: 你似乎在回想什么。这个长矛果然认出了你。那么你肯定就是#b使用长矛的英雄，战神#k了。你想起什么其他的了吗？有关长矛的技能之类……

original: #b(You tell her that you remember a few skills.)#k
translated: #b（说技能倒是想起来了几个。）#k

original: That's not a lot, but it's progress. Our focus, then, should be to get you back to the state before you were frozen. You may have lost your memory, but I'm sure it won't take long for you to recover the abilities that your body remembers.
translated: 虽然数量不多，不过也已经很不容易了。现在让我们集中精力来恢复过去的技能吧。虽然你失忆了，但毕竟是以前曾经烂熟于心的东西，要恢复起来应该很快。

original: How do I recover my abilities?
translated: 那个…………办法只有一个。就是修炼！修炼！修炼！只有不停地修炼才能找回曾经忘却的身体感觉！

original: There is only one way to do that. Train! Train! Train! Train! If you continue to train, your body will instinctively remember its abilities. To help you through the process, I'll introduce you to an instructor.
translated: 武器要是能使得更熟练就好了。送你一支#b长矛#k。希望你在修炼的时候能够进步得更快。带着这支长矛……

original: I thought it'd be better for you to use a familiar weapon for your training, so I gave you a #bPolearm#k. I hope you can handle it. Now, take that weapon and...
translated: 嗯，等等。那现在要怎么做呢…………

original: No? Are you saying you can train on your own? I'm just letting you know that you'll get better results if you train with an instructor. You can't live in this world alone. You must learn to get along with other people.
translated: 怎么恢复过去的技能？

original: Hey, Evan, Wassup? What's with the dark circles under your eyes? Didn't sleep well? Huh? Had a strange dream? What was it about? Whoa? A dream about a Dragon?
translated: 哦，起来啦，小不点？大清早的，怎么这么大的黑眼圈啊？晚上没睡好吗？什么？做了奇怪的梦？什么梦啊？嗯？梦见遇到了龙？

original:
Muhahahahaha, a Dragon? Are you serious? I don't know how to interpret dreams, but that sounds like a good one! Did you see a dog in your dream too?



#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 20 exp
translated:
哈哈哈哈～龙？不得了。居然梦到了龙！但是梦里有狗吗？哈哈哈哈～

original: Did you sleep well, Evan?
translated: 醒了吗，小不点？

original: #bYes, what about you, mom?
translated: #b嗯……妈妈也醒了吗？

original: I did as well, but you seem so tired. Did you sleep well? Did the thunder and lightning last night keep you up?
translated: 嗯……但是你怎么好像没睡着呢？昨天晚上打了一夜的雷。所以才没睡好吗？

original: #bOh, no. It's not that, Mom. I just had a strange dream last night.
translated: #b不，不是因为那个，是因为做了一个奇怪的梦。

original: A strange dream? What kind of strange dream?
translated: 奇怪的梦？梦见了什么呢？

original: #bWell...
translated: #b(说明梦见在迷雾中遇到龙的事情。)

original: #b(You explain that you met a Dragon in your dream.)
translated: 呵呵呵呵，龙？怎么会梦到这个呢？没被吃掉，真是太好了。你做了个有趣的梦，去告诉#p1013101#吧。他一定会很高兴的。

original: Hahaha, a Dragon? That's incredible. I'm glad he didn't swallow you whole! You should tell Utah about your dream. I'm sure he'll enjoy it
translated: #b#p1013101##k去#b#m100030102##k给猎犬喂饭了。从家里出去就能见到他了。

original: Haha, I had a good laugh. Hahaha, but enough with that nonsense, feed Bulldog, would you?
translated: 一大早就来开玩笑，哈哈哈。别乱说了，快去给#p1013102#喂饭吧。

original: #bWhat? that's Utah's job!
translated: #b嗯？那不是#p1013101#的事情吗？

original: You little brat! I told you to call me older brother! You know how much Bulldog hates me. He'll bite me if I go near him. You feed him. He likes you.
translated: 你这家伙！快去喂呀！！#p1013102#有多讨厌我，你也知道。哥哥我去的话，它一定会咬我的。猎犬喜欢你，你去给它送饭。

original: Hurry up and head #bleft#k to feed #bBulldog#k. He's been barking to be fed all morning.
translated: 你快到#b左边#k去，给#b#p1013102##k喂饲料。那个家伙好像肚子饿了，从刚才开始就一直在叫。

original: Feed Bulldog and come back to see me.
translated: 给#p1013102#喂完食之后，赶快回来。

original:
Did you eat your breakfast, evan? Then, will you do me a favor? 
 #fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0#

original: Did you feed Bulldog? You should have some breakfast now then, Evan. Today's breakfast is Handmade Sandwich. I've brought it with me. Hee hee. I was going to eat it myself if you didn't agree to feed Bulldog
translated: 给#p1013102#喂过饭了吗？小不点你去吃早饭吧。今天的早饭是#t2022620#。我拿出来了，嘻嘻。事实上，如果你不去给#p1013102#喂食，我就不打算给你早饭吃。

original: Here, I'll give you this #bSandwich#k, so #bgo talk to mom when you finish eating#k. She says she has something to tell you.

translated: #b(有话要跟我说？先把#t2022620#吃了，然后到屋里去看看吧。)#k

original: Your #bDad#k forgot his Lunch Box when he left for the farm this morning. Will you #bdeliver this Lunch Box#k to your Dad in #bFarm Center#k, honey?
translated: 去农场干活的时候，#b爸爸#k忘了把便当带过去了。你能去#b#m100030300##k给爸爸#b送便当#k吗？

translated: 呵呵，小不点果然是个好孩子～#b从家里出去之后，往左边走#k。爸爸一定饿极了，你最好快点给他送过去。

original: Come back to me if you happen to lose the Lunch Box, I'll make his lunch again.
translated: 如果不小心把便当弄丢了，就马上回来。我再给你包一份。

Ah, did you bring all the Thick Branches? That's my kid! What shall i give you as reward?... Let's see... Oh, right!

original: Please make room in your Set-up Inventory
translated: 好了，我用修理篱笆剩下的木板做了一把椅子。虽然不太好看，但却很结实。就给你用吧。

original: The pigs at the farm have been acting strange these past couple days. They've been angry and irritable for no reason. I was worried so I came out to the farm early this morning and sure enough, it seems like a few of these Pigs got past the fence.
translated: 最近农场上的#o1210100#有点奇怪。经常无缘无故地发脾气，做出一些烦人的事情。我对此很担心，所以今天很早就出来了。果然有一只#o1210100#钻过了篱笆，逃到外面去了。

original: Before I go and find the Pigs, I should mend the broken fence. Luckily, it wasn't damaged too badly. I just need a few Thick Branches to fix it right up. Will you bring me #b3 Thick Branches#k, Evan?
translated: 在找到#o1210100#之前，必须先把坏了的篱笆修好。还好坏得不是太严重，只要有几个#t4032498#应该就能修好了。小不点，要是你能帮我搜集#b3个#t4032498##k就好了……

original: Oh, that's very nice of you. You'll be able to find the #bThick Branches#k from the nearby #rStumps#k. They're not too strong, but use your skills and items when you find yourself in danger.
translated: 哦，真是谢谢你。#b#t4032498##k可以从周围的#r#o0130100##k身上搜集到。它们虽然不是很强，但不小心的话，可能会遇到危险。你一定要好好使用技能道具。

original: Oh, did you bring the egg? Here, give it to me, I'll give you the incubator then.
translated: 哦，#t4032451#拿来了吗？快把蛋给我吧。我来帮你把它孵化。

Alright, here you go. I have no idea how to use it, but it's yours.
 #fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 360 exp

来，拿着。不知道这到底可以用来干什么……

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/8/0# 360 exp

original: Did you defeat the Treacherous Foxes?
#bWhat happened to slaying the Foxes left behind?
translated: #b你说要去收拾剩下的狐狸的，怎么回事？

original: Oh that? Haha, I did chase them, sort of, But I wanted to make sure they did not catch up to you. I wouldn't want you eaten by a Treacherous Fox or anything. So I just let them be.
translated: 啊，那个嘛？我后来是去了，但走错了路，怕被#o9300385#抓去做人质，所以就回来了。

original: #bAre you sure you weren't just hiding because you were scared of the Foxes?
translated: #b该不会是害怕狐狸而躲起来了吧？

original: What? No way! Sheeesh, I fear nothing!
translated: 你在胡说什么啊？！我为什么会害怕狐狸？！我一点都不害怕狐狸！

original: #bWatch out! There's a Treacherous Fox right behind you!
Eeeek! Mommy!
translated: 啊！快躲起来！
……你这家伙。别吓哥哥我！哥哥我的心脏不好，不能受惊吓！
#b(所以叫哥哥才不愿意去，叫我去。)

original: You little brat! I'm your older brother. Don't you mess with me! Your brother has a weak heart, you know. Don't surprise me like that!
translated:
哼哼，不管怎样，#o9300385#消灭掉了。辛苦你了，我把一个路过的冒险家送我的东西送给你，作为给你的报酬。来，拿着。

original: #b(This is why I don't want to call you Older Brother....)
translated: 是#b魔法师的攻击武器短杖#k。虽然你也可能没什么用，但拿在手里到处走，还是很帅的，哈哈哈。

original:
Hmmph! Anyway, I'm glad you were able to defeat the Treacherous Foxes. As a reward I'll give you something an Adventurer gave me a long time ago. Here you are.  
 #fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
 #v1372107# Beginner Magician's Wand

translated: 狐狸的数量确实增加了，对吧？奇怪。狐狸的数量为什么会增加呢？看来必须调查一下。

original: It's strange. The chickens are acting funny. They used to hatch way more Eggs. Do you think the Foxes have something to do with it? If so, we better hurry up and do something about it.
translated: 你不觉得奇怪吗？最近的鸡怎么和以前不一样了？以前它们会下很多#t4032451#，但现在越来越少了。是不是因为狐狸增多了呢？那样的话，必须赶紧想办法才行。你说对不对？

original: Right? Let us go and defeat those Foxes. Go on ahead and defeat #r10 Treacherous Foxes#k in #bBack Yard#k first. I'll follow you and take care of what's left behind. Now, hurry over to the Back Yard!
translated: 好吧，让我们去消灭狐狸吧。你先去#b#m100030103##k消灭#r10只#o9300385##k。我会负责剩下的事情的。好了，你快到#m100030103#去吧～

original: Master, master, look at this. There's something wrong with one of my scales!
translated: (从米乐处获得了龙鳞，当鳞片落入手中之后，神奇地变成了#i1142158#。)

original:
That's...?! 

Mir, one of your scales is showing the #bOnyx Dragon's Mark#k!
translated: (学会了#b英雄之回声#k技能。)

original:
Really? That's weird... 

Oh, I know! Then that means it's time.
translated: 哇！学会了全新的技能，作为龙神，有种成为了弗里德真正继承人的感觉呢。

original: It's time?
translated: 嘻嘻，恭喜你，主人。日后你也要不断强大，试着超越前任哦！

original: Master! Look, I've grown some more.
translated: 主人～你看，我又长大了。

original: #bOh my! You really grew! Whoa, your voice is even different!
translated: #b哇，你怎么这么大了……啊！声音都变了。

original: Ahem... Really? Do I sound cool?
translated: 呵呵～是吗？怎么样？很帅吧？

original: #bDefinitely! Dragons really do grow in leaps and bounds!
translated: #b嗯！帅呆了！我之前也发现了，龙每次都会长很多。是因为会蜕皮，所以才会这样的吗？

original: Yep! I shed my old scales and grew new ones. I guess in human terms, it would be something like...buying new clothes as your body grows?
translated: 嗯，新的鳞片长出来之后，就必须把原来的鳞片全部脱掉。人类的话……身体长大之后，就要做新衣服，就是这种感觉。

original: #bYour new scales are so shiny and nice.
translated: #b好像因为是新长出来的鳞片，看上去非常闪亮。

original: Yuuup. They are, aren't they?
translated: #b(虽然个头长大了，但可爱的语气还是老样子……)

original: #b(His body's grown but he still talks the same.)
translated:
但是主人，你看看这个。
#i4032502#
这是我脱下来的一片鳞片，只有它在闪闪发光。其他鳞片全都因为失去了力量而碎裂了。只有这个鳞片好像还保存着我的力量。这个东西应该能用来做什么吧？

original:
Anyway, master, could you take a look at this?
#i#
This is one of the scales I shed. For some reason, this one's still shiny. All the others sort of fell apart. I feel like this scale still carries my strength in it. Do you think we could use it for something?
translated: #b嗯？可以用来干什么呢？

original: #bHmm, maybe.
translated: 虽然人类没有角，没有鳞片，没有爪子，也不会喷火，但是人类可以制作有用的东西，不是吗？用它做材料制作东西，你说好不好？这是我的鳞片，所以非常坚硬。其中还含有我的力量，应该可以使主人的力量变得更强。

original: Yippee! Humans don't have horns, scales, or claws like Dragons do, but they do have the ability to make useful things! That scale is extremely sturdy and carries my strength with it, so it will make you that much more powerful, master!
translated: #b哇，好像是的。米乐你真了不起！你什么时候变得这么聪明的！

original: #bMir, you are awesome. When did you start thinking like that?
translated: 嘿嘿，我和你在一起这么久，对人类已经很了解了。这种事情是小意思。

original: Ahem. It's not like I was born yesterday. I know a whole lot about humans now.
translated: 来，主人，这是我的鳞片。以你的力量，一定可以用它制作出很棒的东西。

original: Here you go, master. Take my scale. I know you'll be able to make something really great with it!
translated: #b(从#p1013000#那里获得了蓝色双角龙的鳞片。神奇的是，鳞片刚放到手里，就马上变成了#i1142156#。)

original: #b(You received #p#'s dragon scale. As you place your hand on the dragon scale, it magically transforms into #i#.)
translated: 嘿嘿，是吗？

original: Master, look. I think I'm really coming into my own with my strength.
translated: 主人，你看。这次成长之后，我的力量几乎已经完整了。

original: #bYou're right. You look quite imposing. Is this the true strength of an Onyx Dragon?
translated: #b嗯，看上去就感觉很有气势。这就是玛瑙龙的真正力量吗？

original: It is the strength of an Onyx Dragon as well as the strength of its master. The Onyx Dragon can only grow when its master is growing stronger. That means your spirit has grown that much, too, master.
translated: 这是玛瑙龙的力量，同时也是主人的力量。玛瑙龙只有在契约者变强的时候才会成长。也就是说，主人你也同样成长了。

original: #bI see you've matured. You even sound different, #p#.
translated: #b果然……你现在越来越会说话了，#p1013000#。

original: Haha, of course. It would be embarrasing to talk like a child with this elegant bod! Anyway, master, I have another shiny scale that came off when I was shedding. It seems to be even more powerful than the last one I gave you. Here you go.
translated: 呵呵，那当然。我这么优雅的外表，如果太轻狂的话，岂不会被人笑掉大牙？对了主人，和上次一样，这次蜕皮之后又留下了一块鳞片。里面含有比以前更强的力量，我想应该会对你有所帮助。来，拿着。

original: Master, you should use this scale to make something useful that would reduce the damage you take when hit by a monster. You'll get stronger, which means that I'll get stronger. Sounds good to me!
translated: 虽然因为龙神是人类，会受到怪物的攻击，可是说不定那块鳞片可以保护龙神。如果龙神变强，我也会变得更加强大……我们一起强大起来吧，龙神。

original: Kinesis, I've got a present for you. Thought it would be nice to celebrate your first real upgrade.
translated: 凯内西斯，为了纪念完成第一次升级，我准备了点东西。

original: Check it out, it's a bag! This will help you carry more stuff without having to resort to a fanny-pack or something.
translated: 日后你要随身携带的物品会越来越多，我来帮你扩展你的道具栏。

original: Keep it up, K. Not that you need me to tell you that.
translated: 那么，日后也要期待你的大展身手了。

original: #face9#Let me see... got it. Perfect. Now that you've suffered through the boring yet EXTREMELY IMPORTANT part, we can cut you loose. Start with those 5 Training Robot Bs.
translated:
#face9#好的，测量毫无异常，那就正式开始吧。
把左边的5个训练机器人B全都打倒。

original: #face9#Pick up anything you want with the Z key. Don't worry, I've got plenty of parts to rebuild these with. When you're done, take the door on the left to come meet me.
translated:
#face9#打倒后拾取剩下的材料时，按下Z键就可以了。
结束之后利用左侧的传送口来我这里。

original: Jay, I feel so slow walking around like this. I'm going to switch to my speedier moves.
translated: 按下Z键可以拾取道具。

original: Actually, wait. Let me get a preliminary physical reading right now.
translated: 好吧，那最后再检查一下身体状态。

original: #face3#...That's weird. Hey, K. Looks like you have an ability you can improve.
translated: 只是休息了片刻，这么快就恢复了，你的体力可真够好的啊。

original: Data looks good so far. Nicely done.
translated: 我准备的可是你之前一直喜欢喝的饮料，这段时间难道你的喜好变了？

original: Okay, that's enough for today. Have a drink and get some rest. We're still not clear on how much stress your powers put on your body.
translated: 所有一切都好像顺利启动了。

original: The drink I gave you went to your inventory. Just like equipping gear, you can double-click that drink to, y'know, drink it. Now, get some rest. I want to check your physical indexes afterwards.
translated: 今天的测试做到这个地步应该可以了，最后我准备了爽口的运动饮料，一边喝一边休息一会吧，我会记录你体内身体疲劳物质正常化的过程的。

original: Is that all?
translated: 现在都可以了吧？

original: #face9#No, of course not. Don't get ahead of yourself, K.
translated: #face9#对了，还有件事忘了解释。

original: #face9#I'm tracking your Psychic Points #g(PP)#k so you'll know when you can use your ultimate. That's what I call that super technique you came up with. Seemed appropriate.
translated: 收集#face9#超自然点数#g(PP)#k，就可以使用绝招技能，这是你能使用的最强大的技能。

original: #face9#You'll get Psychic Points just by using psychokinesis abilities. I have to say, you have a very convenient power set, K.
translated:
#face9#超自然点数要怎么收集啊？
很简单，你平时使用念力的时候会自动累积。

original: #face9#Your ultimate skill should be on your #g[END]#k key, if you haven't moved it. Go ahead and let loose with it... I reinforced the walls after last time.
translated: 超能力者收集超自然点数就可以使用绝招技能.

original: #face9#Ultimate: Metal Press#g [END]#k will crush everything in its path, including targets high above you.
translated:
#face9#如果你还没有用过绝招技能，我就帮你装在#g[END]#k键上，
出来之前试着自在地用一次吧。

original: #b#h0##k! You jerk, I've been waiting TWO DAYS for you to get back to me! Have you been fooling with Jay again?
translated: #b#h0##k！！你居然现在才来，真是令人难以置信，我让杰帮我传话都已经是两天前的事情了！！

original: He forgot to tell me until just now, and I came as soon as I could. You know I hate to keep you waiting.
translated:
我真的是刚刚才听到他跟我说这件事的，
一听说你在等，我真的是以超新星爆炸的速度奔过来的。

original: #face1#...Like I haven't heard THAT before.
translated: #face1#是……是嘛？

original: #face2#(Her expression softens. Nice save.)#k
translated: #face2#嗯。#b(瞧瞧脸色立马就恢复正常了，多可爱啊。)#k

original: Well... You know, this wouldn't happen if you'd just show up for Student Council Meetings. I mean, you ARE the president! Give me the Meeting Minutes.
translated: 嗯，那也没办法了，如果你一开始能够准点地出现在总学生会会议上，也就不会有这种事情了，会议录给我。

original: The system is running smoothly, and all the errors are cleared. I'll compile the data and then we can decide our next move.
translated:
系统全都比较顺畅，这次也似乎并没有什么大的报错。
这段时间累积数据会比较重要，等到数据增多后就行升级。

original: You sure you don't need to start upgrading again? I'm going to outpace your system before you know it.
translated: 那得赶紧准备下一个版本了吧？看你最近的活跃表现，总觉得很快就需要升级版本了吧？

original: You keep saying that like you know anything about my rig. Nobody runs a better system than me. You stick to mind crushing and being pretty.
translated: 超，能，力，者，你倒是替我想想最近我的工作量有多大，昨天我就得在三个区的监控视频数据里将你的影子给去掉。

original: ...Which reminds me, are you EVER going to start covering your face when you do the superhero thing? It's the digital age, dude. Even my blender has a 15 megapixel camera.
translated: 算我求你了，就算你是想当英雄，能不能拜托你也遮遮你的脸啊？

original:
Seriously, are you going to cover your face?
#b
#L1#Eh. Too much trouble.#l
#L2#I don't have time to suit up in an emergency.#l
#L3#I'm too handsome, I can't deny the world this face.#l
translated:
你对遮着脸这件事，是怎么想的？
#b
#L1#为什么啊？多麻烦。#l
#L2#实际状况之下我是没那个时间的。#l
#L3#帅气的遮着脸可对这个世界不礼貌啊。#l

original: ...I figured you'd say that. You really don't take this serious enough.
translated: 啊……你要这么回答我是吧，真不愧是你的作风。

original: Fine. Give me your kitty mask. I was thinking about changing my name to Captain Fuzzums anyway.
translated:
如果你真的想要，把你那个搞笑的眼罩借我怎么样？
如果你想要的不是超能力者而是猫人，我倒是不妨戴上一天。

original: How do you know about Captain... Dude, stop reading my fanfic! In fact, just stay away from all my stuff. No stuff for you!
translated: 不可以，就算你是我的朋友，也不许碰我的东西。会传染到外界的细菌的。

original: You're already in trouble with #bYuna#k, you know. She stopped by while you were gone and told me to give you this.
translated: 真是的，话说回来，你不在这段期间，愤怒的#b尤娜#k曾经来过，她让我把这个交给你。

original: Great, Student Council minutes. The highlight of my day.
translated: 额……这东西一看就知道很没意思啊？难不成是学生会的会议录……？

original: That's what you get for being president, hotshot. Yuna's surely waiting for you at school. I can track her Rage Gauge as you make her wait, if you want.
translated: 尤娜应该会在学校里等着，估计等的时间越久，尤娜的愤怒值就会越高的。

original: School is right there, dude. Go out and hang a right. Don't make her any angrier than she already is. It's not cute.
translated: 你可不要告诉我，因为你太久没去学校，已经不记得学校的位置了，出去右拐就是。

original: #b(Go outside and find Yuna.)#k
translated: #b(去外面找尤娜吧。)#k

original: Did you get all of the signatures? Nice.
translated: 签名已经都要回来了吗？辛苦你了。

original: #face3#Hey, #b#h0##k... Don't you think maybe you've done enough of the hero thing?
translated:
#face3#那个，#b#h0##k。
现在可不可以不要再继续扮那个危险的英雄了？

original: #face3#I know helping people is a noble cause, but your duty is to be a student. And on top of that, you're the Student Council President. How do you think we all feel when you ditch us to go levitate trucks and tear up pavement?
translated:
#face3#虽说帮助他人真的是很不错的事情，但你的本分是个学生，你是学生会长啊。
放下手头该做的事情不做，到处在其他地方闯祸，你觉得在网上看到你的这些情况，我的心情会怎么样？

original:
#face3#Well, #b#h0##k?
#b#L1#Yuna, you worry too much. I can help you relax...#l
#L2#Maybe you can tell me more about that last council meeting...#l
translated:
#face3#你怎么想，#b#h0##k？
#b#L1#安抚尤娜#l
#L2#转移话题#l

original: #face2#Is that a new ribbon? It's quite nice. You always look so good, but today you look-
translated: #face2#哎哟，我们尤娜生气了啊？要是你一直这么生气，你这漂亮的小脸蛋可是会长皱纹的哦。

original: #face1#Are you ALWAYS going to change the topic when this comes up?
translated: #face1#这种话你还是说给那些喜欢跟在你屁股后面转的女孩子听吧？

original: #face1#Maybe you should save those lines for your little groupies! Especially if you're not going to take this seriously!
translated: 那种女孩子好像现在就在我面前啊？

original: Hey. If I wasn't serious, I wouldn't be here. The only girl I'm worried about is the one right in front of me.
translated:
#face1#什么……
我什么时候跟在你屁股后面转了！

original: #face1#Then enough with the lines and answer my question.
translated: #face2#我记得没错的话，应该是从十岁开始吧？

original: #face2#Sure, sure... What was it, again?
translated: #face1#那还不是因为你整天闯祸……！

original: #face1#YOU. ARE. INFURIATING.
translated:
#face2#嗯……总之，特意去事故现场实在是太危险的举动，
每次看到你的新闻，我就惴惴不安的。

original: #face2#Look... All I'm saying is, don't go getting yourself killed playing hero. I know you think you've got everything on lockdown, but you can't be prepared for everything...
translated: #face2#你是担心我受伤吗？还是说担心我的粉丝越来越多？

original: #face2#Are you worried that I'm going to get hurt? Or are you worried that I'm going to get more fans?
translated:
#face1#那当然是！！！
啊，真是的，每次和你对话，总觉得只有我变得越来越奇怪了。

original: #face1#See? SEE? THIS is what I'm talking about! You don't LISTEN!
translated: #face10##fs12#没错。

original: #face10##fs12#...You're so bad at this, yet she doesn't dump you. It's incredible.
translated: #face1#这个你拿去吧！还有至少来学校签到这种事情你得按时按点做吧！就因为你，我这个副会长也跟着遭殃了啊。

original: #face1#RRRRGH... Take this and GO. Just GO. I'm the Vice President, I don't deserve this kind of abuse.
translated: #face2##b(我……总有种不安的感觉。)#k

original: #face2##b...I keep feeling so anxious.#k
translated: #face9#凯内西斯，你要是每次都这么调戏尤娜，小心日后会后悔哦？

original: #face9#K, you're going to regret teasing Yuna so much.
translated: #face2#这么有趣，你叫我怎么办。

original: #face2#I can't help it. It's too much fun.
translated: 话说回来，你怎么每次都来插话？

original: Hey, why aren't you here? You keep talking about wanting some field testing.
translated:
#face9#反正又不是一两回了，
我可是支援你的，远程插话这件事你也得习惯起来了啊。

original: #face9#I'm not a fan of the sun, buddy. Plus, I like giving orders from on high.
translated:
#fs20#

#fEffect/BasicEff.img/QuestAlert/Default/0#
按下界面左侧的电灯泡,  
就可以查看远处抵达的任务.

original: #face3##b#h0##k... You know your picture is all over the internet, right? You keep letting yourself get photographed!
translated: #face3##b#h0##k，你知道最近新闻、社交网站、搜索网站上到处都是你的ID，已经引发热点问题了吗？

original: Why are you whispering? Speak up.
translated: 你这么小声嘀咕做什么？大声点说。

original: #face4#What if someone hears us? Ooh, we're trying so hard to keep this secret, and you're blowing it! What is your DEAL?
translated:
#face4#要是被别人听到了怎么办！
一般的英雄都会隐瞒自己的真实身份，自己惴惴不安的，怎么你就搞得周围人跟着受累呢？

original: #face9##fs12#Yeah, she's right! What IS your deal? Heh heh.
translated: #face9##fs12#没错。

original: Relax. Only the three of us know the truth.
translated: 你冷静点，目前也就只有我们三个知道我的真实身份。

original: For now! But... Ugh, whatever. I need you to do something. I need 100 student signatures for the gymnasium renovation.
translated:
你也真是的……反正你有件事要帮我去做。
为了体育室维修工程，我需要我们学校100名学生的签名。

original: #face2#I'm sure our lovely Vice President has already taken care of it?
translated: #face2#当然我们副会长都会做好的吧？

original:
I got 97 signatures. I need YOU to get the remaining 3, #b#h0##k.
#b#L1#I guess I can do that.#l
#L2#Ehh, sounds like too much work.#l
translated:
我已经拿到了97名学生的签名，剩下3个人的签名你去要吧，#b#h0##k。
#b#L1#知道了，这点事情就帮你做好了。#l
#L2#什么？好麻烦！#l

original: Huh. Are you turning over a new leaf? I didn't think you'd agree so easily.
translated: 什么状况，你居然也有这么亲切的时候。

original: Get three student signatures. That's it! You can do that, right?
translated: #face3#偶尔也会忠于自己的本分啊。

original: I'll be waiting here.
translated: 去学校里帮我要三个学生的签名吧，这点事还是可以做的吧？

original: #b(You should go find 3 student signatures somewhere in the school.)#k
translated: 我会在这里等着的。

original: #b#h0##k, did you see the news? Kinesis rescued a kid.
translated:
#b#h0##k，看到这里了吧？
这条新闻啊，看到了吧？说是超能力者救了小孩子。

original: #b...Yeah, I like this feeling.#k
translated: #b(是啊，那会儿头发差点全部被烧着。)#k

original: What?
translated: 嗯？你说什么？

original: Hm? Oh, yeah. Here, I need you to sign this.
translated: 没事，我什么都没说，还是赶紧给我签名吧。

original: Hey there, #b#h0##k! Did you see this picture in the paper? My dumb friend is convinced it's you. We've been arguing all morning.
translated:
你来得正好，#b#h0##k。
地铁的日报上登了这种照片，我总觉得这应该是合成的吧？我和朋友吵了好久。

original: #b...Oh yeah, I remember that. Good one.#k
translated: #b(啊，我想起来了，这刚好是那时候经过的路。)#k

original: What?
translated: 嗯？你说什么？

original: What? I didn't say anything.
translated: 没，我什么都没说。

original: The really weird part is that they're saying this Kinesis person uses psyro... psino... mind powers to move things.
translated:
听传闻说，超能力者会使用念力。
这是种不用动手就可以移动物体的超能力。

original: That's just ridiculous, right? No one can do that, right #b#h0##k?
translated:
我总觉得这在科学的角度是说不通的，
你是不是也这么觉得，#b#h0##k？

original: Think about it. Here, I'll sign that thing for you.
translated: 对了……你让我帮忙签名同意书的吧。

original: Oh, hi! Need me to sign something? Sure, anything for the Student Council President.
translated:
嗯？签名？
既然是学生会长提出来的，当然要帮忙了。

original: Hey, I heard Kinesis caught a bank robber. Did you see the news?
translated:
那个，听说这次超能力者抓住了银行劫匪，
你看过这个新闻了吧？

original: #b...Man, that picture came out great. I'll have to repost that.#k
translated: #b(照片拍得不错，为了配合编队，能更上相一点，我是没少受累。)#k

original: I got the inside story on their true identity, too. You ready for this?
translated:
那个，这可是高级情报，
根据可靠传言，超能力者的真实身份……

original: Kinesis is an alien from an exploded planet who crashed on Earth! They were adopted by humans who were killed by a criminal, so they vowed to spend their life fighting crime. While training they got struck by lightning, but then saved by a magic ring from outer space.
translated: 是通过基因实验孕育出的变异人，他先是被恐怖分子绑架，后来又被虫子咬了，就变成了绿色皮肤的超级军人。

original: I mean, it's really the only logical story once you narrow it down.
translated: 平时一副戴着眼镜的新闻记者的架势，但实际上是个超级有钱的土豪呢？

original: ...Comic books are destroying society.
translated: ……就说大家伙电影看太多了。

original: There you are. Wash your hands before you touch any of my stuff.
translated:
凯内西斯, 你的手应该洗干净了吧？
听说光是认真洗手, 就已经能够预防大部分的传染病了。

original: Give it a rest, you polish those things like twice a day. Tell me what you found.
translated: 别再跟我提这些公益广告的内容了，倒是说说你究竟发现什么了吧。

original: #face3#Ok. This is really cool.
translated: #face3#嗯，事情变得越来越有趣了呢。

original: I've been tracing someone online known only as WM. Their messages have been popping up on message boards all over.
translated: 你还记得用W.M.这个ID的人吗？那个在网上周期性地发出加密信息的ID。

original: It was always a big block of text, maybe some kind of code. A few cryptos tried to decode it, but most people ignored it.
translated: 一开始大家都觉得他没什么了不起的，但是随着时间的推移……

original: But then we noticed that the timestamps on the posts lined up with the weird stuff happening in the city. Whenever WM posts, monsters show up.
translated: 人们发现那个信息发出来的时间，和城市里发生事件或事故的时间越来越重合，也就是说W.M.一旦发出信息，过不了多久城市里就会出现奇怪的怪物。

original: That kicked off this weird cult following, with people saying WM was a prophet...
translated: 有许多黑客都说W.M.是个预言家，但是……

original: Ridiculous. Do people online believe anything?
translated: 这不可能的啊。

original: HEY. Hey. Some of us are smart enough to recognize the real meaning behind all this.
translated: 是啊，从常识的角度来看，与其说这是预言，倒不如说这更接近于是一种犯罪预告。这就是我们共同的意见。

original: Does that mean you cracked WM's code, Jay?
translated: 难道你已经解读了W.M.的信息了吗，杰？

original: What else? I needed something to keep me awake this morning.
translated: 嗯，没想到还是蛮简单的。

original: My colleagues couldn't crack it because WM is using a local TV broadcast as part of his hash. The code itself was arranged like packet transfers, so I just set up a comparison array script and ran it against all broadcasts for an hour or so. Simple.
translated: 之所以其他国家的黑客未能破解是有原因的，只有将这个信息和相同时刻我们国家的电视台信号相结合才能得出答案，暗号本身只是莫斯码的一种变形，想要解开并不难。

original: It's almost like WM wanted it decrypted.
translated: ……就好像有种故意等待某人解开暗号的感觉呢。

original: Do you think the police know?
translated: 警察都知道了吗？

original: Seriously? The police here probably don't know videos have comment sections. I hacked their database anyway, and there's nothing in their cyber division.
translated: 应该还不知道吧，警察的网络调查网中并没有相应信息。

original: So... what does the code say?
translated: 暗号的内容呢？

original: It describes exactly where and when the monsters will appear. Now, the most recent one says that the next attack... #bwill be at your school#k.
translated: 怪物出现的时间和地点，可是那个地点……好像就是#b凯内西斯你所上的学校#k。

original: #face4#...Really.
translated: #face4#……你说是#b学校#k？

original: #face0#That can't be a coincidence, K.
translated: #face0#怎么样，很奇怪吧？

original: #face9#Kinesis, you need to get back here as soon as you can. I've discovered something very interesting.
translated: #face9#凯内西斯，如果你的事情结束了，希望能再回来一趟，我好像发现了一件更有趣的事情。

original: What is it? The last time you said that, it was a new torrent site for your Japanese cartoons.
translated: 到底发现了什么？能让杰感兴趣的事，应该是大楼一楼有了著名面包房这种事情。

original: #face9#It's called ANIME, you plebeian. And no, this is about the monsters you fought the other day.
translated: #face9#是有关之前怪物的事情。

original: #face4#Talk to me, Jay. What did you find?
translated: #face4#……说说看，你找到什么线索了吗？

original: #face9#Dude, just come back here. I'm trying to be all dramatic.
translated: #face9#嗯，这个事你亲自过来听一听应该会更快。

original: #face9#And pick up a tub of ice cream on the way. I'm out.
translated: #face9#来的时候帮我带个甜瓜冰淇淋……开玩笑的，今天我已经摄取了足够多的糖了。

original: #b(Return to the Hideout and talk to Jay.)#k
translated: #b(回到据点，去找杰对话)#k

original: #face1#My money is on this being a trap. I'd advise against you going.
translated: #face1#凯内西斯，说不定这就是针对你的陷阱。也许这件事你不管会比较好。

original: If I don't go, how am I supposed to stop the big bad dropping monsters on everyone?
translated: 但如果我们的猜测是对的，那就表示有坏人持续性地在城市里放出怪物啊？

original: You could always come up with a plan instead of winging it and hoping for the best. What's it going to be?
translated: 没错，这也只是猜测而已，不过你想怎么办？

original:
All signs point to the school, and soon. Are you going?
#b#L1#Wing it and hope for the best. Time to go back to school.#l
#b#L2#Tell me more of these 'plans'.#l
translated:
信号正指向学校，要去吗？
#b#L1#当然是去学校了。#l
#b#L2#我再考虑看看。#l

original: Geez, they just don't quit!
translated:
到底是什么状况？
持续不断地有怪物冒出来。

original: I'm not seeing anything dangerous here. I should move on.
translated:
好像也没有学生身陷危险，继续留在这里只是浪费时间，
还是先回去吧？

original: Welcome baWHAT IS THAT.
translated: 赶紧过来……等等，你后面那是什么？

original: #face4#Meow!
translated:
额！……猫……甚至还是只野猫。
肯定浑身都是细菌和病毒……跳……！说不定还有跳蚤和虱子！
你怎么会带了只野猫回来，多危险啊！赶紧给送回去。

original: Y-you brought a CAT in here?! A filthy, disgusting alley cat? It's going to get hair in my cooling fans! Or chew my cables! Or run off with my collector's edition models! Get it OUT of here!
translated: 啊-！冷静点，杰，你瞧瞧这个小不点的脚，它这么小一只，在那么危险的地方还能逃得出去吗？我要是送它回去它会死的。

original: Aww, have a heart, Jay. Look at these little tiny paws. Nero here would be done for on the street. You want that on your conscience?
translated: #face2#你瞧瞧，这家伙也说是啊，你要摸摸它的脚掌嘛？软乎乎的呢？

original: #face4#Meow!
translated:
#face5#额……啊，不要！
总之我知道了，我知道了，不要离我太近。

original: #face2#Here, touch the paws. Touch them.
translated:
#face5#你为什么……为什么要把那么危险的生物带回来？
我不是让你去带来可以分析怪物的资料嘛。

original: #face5#Dude, get the heck away from me! Ugh... FINE. Do what you want. But if it pees on my servers, it's going through a window.
translated: #face2#啊，提起这个，在这里。

original: #face5#Did you at least bring back something on the monsters? You know, the thing I ASKED FOR.
translated:
#face6#……那是什么，灰尘？！
这，这个天底下我最讨厌的就是灰尘了。

original: #face2#Yeah, chill. It's right here.
translated:
#face8#站住，就在那里，不要再靠近了。
你要是靠过来，我就把这些资料全都初始化。

original: #face6#...Covered in dust and grime, of course. Thanks for wiping it off before bringing it in here.
translated: #face2#来，我想让你再靠近一点看嘛。

original: #face8#You both just... stand over there. Away from me. Good. Let me work.
translated: #face7##fs30#凯内西斯~~~！！！

original: #face2#Here Nero, come closer and look.
translated: #fn黑体##fs18#第二天,  据点

original: A cat? Here? Hey kitty, this place is dangerous.
translated: 哎哟？这种地方居然有猫，喵喵啊，这里现在很危险的。

original: #face4#Meow.
translated: 让我瞧瞧……你，还是小朋友啊。

original: Geez, you're still a kitten.
translated: 哎哟呵？你现在这是在发火吗？你这个小不点，你是没了妈妈吗？

original: #face5#Meow!
translated: 哈哈，不过你看上去还挺有韧性的嘛，我看你也无处可去了，跟我走吧？

original: What are you so mad about? You're such a small kitty. Did you lose your mommy?
translated: #face4#……喵呜！

original: #face5#MEOW!
translated: 好吧，既然你是黑色的……内罗！内罗怎么样？

original: Ha. Yeah, you've got some fight in you. You look lost, want to come with me?
translated: #face2#你说你特别喜欢？你也不想想这是谁起的，这是当然的咯。

original: #face4#...Meow!
translated: #b(带回去吧？)#k

original: Good. Let's call you... Nero! How about Nero?
translated: #b(赶紧回到杰那里。)#k

original: I analyzed those things you fought yesterday, but I can't figure them out. I want to say they're ghosts, but I mean, that's ridiculous.
translated:
我分析过你昨天对付的那些东西了，但实在是搞不清楚那是什么。
最为接近的应该就是鬼、幽灵那一类的吧。

original: Whatever they are, I can take them. Don't worry about me.
translated:
搞不清楚这一点确实有点可惜，不过应该能抓到一点线索吧，
还有不管那是什么，有多少，我都会去对付的。

original: That confidence of yours will be your downfall. Also, get that cat away from my gear. It's been eyeing my mouse for the last hour, the mangy thing.
translated:
你这自信心倒是挺好的……
你好像离我太近了，希望你能带着那只猫离我稍微远一点。
它的脚掌……你是消过毒之后再摸的吧？呃……

original: Still, this might be a good time for confidence. I got another one of those codes.
translated:
还有，我是看你好像还挺喜欢那些奇怪的幽灵才告诉你的，
我又发现了另一条和昨天相似的暗号。

original: Good. Point me at them and let me loose.
translated: 好啊，那今天就再去看看吧？

original: K, hold it. I want to ask you something first.
translated:
等下，凯内西斯。
在这之前我有话要说。

original: #face0#I know you're hiding something. I lost the uplink with you for just a moment, but your Psy-Limiter showed a spike.
translated:
#face0#你，昨天的事情，你有些事情没有告诉我吧，
虽然只是很短的片刻，但是我们的通信曾经断过，
那时候我检测到你的ESP限制器有异常反应。

original:
#face0#What happened at the school?
#b#L1#(Tell the truth about losing consciousness.)#l
#L2#(Lie.)#l
translated:
#face0#在学校里到底发生了什么事情？
#b#L1#如实说出自己晕过去的事情#l
#L2#说谎#l

original: I lost consciousness for a second. And in that time, my control over my powers slipped. I think I was just exhausted.
translated: 我一时失去了意识，而且我也无法控制自己的能力了，估计是因为我身体状态不是很好吧。

original: #face0#I don't like the sound of that. Not at all. You should rest up today.
translated: 没什么事情，你不同太担心的。

original: #face0##fs30#!!
translated: #face0#如此说来可就危险了，今天最好还是不要出行……

original:
#face1#...Kinesis, this is serious. I don't want you out there.
#b#L1#I have to save those people!#l
#L2#I want to know more about my abilities.#l
#L3#I just want to enjoy this power while I have it.#l
translated: #face0#……真的吗？你不会对你的搭档说谎了吧？

original: Didn't you hear? The monsters are attacking innocents now. I have to do something.
translated: 新闻速报,  在都市MS镇地铁历史上,

original: #face0#...Why do I even bother? Get going. I'll be with you on comms.
translated: 这是第一次有来历不明的生物对所有居民发动攻击.

original: #b(Hurry to the subway.)#k
translated: 目前正在发生,  请附近居民小心外出.

original: Where am I? Who are you?
translated: ……这里是哪里？你是谁？

original: I am the third child of the moon, hero of another world.
translated: 冷静点，你没事的。

original: That... you... what?
translated: #face0##r#fs25#狗居然会说话？！

original: Steady yourself. You are yet unharmed.
translated: #face2#啊，仔细再一看，原来是狼啊，对不起。

original: #face0##r#fs25#...A talking dog?!
translated: 这里到底是哪里？我之前明明是在地铁里的啊？我难道是在做梦吗？

#face4#这不是梦，
这个地方叫冒险岛世界。

original: #face2#Oh, wait, wolf. Sorry.
translated: #face4#这里和你所生活的世界不一样，希望你还是早点适应比较好。

original: What is this place? I thought I was on the subway. Am I dreaming all this?
translated: #face4#比方说……

original: #face4#Nope! Welcome to Maple World!
translated: #face0#看到了吗？这便是魔法。

original: #face4#Er, it's pretty different from your world. We better get you adjusted quick.
translated: #face0#在你们所生活的世界是不存在的。

original: #face4#Here, watch this.
translated: ……倒不像是在做梦。

original: #face0#Did you see that? That was magic.
translated: #face0#我来正式介绍一下，我的名字叫#b内拉米迪奥内鲁尼亚。

original: #face0#Pretty sure you don't have that in your world! Heh.
translated:
#face0#在古语里是月光下高贵的半个孩子，
作为历史非常悠久的魔法师家族的继承人……

original: So I'm not dreaming...
translated: #face2##fs20#你到底在说什么啊，#b内罗。

original: #face0#Again, nope! Lemme officially introduce myself. I am #bNella Medionel Roonia.
translated: #face2#哎，我不是内罗啦！！

original: #face0#In our ancient tongue, it means half-child of the sacred moonlight. See, I'm from a real big-deal magician family...
translated: 话说回来这里是哪里啊，内罗？

original: #face2##fs20#What on Earth are you talking about, Nero?
translated: #face0#是我们救了你，你倒是听人家把话说完啊！！

original: #face2#Hey hey hey HEY! I'm not Nero!
translated: #face0#你还记得自己被一个奇怪的#b白发男人#k攻击的事情吗？

original: Cute. Look, Nero, I need to know where I am and how to get back.
translated:
#face0#我本应该跟过去拦住你的……这是我的失策啊。
我原以为离得近就可以跟得更敏捷一些，没想到反而跟丢了你。

original: #face0#HEY. We saved you. So shut your facehole and listen for a minute!
translated: #face0#总之这段时间你只能在这里了。

original: #face0#Do you remember what happened with the #bwhite-haired man#k?
translated: 那个，内罗，我完全不知道你在说什么。

original: #face0#I should have followed you... stopped you, maybe... It was my fault. I thought being near you would allow me to tail you easily. But I wasn't able to keep up.
translated:
#face0#很快#b汉斯#k老师就要来了，详细的情况你可以听他跟你解释。
在这之前还请你冷静一下，耐心等待。

original: So, our meal has been secured. Was the struggle great?
translated: 这里有你刚刚拿来的鸟蛋，这个你是怎么拿来的？

original: Nero, can you translate for me? I'm not following Wolfshirt here at all.
translated:
内罗，我好像需要翻译呢？
这个狼大叔说的话我实在是听不懂是什么意思……

original: Breaking the shell of an egg is a simple matter. It requires only the use of force in the right place.
translated:
谁都可以轻松打破鸟蛋的蛋壳。
这个蛋壳这么脆，只要很小的力量就能打破了。

original: But you, you hold a far greater power, contained within its own egg.
translated: 可你明明有非常强大的力量却并没有展露，而是带回了没有打破的蛋。

original: You must keep this power contained, lest it break free of its own shell, and shatter the shell of the world itself.
translated:
你的其他力量现在还办不到，
不过如果继续这么充满了力量，会让这个脆弱的世界产生裂缝的。

original: ...What does that even mean?
translated: 等下，让世界产生裂缝，那是什么意思？

original: Perhaps one day, you will know.
translated: 这个你日后自会明白的。

original: So I'll only get a proper explanation from this Grendel guy, right? Wouldn't it be faster if I went to him?
translated:
只有等那个叫汉斯的人来了，我才能知道详细的情况说明是吧？
要是我直接过去，是不是能够更快见到面啊？

original: Waiting is the path to training your soul. I sense you are unhappy doing so.
translated:
等待也是一种内心的修炼，
你是害怕等待啊。
……得准备晚餐了，要是客人也能搭把手我肯定会很开心的。

original: The hour of supper approaches, and finds us unprepared. I shall attend to our feast, and hope that you would do the same.
translated:
#face0##ho#，汉斯估计不会花太久的。
我们一起去收集#b鸟蛋#k吧，只要打猎#b麻雀#k就可以了。

original: #face0##ho#, Grendel the Really Old will be here soon. We've got time to gather some #beggs#k, so let's do that. Hunting #bsparrows#k will get you what we need.
translated: 打猎？好吧，那应该挺有趣的，也可以顺带去看看外面什么样，你也帮我介绍介绍。

original: Hunt? Now that I can do. It'll be nice to see what's around here, too. By all means, lead the way.
translated:
#face1#往#b右边#k走吧，鸟蛋超好吃的。
亚乌也很擅长做菜。

original: You have done well this day.
translated: 嗯，辛苦了。

original: #face1#10 eggs! That's alla them. Good job.
translated: #face1#是10个鸟蛋！没错，辛苦你了。

original: So we done here, Nero?
translated: 那现在就算结束了吧，内罗？

original: #face2##fs25##rI told you, my name is not Nero!
translated: #face2##fs25##r我说了我的名字并不是内罗……！

original: #face3#...Oh, whatever. Call me what you want. Grendel the Really Old is taking his sweet time, so we should get some firewood for cooking.
translated:
#face3#哈，你随便叫好了。
汉斯还没有来，我们也需要烧菜用的柴火。

original: Firewood? You're not asking me to chop wood, are you?
translated: 柴火？还得去砍树吗？

original: #face0#As much as I'd like to see that, no. We're gonna hunt monsters. So, uh, chopping monsters instead of wood!
translated: #face0#嗯……我们并不是砍树获取柴火的，而是通过打猎怪物获取的，不过也差不多啦。

original: More fighting? Really? Geez, do you people beat up monsters for everything you need?
translated:
怪物？那又得干一架咯。
看来这个世界主要是靠这种方式获取材料的吧？

original:
#face0#Yup! Go hunt the #bAxe Stumps#k to collect 15 pieces of Firewood.
And then take them to #bThree Moon#k.
translated:
#face0#没错，捕猎#b斧木妖#k，只要收集15个就可以了。
集齐后就拿去给#b亚乌#k。

original: #face2#Rawr! No work, no grub!
translated:
#face1#从右边出去吧喵。
一想到可以烤鸟蛋吃，口水就流不停了喵。
