original: I will contact you again when I need you. Until then...
translated: 好的，再见。需要的时候，我会再找你的。

original: Kona tells me I'm on your debt. Just remember, you can help out all you want, just don't come crying when you lose a foot. Now what do you want?
translated:
我从珂娜那里听说了。哎呀，真是麻烦你了。哈哈哈！
总之谢谢你。我刚好因为怪物而头疼呢。对了，听珂娜说，你是来这里探险的……你想找什么东西呢？

original: You want my story? I guess I can do that...
translated: 你想听听故事吗？我可以随时告诉你。

original: I brought this expedition out to take a look into the earthquakes. Had a pretty good team up here before the bugs drove them off.
translated: 相信你应该听村长说过了，这里是我们哈夫林的探查现场。在岩壁巨人出现之前，这里就一直是探查现场。原来这里聚集着很多哈夫林，比现在多好几倍。

original: Of course, we lost a few good explorers when they found out the mountain itself was moving. you should've seen the look on Thumbo's face... But I don't scare so easily. I've been studying this mountain since I was fifteen, and I'm gonna keep exploring it until I'm old and gray.
translated: 在探查什么东西？你可别吃惊。这里的山在动！在几百年的时间里，一点一点地在动。知道这一点的话，任何人都会感到好奇，不是吗？我从六岁开始一直到现在，从白色的毛变成灰色，都一直带领探查团员们在这里进行研究。

original: I'll tell you what though, fifteen year old me did not expect to see this mountain start moving by itself.
translated: 但是有一天，那件事突然发生了。我们一直以为是山的东西，其实不是山。

original: The shaking was so bad, I thought the whole world was ending. I saw that big mouth start moving and thought we were all going into its belly, but I think it was trying to say something.
translated: 我当时想这下完了。我还以为会发生大灾难，但没想到谁也没受伤。因为那个岩壁巨人动了一下之后，就再也没动了。他好像在张嘴说话，但是我们根本听不懂他在说什么。

original: Then it just stopped. And the monsters came... That's when most of my crew went back down the hill. I couldn't let them stay in danger, but I couldn't give up either. And that's my story.
translated: 还有，那天之后出现了很多危险的怪物，探查队员们一个个地离开了，现在就只剩下这么几个人……怎么样？现在你明白了吗？

original: Who are you? Come to meet the famous driver, master of the wheel, Kupo?! I knew it. My fame is spreading across Maple World. It'll be a hundred million mesos for an autograph, but i'll let you take a picture with me for 75.
translated: 怎么？你是我的粉丝吗？看来我骑士卡布的名声终于在冒险岛世界中传扬开来了。我要事先申明，我的签名可是很贵的，大概1亿金币？

original:
Not even a chuckle?
Let me introduce myself like a proper gent. The name's Kupo.
Rhymes with 'eww, slow'.
translated:
真是个没有幽默感的朋友。
我来自我介绍一下。我叫卡布！注意发音。如果说成是“卡普”或“卡波”的话，小心屁股被我踢，哈哈哈！

original:
You're not much for small talk, are you? I get it. I respect your need for speed.
Getting up to the Stone Colossus ain't exactly a walk in the park, but I've got the ride that will make it a trip to remember. of course, nobody rides for free...
translated:
哎呀，长话短说，直奔主题？我喜欢像你这样的人。人生中最重要的是速度。
到岩壁巨人那里去的路很高、很遥远，也很险峻，靠自己的两条腿是没办法过去的。不过有我卡布的骑宠的话，就另说了！当然，如果你能好好当我的助手的话。

original: Your job's simple enough. I keep the motor running, you do everything else. Don't worry about messing up, just trust your instincts. You think you can handle that?
translated: 很简单。往前走的事情交给我！你只要坐在助手座位上负责其他事情就行。百闻不如一见。要试试看吗，朋友？

original: That's right! Let's do this!
translated: 我就喜欢你这样的人，朋友！那我们出发吧！

original: Okay. We're all fueled up! Ready to head out now?
translated: 好了，这么多的话，燃料应该够了。已经全部准备好了，现在出发吗？

original: Yeehaa! Let's go!
translated: 岩壁巨人_上山之路

original: Okay, are you set to go? We're going to take the elevator up the side of the Stone Colossus, and it's going to be a long trip. Make sure you're ready.
translated: 好的，现在出发吗？乘坐升降机，可以沿着岩壁巨人的身体爬上去。他的身体非常巨大，爬上去需要一些时间。请做好充分的准备。

original: Are you ready?
translated:
也许会受到虫子的袭击。那种时候最好是使用枪。

#r(枪可以通过鼠标点击使用。)#k

original: What are you waiting for?
translated:
#fMob/9307006.img/fly/0# 
黄蜂冲过来的话，一定要毫不犹豫地把它们消灭掉。当然，时间和子弹是有限制的，一定要记住。

original:
Greetings #h0#! Can you hear me? Have you spoken with the colossus?
#b(It sounds like Guwaru. You tell him all about the Stone Colossus.)
translated:
#h0#，你能听到我说话吗？能和岩壁巨人对话吗？
#b(是古瓦洛的声音。把和岩壁巨人的对话告诉他吧。)#k

original: The birth of this creature is something I had long thought impossible. The spirits of hundreds, if not thousands, of lesser life forms have combined to become one, gigantic entity.
translated: 岩壁巨人是大地精灵长期聚集在一起形成的新的生命体，看上去就像是粘土组成的一样。实际上是成百上千个小生命体结合在一起后诞生出来的东西。

original: This all began when my powers wre abused by Magnus long ago. The smaller spirits huddled together in fear at the corruption that held me. Alone they were mere insects. Together, they could be safe. The lack of my guidance forced them to coalesce
translated: 因为我在几百年前遭到了军团长麦格纳斯的背叛，被吸收了力量。因此精灵们本能地感觉到了危机。就像受了伤之后，身体的各个组织会迅速运作起来恢复身体一样，精灵们决定通过“合体”来应对“我的力量消失”的危机。这一过程，经历了几百年时间。

original: But this is unnatural, and dangerous. If these spirits were dispersed across the world, the corruption of a few would not be a concern. But if they were tainted by dark energy in this confined space, I fear the corruption would spread too fast to stop.
translated: 但这很明显是违背自然规律的……原来精灵们不应该组成巨大的生命体，而是应该分散在各地，组成世界才对。如果精灵们分散在世界各地，即使某个地方的精灵受到了污染，他们也能自我净化。但是现在他们合成了一个生命体，就产生了很大的问题。

original: The catastrophes that colossus could create, if left under the influence of evil powers... I cannot begin to think. If only I had not allowed myself to fall victim to the Black Mage's idiotic plans.
translated: 如果岩壁巨人被黑暗力量污染，那该怎么办呢？那样的话，一定会发生大灾难。从岩壁巨人说的话来看，好像已经出现了污染的征兆。这一切全都是我的错。

original: You must help the Stone Colossus regain its pure heart. It would be disastrous if the creature were to fall evil.
translated: 你能帮助岩壁巨人吗？必须阻止大灾难的发生。

original: I can't believe the Goddess would create such a vile and vicious monster.
translated: 女神的宠物竟然变成了如此邪恶凶暴的怪物……？

original: This is only the beginning. There is so much more in store...
translated: 呵呵呵……这只是开始。以后的事情更值得期待。

original: #b(The stranger's voice fades with the passing wind.)
translated: #b(可疑的人的声音顺着风消失在了远方……)#k

original:
#b(The Stone Colossus's trembling subsides. A feeling of calm and peace washes over the area.)#k
Whew, I think the Stone Colossus is out of harm's way for now.
translated:
#b(消灭掉蜘蛛女王后，岩壁巨人停止了颤抖，洁净的气息开始向四方扩散。)#k
岩壁巨人摆脱了危机。暂时应该不会受到污染了。

original: I'd better see how old rock-face is doing.
translated: 回到岩壁巨人那里去，查看一下他的状态吧。

original: Who's sending me letters? I don't think I gave anybody my address...
translated: 如果没有像你这么优秀的人帮我的话，我就不可能对这里进行调查。你能再考虑一下吗？

original:
Hey. 


 I'm #b#p2161012##k, one of the Silent Crusaders. I don't like talking all flowery, so I'll get right to it. The Silent Crusade takes down bad guys and monsters. That's what I do.
translated: 是谁给我写的信呢？没有发件人……要看一看吗？

original: The #rLion King's Castle#k is full of something nasty right now. Overflowing with it. I'd take the cold winds of El Nath over thse dark chills any day.
translated:
致阅读这封信的冒险家：

我是十字猎人的工作员，名叫#b#p2161012##k。我就长话短说了。我们十字猎人的工作员们在冒险岛世界各地走动，执行消灭邪恶怪物的任务。

original: I need some help out here. A lot of good people are having a hard time. Keep reading, if you're interested.
translated: 但是我现在所在的地方——#r狮子王之城#k，正散发出之前我从没见到的强烈黑暗气息。我感觉到了比冰峰雪域的寒风更摄人心肺的恐怖。

original: If you read this page, you ain't a chicken. I appreciate that. It also means I'll be seeing you in about 30 seconds, because I infused this letter with magic.
translated: 为了完成我的任务，需要像你这样优秀的冒险家的帮助。愿意帮助我的话，请继续往下看。

original: #bI've wiped this place clean. I should report this.
translated: #b把敌人全部消灭了，用通讯设备进行联系吧。

original: You made short work of those creatures. Proceed to the stairs.
translated: 嗯，看来你已经把敌人都消灭了。那么请执行接下来的任务。你继续往前走，会看到一个阶梯地区。或者你现在可能正在阶梯地区跟我通话。

original: Take the stairs, and contact me again when you reach the #r2nd floor of the basement#k.
translated: 请你进入阶梯地区。你先#r确认是否可以进入地下2层#k，再跟我通话。

original: #b(From #m401052003#, I should take the portal to #m401052100# and check out the 2nd floor of the basement.)
translated: #b(利用从#m401052003#进入#m401052100#的传送口进行移动，确认是否可以进入地下2层吧。)

original: Whew... that was a ton of Specters. Their numbers are incredible... the Nova are in big trouble...
translated: 好不容易解决掉了所有幽灵，可没想到幽灵军队人数居然如此众多……看样子诺巴也会有难啊。

original: Things have calmed down here. Maybe it's time I visited #b#m401000001##k to find #b#p3001001##k and #b#p3001000##k.
translated: 这里的情况差不多也恢复了平静。你到#b#m401000001##k去，见见#b#p3001001##k和#b#p3001000##k吧。

original: I'm sorry, but it's crazy around here. Our commanders, #b#p3001000##k and #b#p3001001##k, are cut off near the front.
translated: 唔……不好意思，我正在想事情……这里的指挥官#b#p3001000##k和#b#p3001001##k好像在战线上被困了。

original: They're both top-quality warriors, but I'm worried about the troops with them. They may not have the fortitude to handle that kind of battle.
translated: #b#p3001000##k和#b#p3001001##k的实力都非常出众，我相信他们一定能突围……但在本部地区进行最后防守的那些普通士兵的安危很令人担忧……

original: I don't really have time to go into further detail, but we need your help on the battlefield. I'll guide you there!
translated: 没时间详细跟你解释。如果你是来帮忙的，我可以马上引导你去战场，麻烦你消灭掉那些幽灵吧？战况迫在眉睫……

original:
Please protect as may soldiers as you can! If you succeed, please go to the #b#m401000001##k and speak with both #b#p3001001##k and #b#p3001000##k. I wish you luck, Maple Warrior! 
 
 #b(#ePress Accept to move automatically. You will have to forfeit the quest and restart if you fail.#n)#k
translated:
非常感谢你！请你尽量保护那些士兵！等你做好出发准备，我立刻为你指路！你消灭所有幽灵后，就去见见#b#m401000001##k的#b#p3001001##k和#b#p3001000##k吧。祝你好运。多保重，冒险岛勇士。

#b#e(接受后将立即移动到战场地图。如果想重新开始任务，请放弃任务后再重新开始。)#n#k

original: I'm ready to enter the Heliseum Reclamation HQ and hunt down my enemies.
translated: 我准备好了。下面就进入反攻总部，扫荡敌人吧。

original: Hey there. Glad to see you made it here with all your limbs. I called you out here to help me lock down the front.
translated: 见到你很高兴，格兰蒂斯大陆和反攻总部的环境你还适应吧？我叫你来，是为了扩大战线的事，还需要你帮帮忙。

original: I didn't think all those battle hounds were stopping supplies from getting through.
translated: 事实上，我觉得补给路线被截断的原因不仅仅是由于那些战斗犬。

original: You got that right. We need to open up the supply lines if we want to make a difference. That means an attack on the #b#m401010010##k, where all those #r#o2400109##k monsters are holed up.
translated: 对，为了能顺利运输补给，需要对#b#m401010010##k，的#r#o2400109##k占领的地方发动攻击。你能帮我们消灭#r#o2400109##k吗？

original:
It's tough to get through them with their High HP and defense. but I'm sure you'll figure out a way to take down their shields. 
 
 #b#e(Press Accept to move automatically. You will have to forfeit the quest and restart if you fail.)#k#n
translated:
由于他们手持盾牌堵着通往森林的分岔路，令人十分恼火。那些盾牌兵的体力和防御力虽高，但攻击力较低。你去消灭那些盾牌兵吧？

#b#e(接受后将立即移动到战场地图。如果想重新开始任务，请放弃任务后再重新开始。)#n#k

original: It shouldn't be too tough for you. You'll take care of business easy.
translated: 我觉得这个任务不是太难，你会做得很好的。

original: Did you meet with Harpoon?
translated: 这期间，我们要做的事情变得更加明确了。首先我们需要尽可能多的信息。穿越西北边茂密的森林地区，就能看到一个破旧的茅屋。

original: This gives me an idea. There is an old cabin in the Lush Forest northeast of here...
translated: 那里应该会有一位诺巴老人，人称贤者的#b#p3001002##k。

original: A old man name #b#p3001002##k lives there. He is known to be a sage, well-learned in the past.
translated: 平时是个没用的老头子，但我活了很长时间，拥有各种各样的智慧。紧急时刻我能帮得上忙。去找#b#p3001002##k获得建议吧。

original: He's a grumpy old cool at the best of times, but he is... wise. He's even been known to be helpful on occasion. I want you to visit #b#p3001002##k and ask for his advice.
translated: 看样子你们关系不太好……

original: Did you guys use to have a thing...?
translated: 哼，我才懒得跟他搞好关系。咳咳，总之你去见见#b#p3001002##k吧。

original: What? Disgusting! Get out of here and go talk to #b#p3001002##k. The things you people say...
translated: 你到了就说是#b#p3001000##k让你去的。还有，看他有什么反应，以后记得向我报告。

original: Go, and tell him that #b#p3001000##k sent you. And take a picture of his face when he hears that!
translated: 你见过哈伦了吗？

original: Hm? A letter for me? From whom?
translated: 嗯……给我的信？是谁给你的啊？

original: Hmm, I knew this would happen. That fool...
translated: 信到底在哪里啊……别跟我开玩笑……

original: #p2160000# came by a few days ago on his way to the castle. I told him not to go after that Lion King Medal. There's been a fould wind coming off the castle lately. Does he listen to an old man? No! He goes out there at night!
translated: 呵呵……那个家伙……无视我的警告，最后变成了这个样子……啧啧……

original: I sent a few locals to rescue him, but the monsters scared them off. I'll make sure to get this to his family.
translated: 几天前，#p2161004#来到了这里，说要到狮子王之城去寻找狮子王的勋章。不久前我在狮子王之城里感觉到了奇怪的气息，所以就劝他不要去，但是他却趁着夜深人静的时候溜了出去。

original: Can anybody out there hear me?! Someebody, please listen up!
translated: 要是……有谁听到了我的话……请过来跟我说会儿话……只要一小会儿就行！！

original: Can you hear me? That's great! I thought I was talking to thin air!
translated: 你听到我的话了？呼……太好了……我还在想，要是没人听见我的话的话，我该怎么办……

original: I'm #b#p2160000##k, I came here looking for the legendary #bLion King's Medal#k, but I guess it didn't work out. I was searching the castle when everything started shaking and monsters started popping out of nowhere! I tried to run, when a man appeared in front of me.
translated: 我的名字叫#b#p2161004##k……为了寻找传说中的#b狮子王的勋章#k，我来到了这个地方……我在城堡的各处寻找勋章的时候……城堡突然开始摇晃，接着怪物就出现了……就在我慌慌张张地避开怪物逃走的时候……突然有个年轻人出现在了我的面前……

original: He was a real mopey lookin' guy who calimed to be #bVon Leon the Lion King#k. I don't remember much after that, but I guess I'm a ghost now. It must be a curse or something! I can still feel my body... and it's super itchy!
translated: 那个年轻人说自己是#b狮子王班·雷昂#k，是这个城的主人……他说我未经允许就进入了城堡，然后把我变成了无法从这里离开的幽灵……可能是因为诅咒的缘故，虽然变成了幽灵，但感觉身体里有寒气在到处乱窜，身体像刀割一样地疼，从来都不会停歇……现在我光是这样说话，就已经非常痛苦了……

original: I need to get this letter to #bAlcaster#k in El Nath, He acn get it to my family.
translated: 虽然我变成了这副模样……但是我想把这封信送给在远方等待着我的家人……你能帮我把这封信交给冰峰雪域的#b阿尔卡斯特#k吗？阿尔卡斯特会帮我把信转交给我的家人的……

original: I'd been saving this scroll to get back one day, but I guess you can have it. Just get to #bEl Nath#k and give my letter to Alcaster!
translated: 为了方便自己回去，我留了一个珍贵的魔法卷轴。我会用它把你送到#b冰峰雪域#k，帮我把信交绐阿尔卡斯特！

original: Hello there! Oh, are you surprised my overwhelming alacrity? Do not be! I'm a merchant. I know how to move, and, or, shake it! Besides, I know a few secret back parlors to pass thorugh, here and there.
translated: 你好哇。因为我这么快就到了，吓一跳吧。我是个称职的商人，即使在最危险的情况下，也一心扑在买卖上，所以才走过常人难走的路，不顾艰险地来到这里。

original: A-are you speaking English?
translated: 那边明明没有路啊……

original: Haha! Wound tight by the wizardry of my words! Let me introduce the visage that stands before you! I am #b#p3001004##k, a humble merchant.
translated: 哈哈哈，瞧你那副难以置信的小样儿……嘿嘿，我先介绍一下自己吧，我是隶属商团的#b#p3001004##k。

original: I don't know what's going on, but I know I've seen a lot of new coinpurses lately.
translated: 认识你很高兴。最近意外的客人越来越多呢。

original: I certainly don't care about your hometown or the heritage you acquired. Let's just talk the good talk of business. Shall we?
translated: 我对种族啦，出身啦这类东西不感兴趣。看你样子比我小，我就不跟你拿腔捏调地说话了，可别觉得是我瞧不起你哦。好了，下面说说正事吧。

original: Did you bring the fee I requested?
translated: 嗯，你搜集到用作情报费的獠牙了吗？

original: Not bad, not bad. I've written down what you need to know in this envelope, so take it over to #p3001002#. Give me a ring when you need more!
translated: 这獠牙挺不错啊，能派上用场。情报就装在这个信封里，你搜集各种情报后，拿去交给#p3001002#老头就行。嘿嘿，情报不止一个，其他的下次再交易啦。下次你再用发报机联系我。

original: The D-03 transmitter is ringing. Wonder who it is...?
translated: 哦，D-03发报机突然响了，快接听吧。

original: Testing, testing. Hey! You hear me?
translated: 啊，啊！麦克风测试！老表，听见我说话吗？！

original: #bWho is this? #p3001004#?
translated: #b嗯，听得见。你不是#p3001004#……你是谁？

original: I'm #p3001005#. I'm the top trader and wilderness guide for the Shadowdealers. Meet me over at the #m401020300#!
translated: 啊，我是商团的业绩王，野性商人#p3001005#。我去#m401020300#吧，我们在那里见咯。

original: #bUh... I guess I'll come meet you then.
translated: #b(野性商人是什么啊……虽然很无语，可现在也没办法。去见见#p3001005#吧。)

original: You bring everything?
translated: 怎么样，脚趾甲都搜集到了吗？

original: You paid up right, I'll tell ya what you need. (Romero whispers a bunch of secrets into your ear.)
translated: 嗯，不多不少100个脚趾甲。我是守信用的商人，这是你要的情报。(罗梅洛用悄悄话提供了各种情报。)

original: Did you get the fur coats?
translated: 毛皮你都搜集到了吗？

original: #bYes, I believe so. I brought 100.
translated: #b嗯，都搜集好了。共100张。

original: The old ladies are going to make me a bundle of cashola! Allow me to expound upon the information I acquired. (Tonero whispers a bunch of secrets in your ear.)
translated: 不错，只要稍微处理一下，估计能卖个大价钱。我这就给你第三个情报。(托内罗用悄悄话提供了第三个情报。)

original: Did you collect the information I requested already? You're a rather effective foreigner.
translated: 呵呵，你已经把三个情报都集齐了啊。跟守护者相比，你家伙运气挺好，异族人……嘿嘿。

original: All you have to do now is take it over to the old man, #b#p3001002##k. We shall meet again!
translated: 接下来你只要返回#b#p3001002##k老头那里，把情报传达给他就行。辛苦啦，呵呵，以后我们会再见面的。

original: See ya around!
translated: 后会有期！

original: I've delivered #b#p2160000##k's letter to his family. Now, could you do me a favor?
translated: #b#p2161004##k的信已经交给了他的家人。希望你能帮我一个忙……

original: The reason #p2160000#'s soul is suffering is because of the curse the Lion King put on #p2160000#. To lift the curse, you must break the link between the Lion King and #p2160000#.
translated: 现在#p2161004#的灵魂之所以会受到寒气的折磨，是因为狮子王向#p2161004#下了诅咒。要想解开那个诅咒，必须切断狮子王和#p2161004#之间的诅咒的力量……

original: Take this Crystal. This Crystal contains my magic. Use it where #p2160000# is at to lift Lion King's curse from #p2160000#.
translated: 你带着这个水晶过去。这个水晶里含有我的魔法的力量。在#p2161004#所在的地方使用水晶，狮子王施加在#p2161004#身上的诅咒就会解开。

original: I don't think you have enough room in your inventory. please check your inventory again.
translated: 这个水晶我就送给你，但是如果你弄丢了，重新制作就需要#r1000万金币#k。一定要记住。我会把你送到狮子王之城入口处，你快去找莫特吧。

original: You're here! Let's get the meeting started right away!
translated: 你来啦！会议现在可以开始了吗？

original: We must begin immediately, without any delays.
translated: 好的，那我们马上开始吧。

original: Are you asking where we are? Did you follow me without knowing where I was going? This is the forest path to the #b Ellinel Fairy Academy#k.
translated:
你问这里是哪里？你连这里是哪里都不知道就跟来了吗？
这里是通往#b妖精学院艾利涅#k的森林深处。

original: Ellinel Fairy Academy?
translated: 没错，#b艾利涅#k是多年来教导妖精孩童们魔法的一种教育机构。

original: Yes. #b Ellinel#k is an academy where fairy children learn magic.
translated: 那为什么要藏在这种森林深处啊？

original: But why is it hidden so deep within the forest?
translated: 看你的表情，还真是一无所知的样子，你知道#b魔法密林#k原本曾是妖精的村庄吗？在数百年前和黑魔法师爆发过一场大型战争之后，人类进来开垦了村庄，便有了现如今的#b魔法密林#k。

original: Did you know that #bEllinia#k used to be a fairy town? Several hundred years ago, after a war with the Black Mage, humans came in and reclaimed the town and it became the #bEllinia#k we know now.
translated: 那么魔法密林外面也有妖精生活的地方咯。

original: Then that must mean that fairies live outside of Ellinia, too.
translated: 虽然也有一些愿意接受人类的妖精，但还是有很多并非如此相对保守的妖精，#b妖精学院艾利涅#k也曾如此。他们拒绝与人类为伍，独自消失在夜的领域中，而且为了拒绝外人的出入，他们还建在了湖的对面。

original: Some fairies are okay with humans, but others very much are not. It's the same in the #bEllinel Fairy Academy#k. They don't want to mix with humans, and so they disappeared into the forest. That's why the school is far across the lake.
translated: 你的意思是说魔法师库迪被那些艾利涅的妖精生擒了吗？

original: You think Cootie got captured by human-hating fairies?
translated:
没错，我也完全没有搞明白这到底是怎么一回事，虽然#b汉斯#k和我曾经多次尝试去联系，但他们很讨厌我们，并不听我们说话。所以我们需要你的帮忙，
不过#b#h0##k，你游泳游得好吗？

original:
Most likely. I know I thought about using him as a scratching post a few times. Master #bGrendel#k and I tried to befriend the fairies, but they just weren't listening. I think we should use more... forceful methods.
#b #h ##k, let me ask... are you a good swimmer?
translated:
你先游到湖对面怎么样？相信你应该能做到！鼓起勇气跃入水中吧！
#b(度过右边的湖。)#k

original:
Why don't you go for a swim! Show us how brave you are, meow...
#b (Cross the lake to the right.)#k'
translated: 妖精学院艾利涅？

original: Are you here to chastise me?
translated: 你来的正好，请听我说。我根本不是犯人。我为何要绑架那些妖精呢？

original: Look, hear me out, please? Why would I ever kidnap a fairy? SURE, they're THE most evolved and amazing species on the planet, but...
translated: 你是来救我的吗？

original: You're still here. Is there more to discuss?
translated: 你还没回去啊。还有什么要说的吗？

original: You cannot trust this outsider, Headmistress! The human will only feed us lies and lame excuses.
translated: 哼，显而易见。他的辩解实在是令人难以信服。异邦人的话不能相信，校长先生。

original: #bI thought you were a wise and rational people. We should analyze the facts before we come to any kind of judgment. #k
translated: #b我也只是受人之托来化解误会的。因此，我得先掌握清楚互相之间正确的事实关系，不是吗？#k

original: Five children vanished into thin air at once! What other facts do you need? This one kidnapped them, end of story!
translated: 哼，别废话了！我们5个孩子一下子消失了。这不是绑架是什么？

original: #b So, you have proof that Cootie was the culprit?
translated: #b有证据能够证明是魔法师库迪犯下的罪行吗？#k

original: The on you call Cootie has been chased off of these grounds a number of times, but he continues to return and defy our wishes. He has been conducting secret experiments in our forest!
translated: 那个叫库迪的魔法师在我们森林附近出没也不是一两次了。虽然把他赶跑很多次，但他还是偷偷地干着什么奇怪的勾当。

original: He's been planning this! It's the perfect crime. He comes to scout the area for weeks before he finally steals the children from underneath our very noses! He knew we had a number of staffers going out on vacation, and I caught him loitering around the scene of the crime afterward. He MUST be guilty!
translated: 原来，为了干坏事，他已经事先考察过现场了吧。他想趁着放假，老师们全部去休假的空当，对孩子们下手。不过犯人总归会再次出现在现场。所以当他在这附近游荡的时候，被我抓了个正着。

original: #b(Could Cootie really have planned the kidnapping of five children? He's so small!)
translated: #b(5个孩子消失，此事的确非同寻常。但果真是库迪所为吗？)#k

original: Your desire is to find the most rational explanation. I present to you that our primes suspect IS the omst rational explanation. We must interrogate him.
translated: 你说需要冷静思考问题，我也理解。但作为我们来讲，首先必须得对有嫌疑的人进行训问。

original: #b(They're way too upset to see anybody except Cootie as a suspect. Better talk to him...)
translated: #b(他们因为担心孩子，现在正处于非常兴奋的状态。看来最好听听魔法师库迪本人的话。)#k

original:
You think YOU can find the missing children? How do you propose to do that?#b
#L0#Let's look around the lake. #l
#L1#Why don't we use magic?#l#l
#L2#I'd like to look through the childrens' rooms.#l
translated: 呜呜……你们是来帮忙找孩子们吗？你们打算怎么帮忙？

original: The lake has been searched ten times over at this point. There's nothing left there to find.
translated: #L1##b想在湖中寻找。#l

original: Magic doesn't work like that.
translated: #L2##b想用魔法来搜寻孩子们的行踪。#l

original: I don't really like the idea of you snooping around, but you can go ahead.
translated: #L3##b想在孩子们生活过的地方寻找线索。#l

original: Isn't this place amazing, #h0#. Let's have a look around.
translated: 你来啦，#h #。那么开始搜索吧？

original: What should we do first?
translated: 从哪里开始入手呢？

original: You know what kids love the most? Secrets! I remember trading potion recipes with my friends behind the teacher's backs, hiding away my alchemy research in the nooks around school...
translated: 你知道孩子们最喜欢什么吗？就是他们之间的秘密。我也常常背着师傅，偷偷和其他弟子交换纸条，然后偷偷地笑呢。有时也在秘密的地方藏东西。那种事情可是非常有趣的呢。

original:
I bet these kids have hidden notes all around the school. But how would we find them?#b
#L0#Find the children and ask them where they hid things.#l
#L1#They must be nearby, we should look around.#l#l
#L2#I have no idea. This is hard...#l
translated: 凭我的直觉，孩子们之间有个共同的秘密。那个秘密应该就是关键。不过现在的问题是，要怎样做才能找到孩子们的秘密呢？

original: What a human thing to say, #h0#. We have to find their secrets FIRST! Then we find them... geez.
translated: #L1##b先找到孩子们之后，再询问秘密。#l

original: Everyone already searched, We should try something else.
translated: #L2##b寻找一下写有秘密的纸条如问？#l

original: Maybe there are clues written in these books.
translated: #L3##b我也不知道，你怎么看？#l

original: If this note is accurate, the secret thing they were working on will be around the dormitories. The boys' hall stretches across most of the second floor. Let's try there.
translated: 从纸条上获得有用的信息了吗？

original:
I, uh, I'm going to hang out here until you're done. I need to look around...
#b(Check the dormitories on both ends of the 2nd floor.)#k
translated: 秘密物品……那个到底是什么？最好我们亲自找找看。

original:
You found a script? Let me take a look at that.

...Well, there are some obvious problems in the first act, and the All-You-Can-Eat Sundae Bar scene seems a little tacked on, but this is a fine example of fairy entertainment. Why did the kids have this?
translated:
你发现了剧本？让我看看。

这不是有关将黑魔法师封印起来的冒险岛世界英雄们的故事吗？难怪台词如此教昂……不过，这种剧本为什么会在那些孩子手里呢？

original:
Let's investigate the third floor! Maybe we'll find something else.

#b(Talk to #b#p1500012##k on the 3rd floor of Ellinel Fairy Academy.)#k
translated:
接下来调查3楼吧！我会在上面等着你。
（在艾利涅3楼，与#b魔法师库迪#k对话吧。）

original: There's something weird over here. Should we check it out?
translated: 总觉得有个地方非常可疑。要去调查下吗？

original:
#i4033828# 

(You found... a stageplay. Did the kids write this thing? It's like 300 pages long! You'd probably better go ahead and read it... for research...)
translated:
#i4033828# 

(发现了未知的演出剧本。要稍微读一下吗？)

original:
[Fairy Stageplay]

- Act 3 -

[The curtain rises as a solemn tune fills the air.]

PHANTOM: (to audience) This world is a world of sadness and sorrow, and also sadness! I warn thee, commander of evil and friend to the Black Mage, I will never allow you to rest in peace, except when I make you rest in peace! I have stolen gems and masterpieces from millions of fancy people, but the last thing I will take... IS YOUR LIFE!
translated:
[妖精的剧本]

~第3章~

帷幕升起，响起悲壮的音乐。

幻影：(面对观众)啊啊，悲痛已经浸染了这个世界。你，恶毒的黑魔法师的军团长！我以怪盗的名义发誓，你将永无安宁之日。我怪盗幻影要取走的最后一件东西，既不是宝石，也不是美术品，而是你那不值钱的贱命。

original: This is amazing... I've got to read more
translated: ……？读读其他几页吧。

original:
[Fairy Stageplay]

ARAN: (Brave and wistful at the same time) Dear guardian of light, travel faster than light! I will ward off the evils of the enemy with my tornado arms!
LUMINOUS: (Super lamenty) I swear by the mightiest of all the gods of time and light powers that I will defeat the Black Mage with my ultra light magic before your weapon can destroy its thousandth and one enemy! 

[The lights dim and Freud and Mercedes appear, stage left]

FREUD: Oh dearest, fairest, cutest queen of elves! You are so pretty that I want to kiss your feet and then brush your hair! My honor is exploding with extra power from fighting at your side!
MERCEDES: Oh, most dragonest of Dragon Masters, I will be proud to fight at your side, with my awesome hair flowing in the wind from your sweet dragon! The Black Mage will fall before us!
translated:
[妖精的剧本]

战神：(豪迈地) 光之守护者啊，你赶快去吧！这里有我守着，就算敌人如海啸般涌来，也休想过我这关。
夜光法师：(感叹地) 以神之名来讲，这天下再也找不到像你这么勇猛的战士了！你的勇猛可比天高。用你那斩杀了数千数万敌人的武器消灭黑魔法师吧。

灯光暗了下来，弗里德和双弩精灵在舞台的一侧登场。

弗里德：喔，精灵女王啊！在您那灿烂光辉的美丽面前，连凶猛的野兽都会俯首称臣！能与你站在同一战场上，是我无上的荣幸。
双弩精灵：你，龙神啊！让我们一起消灭黑魔法师吧。我们的战斗就如同那离弦之箭一般，已经打响了。

original:
Why in the world were the kids hiding this thing? I want to read more, but I have to show Cootie.
(Talk to #b#p1500011##k.)
translated:
孩子们怎么会有这种剧本……总之，先拿给库迪，看看他怎么说。
（和#b魔法师库迪#k对话吧。）

original: The girls' dormitories are laid out just like the boys', on the end of each floor. I don't know if I'm supposed to be looking around in ladies' rooms though...
translated: 找到有用的东西了吗？

original:
We must do what must be done to complete this investigation!
(Cootie's blushing for some reason...)

Please look around the dormitories on the third floor for me...
translated: 你说他们不知道在偷偷地制作什么？会在做什么呢……或许这就是解开这个秘密的关键！

original: These costumes must be what the girls were working on in secret! I bet they were putting on that play we found! But how does this tie into their disappearance?
translated: 女孩子们偷偷制作的东西原来是衣服啊！孩子们一直在为有关封印黑魔法师的五位英雄们的演出做准备。并且，做衣服也是非常隐秘地在进行。这意味着什么呢？

original:
Let's go back to the first floor and talk with the Headmistress.

#b(Go to the 1st floor of Ellinel Fairy Academy.)#k
translated:
我们能掌握的就只有这些。返回1楼，和大家谈谈吧。

（#b前往艾利涅1楼。）

original: There's something weird over here. Should we check it out?
translated: 总觉得有个地方非常可疑。要去调查下吗？

original:
#i4033829# 

There's so much clothing up here... Some of them look weird.
translated:
#i4033829# 

找到了一堆衣服。看上去不像是平时穿的衣服……要展开看看吗？

original:
#i1052196##i1050168##i1052495#

I knew it! These are stage costumes! I'd better get this back to Cootie.
translated:
#i1052196##i1050168##i1052495#

果真如此……这些衣服是看上去就是为了演出而特别制作的。把衣服拿给库迪，看看他怎么说。

original: I owe you an apology. We completely misunderstood your intentions here. I hope you will continue to help us find the children.
translated: 先向你表示抱款。发生了这种事情……所有的一切都是我们的误会。为了能找回孩子，你能继续帮助我们吗？

original: I need to think about how to find the missing students. Give me some time, please.
translated: 如何才能找到那些孩子？我现在在整理思路，请重新和我说话吧。

original: Hey, #b#h0##k. I was just telling the Headmistress what we found...
translated: 快来，#b#h ##k。我正想找你说事呢。

original: You believe the children were trying to stage a play?
translated: 我都听说了。孩子们在排练演出？

original: Everything we found points to it. Do you think that's why the kids are missing?
translated: 我们只握到了那些信息。这能成为线索吗？

original: ...This is all my fault, Headmistress Ivana.
translated: ……这一切都是我的失职啊，校长先生。
那是几天前的事情了，那些孩子非常喜欢人类世界的英雄们，而且还想模仿英雄们进行一场演出。当时我就进行了严厉地批评，并处罚了他们。

original: A few days past, I caught the children mimicking the heroes of humankind, so I admonished them.
translated: 你怎么能批评他们呢？每个孩子都有自己喜欢的英雄，这是再正常不过的事情了。

original: Why did you punish them? It's only natural for kids to admire heroes. When I was their age, I used to--
translated:
我们艾利涅根本不相信人类。所以我们觉得对于仰募人类英雄这样的事情，不利于孩子们的教育。

不过没想到，孩子们后来仍旧在准备演出……他们肯定是为了不让我发现，所以躲在什么地方偷偷排练。

original:
We do not spend our time dreaming about humans. 

I could not have known the children would have been so insistent. They must have begun rehearsing in secret...
translated: 看来，孩子们是为避开老师们，在其他地方进行排练的时候失踪了。比如,森林深处的地方，又或者是……

original: They must have gone somewhere dangerous to stay away from you... Like the forest...
translated: 这，这都是我的错啊。如果孩子们有什么三长两短……我，我……

original: If... If something bad were to happen to the children, I-I can't...
translated: 请镇静，副校长先生。越是这种时候，就越需要冷静。

original: What do you want? I'm busy...
translated: 你有什么事？我忙得很……

original: (You tell Arwen what's going on.)
translated: （把发生的事情告诉了妖精艾温。）

original: Missing students? That sounds dangerous... Ellinel isn't the safest place to go missing.
translated: 艾利涅的孩子失踪了？居然会有这样的事……

original:
Do you know Arwen or Rowen from Ellinia?  They are former Ellinel Fairy Academy graduates. They might know of some places we teachers do not.

  #e#b(You will be moved to Ellinia if you accept.)#k
translated:
你知道魔法密林的妖精艾温和妖精罗雯吗？其实，他们是艾利涅的毕业生。要不要向他们寻求帮助？说不定他们更了解孩子们的心理。

#e（接受的话，自动移动到魔法密林。）

original: Please meet Arwen the Fairy in Ellinia.
translated: 拜托了。请返回魔法密林，去找妖精艾温。

original: Welcome back. Did the girls in Ellinia help you?
translated: 你来啦。有收获吗？

original: (You show them Dr. Betty's device.)
translated: (给妖精们看巴缇博士的东西，并说明其功能。)

original: Are you suggesting we befoul our forest with this filthy, foul item from the corrupted human civilization? Never!
translated: ……那么，现在要让我们使用这不纯洁的人类的东西？不行！绝对不行！死也不行！

original: There's no other option at this point, Faculty Head Kalayan.
translated: 可现在别无他法，副校长先生。

original: Rowen's right. We have to find those children!
translated: 罗雯的话没错。现在最首要的任务就是要找到那些孩子，不是吗？

original: I cannot say that I am fond of the idea, but we have no other options.
translated: 我虽不赞同，但目前只有这个方法。

original: Fine. But this is on YOUR wings if it pollutes our forest...
translated: ……呃……只好那样了，不过只此一回……不，不管怎么说……

original: Everyone, please stay quiet for a minute. I'm going to turn it on.
translated: 我来启动试试。请大家暂时安静。
好像捕捉到了森林里的各种声音……

original: Wow, I can hear the whole forest!

translated: 什么嘛，除了杂音什么也听不见。

original: What's wrong with this thing? Why is it only recording useless noises?
translated: 呜呜……救命啊……呜呜。

original: Shh... Be quiet.
translated: 是后院的方向。

original: That voice!
translated: 等着我，孩子们！我副校长去救你们啦！

original: It's coming from out back!
translated: 艾温，我们也一起去寻找孩子们吧！

original: Be patient, children! I will save you right now!
translated: 各位，请等一下……！

original: Arwen, we should help.
translated: 吱吱吱…

original: Everyone, please wait!
translated: 嘘……安静。

original:
I have studied the magical forests around the academy a great deal. It's difficult to navigate, but I created a tool that can help you at least identify which directions sounds are coming from. 

#i4033830##b#t4033830##k
translated:
我研究的是森林里的各种生物。在森林中，需要精确捕捉所需生命体的声音时，有时也会用上这个工具。只要捕捉到声音的话，就能大致知道方向和距离。

#i4033830##b#t4033830##k

original:
I'm not sure how helpful it will be, but it's better than nothing. Now, I've got to go before my lab explodes. 

#b(You will move to Ellinel Fairy Academy if you accept.)#k
translated:
虽然不知道是否能派上用场，但总比没有强啊。请把那些不幸的孩子拯救出来吧。

（接受后，移动到妖精学院艾利涅。）

original:
Not bad, #h0#. You really thought like a fairy out there. Let's return to the Headmistress in Ellinel. 
#b(You will be moved to Ellinel if you accept.)#k
translated:
#h #，我真的很佩服你的实力啊。你终于成功救出了我们全部的孩子！现在只要返回艾利涅，并向校长先生做报告就行了。现在我们一起回去吧。
#b（接受后，移动到艾利涅。）

original: Great. All the kids must be back by now, right?
translated: 好吧，孩子们已经全部回来了吧？

original: Are you the one I invited to help with the ruckus at the Ellinel Fairy Academy?
translated: 喵~ 你就是受邀前来解决妖精学院艾利涅里发生的骚乱的勇士吗，喵？？

original: Um, of course?
translated: 原……原来如此……不过

original: You don't look as strong as I'd hoped. But, you're famous, so I'll leave it to you.
translated: 你看上去好像并没有想象中的那么强哦，喵。但既然是有名的勇士，我就相信你一次吧，喵。

original: Could you spare me a moment? I received a request for help, and I can' think of anyone better than you.
translated:
啊，你来得正好。我们接到外部发来的紧急请求，这事非你不可。

#b(※ #r妖精学院艾利涅#b是特殊主题副本，最高至#r59级#b为止，提供与勇士的等级相匹配的怪物和任务经验值。

original: There has been an incident at the #bEllinel Fairy Academy#k. A human magician has trespassed in the sacred halls of the fairy school.
translated: 事情是这样的，听说眼下#b妖精学院艾利涅#k发生了重大骚乱。妖精学院艾利涅所在之处不同于魔法密林，是不受人类影响的妖精们的领地。正因此，该地至今仍保存着太初时期的风貌。但是，最近#r有一名人类魔法师#k打破了那里的平静。

original: Fanzy will take you into the land of the fairies. I can send you to him directly, if you'd like.
translated: 虽然详细的事情我也不是很清楚，但如果骚乱继续扩大的话，妖精和人类之间的关系肯定会日趋恶化，因此，得去弄清楚事情的真相才行。勇士你去的话，肯定能够应对这种状况。那么，请先到魔法密林附近的北部森林，寻找#b潘喜#k吧。

original: Are you the one I invited to help with the ruckus at the Ellinel Fairy Academy?
translated: 喵~ 你就是受邀前来解决妖精学院艾利涅里发生的骚乱的勇士吗，喵？？

original: Um, of course?
translated: 原……原来如此……不过

original: You don't look as strong as I'd hoped. But, you're famous, so I'll leave it to you.
translated: 你看上去好像并没有想象中的那么强哦，喵。但既然是有名的勇士，我就相信你一次吧，喵。

original: Right on time. I've received some disturbing news...
translated:
啊，你来得正好。我们接到外部发来的紧急请求，这事非你不可。

#b(※ #r妖精学院艾利涅#b是特殊主题副本，最高至#r59级#b为止，提供与勇士的等级相匹配的怪物和任务经验值。

original: There's been an incident at the #bEllinel Fairy Academy#k. Unlike Ellinia, Ellinel has been a sacred place for fairies to live and learn uninterrupted by the outside world. However, a #rhuman Magician#k has trespassed on their territory.
translated: 事情是这样的，听说眼下#b妖精学院艾利涅#k发生了重大骚乱。妖精学院艾利涅所在之处不同于魔法密林，是不受人类影响的妖精们的领地。正因此，该地至今仍保存着太初时期的风貌。但是，最近#r有一名人类魔法师#k打破了那里的平静。

original: Fanzy will take you into the land of the fairies. I can send you to him directly, if you'd like.
translated: 虽然详细的事情我也不是很清楚，但如果骚乱继续扩大的话，妖精和人类之间的关系肯定会日趋恶化，因此，得去弄清楚事情的真相才行。勇士你去的话，肯定能够应对这种状况。那么，请先到魔法密林附近的北部森林，寻找#b潘喜#k吧。

original: #h #, could you spare me a moment? I received a request for help, and i can't think of anyone better than you.
translated:
啊，你来得正好。我们接到外部发来的紧急请求，这事非你不可。

#b(※ #r妖精学院艾利涅#b是特殊主题副本，最高至#r59级#b为止，提供与勇士的等级相匹配的怪物和任务经验值。

original: There has been an incident at the #b Ellinel Fairy Academy#k. A human magician has trespassed in the sacred halls of the fairy school.

translated: 怎么，你还有话要说吗？

original: Granny, I have a question.

original: What do you want to know? Are you curious when this old lady will die? If you mention about defeating and sort one more time in front of me, boy, I'll destroy that mouth of yours first.
translated: 你想问什么？想问问我这老婆子什么时候死吗？要是还想说些没用的废话，就给我闭嘴。

original: No.. What I am saying is that the penguins, the malamutes, and the seals here are doubting you. Is it perhaps due to your magic that the glaciers are melting and the sea level is rising?
translated: 不是的……这个地区的企鹅族、阿拉斯加犬族和海象族全都对您怀有疑心，会不会是因为您的魔法，使得冰川融化，海平面上升的呢？

original: Magic? What is that? Do you eat that?
translated: 魔法？那是什么东西？是能煮着吃的吗？

original: There also is a rumor that she is conducting some experiments with the children.
translated: 现在甚至还有传闻说，您把孩子们当做试验材料，正在制作某种东西。

original: WHAT?! Shut your mouth! What makes you think that I would do such a thing to these cute little things?!
translated: 谁再那么胡说八道，看我不把他嘴缝起来！说我拿孩子们来做什么？我拿这些温顺可爱的小家伙来做试验材料？

original: These poor kids lost their home and parents as the glacier is meltingIf no one takes care of them, its unimaginable how they will turn out!They were floating on the sea pitifully, and I picked them up and am taking care of them.
translated: 它们都是些因为冰川融化，而失去家园，失去父母的孩子。要是没人去照顾一下，还不知道能不能活下去唉！就那样可怜巴巴地在大海上漂浮，是我一个个捞起来抚养的。

original: You have been raising the children?
translated: 您在抚养那些孩子们？

original: I was just taking care of them temporarily..
translated: 我也就暂时照顾他们一段时间……

original: It is said, the penguins should grow with the penguins, and the seals need to grow with the seals. After curing a baby, and if it looks like it has recovered enough, I would bring him to his people secretly at night.
translated: 自古以来，各种动物就该在同族群中成长。我把它们带回家后，为它们治疗伤口，等它们体力恢复得差不多了，就包在襁褓里，晚上偷偷放在村庄前面。

original: But why would you do such a thing despite all the misunderstandings?...
translated: 可是，你没必要冒着被冤枉的危险这样做啊……

original: Whew.. That mouth of yours.. How does it help you to talk so much? If you have time for talking, shut up and do me a favor.

original: There are five different Explorer Jobs. You can advance to them on Victoria Island. Hm I think they were... Warrior, Magician, Bowman, Thief, and Pirate.
translated: 恩，现在开始，你要去的金银岛中，有另外五种职业可以进行转职。嗯，我记得是……战士、魔法师、弓箭手、飞侠和海盗。有这五种职业。

original: #b What are they like?

original: Let's see. Warriors have great strength and defense, so they excel at close-range combat. Magicians use magic, so they f-favor intelligence over power, and they're good at long-range combat against multiple enemies.
translated: 首先，战士的力量和体力很强，适合近距离战斗。同时，防御力也相当出色，所以不会轻易倒下。魔法师与战士不同，通过魔法进行战斗，所以相比力量，智力更加重要。因为使用魔法，所以可在远距离一次攻击多个敌人。

original: B-bowman are also good at long-range combat. They shoot arrows from afar and can keep enemies at a distance. And, let's see... Thieves are close-range, like warriors, but they focus on speed instead of strength.
translated: 说到远距离攻击，弓箭手才是最适合的。其可以在远距离使用箭矢，并且控制距离的能力也相当出色。飞侠虽有不亚于战士的近距离战斗能力，但在战斗时往往以速度为主，而非力量。

original: Finally, Pirates... are Pirates. Some use their fists in close-range combat, others shoot guns or cannons from afar. Their attacks are pretty fancy, either way.
translated: 最后一个，海盗……其特征很难用一句话来概括。海盗既能用体术发动近身攻击，又能在远距离用手枪或大炮进行攻击。而且，无论哪种攻击方式，都相当华丽和富有个性。

original: No one knows how or why he went missing. He had been getting antsy in days before he went missing, and started secretly conducting experiments that no one knew existed...no matter how much we asked, he never divulged any information on it. He was conducting experiments like a mad man... research, research, more research. That's all he did, in the name of Life Alchemy... then, that's when #bthat#k happened...
translated: 谁都不知道那家伙为什么会消失．不知从什么时候开始那家伙就变得暴躁，人们不知道他到底在做什么实验．那家伙大概半年左右一直是疯疯癫癫的状态．研究，研究，研究…不断地在做实验．有关生命炼金的...结果，#b那个事件#k终于发生了…

original: Even in the town of alchemists like Magatia, no one ever witnessed an explosion that big... I can't even begin to fathom what kind of experiments he conducted. What kind of a monster was he digging up...? The head of the alchemist society had already searched his house, so he should know what happened... yet he's never revealed anything...
translated: 就算是号称练金术士之村的玛加提亚…也未曾发生过像那样的剧烈爆炸事件…不晓得那家伙到底做了什么实验，我怎么猜也猜不透…他到底是在做什么惊人的研究呢？既然已经对他家进行了调查，我想协会会长应该知道些什么，但他也不肯透露…

original: Even this experiment started off as joint research between him and myself. But he's missing now, and it was impossible to go further with the experiment. I knew what to do with potions and pills, but that was still tough. I'm continuing this on his behalf, but... I don't understand why he thought of conducting a study on altering the state of the body...
translated: 这项研究..其实一开始也是和他一起合作，但他却消失无踪，而这项研究也无法继续下去。我对药物虽然还算有自信，但还真不容易啊！既然是和那家伙一起开始的，虽然断断续续还在持续下去，但是…那家伙为什么会想要研究改变人体的状态呢？

original: Oh! That was quick! Now, I must prepare my #rsignature dish#k! Slurp!
translated: #ho#！噢！你这么快就搜集到材料啦！好的，那现在来完成我的#r特制料理#k吧？！

original: It should be ready in no time! Come back in a little bit, slurp!
translated: 我很快就能做好了，你稍后再来找我吧！哈！

original: #face0#Looks like I've cooked another wonderful meal!
translated: #face0#嗯~我今天做的料理好像也很赞！

original: We're the ones eating it, so we'll be the judges of that!
translated: 好不好吃得由我们来判断！

original: #bPibik#k, are you going to keep on complaining about free food?
translated: #b哔比#k哥哥~ 你怎么一直吐槽猴姐啊？

original: Don't you talk back to me! I'm older than you.
translated: 你这小家伙不要一直顶嘴！我是你哥哥！

original: That's all the more reason for you to #r#fs20#exercise common sense!
translated: 我知道~ 哥哥~不过，哥哥你总是这么没礼貌，所以我#r#fs20#有点点生气了！

original: Pi... mi... #bPimi#k scary... Heeeheee.
translated: 哔……米#b哔美#k姐……姐好可怕…我害怕…… 哼哼哼~

original: Ahem! Let's all enjoy this wonderful meal. ...Eat your food already!
translated: 哎…哎！这么开心的用餐时间，干嘛要这样！快点…吃饭吧！

original: Of course #bPibik#k. Doesn't it feel nice behaving? You should keep being good for Simia, since she works so hard for us. Okay?
translated: 就是嘛~#b哔比#k哥哥~你早点像这样懂礼貌该有多好啊？就算是为了给我们辛苦做饭的猴姐，也请你以后一直~这么懂礼貌，知道了吗？

original: If you don't, you #fs20#might not like what happens.#fs15# (Sighs) I'll just leave it at that.
translated: 如若不然，#fs20#我就……。把你的……。头……#fs15#呼……。我就不跟你多说了，哥哥~

original: O-okay!
translated: 我…我知道了！

original: Heh, heehee. Pimi made Pibik quiet again.
translated: 呵呵呵，哔美姐……姐姐又教训……哔比哥哥了…呵呵呵

original: Pidol, you need to eat too. You have to take care of yourself if you want your #bhead to heal#k...
translated: 哔嘟必须多吃一点，#b受伤的脑袋#k才能尽快好起来……

original: Hehehe. I fine. I always like this.
translated: 我…我…本来就是这样啊…？呵呵呵

original: Pidol... You need to focus on getting better... (Sighs)
translated: 哔嘟啊…你原来并不是傻瓜…不对，你原来是个#b正常的孩子#k…所以你要快点好起来……。哎……

original: #face0#Pibik! Pimi! Pidol! It's so nice to see you all looking after one another!
translated: #face0#哔比！哔美！哔嘟！你们这样吵吵闹闹，同时又互相关心对方的样子看起来很好！

original: So few of us around here, myself included, #bhave a family#k to rely on... But #bthe three of you can always depend on each other#k. You must feel so happy!
translated: 这里的大部分人跟我一样，#b没有家人#k，你们#b三个可以相互依靠#k，真是太幸福了！

original: Simia, you do have a family. You took us in when #bthe village kicked us out for having unusual tastes#k. We're your family!
translated: 猴姐，你怎么会没有家人呢~ 你收留了#b因为口味奇怪而被赶出村庄的#k我们啊~ 姐姐你就和我们的家人没有区别~

original: Hehe... Thanks Pimi! I don't have anywhere to go either. Let's stay together forever!
translated: 没错，哔美！虽然我也一样无家可归！我们像现在这样，永远生活在一起吧！

original: Family? Yeah right... We don't even look alike...
translated: 切…什么家人啊…长得完全不一样啊……

original: Hey... You should stop being mean #fs13#if you know what's good for you...
translated: 喂…适可而止…吧？

original: W-what I meant was that I'm even more grateful! She had no reason to look after us short little weirdos... We have unusual tastes but she makes food we like...
translated: 我…我的意思是，所以我们更应该心怀感激！猴姐的个头比我们高很多，要照顾我们这些小不点…我们的口味这么奇特，她还要给我们做好吃的……。

original: (Mumbles) #fs13#Thanks... Simia...
translated: 谢谢你……猴姐……

original: #face0#Hehe. I know how much you like me Pibik. Pimi, stop bullying your brother. Families shouldn't threaten or fight with each other.
translated: #face0#嘻嘻，我知道哔比你非常喜欢我~ 哔美啊，你也不要总这么对待你的哥哥~家人之间也是不能互相打骂的~

original: We're not... hitting each other... Hehehe... #bIt's one-sided#k... Heehee.
translated: 应该不是…互相…打骂吧…？呵呵呵…… 好像是#b单方#k…呵呵呵

original: #face0#What are we doing sitting here gabbing, with this delicious food getting cold in front of us? I made your favorite, #bChewy Sole Soup#k! Bon apetit!
translated: #face0#好啦~好啦~放着美味的食物不吃，我们这是在干嘛呢？今天我特意为你们准备了你们爱吃的#b劲道脚掌汤#k！快吃吧~

original: So, that delicious smell was coming from here... Whatever they're eating, I hope they have enough to share...
translated:
这里有好香的味道……
刚好是#b吃饭时间#k，应该去看看能不能要点吃的……

original:
#b#h0##k!
I see you brought all the ingredients. Now we'll just mash these into a paste and bake it into a #bbun#k!
translated:
#b#ho#！#k
你已经集齐材料啦？用这些材料应该可以做出面包？的味道！！

original: #b#h0##k! You're back with more ingredients! We just finished baking the bun. Now we'll just throw in the topping you brought... There!
translated:
#b#ho#！#k
你已经集齐材料啦？面包已经做好了…现在只要像这样混合，然后像这样放上去……

original: All right, the first part of our #bDelicious Beefy Tastesplosion Sandwich#k is ready to go! Next, we make the patty. Ask #bPibik#k to help you with that!
translated: 好啦！现在#b

original: That was fast! You got the ingredients already?!
translated: 你这家伙真是迅速！这么快就集齐材料啦？！

original: But it's not a real sandwich without multiple types of meat!
translated: 不过，我的口味非常非常讲究，就这几种肉食满足不了我的！

original: Now! Bring me more meat to complete the #bDelicious Beefy Tastesplosion Sandwich#k and to #bfill my belly#k!
translated: 好了！为了#b都很奇怪啊！现在够了！转转转！三明治#k的完成，以及#b填饱我的肚子#k，去搜集更多的肉吧！

original: Why are we making the sandwich that #bYOU want to eat#k? Have you forgotten this is all for #bMuto#k?
translated: 你怎么总打算制作#b你要吃#k的食物…你不要忘了，我是在为#b穆托#k准备食物！

original: My taste is impeccable! Now stop talking and bring me meat!
translated: 都一样的啦！！别废话了，快去搜集肉吧！

original: You're back?! I was sure you would be eaten alive!
translated: 什么啊？！我还以为你被吃了呢，没想到活着回来了？！

original: Check out my awesome patty! The #bDelicious Beefy Tastesplosion Sandwich#k is coming along nicely!
translated: 好啦！快看看我做的肉饼！#b都很奇怪啊！现在够了！转转转！三明治#k现在可以说是已经完成了！

original: Now, a little nibble for the master of taste!
translated: 嗯嗯！那我先尝一口吧？！

original: If you don't move that stubby little beak of yours away from the sandwich, #byou're gonna be eating your next meal through a straw#k.
translated: 哥哥，如果你现在不拿开你的嘴，我会让你以后#b很难吃饭#k的哦？哈哈

original: Grr... It looks like my work here is done. You can go bother #bPimi#k now!
translated: 该死，现在我的作用已经结束了，现在你去找我的妹妹#b哔美#k吧！

original: Oh, you're back. And you're soaked to the bone. Hand me the ingredients you brought, and then go get some rest.
translated: 天啊~你回来啦？哎呀，你全身都湿了~快把你搜集到的东西给我，你先休息下~

original: Ah, that delightful aroma! I know that this #bDelicious Beefy Tastesplosion Sandwich#k will be the best dish ever.
translated: 嗯~这新鲜的香味！#b都很奇怪啊！现在够了！转转转！三明治#k肯定会成为最棒的料理~

original: Ah! Of course, you still have to gather the next ingredient.
translated: 嗯！你应该知道还没有结束吧？我会告诉你接下来要搜集的材料，请你立刻出发~

original: Can't I rest for a bit?
translated: 我休息会再去不行吗……

original:
Sure. Take a break. If you want, I can help you take #rthe longest nap of your life.#k 
#b(She balls one of her wings into a fist and slams it against the other)#k 
Hehehe!
translated: 嗯~你想休息就休息吧~ 要不要我帮你#r永远的休息下去#k？哈哈哈！

original: Oh! Looks like you survived the #bRhyturtle's dreaded horn#k. Hehe.
translated: 噢！你躲过了#b犀牛龟#k犄角的攻击啊？哈哈~

original: At last, the seafood patty is complete! We'll just crunch up the shells and sprinkle them on top, and... Voila! What a masterpiece, eh?
translated: 好了~现在海鲜饼已经完成了~你快看，看起来是不是很美味啊？

original: Muto will absolutely adore our #bDelicious Beefy Tastesplosion Sandwich#k! Hahaha.
translated: 穆托肯定会非常~非常喜欢#b三明治#k的，哈哈哈`

original: I... I want to... Help also, yes... Hehehe.
translated: 我………… 我也…想…帮忙…姐…姐姐…呵呵呵

original: Of course, Pidol! Yes, you should help the traveler too!
translated: 天啊~我们善良的哔嘟！好的，好的，你也快点帮助旅行者吧~

original: Uhhhh... Are you sure about that?
translated: 怎么觉得要加的东西越来多了……。

original: Wow... Feathers! You brought them fast. Heeheehee.
translated: 呜…哇…… 你这么快就把羽毛拿回来啦。

original: Okay Pidol, here's your weird gorilla-bird feathers for that 'egg patty.'
translated: 好了~ 哔嘟，现在可以了吧？快点完成你的蛋饼吧~

original: Hmph. How dare you belittle me. I needn't explain my logic to such an ignoramus.
translated: 哼，你怎么会任务我的任务只有一项呢？在你眼里我就那么傻呀？！

original: Pidol! You spoke normally again...
translated: 啊，呵呵呵，我不管…我还需要更多~ 哼，再去搜集吧…哼

original: Normal...? Feather good... I still need more...
translated: 噢！哔嘟你！

original: Woooow! Sandwich... Com... plete! Wheeheehee!
translated: 哇啊啊~ 完成…啦~~转转转！

original: #h0#, our #bDelicious Beefy Tastesplosion Sandwich#k is finally complete! Yay!
translated: 旅行者~ #b三明治#k终于完成了！你快看~~

original: We should all try a bite!
translated: 好了~那现在我们一起用餐吧？

original: #face0#The last part of the questline will be implemented later. You can start on dailies and continue to esfera now.
translated: #face10#你来啦，#h0#。我一直在等你。

original: They're much stronger than Xenoroids!
translated: 呼，简直比超级人造人强大多了。

original: #face0#The Erda will take whatever form it thinks it needs to protect itself. Sometimes that includes incredible strength.
translated: #face0#因为那些是艾尔达啊。

original: There are Xenoroids here too.
translated: 这里也有超级人造人啊。

original: Is that... coral growing on them?
translated: 脑袋上全是海鲜……

original: No matter how many I defeat, there are always more!
translated: 好像怎么都消灭不完啊？

original: #face0#Wonderful isn't it, the ability for the Erda to be born anew?
translated: #face0#是吗？

original: Wonderful isn't exactly the first thing that comes to mind...
translated:
#face0#等等，我感觉到#fs18##r阿尔卡那的那个人#k#fs16#就在这附近。
应该没走多远。

original:
#face0#Wait... I can sense her nearby.
She's much closer than I expected.
translated: 你感觉到了？

original: Her? Who are you talking about?
translated: #face0#她的力量对我也有影响。

original: #face0#Tana! Her presence alone is enough to effect even me...
translated: #face0#没时间犹豫了。赶快行动。

original: #face0#Meoooow!
translated: #face0#喵喵喵喵~！

original: Phew! I barely managed to track all of them down.
translated: 江，别让我抓住你。

original: Just wait until I catch you Jean.
translated: 呼，终于找回来了。

original: #face0#Hey, old man. Did you not hear me, or are you just stupid? I said pay up! You want a primo market spot, you've gotta fork over the dough.
translated: #face0#喂，大叔。你这个月的保护税交晚了啊！

original: #face0#W-well, you see, business has been down l-lately...
translated: #face0#这、这不是生意不好嘛……

original: #b(That man seems to be in trouble.)#k
translated: 有什么事吗？

original: #face0#Thank you so much! Now I can get this food delivered.
translated: #face0#哎呦，谢谢夏伊了。你点的东西马上送到。

original: I'm glad I could help!
translated: 谢谢。

original: Also, do you know anything about that crystal disaster?
translated: 那个……你知道那件惨案吗？

original:
#face0#Disaster? Well, it's been quite a while... 
Didn't it happen before you left for your studies?
translated:
#face0#你是说……惨案？当然知道。那都是好几年前的事了……
不是在你留学之前发生的吗？

original: I heard there was a survivor.
translated: 听说当时有人活下来了，难道是……

original:
#face0#I-I don't know anything about that. I'm sorry. 
You should try asking someone else.
translated:
#face0#这、这我不知道。抱歉啊。
不如你去问问其他人吧？

original: #face0#Maybe the pottery shop lady over there?
translated: #face0#不然去问问#b瓷器店大婶#k吧？

original: You know that monument in the center square?
translated: 那个广场中央的纪念碑……

original: #face0#Mm hm, yes.
translated: #face0#嗯？纪念碑？当时你不在吗？

original: #face0#It was placed after that anti-magic stone fell and broke all those years ago.
translated: #face0#几年前发生了一场大事故。反魔力石在设置过程中摔碎了。

original: #face0#The moment that stone shattered, everyone in the vicinity disappeared without a trace. It was so sad.
translated:
#face0#那东西损毁后，在附近做生意的商贩一下子……
#fs18##r蒸发#k#fs16#了。真是可惜。

original: Is it true there was a survivor?
translated: 原来如此……可听说有人活下来了……

original: #face0#You mean the Angel of Death?
translated: #face0#你是说#fs18##r死神#k#fs16#啊。

original: People call her the Angel of Death?
translated: 死神？

original:
#face0#Yes. I mean, she was quite a frightening sight. 
I'll never forget her. Couldn't sleep for days after that.
translated:
#face0#我当时也在场，
场面太惨了，吓得我好一阵子都睡不着觉。

original:
#face0#She just vanished and rematerialized like it was nothing.
And the way she looked too... that darkness... her eyes...
Only someone incredibly powerful could have managed something like that.
I suppose that's why they took such an interest in her.
translated:
#face0##fs18##r死人竟然再次复活#k#fs16#
这种事多不吉利啊。

original: Who took an interest in her? What happened to her?
translated: 原来是这样。塔纳……那个死神最后怎么样了？

original: #face0#The soldiers... Once they got a hold of her, no one ever saw her again. There have been rumors though.
translated: #face0#被士兵们带走后就没消息了。其实传闻说……

original:
#face0#You know, there's one person who might know more. 
He's been asking about those rumors too, but I haven't seen him lately...
translated:
#face0#说不定那家伙知道。
先前总是四处打探消息。可惜最近一直不见他出现……

original: Who's that?
translated: #face0#还有谁啊，当然是#b江#k。

original: #face0#Well, Jean, of course. He was the last one to see her alive... or so they say.
translated: 啊，#b回忆录#k又发光了。

original: Hmm... Jean... I'll have to track him down. Thanks.
translated: 那是谁啊？

original: #b(Hm? What's this journal doing in your bag? Who does it belong to? And why is it glowing? Maybe you should take a look at it.)#k
translated: 哦……是江……

original: #face0#You're late. I looked for you everywhere. I was worried something might have happened.
translated: #face0#你来晚了。我还担心你出了什么意外呢。

original:
#face0#The High Priest already arrived and went straight to the observatory...
I thought you were going to arrive with him.
translated:
#face0##b所长#k已经到了。
说要去瞭望台……到底为什么要到那上面去呢？

original: #b(High Priest?)#k
translated: #b(所长？)

original: Anyway, you should go see him.
translated: #face0#夏伊大人跟所长也是初次见面吧？

original: #face0#You've never met the High Priest before today, right Shey?
translated: 啊，嗯……

original: Not yet.
translated: #face0#你到了。远道而来辛苦你了。

original: #face0#Welcome. You must be tired from your journey.
translated: #face0#不错嘛。

original: #face0#I'm fine.
translated: #face0#所长？天上有什么东西吗？

original: #face0#Sir? What are you looking at?
translated: #face0#第一次看见飞得这么高的鸟。

original: #face0#I've never seen a bird fly that high.
translated: #face0#啊啊，你在看鸟啊。克里蒂亚斯的鸟儿飞得高可是出了名的。

original: #face0#Ah, yes sir. The birds in Kritias are known for that.
translated:
#face0#甚至坊间传说，有人梦想变成鸟儿，一整天都盯着天空
结果变成了瞎子。

original:
#face0#I once heard a tale of a man who went blind from
staring at the skies wishing to become one of them.
translated: #face0#眼睛瞎掉已经算不错了。

original: #face0#It's a miracle that blindness was the worst of it.
translated: #face0#即使燃烧我的身体也无法阻止的竟然是人类。

original: #face0#What?
translated: #fs20##r阿卡伊勒？！！！#k

original: #face0#Humans have a remarkable stubbornness that defies even grievous injury.
translated: 大神官阿卡伊勒。

original: #fs20##rArkarium?!#k
translated: 年纪轻轻就因诚恳忠实而受到认可，#r站在了离女神最近的位置。#k

original: She looks like she's in pain.
translated: 看你那么痛苦，没事吧？

original: #face0#We're only testing whether we can transfer her regenerative power to others. The subject is fine. It's just a side effect of the daily experiments.
translated: #face0#没关系。这是正常的实验副作用。

original: Daily?
translated: 正常？

original:
#face0#Yes. If the experiment fails, the test recipients vanish, but her power enables her body to restore itself perfectly every time. 
She's barely even aware of it happening.
translated:
#face0#她的身体往往会迅速恢复。
根本不受本人控制。

original: Isn't this inhumane?
translated: 这完全有悖人类构造嘛……

original:
#face0#Whatever she looks and acts like, she's not human. 
What you see is a shell formed by the power she possesses.
translated:
#face0#她并不是人类。
虽然外貌和行为跟人类没什么两样，但总觉得不过是个驱壳而已。

original: #face0#She barely even exists at all. She experiences no emotion, desire, or memory.
translated: #face0##r#fs18不过是#没有感情、没有欲望、没有回忆的行尸走肉#fs16##k。

original: But...
translated:
#face0#看来你还没理解。
查看#b研究日志#k应该能有助于你理解。请稍等。

original: #face0#Did you find the Journal?
translated: #face0#找到文件了吗？

original: Yes. Who wrote this?
translated:
#face0#那是上任所长。自从爆炸事件后就引咎辞职了。
他最后留下了这么一句话。

original: The former High Priest. He resigned shortly after that incident. Here's what he put in his final entry.
translated: 这既非魔法的领域，也不是科学的范畴。

original:
'This is neither magic nor science. 
It is beyond human; it is of the gods. 

We have overstepped our bounds.'
translated: 那是人类之上的存在，即#r「神之领域」#k。

original: What does he mean by that?!
translated: 我们正在将手伸向不该碰触的东西。

original: That is why you're here. We needed you to bring High Priest Arkarium.
translated: 神之领域？

original: Is that why Arkarium...
translated: #face0#所以才需要#b夏伊#k大人。为了侍奉大神官大人。

original: Sh! The high priest is coming this way.
translated: 原来如此。所以阿卡伊勒……

original: Got it! So... it was a necklace!
translated: #face0#很好，干得漂亮！

original: #face0#Perfect!
translated: 等等，这不是反魔力石碎片嘛？呃啊！

original: Wait a minute... this looks like an anti-magic stone fragment. Ah!
translated: #face1#呼哧，差点出大事了。小心点。

original: #face1#Whoa! That was close. Be careful!
translated:
#face1#你不记得那个惨案吗？
这东西一旦摔碎，周围的生命就会全部蒸发。

original:
#face1#Don't you remember the last time one of these broke? 
Shatter this, and every living thing nearby will disappear without a trace.
translated: 这么危险的东西干嘛带在身上？！

original: Why are you carrying something so dangerous?!
translated:
#face0#你不知道玫瑰带刺吗？
越是美丽的东西就越是危险。我们塔纳就是这样。

original:
#face0#Anything worth having comes with a little risk. 
The more beautiful and special something is, the more dangerous... just like Tana.
translated: ……我看你是彻底被迷住了。

original: Well, you ought to be more careful.
translated: 找到了。原来是项链。

original: #face0#You're quicker than I thought!
translated: #face0#竟然这么快？可惜还是没我快~

original: #face0#All right. We're all set. Now let's go get the key.
translated: #face0#很好，完美。那接下来去找钥匙吧？

original: #face0#Head to #bResearch lab#k
translated: #face0#赶快前往#b封锁区4#k吧。

original: #face0##h #! Are you awake?
translated: #face13##h0#！恢复意识了吗？

original: Ugh... yeah. I guess we're finally out. But your form...
translated: 呃……嗯。终于出来了。你的样子？

original: #face0#Looks like I'm stuck as Jean.
translated: #face13#好像变成江了。没办法，谁叫我是艾尔达呢。

original: What about Tana?
translated: 可塔纳呢？

original: #face0#She must have dropped somewhere else.
translated: #face13#不知道。她好像是掉到别的地方了。

original: Oh no! We have to persuade her to-
translated: 糟了！必须说服塔纳才行……

original: #face0#Impossible.
translated: #face13#这太冒险了。

original: What?
translated: 什么？

original: #face0#You still don't understand her purpose.
translated: #face13#你还不知道她的目的吗？

original: #face0#Only one thing can end her pain, and I'm afraid that is-
translated: #face13#结束痛苦的唯一办法。就是……

original: Destroying the world?!
translated: #face13#答对了。

original: #face0#Yes.
translated: #face12#我获得这副身体……不，更大的问题是……

original: Are you telling me this was all for nothing?!
translated: #face1#啊，快看。口袋里好像有……

original: #face0#There's a bigger problem.
translated: #face10#如果他们的目标……是阻止黑魔法师，那真该现在就干掉……咳咳……

original: #face0#Hang on. What's in my pocket?.
translated: 世界毁灭？！！

original: Isn't that an Arcane Symbol?
translated: 结果是徒劳一场。

original: #face0#If they intend to thwart the Black Mage, I should stop them now.
translated: 这不是神秘徽章嘛？

这里很危险…该死，已经晚了。

original: There are humans in the Arcane River? I should talk to them.
translated: 神秘河有人出现?? 搭个话看看?

original: And the winner is... Pie Mask!
translated: 优胜者是派面具！

original: They held the eating contest while you were gone.
translated: 在那期间食物大战已经展开了。

original: Wow! Did you see that? That was a lot of food!
translated: 哇！你看到了吗？真的是吃个没完啊！

original: I lost? How could I lose? I was so sure this would be my first victory!
translated: 输了，我居然输了！我一定要做一届优胜者的！

original: I still don't understand how me breaking all the plates would have helped him win his first victory.
translated: 虽然打碎了盘子，但就这样成了冠军？

original: It's not like you broke ALL the plates anyway.
translated: 甚至还不是打碎了所有的盘子。

original: I did it... Look at me. I'm the winner! Admire me. I'm so happy... Aren't I?
translated: 终于胜利了……请看着我，仰视我。嗯，我好幸福。

original: I don't undestand... I should feel happy right now, shouldn't I? Ah!
translated: 不对啊？好奇怪…………我原本就很幸福啊？哦哦！

original: Hm... The dream is growing weaker.
translated: 嗯…梦境正在减弱。

original: Hold on to this for me, won't you? Who knows whether I'll transform into a Dreamkeeper again.
translated: 你先收下这个吧。说不定我什么时候就会重新变为清道夫了。

original: I discovered this while I was a Dreamkeeper. I guess I was still awake, in a way. Perhaps it will be of use to you.
translated: 这是我变为清道夫时发现的，我一直把它带在身上。看来那时我还保留了意识。不知道它能不能帮到你。

original: I see Protective Mask couldn't make it. The shock of his ordeal must have been great.
translated: 话说，防毒面具最终还是没有来，看来他受到的冲击很大。

original: But don't worry. I'm sure he will recover.
translated: 不过，你不要太担心。他肯定会恢复的。
我不阻拦你，#ho#，希望你能赢。为了你，还有，为了我们。

original: I'm going to stop Lucid.
translated: 我要击退路西德。

original: Is it over? Is that it?
translated: 现在真的都结束了吗？还是还没有结束？！！

original: #face0#I... think it's over. But the barrier around the city hasn't disappeared yet.
translated: #face0#虽然笼罩城市的梦境还没有消失，但好像告一段落了。

original: What are you going to do now?
translated: #face0#梦就是梦，现实就是现实，虽然不是立刻，但梦境将会逐渐减弱。

original: #face0#Dreams and reality are separate once more. And now, just like any other, this dream will slowly fade away...
translated: 可是，如果梦境消失，你也……

original: But if the dream end, then you'll...
translated: #face0#天亮的时候，噩梦消散，这是不变的法则。

original: #face0#The nightmare must vanish when the day breaks.
translated:
#face0#如果成功拯救了居民和艾尔达，
我存在的意义也算是完成了，现在就算消失也没有关系。

original: #face0#If the people, or the Erdas are safe, then that means I've fulfilled my purpose. It doesn't matter if I disappear.
translated: #face0#如果红色迷雾消散，你也会出发去完成你的使命吧。
#face0#这场旅途肯定充满艰辛，希望你能平安无事。

original: #face0#I guess you'll resume your quest when the fog is lifted.
translated: 可以缩短之前神秘河地区的每日任务。

original: #face0#It will be a difficult journey, but I hope you'll return safely.
translated: 以后你打算怎么做？

translated: #ho#，你完成了今天的全部委托了啊。真是太谢谢你了。这是

#face7#That tree you see in the distance once resonated with the song of a harmonious forest, and blossomed with beautiful flowers. We strolled beneath the Spirit Tree's branches and were happy.
translated: #face7#那边，遥遥可见的那棵树会与和谐的森林之歌产生共鸣，并会一直绽放出美丽的花朵。我们总是会在那棵精灵之树下嬉戏游玩，幸福不已。

original: #face7#The Spirit Tree sheltered us from danger, and the places where its petals fell overflowed with life.
translated: #face7#精灵之树用它那宽广的胸怀照拂了所有人，让大家免受危险的困扰，花瓣所及之处也总是生机勃勃。

original: #face4#...But the song of the forest grew silent, and tragedy befell us.
translated: #face4#……可是森林之歌消失了，悲剧也随之开始了。

original: #face4#Wild, discordant spirts began to appear, and the forest slowly began to die.
translated: #face4#失控的精灵接二连三地出现，森林也渐渐失去了生命力。

original: #face5#So too did the Spirit Tree begin to wither...
translated: #face5#而就在这时，曾经与森林之歌产生共鸣的精灵之树也开始逐渐失去了力量。

original: #face4#As the Spirit Tree withered, it became shrouded in an evil stench.
translated: #face4#逐渐衰弱的精灵之树最终彻底干枯，并被邪恶的气息所吞噬。

original: #face4#The Vortex of Light appeared shortly afterwards. It must be connected to the deterioration of the Spirit Tree.
translated: #face4#而光之漩涡正是在那之后出现的，这和精灵之树的恶化一定有着某种关联。

original: #face7#I believe the Spirit Tree will restore itself, if only the Song of the Forest were played once more. I tried to revive the Songblooms, but...
translated: #face7#我觉得要是能救活自然生物，精灵之树也许能复苏，所以一直以来都在为此努力，可是……

original: #face4#It didn't work. Wahhh...!
translated: #face4#……并不太顺利，呜呜……

original: #face4#...I-I'm sorry I'm such a crybaby. Wah...
translated: #face4#……很，很抱歉我既是个胆小鬼又是个爱哭鬼，呜呜……

original:
#face1#It can be felt, but not seen. You cannot hear it, but you know it is there.
What is it?
translated: #face1#就算听不见也看不见，还是能感受到的吧~额，某些东西~？

original: #face2#Friendship, love, kindness. It goes by many names.
translated: #face2#友情、爱情、温暖的心意~

original: #face2#Your tale tugs at my heart, like the breeze on one's tendrils. Very well, I will assist you.
translated: #face2#很好，你们的故事很是有趣~这么吸引人的事情，怎么能缺了我风精灵~

original: #face7#Ah, Wind Spirit! (Sniffs) That's Wind Spirit. He's a little unusual.
translated: #face7#啊，风精灵！呜呜，他就是风精灵。嗯，这家伙可真叫人捉摸不透。

original: #face1#My song is mine alone, but you may sing it.
translated: #face1#还有刚刚那首歌是我的自创曲目~就是想让你知道一下~

original: Uhh, right... We're going to revive the Songblooms and restore the Song of the Forest. Will you help us?
translated: 我们要重拾歌谣，复活精灵之树。你愿意帮助我们修复森林的自然环境吗？

original: #face1#We might be able to revive the Spirit Tree and put everything back the way it was! What do you say, Wind Spirit?
translated: #face1#风精灵啊，精灵之树也许能复活，你就帮帮我们吧。

original: #face2#Hahaha, you have my assistance. Just tell me what to do! I wait with baited breath.
translated: #face2#哎哟，尽管开口吧~我已经被俘获了~我是说我的心已经被攻占了~真不知道要如何是好呢~

original: #face1#Ah! An urgent quest. I pulsate with excitement.
translated: #face1#扑。通。扑。通。小。鹿。乱。撞。的这种心情~耶~

original: #face1#You gathered the Deathcries! Let's smash them over on this side of the tree...
translated: #face1#你收集到了致命尖叫啊！那，那现在就用这个在树生长的反方向……
#face6#啊，不行，看来光靠致命尖叫似乎还不够。

original: #face1#You brought the Volatile Shrieks! Quickly, place them on this side of the tree...
translated: #face1#你收集到了爆炸尖叫啊！那，现在就在这棵树的反方向……

original: #face2#Yes, yes, it worked! Now that the tree is out of the way, when the stars begin to shine--
translated: #face2#很好，树的方向已经改变，若是洒下星光，这次可真是……

original: #face0#What are you up to now?!
translated: #face0#居，居然如此胡来！

original: #face0#Whatever you're doing, stop it right now!
translated: #face1#啊，因为刚刚的那声巨响，树精灵们……

original: #face1#Uh oh... those shrieks got the attention of the Tree Spirits...
translated: #face0#够了！

original: #b(You asked about the stranger with the terrible aura.)#k
translated: #b(询问让人心情不爽的异邦人。)#k

original: #face0#Curious, are you? Then I'll tell you. But... it is a painful memory.
translated: #face0#让你很在意吗？嗯，那我就告诉你好了，虽说再次回想起那段记忆确实很痛苦……

original: #face0#It was on a day so quiet, even the winds were still.
translated: #face0#那一天，就连风都是静悄悄的。

original: #face0#We Tree Spirits were tending to the trees, like any other day.
translated: #face0#我们树精灵和往常一样，一直在照顾着每棵树。

original: #face0#But then we felt an aura of immense evil enter the forest. It was calm, but so very powerful...
translated: #face0#可是就在这时，我感觉到了一股不知从何处而来的阴森气息，一股很冷静却强烈的……

original: #face0#Our first instinct was to hide, and we watched in silence.
translated: #face0#我们全都出于本能地藏了起来，然后屏息凝视着，那个景象。

original: #face0#The trees, flowers, grass, and rocks of the forest... Everything in the strangers wake vanished, transformed into something else.
translated: #face0#森林里的树木、花朵、青草、岩石……全都消失不见了，却又再次诞生出了其他什么东西。

original: #face0#...All from coming into contact with that stranger's aura.
translated: #face0#……只是触碰了一下那个异邦人的气息而已。

original: #face0#She was only walking by, but in an instant it was all gone...
translated: #face0#他只是走过而已，一切都只在一瞬间，仅此而已整个森林就……

original: #face0#Others followed behind her... I don't remember how many. I was too consumed by fear.
translated: #face0#我们跟随其后，发现他好像还有一个同伴，可却记不太清了。

original: #face0#That's all we saw. Just thinking about that day brings back so many terrible feelings. Fear, anger, helplessness...
translated: #face0#总之我们看到的就是这些……哎，说了说那天的事情，还真让我有点头疼呢。

original: #face0#Am I imagining things, or is the ground shaking?
translated: #face0#啊，这是怎么回事？大地好像在晃动啊？

original: #b(The ground is definitely shaking... What's going on?)#k
translated: #b(果然在晃动，这到底是怎么回事？)#k

original: #face0#The plump one cries, and we must fly. We should depart, immediately.
translated: #face0#咚咚在哭~得赶紧过去~赶紧赶紧~

original: #face0#The Spirit Tree sings a pained and mournful tune~
translated: #face0#那个声音可真是异常痛苦~又悲伤呢~

original: #face7#No... What's happened to the Spirit Tree?!
translated: #face7#看样子是精灵之树出什么事了吧！！！！！！！！！！

original: #face7#We have to hurry!
translated: #face7#看来得抓紧时间了！

original: #face0#The Spiwit Twee's in twouble!?
translated: #face0#你说精灵之树！？

original: #face0#I have an idea!
translated: #face0#这么说我有个好法子！

original:
Thank you for everything. Because of you, the forest is returning to normal. I want you to have this for all you've done! 

 #i1712004# #bArcane Symbol: Arcana
translated: 谢谢，多亏了你，森林终于恢复了原貌，作为谢礼，我要送你#b#i1712004:# #t1712004:##k！

original: Farewell friend...
translated: 不过等那些变得邪恶的精灵重新恢复原状，可能会稍微花点时间。

original: Please make space in your EQUIP inventory. I have something very special to give to you.
translated: 光之漩涡很快就会消失，你也很快就会离开这里了吧？穿越这片森林，去往更为艰险的地方……

original: What's up?
translated: 出什么事了？

original: #face13#I've heard some suspicious folks arrived in Morass the other day. Sounds like they've been looking for something.
translated:
#face13#有报告说出现了一些可疑的家伙。
好像正在窥探莫拉斯内部。

original: Suspicious folks? Suspicious how?
translated:
#face13#他们好像进入了地下监狱。快跟我来。
我想搜集更多关于这些人的情报。

original: #face13#You'll know what I mean when you see 'em. Last anyone saw, they were headed for the dungeon. Might wanna look for 'em there. I'll see if I can find out what else they've been up to.
translated: 要现在就去吗？

original: Should I head out now?
translated: 可疑的家伙？

original: Anyway... where are we?
translated: 但是，这是什么地方啊？

original: #face3#Actually, I've got a letter from Neinhart for you. It might answer a few questions you were about to ask.
translated: #face3#这是南哈特的信。

original: Esfera?
translated: 好久不见，#h0#。

original: #face0#Okay, well, I guess that letter didn't really answer much. But man, look at this place! The #bOrigin Sea#k has a pretty appropriate name, huh?
translated:
我决定在你到达神秘河海底的巨大空间——
#g「太初之海埃斯佩拉」#k的时候，将这封信交给你。

original: How in the world did Neinheart know what kind of place we'd end up in?
translated: 你应该会有很多疑问，但由于涉及到保密问题，具体的情况我会直接告诉你。

original: #face0#After the World Tree incident, he's been pretty obsessive about knowing what our enemies are up to all the time.
translated: 按照预定，最少会有1名联盟侦察兵与你同行。

original: #face0#I'm as surprised as you that he knew about a place like this! But I'm sure he'll explain everything when you talk to him. Hopefully.
translated: 请你让他接通通信装备。

original: #face0#Our communication uplink is on the ship. Was on the ship. I hope it still exists. And Shubert and Melange too.
translated: #face0#请环顾一下四周。#b太初之海……#k这个名字真的很适合这里。

original: #face3#Did you get it? Great! I'll just... ooh. We can't use this, it's all wet. And it smells... ugh!
translated:
#face3#找到了吗？但是……全都湿透了，好像没法用了。
嗯？呼呼！有种奇怪的味道。

original: Yeah, they might have, ah, drooled on it a bit.
translated: 应该是……唾液。

original: #face1#That's so gross! Man... Well, I don't think it's soaked all the way through. We should be able to use it once it dries out. If only we had something to burn...
translated:
#face1#呃……怎么办呢……
里面好像没被打湿，晒干之后好像还能用。
最好能在周围生堆火……

original: It's a turtle... with trees sprouting on its back.
translated: 原来是乌龟。背上长着树……

original: #face0#Here we go! One nice, toasty flare. It even browned around the edges!
translated: 木柴搜集到了。

original:
#face0#Okay, let's go ahead and launch this thing. I want to find Shubert and Melange before things get any weirder than they already are. I found a good turtle-free spot for us, so are you ready to roll? 
#b(Accept to be moved right away.)
translated: #face0#这么多应该足够了。我来点上火，把信号弹烤干。

original: #face0#Shubert! I'm so happy to see you safe and sound.
translated: #face0#你们没事啊，休麦。

original: #face0#What did you expect? I'm not punching out in a place like this.
translated: #face0#当然了。死在这种地方，岂不让人笑掉大牙。

original: #face0#How's Melange?
translated: #face0#梅尔朗怎么样？

original: #face0#Zzzzz...
translated: #face0#这家伙掉进水里之后还在睡觉。要不是我把他捞了上来，也许早就赴黄泉去了。

original: #face0#The usual. She was tucked in the ship the whole time, sleeping like a baby.
translated: #face0#哈哈……

original: #face0#Man, I wish I could sleep like that...
translated: #face0#现在通信装备可以连上吗？

original: #face0#Right, on to business! Can we get a connection to HQ out here?
translated: #face3#好像有点问题。坠落的时候，装备摔坏了。

original: #face0#That's a tall order right now. Our uplink was damaged in the fall.
translated: #face0#呼呼……嗯？！……出什么事了？

original: #face0#Zzzzz... Zzz... Hmm?! Something's wrong.
translated: #face0#没错，没错……我们坠毁了。

original: #face0#Yes, we fell. Good of you to notice!
translated: #face0#咦，你们看天空。

original: #face0#No, I mean the sky.
translated: #face0#天空？

original: #face0#Sky?
translated: #face0#没有太阳。

original: #face0#I guess this is the place? Did you see anything... memory-ish?
translated:
#face0#来啦？？
#b（请环顾四周，在安全的地方进行。）#k

original: I've been to some weird places, but this one is taking the weird cookie... Anyway, can we use the staff?
translated: 果然有长得很奇怪的东西。好吧，现在只要使用法杖就行了吧？

original: #face0#Yup. The instructions say it's voice activated, so just yell and point it at an empty space.
translated: #face0#是的。说明书上说先呐喊一声，然后向着虚空挥舞。

original: #face0#Hyaa! Waah!
translated: #face0#呀！呀！

original: #face0# Um... It's not working.
translated: #face1#咦？没有反应。
#face1#我再看一下说明书。

original: #face0#I think this thing's ready to go. Let's take it somewhere a little more secure, so nothing can interrupt us.
translated:
#face0#好像行了。
为了以防万一，最好移动到附近没人的地方，然后再使用。

original: #face0#I think we're clear here. Except for the hordes of monsters, of course.
translated: #face0#我在这里。

original: #face0#Whoof, what a smell! this better be enough. Let's return to camp.
translated: #face0#好像足够了。现在可以回大本营了。

original: What happened? Everything looks different all of a sudden.
translated: #face0#我先回去了。这里的事情结束了。

original: #face0#I'm starting to hate this place. Okay, that's a lie, I already hated this place.
translated: #face3#梅尔朗，你不想帮我们吗……

original: #face0#Tana's touched the power of the mirror. It's flowing out through the ocean.
translated:
#face0#如果是蜘蛛，请不用担心。
因为他好像被塔纳的镜世界压制着。

original: Melange? How long have you been here?
translated: #face3#被压制？那是什么意思？

original: #face0#What does that mean? The power of the mirror... comes from Tana?
translated: #face0#只要塔纳还在坚持，就无法在这里使用镜之力量。因为两种力量是相互冲突的。

original: #face0#Creating a sun through the power of the Mirror World makes it hard to break from the outside.
translated: #face3#那不和电波干涉很像吗？要是相同波长的电波碰到一起……

original: #face0#But the spider's ritual was interrupted, so that power is flowing out with the Erda.
translated: #face1#原……原来是……电波干涉。明……明白了。

original: Um... I'm still not sure what you're...
translated:
#face0#据说要是没有镜之力量，他没什么了不起的……不过千万不要大意。
他之所以强大，还有其他原因。

original: #face0#I don't even get how Morass works half of th etime, so this Mirror World stuff just fries my brain.
translated: 又走掉了……

original: #face0#I'll head back. You guys finish up.
translated: #face3#没什么了不起……

original: #face0#Melange, um, I don't suppose you want to help..?
translated: #face3#但是真的很疼耶……

original: #face0#If you're worried about the spider, don't. He's threatened by Tana's Mirror World.
translated: 沃莉？

original: #face0#What do you mean, threatened?
translated: #face0#啊，没什么。哈哈……走吧。

original: I'm done hunting. Err, what are you staring at?
translated: 狩猎结束了。嗯？又有什么东西？

original: #face0#Not staring, listening. You hear that? Sounds like a... fight.
translated: #face3#好像……在战斗。

original: A fight?
translated: 战斗？

original: #face0#There's a fight going on. Let's check it out.
translated:
#face0#战斗正在进行中。要去看看吗？
#b（接受时立即移动。）#k

original: Turns out those spiders weren't poisonous, so, y'know, all clear.
translated: 好像没有毒。

original: #face0#That's a relief. The staff's all charged up, too.
translated: #face0#太好了。已经充好能了。

original: #face0#Should we use the staff now?
translated:
#face0#你想现在使用法杖吗？
#b（接受时立即移动。）#k

original: #face0#I can tell the mirror's power is getting stronger as we move on. We must be getting closer to wehre Tana ended up!
translated:
#face3#流淌出来的镜之力量好像正在变强。
即，我们正在逐渐接近沉到某个地方的塔纳。

original: Is that a bookshelf?
translated: #face0#那根棍子，对着书桌使用。

original: #face0#Your staff. Use it on the bookshelf.
translated: 那是书桌吗？

original: #face0#That wasn't pleasant, but the staff is charged now.
translated: #face3#充能完成了。

original: #face0#Are you ready to use it?
translated:
#face3#现在马上使用吗？
#b（接受时立即移动。）#k

original: #face0#Here.
translated: #face0#这里。

original: #face0#The barrier has been released.
translated: #face0#结界解开了。

original: #face0#To the #bright#k.
translated: #face0##b右边#k。

original: #face0#I think we should follow his lead. To the #bright#k!
translated: #face3#好像跟着走就行。往#b右边#k走！

original: Cough, cough!
translated: 咳咳！咳咳！

original: You... You attacked Will and stopped the ritual. But why? Why did you save me?
translated:
你……攻击威尔，妨碍仪式的人是你。
你到底想干什么？为什么……要救我？

original: #face0#...
translated: #fn黑体##fs20#为了除掉那家伙……需要#r「对抗者」#k。

original: #face0#Go through the Gate of light at the base camp.
translated: 那家伙……是指黑魔法师？啊？！

original: #face0#Over here.
translated: #face0#就是这里。

original: #face0#I'll use the staff then.
translated:
#face0#我来使用法杖。
#b（接受时立即移动。）#k

original: #face0#Good, you're here. I was starting to nod off.
translated: #face0#你来啦。

original: #face0#I'll use the staff.
translated:
#face0#我来使用法杖。
#b（接受时立即移动。）#k

original: The treatment worked well for you, which means you're ready to learn Shadowdealer skills and techniques. Welcome to the branch.
translated: 治疗应该结束了。现在我来教你影子商团的秘传技术。从现在起，你就是支部的正式成员了。

original: You've done well as my apprentice. You're strong, and you have incredible talent for combat. Keep practicing the techniques I've shown you, and you'll get even stronger.
translated: 这段时间以来，你作为我的弟子展现出了优秀的战斗天赋，我认为你已经足够强大了。不过，如果能学会我刚才教给你的技术，你就会变得更加强大。

original: Now that I've taught you, you're completing missions in record time. Well done.
translated: 看来你在用我传授的技术出色地执行任务啊。很好，你在实践方面的表现也非常优秀。

original: At first, I wasn't sure you took this seriously, but it looks like I was wrong.
translated: 虽然你的性格太过自由散漫，有时会让我有些担心。不过……我必须承认，你的天赋确实出众。

original: You seem pretty comfortable with that skill, so let's move on to the second battle skill.
translated: 你已经掌握了我传授的技术，我们进入下一阶段吧。接下来，我来教你第二项战斗技术。

original: These skills are a lot more challenging, but I'm sure you can handle 'em.
translated: 这一技术比你之前学习过的都要难，不过我相信你一定可以完美掌握它的。

original: I think you've improved enough to handle more dangerous missions now. Open your skill window (K) and take a look.
translated: 过不了多久，你就会接到越来越危险的任务了。我已经把足以应付任务的技术都教给你了。打开技能栏(K)看看吧。

original: Keep practicing and getting experience to keep your skills in top shape.
translated: 希望你以后也能够继续脚踏实地，取得更大的进步。只要你不断磨练自己，终有一天所谓强大的技术都会变成无用之物的。

original: Now that I've taught you further, even difficult missions are cleared without issue.
translated: 看来你在用我传授的技术出色地执行任务呢？很好，你在实践方面也表现出了卓越的水平。

original: You seem pretty comfortable with your current skill set, so let's move on to the third battle skill. This will be the last time I will be teaching you.
translated: ……虽然你从不在意别人的评价……但就当我这句话是在夸你进步了吧。

original: These skills even more challenging, but I'm sure you can handle 'em.
translated: 你已经掌握了我传授的技术，我们进入下一阶段吧。接下来，我来教你第三项战斗技术。

original: Keep practicing and getting experience to keep your skills in top shape.
translated: 这一技术比你之前学习过的都要难，不过我相信你一定可以完美掌握它的。

original: Well, those skills the Chief taught me are perfect now.
translated: 我已经能够熟练运用支部长传授的技术了。支部长不是说过，这些技术早晚需要更新换代吗？

original: Guess it's time to start getting creative and come up with some new skills.
translated: 好，我会以在战斗中获得的经验为基础，创造出一套我自己的专属技术。

original: This is good... and this would help here... it's coming together nicely.
translated: 这种形态似乎不错……好，那东西也放进来试试……我卡德娜大人前无古人，后无来者的技术马上就要成形了……

original: Yes! The first skill unique to me is done! Chief is gonna be blown away.
translated: 哈，终于完成了。百分百适合我的专属技术！支部长看到我的新技术一定会大吃一惊吧？

original: Let's test this bad boy out. Time to open the skill window (K) and take a look.
translated: 嘻嘻，不说这个了，我想赶快试验一下我的新技术。快打开技能栏(K)看看吧。

original: #h0#, I see you completed all your missions for the week. Please accept a level up on #i1712006:# #t1712006:# as a reward.
translated: 感谢你的努力工作。给，这是你的报酬，

original: I've leveled up your symbol. Please come back next week!
Come to me when you've finished your missions. Remember, you have to turn them in before the end of the week. Well then, see you later.
translated: 你好！今天的命令是这些。总共有

original:
Arfe these tasks not to your liking? Well, I have other tasks that need doing... 

#b(You can swap out the missions of your choice, but it is possible to receive the same mission as the one being exchanged.)#k
translated: 件任务。

#b(You gave Ollie the information you obtained from observing the monsters up close.)#k
