original: #face0##b(You remember boasting confidently that you'd embark on an amazing adventure; that you'd always follow the path less taken. Right now, though, you feel more lost than you can ever remember feeling. How could you stand tall and look your teacher in the eye in the state you're in?)#k
translated:
#face0##b(说什么要去寻找其他人未曾经历过的冒险,却完全迷失了方向。
这个样子……实在是没脸去见师父。)#k

original: #face2#Heeeey, what'cha thinkin' about?
translated: #face2#勇士,你在干嘛？

original: #face0#Bwah--!
translated:
#face0#我刚才一个人在玩,但是看到你的表情非常悲伤。
觉得不能袖手旁观,所以……

original: #face0#I was playing by myself, but then I saw your face. You looked so sad that I had to come over and see if you're okay...
translated: #face0#要是打扰了你休息,我在这里向你道歉。但是……

original: #face0#Sorry for interrupting you when you were resting. It's just...
translated:
#face1#不久前我度过了一段郁郁寡欢的时光。
心情非常郁闷、沉重的时候,我的表情跟刚才的你一模一样。

original: #face1#Well... I kinda know how you must feel. I had a depressing day not too long ago, and your face just now made me think of how I felt then. It was like all this weight was pressing down on me.
translated:
#face1#啊,我不是说你跟我一样！
我是个笨蛋、胆小鬼,但你很强……

original: #face1#B-but I'm not trying to say that you and I are the same. You're so brave and smart, but I'm just a scaredy cat.
translated:
#face0#所,所以……我的意思是……
这种时候如果能看到美丽的花,也许能让心情好一点,嘿嘿。

original: #face0#S-so what I'm trying to say is, everyone has times when they feel down. When I feel blue, I like looking at pretty little flowers. I think to myself, if they can make it through times like these, then so can I. Heehee.
translated:
#face2#那会让人在不知不觉间心情变得好起来。
嘻嘻……我觉得你好像非常需要,所以给你采了一朵。来,给你。

original: #face2#I don't know why that cheers me up, but it usually does the trick. Heehee... I figured maybe you could use a little pick-me-up too, so I brought one for you.
translated: #face0#哇,哇哇,完成了！

original: #face0#...
translated: #face0#古代罗盘完成了！

original: #face0#Well, that took way too much effort.
translated:
#face2#啊,高尔根好像启动了罗盘！
快去看看吧。快点！快点！去启动罗盘吧～！

original: #face0#Up and at 'em, you two. I've finally fixed the ancient compass!
translated:
#face0#再过一会儿,就是一天中阳光最强的时间。
做好心理准备吧,嗯哼。

original: #face0#Eeeey, look who's back. I figured it'd be too difficult to get those compass parts, so-- Wait, what? You really managed to get them all?! I'm speechless!
translated:
#face0#喂,回来啦。找齐所有罗盘碎片还是太难了吧……
什么？全部找到啦！真厉害……

original: #face0#Yes, I think I'd appreciate some speechlessness as you get to work on fixing that compass without delay.
translated: #face0#好了,快去启动罗盘吧。

original: #face0#Yeah, yeah, don't nag me. Even when I fix it, the compass needs to be exposed to sunlight to work, so it's not like we'll get immediate results.
translated:
#face0#呼呼……知道了。别催我。
反正这个罗盘必须在阳光的充分照射下才能启动。

original: #face0#We've got plenty of time until noon rolls around, so I just need to have it fixed up by then. Gah, more work.
translated:
#face0#现在离正午还早得很呢……
在这之前修好不就行了,呼噜。

original: #face0#Anyway, just give me those pieces and I'll get this thing back in working order. As for you two, get some rest. I'll call you when I'm done.
translated:
#face0#我来把罗盘碎片拼好,你们先休息一下。
到时候我叫你们。

original:
#face0#Gotta put that compass back to-geeee-ther!
'Cause we can't miss that sunny weaaaa-ther!
translated:
#face0#哦～把四分五裂的罗盘拼好 ?
哦哦～在阳光洒满山坡之前 ?

original:
#face0#I think you might be right. I don't like all this noise and shaking one bit, but we need to get to the bottom of this, so in we go.

 #r *You will be automatically moved to the quest map.#k
translated: #fn黑体##fs18#帕勒坦遗迹

original: #face0#Ehehe... Having said that, I'd be lying if I said I hadn't thought about bailing too. I've never dared to get so close to the ruins before.
translated:
#face0#呃……真的要走了,感觉也有点迈不动步。
因为我也一次都没去过那里。

original: #face0#Still... I can't just give up after coming this far. I decided I was gonna do something about this problem, and I mean to see it through.
translated:
#face0#但是不能就此放弃。
既然决定了要解决问题,就必须坚持到底。

original: #face6#You do know that if you end up slowing me down, I'm just gonna to leave you behind, right?
translated: #face6#要是敢碍我的事,我就一个人去好了。

original: #face0#And I'm going to do my best to make sure that never happens, because I need to find out what's causing that terrible noise and save our village!
translated:
#face0#呃啊,我会努力的,绝对不会拖你的后腿！
我一定要查明怪声的原因,拯救村子。快出发吧。

original: #face0#Phew. The path is finally clear. We should be able to get to wherever that sound is coming from now, so just follow me.
translated:
#face0#路打通了,勇士。
我这就把你带到传来声音的地方去。好了,请跟我来。

original: #face1#Uh-oh. A bunch of stone sentries are blocking the way. I don't think they've-- Oh wait, no, they've definitely noticed us. Waaah! Why are these things still operational?!
translated:
#face1#啊,有好多石头做成的怪物……
路被挡住了。它,它们好像想攻击我们,呃啊！

original: #face1#As things stand, we can't continue on without doing something about those sentries. Hmm... I think if you clear out around #b50#k #r#o2300207##k, we should be able to make it through.
translated:
#face1#勇士,好像没办法继续往前走了。
如果能消灭掉#b50个#k#r#o2300207##k,应该就能把路打通……

original: #face0#Just wait here. I should be able to make short work of those boisterous blocks.
translated: #face0#在一边等着,小孩。我来搞定那些东西。

original: #face0#Phew. The path is finally clear. We should be able to get to wherever that sound is coming from now, so just follow me.
translated:
#face0#路打通了,勇士。
我这就把你带到传来声音的地方去。好了,请跟我来。

original: #face0#Oh, you're back already. What are those things you're holding? Aren't those from the plants that were growing on top of the Ruins Sentinels?
translated:
#face0#啊,这么快就回来啦。你手里拿着的那个东西……
是遗迹攻击兵身上的东西吗？

original: #face0#They have a soft glow normally, but they flare up if you give them a good bop, like this.
translated: #face0#碰到之后,就会这样发光。

original: #face0#Huh. You know, that just might work, even underwater. But we need to be sure, so how about dropping one in the water as a test?
translated:
#face0#有了这个,应该就能潜入水里了。
不过为了以防万一,最好还是丢一个进去试试……

original: #face3##b(You picked up a glowpod and dropped it into the pool. The soft light illuminated the water for a good while before finally dimming and growing dark.)#k
translated:
#face3##b(拿起一个发光的闪光石,丢进了水坑。
光在水里亮了好久,然后化作一阵烟消失了。)#k

original: #face0#(These don't last long enough that I can reach the bottom with just one. I'll have to take all I've gathered and hope for the best.)
translated:
#face0##b(看来坚持不了多久。用一个到不了底下。
把搜集到的全都带上吧。)#k

original: #face0#(Those Ruins Sentinels we passed on the way here had some sort of luminous plant growing on their heads. If I got enough of those bulbs, I might be able...)
translated:
#face0##b(刚才路上遇到的遗迹攻击兵。
头上装着发光的东西。用那个东西……)#k

original: #face3#(Okay. We'll have to double back a bit to #m100051042#. I'll grab 10 of those #i4036531# #t4036531# from the #o2300208# monsters and we'll see how much light they give off when bunched together.)
#face0#There's something I want to check out. Wait for me here.
translated: #face0#我有点事情需要确认一下。你在这里等一下。

original: #face0#Of course. It looks like you've already come up with a solution, just like I knew you would. I'll be waiting, then.
translated:
#face0#啊,果然不愧是勇士……这么快就想到了办法。
那我在这里等你。

original:
#face0#Let's activate the first glowpod and swim down. Aaaah... Deep breaths! It'll be fine! I'm with a professional Explorer! ...Still, it never hurts to be careful!

 #r *You'll be automatically moved to the quest map.#k
translated:
#face0#那就打开闪光石,到下面去看看吧。
啊……好紧张……小心小心……

 #r ※ 自动移动到任务地图。#k

original:
#face0#Ahh... I can feel it. A heart drawn by confusion, driven by quiet desperation. The answers you seek are here.

#b#L0# Ask about the relic and the curse sigil.#l
translated:
#face0#啊……感受到了,你心中的那个谜团。
你要找的答案就在这里。

#b#L0# 遗物和诅咒之印 #l

original: #face0#Long ago, the ancient Karuppa that resided in this land fashioned from the wood of a holy tree a sacred icon to venerate in worship.
translated:
#face0#很久以前便生活在这里的古代的卡鲁帕们,
将神圣的树砍下来,做成神物以供崇拜。

original: #face3#Hey, I recognize that design...
translated: #face3#那是……

original: #face0#As you suspect, that sacred totem is the relic now in your possession. Once, it served as a symbol of enlightened benevolence that healed the sick and gave guidance to those who has lost their way.
translated:
#face0#那种神物就是遗物。
可以治好伤者,为迷路的人指明道路。

original: #face0#Time passed, and as order was born into this world, the power of the relic gradually began to wane.
translated:
#face0#但是,随着时间的推移……
当世界的秩序开始形成,遗物的力量就自然而然地变弱了。

original: #face0#Those who knew of the relic's existence lived their lives and passed on, and as fewer and fewer remembered the ancient ways, the relic came to be regarded as a legend.
translated: #face0#知道遗物存在的人逐渐消失,一切都变成了传说。

original: #face0#Perhaps it would have been better that way; to eventually be forgotten entirely...
translated: #face0#要是能那样被人遗忘就好了……

original: #face0#However, hundreds of years ago, a man clad in black robes came to this place and worked his fell spellcraft upon the relic.
translated:
#face0#几百年前的某一天,一个穿着黑袍的怪人出现了。
他冲着遗物施展了邪恶的魔法。

original: #face0#When his hex had been woven, he returned the relic to its resting place and swiftly departed. From that day forward, the relic began to be corrupted by negative energies.
translated:
#face0#仪式结束之后,他把遗物放回了原处,然后忽然消失了。
那天之后,遗物就逐渐开始被邪恶的气息所侵蚀……

original: #face3#A mysterious man in black robes?
translated: #face3#穿着黑袍的怪人？

original: #face0#The relic in your possession retains both its original nature and its corrupted state. You have surely felt the stirrings of both within you.
translated:
#face0#现在你手上的那个遗物中,同时存在着古代之力和堕落之力。
你也应该隐约地感觉到了。

original: #face0#The corrupted power has already become one with the relic, and cannot simply be made to disappear. It can, however, be suppressed.
translated:
#face0#堕落之力与遗物融为一体,现在已经无法让它消失了。
……但是可以抑制住它。

original: #face0#The only way to do so, however, is for you to become the true inheritor of the relic. Only then will its corruption be quelled.
translated:
#face0#成为遗物真正的主人。
那是控制住堕落之力的唯一方法。

original: #face0#It is said that a superior tool chooses a worthy owner. The relic, though no mere tool, will respond to your mastery and allow you to draw out its hidden powers.
translated:
#face0#灵物可以认出自己的主人。
因此遗物会对你的意志做出反应,解放出隐藏的力量。

original: #face0#Wander, explore, and grow in strength and knowledge. When the time is right, the relic shall guide you.
translated:
#face0#通过冒险,让自己变得更强吧。
到时机成熟的时候,遗物将会引导你……

original: #face0#I shall pray that you grow in wisdom, to see the path, and in strength, to walk it without fear.
translated: #face0#希望你能找到属于自己的路……

original: #face0#The path...
translated: #face0#找到属于自己的路……

original: #face0#Well... I guess this is it, then. Now that you found the answer you were looking for, I suppose you'll be on your way, right? I know, I know. I promised I wouldn't be clingy.
translated:
#face0#既然找到了答案,就快点离开这里吧,勇士？
啊,对了……按照约定,现在我不会再跟着你了。

original: #face0#But wherever your travels take you, I hope you'll be safe. I may not be the bravest, but thanks for letting me come on this adventure with you.
translated:
#face0#不管你要去哪里,都希望你能多保重。
虽然我很笨,又很胆小……还是谢谢你能带我一起来。

original: #face0#Oh! If you ever feel like coming back to visit our little Karuppa village sometime, you can use this skill to return there whenever you like.
translated:
#face0#啊,如果你想再来我们卡鲁帕村……
你想接受吗？这是可以随时来到这里的技能。

original: #face0#It'd be great to see you again someday. If you ever feel like dropping by, you'll always have a friend in me.
translated: 获得了<返回帕勒坦>技能。

original: #face2#I'm going back to the village to tell all the Karuppa about everything I heard and saw in the ruins. Will they believe me? Who knows? ...Though I guess Gorgonz might. He's weird like that.
translated: 获得了<返回帕勒坦>技能。

original: #face0#I've still got a long way to go before I can start feeling confident. What do you think? Do you think I'll be able to be brave like you someday?
translated:
#face0#嘿嘿,希望什么时候能再见面。
我会一直在这里等待着你的到来。

original: #face0#Ack... Just listen to me, rambling on. I shouldn't keep you any longer. Goodbye, for now!
translated:
#face2#我会把在废墟听到的事情告诉卡鲁帕们。
虽然不知道大家会不会相信。啊,高尔根说不定会相信的,嘿嘿。

original: #face0#I guess she said everything she wanted to say. I'll see you 'round, kid. And thanks for everything.
translated:
#face0#呼……虽然没什么自信,但我会鼓起勇气的。
将来的某一天,我也能成为像你一样勇敢的人吗？

original: #face0#Anyway...
translated:
#face0#呃啊,我又在胡说八道什么呢……
现在你可以走了。我也该走了。再见！

original: #face1#(It sounds like there's no way to completely rid myself of this curse. That leaves me just one option: I'm gonna have to rise to the occasion and prove myself worthy of the relic's full power.)
translated: #face0#只顾自己说完就走掉了。是啊,你也要保重。

original: #face0#('Wander, explore, and grow in strength and knowledge,' huh? I guess now that I know I can at least suppress the curse's effects, there's nothing stopping me from chasing after the next adventure.)
translated: #face0#事情总算暂时告一段落了……。

original: #face6#(Still, that story about a guy in a black robe using weird magic on the relic worries me. And the voice was awfully tight-lipped after it told me about the nature of the relic's power.)
translated:
#face1##b(诅咒之力没办法消除,那就只能勇敢面对了。
我一定要将遗物的力量完全掌握在手中。)#k

original: #face0#(Maybe if I can master the relic's powers, I can get the voice to talk to me again. But until then, it looks like I'm on my own as far as figuring out how it works.)
translated:
#face0##b(通过冒险让自己变得更强,是吧？
既然知道了克服诅咒的方法,那就继续去冒险吧。)#k

original: #fs10#Hello? Excuse me...
Who just called me?
translated: 嗯？好像有人在叫我……

original: You can hear me? Good!
translated: 嗯……能听到我的声音吗……

original: I'm Anne! I'm here in Ellinia with my mom, Dr. Betty, while she conducts research.
translated: 我是在魔法密林进行研究的巴缇博士的女儿桉。

original: But I need some help. Would you hear me out?
translated: 我有件事想请你帮忙…你能答应我吗？

original:
If you're willing to help, please visit me.
#r(If you accept, you'll automatically travel to Anne in Ellinia.)#k

#b(The #rSecret Forest of Elodin#b is a special theme dungeon. It has a max level of #rLv. 59#b, and quest EXP and monsters near your level will be provided accordingly.)
translated:
那么…请过来找我……拜托了……
#r（接受时，移动到魔法密林的桉的前面。）

original: I'm waiting for you here in Ellinia.
translated: 我在魔法密林等你。

original: The reason I called you is, well...
translated: 唉……好吧……#h #，那我来告诉你……为什么要叫你过来……

original: Everything started out fine. It was a normal day.
translated: 那一天似乎和平常没什么不同……

original: I was playing with my paper airplane...
translated: 那一天，我还跟往常一样折纸飞机玩……

original: Ah, I see. Anxious to explore someplace new, huh?
translated: 啊……其他地方的森林都很开阔。我从没去过南边，还挺想去看看的。

original: Well, it doesn't get much sun, so that's why we don't visit.
translated: 那个嘛……南边没什么阳光，我们一般也不会过去。

original: I'm sure there are fairies #esomewhere#n that like that kind of place, but I'm not one of them.
translated: 当然也有妖精喜欢那种地方……但我更喜欢这里。

original: Besides, I've heard rumors of weird noises coming from there lately. I mean, I #edoubt#n anything bad would happen, but you know...
translated: 虽然最近有人说在那边听到了奇怪的声音，但那个地方应该不会有什么问题的。

original: Why bother with a place like that when you don't need to?
translated: 应该……不会出什么事……

original: Now stop worrying about that dark, melancholy forest and start enjoying Ellinia. It's so much better here.
translated: 请不要在那种地方制造问题。也许……会变得不可收拾……

original: I don't even know where I'm going, and these brambles aren't helping matters. And what are these dopey looking owls even doing here?
translated:
连路都找不到了！
这些东西又是什么！荆棘树和……鸟？！

original: Ow! Which one of you pecked me? I'm gonna punt you so hard you'll end up in the next zone!
translated: 这都是从哪儿冒出来的？呃呃……怎么突然跑出来把路给挡住了！

original: That's it! I've gotta clear this all out!
translated: 消灭拦住前路的荆棘树和泣者，赶快离开吧！

original: How long have I been here?
translated:
呼……呼……
已经过了多久了 ？

original: I feel like I've been going in circles for ages.
translated: 怎么会一直在一个地方徘徊不前呢……

original: And more of these things keep popping up like, well, weeds!
translated: 而且怪物的数量不减反增。

original: What if I'm stuck here forever?
translated: 不赶快杀出一条路摆脱它们 ，恐怕要永远出不去了。

original: She must have gone in that house.
translated: 难……难道是进了那座房子……？

original: Hello?
translated: 你好……

original: Is anyone here?
translated: 有人吗……？

original: Maybe I've been here too long. I must have imagined it.
translated: 是……是鬼魂吗……？

original: Let's face it, I'm lost. I'd rather just fess up and ask for directions than hang out here and get into fights with owls.
translated: 呃……但是如果回到刚才那片森林……就又会迷路……被刺戳……被鸟啄……

original: What now?
translated: 怎么办呢……

original: Ugh...
translated: 走……走开，你这个……

original: Ah, finally back among the living?
translated: 你就不能老实躺着吗？

original: The living? Wh--
translated: 翅膀……？妖精……？

original: Ah! Witch! Ghost! Get away from me!
translated: 呼……现在能听我说了吗？

original: Calm down!
translated: 我叫鲁安。就住在魔法密林南部的森林里。

original: Wait. Wings? You're a fairy?
translated: 终于醒过来了吗？

original: W-what is that?
translated: 发生了什么事？快进屋里去看看吧！

original: I think I'd rather take my chances in there than stay out here...
translated: 嗯……怎么回事……？

original: Squawk!
translated: ……我还以为你很胆小，没什么用呢。没想到力气还挺大的嘛。

original: Oh! I thought you were a wimp, not a bully.
translated: 干嘛打我！干嘛打我！

original: Why did you hit me?!
translated: 再不闭嘴，我就让你再也叫不出来。

original: Stop making that terrible racket!
translated: 不过那样对付那个可怜的小家伙，也太野蛮了！怎么能那样对待它呢？

original: How dare you hit my bird?! You! A complete stranger! In #emy#n house! How uncivilized!
translated: 是吧？那我就再……

original: Maybe I should go...
translated: 哎呀，你想再被打一顿吗？我觉得它再受一次冲击，应该就能清醒过来了。你觉得怎么样？

original: And you! I was trying to sleep! I ought to put you in a cage and cover you with a sheet like some ordinary parakeet!
translated: 呜呜……

original: *sniffle*
translated: 你之前都在干嘛啊……为什么要等到现在……

original: Why haven't you?
translated: 当然要等你来做了。我是森林的朋友，怎么忍心伤害小鸟呢？

original: As annoying as it can be sometimes, I'm a friend of the forest. I don't want to treat my friends poorly.
translated: 嘎啊！

original: You fainted. Clearly you scare easily.
translated: 我并不想吓你，但你竟然晕了过去。胆子怎么这么小？

original: Don't blame me! You're the one gliding around in a dark forest in a black cloak like a creeper!
translated: 什么……你在那种黑黢黢的地方，戴着像鬼魂一样的黑布……

original: A creeper? I happen to be wearing this cloak for a reason.
translated: 鬼魂一样的黑布？你知道这有多贵重吗？

original: It's special. It blocks out sound. I was #etrying#n to sleep when a stranger barged into my home and started shrieking louder than that obnoxious bird.
translated: 因……因为那些鸟，我连觉都睡不好……后来好不容易才弄到了这个可以隔音的面纱……你却说是鬼魂一样的黑布？

original: Oh, uh...
Sooo... A bird's responsible for that racket, huh?
translated: 啊！那些惨叫声难道是鸟叫？

original: That's what I said.
translated: 不对！我们只是在唱鲁安教给我们的歌！

original: It's not a racket. It's the song Ruenna taught me!
translated: 鲁安，你不是说如果想跟树说话，可以这样唱歌吗！

original: Didn't you say this is how you talk to the trees, Ruenna?
translated: 那也叫歌吗！天哪，勇士部落的野猪都发不出那种可怕的声音！

original: I said I #esing#n to the trees, not screech! Honestly, you put bats to shame.
translated: 求你别唱了！你的惨叫声让树木都变得抑郁了！

original: Um...
translated: ……听我说……

original: I can practically see those trees crying every time you start up!
translated: 我为什么要停下来！不是鲁安教我们的吗！你说树木会对此做出应答！

original: Am I interrupting something?
translated: 刚才我不是说了吗？

original: And... Why is it that you live in total darkness?
translated: 但是你为什么要把灯全部关掉，让这里变得这么黑呢？本来森林深处就已经够黑的了。

original: Oh, well, you see...
translated: 啊……那个嘛……

original: One day in the forest, I discovered a lonely bird crying his eyes out...
translated: 有一天，我发现那家伙一个人在哭

original: His parents were nowhere to be seen, and I couldn't bear to leave him there. So I brought him home with me.
translated: 我就把它带到了家里，悉心地照顾它。但是没能找到它的父母。

original: Eventually, I taught him how I speak with the trees. I didn't see the harm in it, and it made him so happy...
translated: 后来有一天，它说想像我一样跟树木说话，也是我告诉它只要唱歌，就能和树木对话。

original: But I quickly regretted it.
translated: ……然后，不在家里开灯的理由……

original: As for living in the dark, well...
translated: 鲁安说在森林中的微光的映照下，可以让歌声变得更加美妙！

original: Ruenna said she sings better in the forest's natural light! I want to be just like her!
translated: ……是的，我错了。

original: Yes. But I never thought he'd take it so literally.
translated: 我不该那么干的……

original: Did you get everything?
translated: 都搜集到了吗？

original: This should be enough for me to turn the lights back on.
translated: 这么多，应该就能把房子全部照亮了。

original: She's the one who said the forest's light was better.
translated: 切……自己说要想唱好歌，就必须得到森林之光的映照……

original: I can hear you.
translated: 我听到了。

original: It's been a while since Elodin's had visitors. What brings you here?
translated:
好久没有异邦人到艾洛丁来了。
异邦人，你到这里来干什么？

original: I have a request from Ruenna.
translated: 是妖精鲁安让我来的。

original: Ah, Ruenna. Such a nice fairy. And she truly loves Elodin.
translated: 魯安…可爱的小姑娘。和其他妖精不同，她真的很喜欢艾洛丁。

original: I miss her visits.
translated: 以前她有时会来这里找我，但是最近却完全没了消息……

original: Well, she needs your help.
translated: 因为出了点事情……

original:
Ah, yes! A little bird told me-- cough
A little bird told me she's gotten herself into some trouble lately.
translated: 哈哈……我也有所耳闻。听说她最近遇到了一点麻烦。虽然不知道到底是怎么回事，但大家好像都对鲁安有点不满。

original: Cough...
translated: 啊……抱歉。最近事情太多，我嗓子有些不舒服。

original: I'm sorry. Please excuse me. My throat's been a bit sore ever since... Nevermind.
translated: 有什么我能帮忙的吗……？

original: Can I help you with something?
Actually, you can! Would you bring me #i4036505# #r#t4036505##k?
translated:
附近的#b#o3501108##k和#b#o3501109##k身上就有。
请灌满我给你的小水瓶就行了。

original: The #b#o3501108#s#k and #b#o3501109#s#k nearby have some. I'd appreciate it if you could fill this small bottle and come back.
translated: 咳咳咳……

original: It took you a whi-- OH!
translated: 终于来了吗？啊！

original: I wonder what could have made a bird of Elodin cry...
translated: 艾洛丁的鸟在哭……？嗯……一定是发生了什么事……

original: Oh? She said she'd teach him how to sing? Wonderful!
translated: 总之，你说过会教它唱歌的！

original: So now you have to take the baby bird there in person?
translated: 你必须把小鸟一起带走，对吧？

original: Then the two of you could go there together!
translated: 那你们一起去就行了！

original: Come back safely!
translated: 再见！

original: I'm so excited! Maybe she can teach me how to sing properly, so Ruenna will like listening to me!
translated: 嘿嘿，真让人期待！你会比鲁安教得更好吗？那样我的歌声定能得到人们的认可！

original: Don't get ahead of yourself now...
translated: 哼，小心我……

original: Why don't we get going? It's a long trip.
translated: 哈哈……那就快出发吧。还有很长的路要走。

original: My baby!
translated: 孩子！

original: Mama! I missed you so much!
translated: 呃啊啊啊！我好想你！

original: Where have you been?! I've been worried sick!
translated: 这段时间你跑到哪里去了？我不知有多担心……

original: Ruenna has been taking care of me!
translated: 鲁安一直在照顾我！

original: Ruenna? You mean you're the one she needed help with?
translated: 鲁安……？那鲁安说要交给我的小鸟！

original: #h0#! I can't thank you and Ruenna enough for bringing my baby safely home.
translated: 看来我得向魯安道谢。啊，#h #，你把我的孩子送回来，我也得向你表示感谢。

original: I looked everywhere! I worried I'd lost him forever.
translated: 我在森林里找了好久，都没找到我的孩子……

original: And the forest has been so strange lately, what with all those weird noises... I didn't know what to do!
translated: 最近因为奇怪的声音，整片森林都变得很敏感，我还担心你会受伤呢……
魯安也很担心。她说最近没听到歌声，不知道发生了什么事。

original: Ruenna was worried too. When you stopped singing, she thought something bad happened.
translated: 她说不能把小鸟一个人留在家里，但是最近森林又变得很敏感，因此无法外出，所以才会找我帮忙。

original: She wanted to check on you, but she couldn't bring the baby, so here we are.
translated:
原来是这样。看来有时间我得去看望一下鲁安。
不过在这之前……

original: I've got to thank her! But before I do...
translated: 要现在开始学习唱歌吗？

original: Why don't we start the singing lessons?
translated: #h #，我需要你的帮助。相信你一定可以帮我。

original: But we need your help to do it, #h0#.
Before you can sing, you have to prep your voice.
translated: 要想唱好歌，首先要充分放松声带。

original: Drinking #i4036505# #t4036505# from the #o3501108#s and #o3501109#s nearby will give you nice, clear notes.
translated: 喝下这附近的#b#o3501108##k和#b#o3501109##k拥有的#i4036505# #r#t4036505##k，不仅能解渴，对于放松声带也非常有效。

original: Here's another Small Bottle. Please fill it with Pure Water and come back.
translated: 我会像刚才一样给你一个小水瓶，请你用它灌满水交给我吧。

original: (It's like this stuff is liquid talent or something.)
translated: 果然……

original: Ah! Wait! Stop!
translated: 等……等等！别再唱了！

original: What? What's wrong? I'm singing better than ever!
translated: 嗯？大家怎么了？我的声音比以前更大了，歌也好像唱得更好了啊？

original: I just realized the source of all the screeching.
translated: 难道响彻森林的那个怪声……？

original: Yeah, and you created that little audio trainwreck.
translated: 嗯？你说什么？

original: Huh? I couldn't hear you.
translated: 我说你唱得非常好。

original: We were just discussing your admirable volume, dear.
translated: 嗯……虽然唱得很好，但我的嗓子好像还没有完全放松。
（什么……就算是母亲，也不能睁眼说瞎话吧……）

original: You certainly have that in spades, but we should work on your control a bit.
translated: ……请小声点……）

original: Only a mother could love that screech.
translated: 你们俩在说什么呢？我也想听听！

original: Give him a chance.
translated: 啊……没什么……

original: What are you two talking about?
translated: 你好像猜对了……

original: Can you bring me more Pure Water and Lotus?
translated: 你能再帮我带来干净的泉水和莲花吗？

original: Please fill this Small Bottle with #r21 droplets of Pure Water#k and find #r10 Lotus Blossoms#k. That should be just enough to do the trick.
translated:
请帮我带回#r21滴#k干净的泉水……灌满这个小水瓶就行了。
莲花要多采一些，要#r10朵#k才够……

original: This bottle will automatically fill every time you get Pure Water, so you won't have to pick it up yourself anymore.
translated: 这次我给你的水瓶在你#r获得干净的泉水时，会自动灌水#k。这样你就不用亲自去灌了。

original: That would have been helpful earlier...
translated: ……那你干嘛不一开始就给我这种水瓶啊？

要有诚意！诚意才是最重要的！
唔……你要是愿意亲手灌水也不是……

original: Well, earlier I didn't realize you were such a whiner. Maybe I won't give you this bottle after all.
translated: ……不不，有这个水瓶就方便多了。

original: No! Forget I said that! I love running errands for you!
translated:
啊！又要喝刚才的水，吃刚才的花吗？
哇……太棒了！

original: Ooh! More water and flowers! I can't wait!
translated: 哈哈……

original: All I need is refreshing water and sweet flowers!
translated: 嗯，我觉得清凉的水更好喝，甜甜的花更好吃。

original: How are things coming along?
translated: 进展顺利吗？

original: Ruenna!!
translated: 你好，鲁安。谢谢你把我的孩子照顾得这么好。

original: Welcome, Ruenna! I'm so grateful to you for taking care of my baby.
translated: 嗯？那只……鸟是……你的孩子……?不会吧……

original: That was your baby bird?!
translated: 你好，鲁安。谢谢你把我的孩子照顾得这么好。

original: Yes! I was so worried about him! But you made sure he came home safe and sound.
translated:
我还担心他会不会受伤，有没有吃饱肚子，没想到你一直在照顾他。
他能长得像现在这样健壮，离不开你的帮助。

original: She made me treats and everything!
translated: 嗯嗯！鲁安很照顾我，给了我很多好吃的！

original: I'm just surprised. Can't say I see much of a family resemblance, to be honest.
translated: 哎呀……真是没想到……你们俩的关系……

original: I suppose you're right about that, at least for now. But he'll be quite the flashy fowl once he's grown.
translated: 看上去长得很不一样吧？但是这孩子只要努力吃饭，快快长大，就也会拥有这样的羽毛。

original: I want to grow up right now!
translated: 嘿嘿，我想快点长大。

original: You'll be grown soon enough. Ruenna, if it wasn't for you...
translated: 再次向你表示感谢，鲁安。要不是你……

original: It was nothing. I was just taking care of the forest.
translated: 不，身为森林的一员，这是我应该做的。

original: Oh! You're here just in time to hear me sing!
translated: 对了对了！我又想唱歌了。你来听听看好不好听！

original: Let's hear it then!
translated: 好的，让我听听到底有多好听。

original: Uhh...
I thought you got lessons...
translated: 完全……没有……改善……

original: So much for a good night's sleep.
translated: 我还以为终于可以睡个好觉了呢……

original: At least his tempo is more consistent now.
translated: 不过现在好歹能跟上一点节奏了，不是吗？
鲁安！！！

original: Whoa, you've brought it! Just hold on a minute! I'll make you the special potion.
translated: 我要的#b#t4032531##k拿来了吗？

original: Alrighty! Are you ready? If you're are, I will go ahead and sprinkle this potion on you. You'll be able to fly then!
translated: 好的，准备好了吗？准备好了的话，我就马上帮你配制秘药，然后洒在你的身上。那样你就能飞了。

original: You have obtained the Soaring skill!
translated: 啊……没拿到#b#t4032531##k吗？你去跟神木村的#b村长塔塔曼#k说一声，他应该会给你的。

original: Hey, Shubert.
translated: 休麦？

original: #face0#Oh hey, #h0#. Welcome.
translated: #face0#啊，#ho#。你好。

original: What's going on?
translated: 你在这里干什么？

original:
#face0#... Nothing.
I just have to take care of something before I head back to Edelstein.
translated:
#face0#……没什么。
在回埃德尔斯坦之前，有事情要做。

original: Back to Edelstein?
translated: 返回？回埃德尔斯坦吗？

original: #face0#Yep, the mission's pretty much over now. Time for me to pack it up.
translated: #face0#我的任务到此为止。现在我要回家了。

original: #face0#But, uh... well, since you're here, I might as well show you around.
translated:
#face0#可是……
既然你也来了，要不帮忙带带路。

original: #face0#Come on, this way.
translated: #face0#来，这边。

original: #face2#Ah-ha, can you hear me, #h0#?
translated: #face2#啊啊，能听见吗？#h0#。

original: Yeah, what's happening?
translated:
#face2#这里是#b埃斯佩拉#k的大本营总部。
在即将进攻#r黑太阳#k之前，紧急投入了特殊作战……（嗞嗞）……

original:
#face2#This is base camp headquarters in #bEsfera#k.
We're running an urgent, special operation before we advance to the #rblack sun#k... *static* ...
translated: #face2#哎呀，通信出障碍（嗞嗞）……通讯兵？这里通……（嗞嗞）……吗？

original: Hm?
translated: #face0#我（嗞嗞）……可……看看吗？

original: #face2#Oh, our radio's having some trouble... *static*... Can I get someone from *static*... signal corps over here...??
translated: #face2#沃莉？？我不知道你对机器……有研究……吗。

original: #face0#May I... *static* a look...?
translated:
#face0#你让让。
……不听话的时候……像这样！#r（咚！）#k这样！#r（咚！）#k

original: #face2#Ollie? I didn't know you... *static*... -neering experience.
translated:
#face2#不是，你在干什么？！
这样完全……（嗞嗞……）坏……（嗞嗞嗞嗞）

original:
#face0#Okay, stand back. 
If... *static*... doesn't work... you do this this! #r*Whack*#k And this! #r*whack*#k
translated: #face2##r（嗞嗞嗞嗞嗞……。嗞嗞嗞……)

original:
#face2#Wait, what are you doing?! 
You're going to... *static* break... *static*
translated:
亲自去看看比较好。

#b（※ 接受时，将移动到任务地区。）

original: #face2##r*Long static* ... *More static*
translated: 什么事？

original: #face2##h0#, you made it.
translated: #face2#你来了，#h0#。

original: Yeah, what's happening?
translated: 什么事？

original: #face2#Well, the reason we called you is because there's an urgent #bspecial operation#k to carry out, before we head to the #rblack sun#k.
translated:
#face2##h0#，我请你过来，是因为在前往#r黑太阳#k之前，
需要紧急开展一个#b特殊作战#k。

original: What special operation?
translated: 特殊作战？

original: #face2#Ollie, would you please bring our friend up to speed?
translated: #face2#沃莉，你能说明下当时的情况吗？

original: #face3#So, not too long ago, during the #boperation in Esfera#k...
translated: #face3#不久前，#b埃斯佩拉作战#k那次。

original:
#face3#While we were trying to bring Tana--
Excuse me; #rAeona, the Transcendent of Light#k -- up from the ocean...
translated:
#face3#在打捞沉在水底的塔纳，不……
是打捞#r光明超越者艾欧娜#k的时候。

original: #face2#Now, as for who to bring with you...
translated: #face2#好，那第二位队员……

original: #face0#They asked me, and I said no.
translated: #face0#是我。虽然我拒绝了。

original: #face2#Your experience in underwater operations is unparalleled, Shubert. I wish you'd reconsider.
translated:
#face2#休麦，很少有人像你一样水下作战经验这么丰富……
好可惜。

original: #face0#That experience is why I said no. I've had enough of the sea.
translated: #face0#所以我才拒绝。现在一提到大海，我都犯恶心。

original: #face2#...
translated: #face2#没办法。那第三位队员……

original: #face2#That's a shame. Moving on, we do have one teammate locked down for you...
translated: #face0#是我！我自愿申请的。

original: #face0#Me! I volunteered.
translated: #face3#沃莉？你不是在接受治疗吗？

original: #face3#Ollie?! I thought you were still recuperating.
translated:
#face2#沃莉是唯一有过埃斯佩拉水下经历的队员。
那什么，能让我也说句话吗？

original: #face2#Ollie is the only one of us who's experienced Esfera's waters firsthand. And by the way, would you mind letting me speak?
translated: #face3#再怎么样也不行啊，前几天才晕倒过……

original: #face3#I mean, it hasn't been that long since she got hurt...
translated: #face0#我已经得到了医护人员的许可。没事的。

original: #bSome shiny object#k sank deeper underwater?
translated: 有#b发光的东西#k沉到了水底？

original: #face3#That's what it looked like.
translated: #face3#是的。

original: Do we have any guesses on what it might be?
translated: 那是什么样的东西，你有头绪吗？

original:
#face2#None. We have zero intel on the object.
I'm afraid the only way to find out is to recover it ourselves.
translated:
#face2#不，我们没掌握任何相关信息。
在直接将它打捞出来之前，根本不知道究竟是什么样的物品。

original: #face2#But I will say this: given that it came from the #rTrascendent of Light#k... it's certainly no ordinary trinket.
translated:
#face2#但那是#r光明超越者#k身上携带的东西。
我认为不是寻常之物。

original: Hmm... So we're looking for one small, unknown object at the bottom of a deep, dark sea...
translated: 嗯……为了找个毫无线索的东西，就要潜入未知的海底吗……

original: #face2#Indeed we are. Not ideal, of course, but... I hope you understand our lack of options.
translated:
#face2#是的……
老实说，我也不太愿意开展此次作战……
但这种不想放过任何一丝希望的心情，希望你们能理解。

original: #face2#Given #rour Alliance's destination#k, any possible help is worth reaching for.
translated:
#face2#想到接下来我们#r联盟要去的地方#k，说真的，
心里不得不期待能出现侥幸。

original: Hmm...
translated:
#face2#所以我准备组织这次的作战队伍，
首先第一位队员就是你，
#b#h0##k。

original:
#face2#We're assembling a task force to retrieve the object.
You, #h0#, were of course at the top of our list.
translated:
#face2#对付未知的怪物，没人比你更拿手。
当然，是否参加全看#b#h0##k你自己的意思。

original: #face2#When it comes to unknown dangers in unknown territory, you are second to none, and we'd be honored and fortunate to have you. Of course, as always, the choice is yours.
translated: (沉没的某物……。去找找吧？)

original: (Searching the ocean for sunken treasure... Should I give it a shot?)
translated:
#face2#谢谢你这次也欣然答应。
让我松了口气。

original: #face3#Is that... the #bJellyfish#k?!
translated: #face3#这……这不是#b海蜇号#k吗？！

original: #face3#H-how'd you get it here?
translated: #face3#这个……你怎么带回来的？

original:
#face2##bEdelstein#k found a way to recover it.
It's had some improvements, so it should be more reliable this time.
translated:
#face2#这是为了此次作战，从#b埃德尔斯坦#k紧急空运过来的。
据说已做了许多改良，在性能上应该会比较可靠。

original: #face0#All checks completed, Commander.
translated: #face0#南哈特，检查完毕了。

original: We need a submersible for this? But in Morass...
translated: 需要潜水艇吗？但在莫拉斯……

original: #face2#The Origin Sea is changing. The environment is different now.
translated: #face2#随着太初之海发生异变，环境与之前发生了很大改变。

original:
#face2#Now all we need to do is wait for our new pilot.
Ollie, #h0#, why don't the two of you familiarize yourselves with the controls while you wait?
translated:
#face2#好，现在就等驾驶员过来了。
沃莉、#h0#，你们二位可以在等待期间看看操纵方法。

original: #face3#Let me check the instructions here...
translated: #face3#我想想……说明书在……

original: #face0#Uh, Ollie? You're... holding them upside-down.
translated: #face0#沃莉？那个……你把说明书那倒了。

original: #face1#Oh, really? S-so they're supposed to be like this?
translated: #face1#啊，是吗？应该这么看吗？

original: #face0#Hmm... I guess they kind of make sense now...
translated: #face0#嗯……啊！我知道了！像这样看就行！

original: #face0#...No, they're sideways now. Rotate them one more time. The other way.
translated: #face0#哦……再从那里往左拐一下……。

original: #face1#...
translated: #face3#南哈特，等等。

original: #face3#...
translated: #face2#怎么了？

original: #face3#Neinheart.
translated: #face3#我……我来操纵吧。

original: #face2#Yes?
translated:
#face3#那家伙不好对付。
我对它比较熟悉，交给我吧。

original: #face3#I... I'll be your pilot.
translated: #face2#嗯……突然调整人员有点困难……。

original:
#face3#Subs are hard to handle.
You need a pilot who's been down there before.
translated: #face2#休麦说得有道理，我批准了。

original: #face2#Well, I can't say I'd normally approve a last-minute personnel change...
translated: #face3#终究是被卷进去了……

original: #face0#Commander Neinheart. *Whisper*
translated: #face0#南哈特。（窃窃私语）……

original: #face2#Ah, the preparations are complete. Perfect timing.
translated: #face2#啊，正巧准备工作刚刚结束。

original: #face2#I have something to show you. Follow me, please.
translated: #face2#有东西给你们看。大家走吧。

original:
#face3#It still stinks in here.
*Sigh* Once a wreck, always a wreck...
translated:
#face3#这股恶臭依然如故。
毕竟它沉没过一次，这也没办法……。

original: #face0#It got wrecked before? ...Still, they pulled it up and put it back in action. This thing's a veteran in its own right.
translated:
#face0#沉没的？
可它又被重新打捞上来，投入作战……
真可称得上是身经百战的勇士。了不起。

original: (That's... not necessarily a good thing, in this case...)
translated: (一般人不是会觉得不不吉利吗……)

original: #face3#Instrument panel... check. Air pressure system... check.
translated: #face3#已检查了仪表盘，检查了气压系统……

original: #face0#All right, final preparations are green. Just waiting for the engine to warm up.
translated: #face0#好，准备工作大致结束了。现在就等引擎预热了。

original: #face0#Oh, right, Ollie, you've been in these waters before, yeah? How'd that go?
translated: #face0#对了，沃莉，当时你下去看到的海底是怎样的？

original: #face3#It was super-murky, and I couldn't see anything. Then something swam up and hit me pretty hard.
translated:
#face3#水里很浑浊，几乎看不清前方。
只知道有什么东西穿过水流扑了过来……造成了非常强烈的冲击。

original: #face1#It felt weird, too. Squishy...
translated: #face1#啊，说起来，触感也非常……诡异。软乎乎的……

original: #face3#Squishy...? Huh, might've been a cephalopod. The big ones are a handful.
translated: #face3#软乎乎……？嗯……是头足类吗。如果是个大家伙，可不好办。

original:
#face0#Still, most people panic when that happens.
You're brave, Ollie, I'll give you that.
translated:
#face0#话说回来，在视野不明的水下遭遇那样的事情，一般人都会陷入恐慌，
总之啊，沃莉还真是胆大。

original: #face0#Thanks for the compliment.
translated: #face0#我就当你在夸我了。

original: #face0#There's a saying at sea: 'The bravest sailors usually sink first.'
translated: #face0#在大海里，越胆大的家伙越早死。

original: #face1#...
translated: #face0#来，精神都绷紧了。现在要下沉了。

original: #face0#All right, stay alert. We're sinking.
translated: #face1#这，不是应该说得手吗？

original: #face1#D-don't you mean, 'we're diving'?
translated: #face0#那不一样嘛。

original: #face2#With that said, Shubert is a veteran of Edelstein's #bdiving unit#k. I'm giving him command of the mission.
translated:
#face2#那么，现场指挥就请休麦负责。
据我所知，你过去曾在埃德尔斯坦的#b潜水部队#k服役过。

original: Diving unit, huh?
translated: #face0#是也有过那样的时候。

original: #face0#A long time ago, yeah.
translated: #face2#他能娴熟地操作各种装备，一定可以很好地领导二位。

original: #face2#You know your equipment, I am sure you'll lead the other two well.
translated: #face2#等你准备好了，就进入潜水艇。

original: #face2#When you're ready, step inside the submersible.
translated: #face0#我和沃莉先去潜水艇里进行修整，你准备好了就进来。

original: #face0#Ollie and I are gonna load our gear into the sub. Come join us when you're ready.
translated: 潜水部队？

original: #face0#Ooh, contact right away, close by. It's making regular pulses.
translated: #face0#信号来源就在附近。正在周期性地发出震动。

original: #face3#Think it's our target?
translated: #face3#那是我们要找的目标吗？

original: #face0#It definitely could be. Let's get a little closer. Ollie, keep an eye on the screen and give me a heading.
translated:
#face0#有很大可能。我们再靠近点。
沃莉，你看着机器，告诉我是哪个方向。

original: #face3#Uh... hmm... so...
translated: #face3#哦……嗯……那个……

original: #face1#I think it's... down below us.
translated: #face1#好像……在下面……

original: #face0#Yeah, figures.
translated: #face0#那倒是……

original: #face0#It wouldn't be easy to get the submersible any closer. We'll have to go out in diving suits.
translated: #face0#从这里往后的路，潜水艇进不去。我们下艇搜索吧。

original: #face0#I'll take point. Come out when you're ready.
translated: #face0#我先过去了。你准备好就出来。

original: So, your name is Human, right? That's rather silly. You don't see any foxes named Fox, now do you?
translated: 这么说来，你的名字是‘人类’了？呵呵，真是个有趣的名字。嗯？你说不是名字？那你叫什么？

original: No, my name is... (What was it that Freud used to call me?)
translated: 我叫…………我叫…………(最早给无名无姓四处流浪的我起名字的是弗里德啊。现在的弗里德…………)

original: Now, now, don't strain yourself. I doubt you can give yourself a very good name. Here, leave it to me. Hm... You're a stranger we found in the woods... Mystery? Oddity? Ooh, how about Muddle? I always thought Muddle would be a great...
translated: 嗬，报个姓名怎么还磨磨蹭蹭的？莫非你有什么苦衷？好吧，看你的表情应该就是了。那么，我来给你起个好听的名字吧！你的毛发是黑色的，就叫玄氏吧？ 要么，你的身材高大，叫魁硕也不错。

original: No, look, I have my own-
translated: 不，我有名字…………

original: Geez, Grandpa! Those are terrible names! We have to name 'em something cool. Besides, I found 'em, so I get to name 'em. Now... You're all dark and mysterious, so I'm gonna call you Shade. How about that? You're the perfect compliment to a Moonbeam!
translated: 唉，什么呀！和人类一点都不相配。既然你是我捡回来的，名字也该由我来起。嗯…………嗯…………你说你来自那个只有一个月亮的地方，对吧？所以…………藏有一个月亮的地方。隐…………月…………嗯，隐月！隐月不错。意思是隐藏的月亮，怎么样？

original: That seems a little...dark. You sure you don't like Muddle?
translated: 哎呀，那个也太土了吧？黑仔和年糕之类的名字不更好吗……

original: I'll go with Shade.
translated: 我要叫隐月。

original: To each his own, I guess... So be it. I recognize you as Shade from this moment forward. That's going to take a little getting used to.
translated: 嗯？你是认真的？嗬，爱好还挺独特的。反正，既然你喜欢我也没办法…………好吧，那从现在开始你的名字就是隐月了。一开始可能会有些别扭，不过渐渐就会适应的。

original: So Shade, why don't you take a look around the house you'll be staying at? Might need some cleaning, seeing how it's been vacant for years.
translated: 那么隐月，你要不要参观一下你今后生活的房子呢？因为那里已经很久都没有主人了，所以堆积了厚厚的尘埃。如果有什么不便的，不必见外，直接告诉我。

original: Follow the path to the left and you'll see a house with a large pot. That's the one. Make yourself at home, my tasty friend.
translated: 你沿着这条路往左径直走，就会看见一个摆着酱缸台的房子。那就是你以后住的地方，你仔细瞧瞧吧。因为房子的主人从不回来，所以比露宿街头强多了吧。所需物品我会为你准备的。

original: No, no, it's no problem at all. The owner of the house has been gone for years. Just as well that someone get some use out of it.
translated: （好像失去了所有的力量。虽然大不如前，但感觉还在。暂时应该没事了。）

original: Ahh, but what if they figure out that I didn't eat it? Hmm. ...Wait, why am I so hung up on this?
translated: 虽然我一点都不喜欢礼物，但出于礼貌，我还是应该像他们表示感谢。狐狸们将自己认为最珍贵的食物送给我了……我还是告诉他们我吃了比较好。

original: What's wrong with you? You're covered in scars! What happened? Tell me now! Is anybody bullying you? Picking on you? You're already so weak and stupid, why would anyone do that?
translated: 你这是怎么回事？全身都是伤。是在哪里受的伤？是被人打了吗？是谁？快告诉我！居然有人欺负这么可怜的人。到底是谁？

original: What? You were just going after a couple #o2400203#s? Why did you run off on your own to hunt them? You coulda just told me and I-I could have done that for you! Why do you need to give gifts in return?
translated: 什么？只是抓了几只#o2400203#，就变成了这个样子？你为什么不经我的允许，就去抓#o2400203#啊？只要跟我说一声……我都可以帮你搞定！答谢？为什么要准备那种东西？为什么？

original: Shade, you stupid! Ughh, I'm so irritated! I-I hate you so much!
translated: 隐月真是个傻瓜！真讨厌！真的……真的……很讨厌！

original: What did I do wrong this time? Why are foxes on an emotional roller coaster all the time? I guess I better apologize to her. She was headed in direction of the #r#m410000002##k. I guess... I guess I should follow her?
translated: 啊，这次我又做错什么了吗？狐狸们的感情波动怎么这么厉害啊？哈，是不是应该先说声道歉呢？她往那个方向跑过去了，好像是去了#r#m410000002##k……应该跟过去吧？

original: I see, you are taking the test of the foxes. I'm very proud of you. You will be talked about by the younger generation for overcoming your lack in many ways. Now here is the test. Pass this multiple-choice quiz and I shall give you my paw stamp. Do you want to begin now?
translated: 是吗？你正在参加狐狸的考试？了不起，真了不起。你那不畏艰险、勇攀高峰的精神，一定会成为后辈们的榜样。好吧，考试现在开始。如果你能答对我所有的问题，我就认可你，给你盖上脚印图章。好了，你想现在开始吗？

original: It's nothing urgent, so take your time. Talk to me when you are ready.
translated:
那我来问第一个问题。以下哪个是我们尖耳狐狸最喜欢的食物？
#L0# 虫干#l
#L1# 斑点翅膀#l
#L2# 麻雀蛋#l
#L3# 老鼠尾巴#l
#b#e#L4# 生肝#l

original:
The first question. What's the favorite meal of Pointy-Ear Foxes?
#L0# Dried Caterpillar#l
#L1# Spotted Wings#l
#L2# Sparrow Eggs#l
#L3# Mouse Tail#l
#L4# #bRaw Liver#l
translated: 是吗？你正在参加狐狸的考试？了不起，真了不起。你那不畏艰险、勇攀高峰的精神，一定会成为后辈们的榜样。好吧，考试现在开始。如果你能答对我所有的问题，我就认可你，给你盖上脚印图章。好了，你想现在开始吗？

original: Wrong! You should study more!
translated:
那我来问第一个问题。以下哪个是我们尖耳狐狸最喜欢的食物？
#L0# 虫干#l
#L1# 斑点翅膀#l
#L2# 麻雀蛋#l
#L3# 老鼠尾巴#l
#b#e#L4# 生肝#l

original:
That's right! We love raw liver. Second question, who do we serve as our god?
#L0# Tiger God#l
#L1# #bFox God#k#l
#L2# Wolf God#l
#L3# Mountain God#l
#L4# Nongod#l
translated:
答对了。我们尖耳狐狸最喜欢的食物是生肝。接下来是第二个问题。以下哪个是我们尖耳狐狸信奉的守护神？
#L0# 虎神#l
#b#e#L1# 狐神#k#n#l
#L2# 狼神#l
#L3# 山神#l
#L4# 瘟神#l

original: Wrong! You should study more!
translated:
没错。我们尖耳狐狸信奉狐神。下面是最后一个问题。我们尖耳狐狸拥有一种特别的能力。你知道是什么吗？
#b#e#L0# 操控精灵的能力#k#n#l
#L1# 操控时间的能力#l
#L2# 操控动物的能力#l
#L3# 不听话的能力#l
#L4# 可爱得让人受不了的能力#l

original:
That's right, the Pointy-Ear Foxes believe in the fox god. Now last question, what kind of power do we have?
#L0# #bPower to handle spirits#k#l
#L1# Power to control time#l
#L2# Power to control animals#l
#L3# Power to ignore other people#l
#L4# Power to be super cute#l
translated: 回答正确。我们尖耳狐狸拥有操控精灵的能力。你也得到狐神的护佑了吧？希望你能珍惜那种能力。如果滥用的话，可能会招致狐神的愤怒。

original: Wrong! You should study more!
translated:
好的，我的考试全部结束了。我来给你盖一个脚印。你去找#r#p3002009##k吧。他会告诉你下一项考试的内容。
#fUI/DialogImage.img/quest/0

original: Would you like to skip the tutorial cutscenes?
translated: 必须消灭掉所有怪物，继续向神殿深处前进。

original: Are you okay? Are you hurt?
translated: 剩余怪物数量：

original: Ooh, my whole body aches! Here, and here, and here!
translated: 没事吧？受伤了吗？

original: You... don't have a scratch on you.
translated: 浑身都很疼！这里也疼，那里也疼。还有这里！

original: I... I must be bleeding internally! Oh, the foxmanity! I need to get back to town for treatment! Thanks for nothing, you big jerk!
translated: 不过好像一点伤痕也没有啊。

original: ...Did I say something wrong again? I wish she'd tell me what I did wrong. I'm glad she's okay, at least.
translated: 本，本来内伤就要比外伤更疼！隐月，你这个傻瓜！我先走了！

original: The town seems restless, different from other days. Did something happen?
translated: 感觉村里的氛围和平时不太一样。村里发生什么事了吗？

original: ...Dunno.
translated: ……我也不知道。

original: (Something must be up. Moonbeam isn't herself either.)
translated: (虽然不知道是什么，但一定有什么事。情绪消沉的样子，完全不是阿琅的作风。)

original: Okay.
translated: 哦，知道了。

original: ...I'm sorry.
translated: ……对不起。

original: Why?
translated: 什么？

original: Just... everything. I'm sorry. I'm really, really sorry...
translated: 没什么。对不起，真的很对不起……

original: Moonbeam! Why is she crying all of a sudden? I should look into it myself.
translated: 阿琅！到底发生了什么事，哭成那个样子……最好直接去问问她。

original: Grandis, Interdimensional Portal, another world... This is a lot to take in. But one thing is for sure... I can go back to Maple World! I'm sure Moonbeam was trying to hide that from me.
translated: 格兰蒂斯、异次元、次元之门…………各种信息突然一涌而来。虽然到现在还不能理解到底是什么意思，不过结论只有一个，那就是一定有办法再回到冒险岛世界！…………而且阿琅想隐藏的应该也是这个。

original: But I must go back. I must see my world again. I can't stay here any longer, knowing that it's still out there. But when that's done... I'll come back.
translated: 但是我必须回去。我必须亲眼确认一下。既然知道有办法回到冒险岛世界，就没有理由犹豫了。等解决了所有事情之后……到时再回来。

original: She's still worried. She worries for me even when she gave me her spirit. The best I can do is try to put her at ease. I'll bring some #r#t4009228##k items.
translated: 不过我还是很不安。她把自己的精灵送给了我，一直很关心我。我现在能做的，就是让她安心。把被称为勇敢狐狸的证物的#r#t4009228##k带过去，她应该就能放心一点了吧？

original: Would you like to skip the tutorial cutscenes?
translated: 其实我已经知道了。隐月你总有一天会离开。因为在隐月身上有着风的味道。

original: Y'know, I always knew. That you'd be leaving someday. Your scent is of the winds.
translated: 我把精灵送给你，其实是不想让你走。让你在旁边保护我，那样你就不会走了。你不是答应我的吗？要保护我。所以，所以……
……我有个朋友。他是最先向我伸出手的人。他告诉认为自己没有理由活下去的我，你也没有理由要去死，让我们一起去寻找活下去的理由。

original: I gave you my spirit because... Because I didn't want you to leave. You promised that you'd be by my side to protect me. So. So...
translated: 在来到这里之前，我最后一个见到的人也是他。虽然做出选择的人是我，但最痛苦的人应该是他。他可能以为我已经死了，一定生活在负罪感之中。

original: ...I had a friend. The first person to ever lend a hand to me. I told him I didn't have a reason to live, and he told me I don't have a reason to die, either. He also promised we'd get through the tough times together.
translated: 我必须得回去。必须回去告诉那些还在等着我的人、正在经受痛苦的人，我还活着。而且我还要守护住他们所深爱的家园。还有…………当我处理完所有的事情后…………那时候，我会再回来。

original: Before I... came here, his face was the last one I saw. He's probably in pain. Thinking that I'm gone. And he probably feels like it's his fault.
translated: ……我也是隐月的朋友，对吧？我也是那么重要的人……对吧？
……当然。

original: I must go back. To those who are waiting for me. To those in pain. I must go tell them I'm alive, and to protect the world we love. And when that's all over... I'll come back.
translated: 我们狐狸把这叫做伙伴。伙伴。隐月和阿琅是伙伴，所以你必须快点回来。我会非常想念隐月，所以我会很难过的。明白了吗？

original: ...I'm your friend too, right? I'm important too, right? Like them?
translated: 不对，隐月是个笨蛋，也许会全部忘掉。所以，这样……

original: Of course.
translated: 来，这是作为朋友的证物。你既然对着狐狸树立下约定，就一定要遵守。如果违背的话，狐神就会震怒，并对你处以可怕惩罚的！

original: Us foxes call those companions. You and I are companions, so you have to come back. I'll miss you so much. It's gonna be so hard on me. So come back soon, okay?
translated: 呃啊，我肚子好饿啊。我先走了，慢腾腾的隐月跟在我后面把！拜~

original: Wait, you're stupid so you might forget all this. Here...
translated: 雨……下个不停。

original: This is Maple World? Did I really... return? I never thought I'd see it again.
translated: 这里是冒险岛世界…………？我真的回来了吗？我还以为再也不能活着回来。

original: I bet everyone is doing well. I'm off to see my friends!
translated: 大家都无恙吧？再等等吧。我这就去找你们！

original: Now let's open this map, and I'll elaborate on what I was talking about earlier.
translated: 好的，先打开地图，我来继续给你说明。

original: This, is Maple World. You see this island right here? That's Victoria Island. Henesys is right here, on the south side of Victoria Island.
translated: 这是冒险岛地图。看见这个岛了吗？这就是金银岛。射手村就在这里，位于金银岛的南部。

original: Leafre? It's in Ossyria continent, over the sea. El Nath is right here, and Nihal Desert is right there.
translated: 神木村？神木村在大海的对面，在神秘岛上。冰峰雪域在这里，尼哈沙漠在这里。

original: So, you must come from Ossyria. There's someone, an elf, who came from Ossyria, too. Her name is #rAthena Pierce#k... Do you want to meet her?
translated: 看来你的故乡是神秘岛大陆。我们村也有来自神秘岛大陆的人，哦不，应该是精灵。叫做#r赫丽娜#k…………你想见见吗？

original: (#rAthena Pierce#k? Is he talking about the little kid that used to follow me around? I guess she was headed to Victoria Island on the rescue ship. She must have settled down there. Maybe she'll know something about Mercedes.)
translated: (#r赫丽娜#k？精灵赫丽娜，是那个整天跟着双弩精灵的孩子吗？听说她乘坐避难船，去了金银岛。看来她在这个村子里安顿了下来。赫丽娜也许知道双弩精灵的消息。)

original: Athena Pierce is at the Bowman Instructional School. She's busy teaching new bowmen, so don't take up too much of her time.
translated: 赫丽娜就在弓箭手培训中心。她正忙着为新手弓箭手培训，所以你别占用她太多的时间。

original: A young elf named Athena Pierce... I believe I'm the only elf with that name. And I did come from Ossyria to Victoria Island to get away from the Black Mage...
translated: 年幼的精灵赫丽娜……这个嘛。据我所知，没有其他精灵和我同名。我确实是为了躲避黑魔法师的攻击，从神秘岛来到了金银岛。

original: But she was so young. I'm sorry, but you couldn't...
translated: 怎么会这样？赫丽娜明明是个年纪很小的精灵。才过了这么短的时间，怎么可能长这么大了……

original: Are you talking about the curse on the elves? Ah, I was lucky enough to avoid it. #rHundreds of years#k is enough time for an elf to mature, you know.
translated: 如果你是说精灵们受到的诅咒，我很幸运，没有受到诅咒。对于精灵来说，#r几百年时间#k也足够长大了。

original: A curse? Hundreds... of years? This makes no sense. The day Mercedes and the rest of us faced the Black Mage was the same day that little Athena Pierce got on the ship to Victoria Island.
translated: 精灵们受到的诅咒？几百年？不知道你在说些什么。在我和双弩精灵他们一起去阻止黑魔法师的那一天，我听说你坐着避难船，到金银岛去了。

original: Then were you... Were you also under the Curse of the Black Mage? Listen to me carefully... It's been centuries since the day you were sealed. Do you understand? #r#eCenturies#k#n.
translated: 你难道……你也受到了黑魔法师的诅咒吗？如果你刚刚醒来……那请仔细听好。从封印黑魔法师的那一天开始，已经过去了几百年的岁月。现在的这个世界，是#r#e距离你记忆中的那一天已经过了好几百年了#k#n。明白我的意思了吗？

original:
Did you think of a keyword? What word do you want to search?

#L0##bBlack Mage#l
translated:
你想好关键词了吗? 那就说出你想搜索的词语吧。

#b#L0# 黑魔法师#l

original: Black Mage, huh? That's a pretty big topic. I'm seeing titles like The Sealing of the Black Mage, Commanders of the Black Mage, Appearance of the Black Mage... 3849 results.
translated: 黑魔法师......黑魔法师的搜索结果包括黑魔法师的封印、黑魔法师的军团长、黑魔法师的登场......等, 大概有3849个标题。

original:
You need to narrow down your search. What do you want to search for?

#L0##bThe Black Mage's Resurrection#l
translated:
一定是词语太笼统了, 所以需要更具体的关键词。说出你想搜索的词语吧。

#b#L0# 黑魔法师的复活#l

original: The Black Mage's Resurrection... Interesting, that's just one book. But uh... There's a problem.
translated: 黑魔法师的复活......噢, 刚好搜出一本书。让我看看......嗯......嗯......这真是, 麻烦了。

original:
This book isn't available to the public. I'm sorry, but I can't help you with this one. Do you happent o have another search in mind?

#L0##bSeal of Time#l
translated:
看来从市面上无法买到有着相似内容的书籍......我不得不违背约定了。怎么办, 实在是太抱歉了?  你还有其他想好的关键词吗? 

#b#L0# 时间封印#l

original: Seal of Time... There's a book about the Seal of Time that locked up the Black Mage. Let's see, let's see... Ah, so that's what happened...
translated: 时间封印......有一本名为‘禁锢着黑魔法师的时间封印’的书。好吧, 让我看看......嗯, 原来如此。嗯, 那时候原来是那样。那么这个......

original:
There's a book called #rThe Black Mage and the Five Heroes#k that's probably everything you're looking for. You want to search for anything else?

#L0#(#bYou whisper something#k.)#l
translated:
好吧, 和这些内容最相近的书叫做#r黑魔法师和五个英雄#k, 你去书店买来就可以了。这两本书基本没什么区别。那么你还有别的词语想要搜索吗? 

#b#L0# ......(附耳低语。)#l

original: Really? Is that your name? I love doing name searches for people! Let's see what your life is like...
translated: 嗯? 你是说......? 啊啊, 莫非是你的名字? 搜索自己名字的事可不常见。也是, 作为人类当然想知道自己走过的轨迹了。那么稍等, 我这就为你搜索......

original: No, it's fine. Don't search my name.
translated: ......等等。算了, 请不必搜索了。

original: Why? You got a lot of secrets or something? Ah well, every one has secrets, I suppose. Very well.
translated: 嗯? 怎么突然? 哦吼, 莫非你也有什么不想为人所知的秘密? 也是, 有谁会没有秘密呢? 那我就当你没有要搜索的词了。

original: (Maybe there are records of me here, if the library truly has ALL the records of the world. I have to keep pressing forward.)
translated: (既然是记录了世间万事, 说不定也有关于我的记录。可是, 事到如今那又有什么用呢? 反正摆在我面前的路只能是往前走。)

original: (I won't dwell on the past, even if it means more pain!)
translated: (我不会回头看。也许那只会让我更痛苦。)

original: There's no question that I... have been erased from everyone's memories. But if it's just me, then they must have holes in their memories. They would know that at least SOMEONE was there.
translated: 我从别人的记忆中消失的事已经确凿。可是, 如果只是不记得我的话, 那记忆中一定会留下空白的。至少会有‘是谁’之类的疑问。

original:
if it's not just that my existence is being wiped from their memories... Then perhaps there are other possibilities. Should i head out now? 
#r(You will be moved directly to the map if you accept.)
translated:
那么也可以换个角度想, 不是吗? 如果说删除存在不是单纯抹去记忆的话......不管怎样, 我一定要确认一下。那么现在就去吧? 
#r(接受任务后将马上移动到相关地图。)

original: I remember now. I put in a photograph. A photo, the only one, with everyone... They told me to put my most prized possession in, and that was it. Good choice, I guess.
translated: 现在终于记起来了。我放入的是照片。什么时候来着, 和这些家伙拍的唯一一张合影。提示我放入最珍贵的东西, 我嫌麻烦就随便拿了一样放进去, 看来还真选对了。

original:
Now I'm sure. The world has #rCOMPLETELY forgotten me.#k
There are absolutely no traces of me anywhere.
translated: 现在可以确信了。这个世界已经将我#e#r彻.底.遗忘了。#k#n关于我的任何痕迹都没留下, 我也无法存在于任何人的记忆当中。

#b(A voice resonates in your head again.) 
'The Sacrifice will protect thee, but it shall be destroyed the moment thou set foot in front of the golden altar! If thou dost not enter, the sacrifice will not be taken.' 
(Massive doors open the way to the Entrance to Ravana's Altar.)
translated:
#b（脑海中的声音再次响起。）
“这个祭品会守护你的灵魂。但是记住，踏入黄金祭坛的瞬间，祭品就会损坏。如果你不去黄金祭坛，重新回来的话，祭品就会重新回到你的手中。”
（沉重的石门打开，走进了#m252030000#。）

original:
#b(A voice resonates in your head again.) 
'The Sacrifice will protect thee, but it shall be destroyed the moment thou set foot in front of the golden altar! If thou dost not enter, the sacrifice will not be taken.' 
(Massive doors open the way to the Entrance to Ravana's Altar.)
translated:
#b(脑海中又一次听见了声音。)
“这个祭品能守护你的灵魂。但是记住，只要你一踏入黄金祭坛，祭品就会被破坏。不要去黄金祭坛，沿原路出来，祭品会再次回到你的手中。”
(随着笨重石门的开启，走进了#m252030000#。)

original: The Fox God gave you his blessings, so you probably have a new skill! Check your skill window.
translated: 你已经在狐神的庇护下，得到了精灵的力量，也将因而获得新的技能。查看一下你的技能窗吧。

original: Fox Trot... Spirit Bond... I've never seen these skills before.
translated: 缩地…………精灵凝聚…………从没见过这种技能。

original: They'll be a big help for a slow, weak thing like you. Here, let's talk some more so I can show you how they work!
translated: 这样的技能对于行动缓慢外加力量虚弱的隐月来说是非常必要的！好的，我会教你如何使用，准备好的话就再和我说话吧！

original: Let's start with #b[Fox Trot]#k. If you really do have ears, perk them up for this!
translated: 好的！我先来说明一下#b[缩地]#k这个技能。你要竖起耳朵听好！哎呀，我忘了隐月没有耳朵了。

original: #b[Fox Trot]#k is super helpful when you want to move quickly or get close to an enemy. You're way too slow to catch prey, so you need all the help you can get.
translated: 总之，#b[缩地]#k是可以快速移动或快速靠近敌人的技能。像隐月这么慢的话，根本连一只猎物都抓不到！

original: Now try using #b[Fox Trot]#k. Oh, and it's a lot easier if you hotkey it and use it that way!
translated: 好了，你来使用一些#b[缩地]#k试试。对了，把技能添加到快捷栏中使用，会更加方便。

original: Whaddaya think? Was that amazingly fast, or what? Use this skill to get close to your prey.
translated: 请试着使用[缩地]技能。

original: Use this skill when you're using other skills to #binterrupt#k the first one and #bmove#k quickly!
translated: 怎么样？是不是快极了？使用这个技能的话无论是敌人还是猎物，都可以瞬间接近。

original: I know you can be a little slow, Shade. Are you keeping up?
translated: 而且，在使用其他技能的过程中使用这一技能的话，将#b终止正在使用的技能#k并且#b移动#k！

original: I'll tell you how to use it to make up for your weakness. Talk to me when you're ready!
translated: 隐月是个傻瓜，所以这么说的话应该不是很明白吧？

original: Do you see that caterpillar over there? Waaaaay over there. It's gonna eat up the whole Fox Tree if we leave it there. Now then, what should we do?
translated: 你看到那~树上的幼虫了吗？继续放任不管的话，就连狐狸树的根都要被啃光了。怎么样才能抓住它呢？

original: I hope you're not thinking of climbing all the way up there! Use #b[Fox Trot]#k to zip up there in a jiffy! Go get'em, go on!
translated: 你该不会是想爬上去吧？我不是说使用#b[缩地]#k技能的话，一下子就能接近怪物的吗？好了，去消灭幼虫吧！快！

original: Use [Fox Trot] to get to the bugs on the trees!
translated: 请使用[缩地]技能接近树上的幼虫后, 将它消灭吧。

original: Congratulations! You can now do your weekly quest here.
translated:
#face0#有很重要的事情需要你来一下#b啾啾村#k。舔舔！
#r（同意后立即移动。）#k

original: #h0#, I see you completed all your missions for the week. Please accept a level up on #i1712002:# #t1712002:# as a reward.
translated: 舔！所有辅助工作都完成了吗！非常好，我把

original: I've leveled up your symbol. Please come back next week!
Come to me when you've finished your missions. Remember, you have to turn them in before the end of the week. Well then, see you later.
translated: 舔舔！快点处理今天的辅助工作！今天有

Is there a mission on the list you aren't up for? Why not Exchange it for another one? 

#b(You can swap out the missions of your choice, but it is possible to receive the same mission as the one being exchanged.)#k
translated: 件任务！

Squishy, the more you help us, the more we can help ourselves. And THAT means we can get ahold of the #brare stuff#k.
translated:
小软柿，每当你完成来自各处的委托，
我们机器人就能侦察更长时间。
那样的话，我们就行搜集到#b珍贵物品#k了。

original: After some discussion, we've decided to give you #i4001842# #b#t4001842##k each week when you #bfinish four commissions#k.
translated:
所以我们决定了，
你#b每周完成4次委托时，领取#k
#i4001842# #b#t4001842##k作为奖励。

original: In fact, here's one to start you off right! Remember, #bcomplete four commissions each week#k and come see me. I'll have my eye on you, Squishy. Heehee.
translated:
#b在开始执行委托时，我送你一个作为纪念。#k
每周#b完成4次委托#k时，就告诉我，哈哈哈。

original: I didn't think you'd be this strong. I feel like you have what it takes to become a member of the Sand Bandits. The most important aspect of being a member is power, and I think you have that. I also... want to test you one more time, just to make sure you're the right one. What do you think? Can you handle it?
translated: 没想到你会这么的强…以你的水平也许可以成为沙子图团的团员也说不定。对沙子图团员来说，最重要的就是力量的强大，而你…看来已经具备了足够的实力！但我还是要再进行一次测试…如何？可以接受吗？

original: To truly see your strength, I'll have to face you myself. Don't worry, I'll summon my other self to face off against you. Are you ready?
translated: 若想要实际测试你的力量，应该需要亲自去体验吧？我想和你进行一场对战！别担心，我也不想伤害你…就用我的分身来对付你好了！可以马上进行对战吗？

original: Good. I like your confidence.
translated: 好！充满自信是吗？

original:
Okay, here it is. Please handle this with care. This silk is very, very hard to find. If it's damaged anywhere, you'll be in jail in no time. 
#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0# 
1
translated: 还真不像是平时的#p2101004#大人…据我所知，#p2101004#大人可不是这么沉默寡言的人，难道发生什么事情了吗？噗！看你脸变得愈来愈红，是不是生气啦？真的很抱歉…我马上去拿丝绸过来，请稍等一下~

original: Er, #p#, it looks like you can't hold the silk. Talk to me again after you make some space.
translated:
来~在这里，请您小心拿回去吧！这丝绸…可不是随随便便就能到手的东西喔！若稍有破损，恐怕王妃会把#p2101004#大人关进天牢了呢！

#fUI/UIWindow2.img/QuestIcon/4/0#
#v4031571# #t4031571# 1个

original:
...aren't you #p#? Long time! Thankfully, I was able to secure the silk that the queen has been desperately looking for. As usual, the item is the finest you can find in this world... but why are you sweating so much? #b
#L0#(altering voice) No, it's just the sun...#l
translated:
这不是#p2101004#大人吗？真是好久不见，这次好不容易拿到了王妃爱不释手的丝绸喔！当然…品质也是一流！可是…您怎么一直在流汗啊？
#L0##b(伪装声音)没什么，只是太热了点...#l

original:
Well, since when was Ariant NOT hot? It's always been like this, and I thought you never seemed to mind the heat, but... Why is your face rapidly turning red? Are you okay? #b
#L0#(altering voice) I, I am okay. Don't worry about me...#l
translated:
阿里安特哪有没热过啊？不就一直都这样嘛~可是我还以为#p2101004#大人您都不会怕热呢！不对…您的脸...变得愈来愈红啰！真的没关系吗？
#L0##b(伪装声音)没…没关系，不需要担心...#l

original:
Are you sure you are okay? #p#, you look like you are not feeling too well. Do you need some medicine? I have some cold medicine from El Nath. I'll sell it to you for cheap. #b
#L0#I told you I am fine!#l
translated:
真的没关系吗？我之前就觉得#p2101004#大人体质虚弱，是不是需要吃点什么药啊？刚好我有在冰封雪域那边採买来的感冒药，您要不要买些回去吃啊？我会算您便宜点的...
#L0##b我说没关系啦！#l

original: Are you sure? But the weird thing is you sound much different from the norm. Are you sure you don't have the cold? I mean, you are not acting like yourself at all. Normally you'd always bargain hard for Lidium Ore, and... are you really #p#?
translated: 真的吗？可是#p2101004#您的声音，和平常不太一样喔！是不是真的感冒啦？怎么看都不像是平时的#p2101004#大人喔！平常你都要我把#t4010007#算便宜一点给您…真是奇怪…您真的是#p2101004#大人吗？
