original: You have completed all your tasks for the week. I will now level up your Sacred Symbol.

Hello #h0#!
I need your help. Come by the Tower of Oz as soon as you can.
translated: #b#h0##k。我得到报告说，希纳斯调查团在#r冒险岛世界的北部边缘#k发现了#b可疑的海底建筑#k。而且据说，在那个建筑中还发现了世界树阿丽莎很久之前的思念体。

original: Are you the one I invited to help with the ruckus at the Ellinel Fairy Academy?
translated: 喵~ 你就是受邀前来解决妖精学院艾利涅里发生的骚乱的勇士吗，喵？？

original: Um, of course?
translated: 原……原来如此……不过

original: You don't look as strong as I'd hoped. But, you're famous, so I'll leave it to you.
translated: 你看上去好像并没有想象中的那么强哦，喵。但既然是有名的勇士，我就相信你一次吧，喵。

original: You seem to be prepared for a new adventure. Can you make some time for me? We were asked to look for someone with the appropriate qualifications.
translated: 看来你的力量已经恢复得差不多了啊。那么，你应该能帮忙抵挡一段时间了吧？#b我们接到了妖精学院艾利涅#k发来的紧急支援请求，希望你能去帮忙看看情况。

original: The request was from #bEllinel Fairy Academy#k. A young human entered the Academy and it's caused quite a disturbance.
translated: 毕竟出事的是#b妖精学院艾利涅#k这个地方。妖精学院艾利涅是人类无法踏足的。但是最近，却有一个魔法师出现在了艾利涅附近的妖精之地。

original: I don't know all the details, but they are in need of help and I think it is best that we look into the situation.
translated: 虽然不清楚到底是怎么一回事，但趁着事情还没有被闹大，希望你能去打探一下实情，并助他们一臂之力。

original: Fanzy will take you into the land of the fairies. I can send you to him directly, if you'd like.
translated: 想前往妖精之地，就去找一只名为潘喜的猫问路吧。如果你愿意，我可以送你一程。

original: I shall send you to Fanzy right away. Complete your mission, and come straight back. Good luck.
translated: 没有问题。我这就直接送你去找潘喜。祝你好运。

original: I am Yamanaka Yukimori, a retainer to the Amako clan. I was at Honnou-ji with you. Before we continue, may i ask your name?
translated: 我是共同参加本能寺攻略战的尼子家家臣，我名为山中幸盛。在说明事情的来龙去脉之前，可不可以告诉我你的名字呢？

original: I Am Anegasaki Kenji, heir to the Matsuyama clan, and the descendant of Anegasaki Tomonobu
translated: 我是松山家的家臣，姐崎朝信的儿子，名为姐崎剑斗。

original: Anegasaki Kenji... I've heard that name before! It's my honor to meet the master of Battoujutsu.
translated: #face1#姐崎剑斗……真是久仰了。能见到鼎鼎有名的晓月流剑圣，实在是我的光荣。

original: Please do not fawn over me, noble warrior. If i had known you were at Honnou-Ji, I would have greeted you as a brother.
translated: 阁下太客气了，能见到人称忠肝义胆的幸盛，才真是我的荣幸呢。如果知道你也参加了本能寺攻略战，我真应该早点过来和你打声招呼了。实在是太遗憾了。

original: Much has happened since the raid on Honnou-Ji. I will fill you in when you have gathered yourself.
translated: #face0#虽然还有很多话想说，但我现在还是先简单说明一下本能寺攻略战时候发生的问题，以及现在的情况吧。等你做好心理准备之后，再来和我进行对话吧。

original: Argh! I-I cannot control my muscles. I feel as though I were covered in rice paste. Are my injuries that severe?
translated: 呵，原来如此。在走向这边的途中，我就一直觉得身体特别沉重。本以为是负伤的缘故，但是现在想想，我身上的伤势并不重，但身体却完全不听使唤。

original: The rules of this world are quite different from japan. The shift in spiritual energies has weakened even the strongest among us.
translated: #face0#没错。“这边”和我们所在的日本完全是两个截然不同的世界。所以我们没办法完全发挥出原本的力量来。也就是说，两个世界的物理法则并不一样。

original: What good is all my training if I cannot move without hindrance? What curse has befallen us?
translated: 那可就不好办了啊。突然来到这个未知的世界，已经让我觉得很是头疼了。没想到居然还不能发挥出原本的力量……

original: I have no need for soldiers without the simle willpower to overcome a small obstacle. There is a solution to every problem.
translated: #face0#我刚才提到的帮忙适应这个世界，指的就是这个意思。不过，我的方法并不能永久解决这个问题，只能当作一时的缓兵之计而已。

original: Who are you?
translated: #face0#你、你是……

original: Mouri Motonari! We met at the Honnou-Ji military council. I am Anegasaki Kenji, a retainer to the Matsuyama clan. I've just arrived.
translated: 阁下是毛利元就大人吧。我曾经在本能寺攻略战的军事会议中见过阁下。我是松山家的家臣，姐崎朝信的儿子，名为姐崎剑斗。我刚刚才到达“这边”，一到达就立刻赶来枫叶山丘了。

original: The Mouri welcome you to Momijigaoka, Matsuyama clan. My sons and I were the first to arrive, so we set up a base of operations. We must all work together, under my guidance, to adjust to this new world.
translated: #face1#欢迎来到枫叶山丘。不知道该说是幸运还是不幸，我和我的三个儿子是最先到达“这边”这个世界的。为了方便联合军再次聚集在一起，我们就在枫叶山丘建起了这个本阵。同时，我们也在帮忙之后到达的各位尽快适应这个世界。

original: what do you mean 'adjust'?
translated: 帮忙适应这个世界？

original: Attempt to move as you normally would, Anegasaki Kenji.
translated: #face0#那就请剑斗你先确认一下，看看现在的自己是否能够活动自如吧。

original: A report has just come in about soldiers in dark armor circling the outskirts of Momijigaoka.
translated: 剑斗。刚刚负责盯守枫叶山丘外围的哨兵传来了不好的消息。他们说，似乎有身穿黑色甲胄的士兵出现在了这附近。

original: Soldiers in dark armor... Oda! They must have been brought to this world as well!
translated: 黑色甲胄……难道是织田军的士兵？果然不出所料，织田军也来到“这边”这个世界了啊！

original: There is no doubt they are Oda's soldiers. However, I am sure they have not discovered the base. Their movements are too erratic.
translated: 根据哨兵的描述，这些士兵应该就是织田军的人。不过，敌兵并没有摆出什么阵型，也没有携带什么武器装备，应该是织田军的侦察兵吧。

original: It is only a matter of time before they stumble onto our nest, most likely due to blind luck. We would be best served if someone were to go fight them. Don't you think, Hayato?
translated: 他们现在应该还没有注意到我们这个本阵的存在。但是再让他们这样侦查下去，恐怕枫叶山丘被敌人发现也不过是时间的问题了。我相信剑斗你应该有能力阻止敌人的侦查。不知道这个任务可不可以交给你来负责呢？

original: Well then, I suppose you should get to work. The reports mention Maple Hill Road. I would expect resistance, and I would not be surprised if you find more difficult than you expected.
translated: 谢谢，有你在真是太好了。从本阵的东门移动到枫叶坡道后，应该就可以看到敌军的侦察兵了。只要能击退大概30名左右的敌军，应该就可以阻止他们的侦查了。好了，接下来就拜托你了。

original: This battle is not over, yet I feel a sense of peace. This world is not so different from my own.
translated: 距离最初来到这个世界，已经过去多长时间了呢？当时，我在陌生的丘陵醒来，发现身体完全不听自己的控制。后来才知道，原来是因为日本和这个世界的物理法则不同，才导致出现这样的问题。就因为这个缘故，我一开始就连想击败训练用的人偶都需要花上不少的力气，实在是太丢脸了。

original: I feel like my old self, yet stronger. I believe this world holds many new challenges for me.
translated: 不过在那之后，我又经历了各种各样的事情，逐渐开始适应要如何在这个世界活动自己的身体了。虽说还没有彻底恢复原本的力量，但身体至少变得听话了很多。

original: I have not yet regained all of my Battoujutsu skills, but one day they will return. One day, the falcon will take flight once again.
translated: 好久没有用过的那些剑术，现在应该也可以重新开始使用了。相信只要脚踏实地坚持修行，那么终有一日，我一定能够自由自在地使出原本所有的秘藏剑术来。虽说目前还很难完全实现这一点，但一定要继续努力下去才是。

original: Please make space in your Equip inventory.
translated: 获得<无敌剑豪的勋章>勋章

original: Kanna! Get your legs about you, we have work to do. Oh that's right... You don't know what happened yet. So pay attention. I won't repeat this. Repeat: I will NOT repeat this.
translated: #face0#哦哦，这不是神那大人吗？神那大人也平安到达“这边”了啊。你现在的思绪肯定还很混乱，等你休息好后，我们再来说说现在的情况吧。

original: #face0#I feel great! The spiritual energy in the mushroom beefed up my reserves.
translated: #face0#哦哦，很好，就是这个！有了这个寄宿着灵力的蘑菇，就足够让我用来扩张灵力储备量的了。你稍等一下哦。

original: #face0#(Munch, munch, munch.)
translated: #face0#（嚼嚼）

original: #face0#Carrying you should be a piece of cake now. Let me know when you need a ride. I'll just be chomping on more of this delicious mushroom.
translated: #face0#嗯……嗯，很好，我能感觉得到。这样一来，完全可以让你骑在我的身上进行移动啦。如果你需要骑上来的时候，就不要客气尽管说哦。

original: #face0#Kanna, our spiritual power is returning. My fur is buzzing.
translated: #face0#神那，神那。看来你已经适应该如何在冒险岛控制灵力了嘛。和之前相比，你提供给我的灵力也多了不少呢。

original: #face0#I think I can maintain my original form now! Look out Nobunaga, Haku and Kanna are gonna fox you up!
translated: #face0#有了这些灵力，我维持原本模样的时间也能延长许多了……只要多少控制一下外形的大小，就完全可以让你坐在我的身上一起移动了。

original: #face0#Oh... But I don't have a way to store the spiritual energy. We need Mouri Takamoto's help. Could you ask him? Pretty please?
translated: #face0#不过，就算你所提供的灵力已经足够了，但现在的我却没有合适的容器去收置这些灵力……如果能得到什么可以扩张灵力储备的东西就好了……不知道枫叶山丘的隆景手里有没有什么合适的东西呢？他似乎负责调配着多种多样的东西，你记得去找他问问看吧。

original: #face0#Kanna, please come to Momijigaoka. We have news.
translated: #face0#神那。我有重要的事情和你说，请你立刻返回枫叶山丘。

original: I wonder what's going on? I hope Oda's Army isn't on the move.
translated: （这么突然，到底是出什么事了呢？难道是织田军又有什么新的动向了吗？总之，还是快点返回枫叶山丘去看看情况吧。）

original: #face0#Kanna, your strength returns. I am nothing short of amazed at your fervor. Both Sokoku and Maple World shall remember your name.
translated: 找回了失去的记忆.

original: Not bad, not bad. Thanks.
translated: 你比我想象中还要快啊。谢谢你。

original: Let me take a look and I'll surely find a way to lift the spell. Come back later.
translated: 我来看一看，有没有能解除咒术的方法。你就待会再来吧。

original: Good, you're here! I was about to pick another fight
translated: 嗯……我想不起来放哪儿了。那上面写着解除咒术的方法……反正不是什么重要的信。

original: We have a problem, and it's not a lack of conditioner. I'll tell ya that!
translated: 哈哈哈哈，真正的男人丢了#fn12#小#fn10#东西的时候就不应该斤斤计较！

original: That warrior you found is in a coma. Lost their fight with consciousness. I guess. I had a letter somewhere here from Momijigaoka (He smashes boxes and chairs looking for the letter )
translated: 我记得，信上写着最近织田军中连普通士兵都学习了咒术，因此武将即使把伤养好也醒不过来。

original: Hm... I don't remember where I left it. It had the instructions on how to lift the spell.. Well, it wasn't that important anyway
translated: 为了解除那个咒术，需要做几件事。你能帮我吗？

original: Ha ha ha, a real man never sweats over losing such unimportant things!
translated: 哈哈，我就知道你会帮我的。

original: As I recall, the Oda army is teaching wicked spells to it's soliders. Maybe one of them knocked our new friend out of commission.
translated: 我们得先搜集有关咒术的情报。从这里的 #o9450024:#应该能获得一些线索吧？

original:
There are a couple things that need to get done to lift the spell.
You can help, right?
translated: 不用很多，只要30个就够分析了。那就拜托你啦！

original: Do you have the #i##z#?

Not bad-looking #i##z#, I have to say.
Let's mash it up and make that medicine.
translated: 为了培育#i4034128:##t4034128:#，真是辛苦你了。多亏了你，我们可以制造唤醒武将的药了。

original: Give me a minute to mix this stuff up. Takes me back to my bartending days.
translated: 我要制作治疗药，你能等一下吗？然后再重新和我对话吧。

original: Looking at those spell scrolls, I was able to remember the instructions on that letter on how to lift the spell. Just needed to jump-start the of noggin
translated: 多亏了你搜集到的咒术书，我想起了信上写的解除咒术的方法了。

original:
Unfortunately for you, lifting the spell requires more materials.
Better get to it!
translated: 为了解除这个咒术，还需要一个东西，你能再帮我一下吗？

original: This #v##z# is just what we need.
So, go to #m#, #m#, and #m#. Hunt #o# and #o# monsters to get these #i# #z# items. We need them to grow the #i# #z#.
If you run around #m#, #m#, and #m#. You'll see herb sprouts. Just drop one #z# on them.
translated: 你去#m811000004:#、#m811000005:#、#m811000006:#看看，留心观察，应该就能找到药草的种子，然后用那里的#t4009286:#提供营养就行。

original: You want to grow #v##z# to Stage 4 and you need 10 #z# items for each stage
Hm? Shingen didn't come here himself? How disappointing.
translated: 嗯？信玄公没来，派你来了？……我还以为信玄公会亲自来呢……

original: Regardless, I pass on the #i##z# to treat the warrior.
translated: 好吧……首先，为了治疗#i4034129:##t4034129:#新来的武将，把这个药交给你。

original: I'm sure she will awaken soon. Go to the Master Room to meet her
translated: 他应该马上就会醒来的。武将在堂主的房间里，你去看看吧。

original: The Master Room is to the left.
translated:
堂主的房间在这个地图的左边尽头。

（#b现在可以通过左边的传送点前往守卫房间了。）

original: I've made the medicine. It stinks like burning hair, so take it to #p# ASAP.
translated: 唤醒武将的药做好了。你代我转交给#p9130008:# 吧。

original: No way, this stuff smells viel. You do it.
translated: ……没什么。反正现在也走不了，你帮我转交一下这个吧。然后告诉他新来的武将是怎么来到这里的。

original: I can't go right now anyway, so just drop it off. Also ask her how and why she traveled all the way here.
Please bring this #i##z # to #p# in #m#.
translated: 其实我要走了……。

original: Ooh, I had SUCH a hard time getting here! I got to a really strange place and I was all tired and then...
translated: 哇，我还以为来这儿会死呢！我总是掉进奇怪的地方，真是累死了~

original: Speaking of wich, Takeda Shingen would like to know how you got here.
translated: 武田信玄大人想知道你是怎么来到这里的。

original: Takeda Shingen? The same Takeda Shingen that I knew before?
translated: 武田信玄？我所知道的那个武田信玄？……

original:
Ugh, that old fart. Tell him that Ayame has NOTHING to say to HIM.
Does he even have a SPECK of compassion? It's his fault I ended up like this!
translated: 那个爷爷真可笑。你要告诉武田信玄！我菖蒲可没什么好说的！那个死老头真没良心，也不看看是因为谁才做成了那件事的。

original: I get this impression you are not very fond of Takeda Shingen
translated: (她似乎对武田信玄大人没有好感……)

original:
Anyway, where is Sakuno? I have so much to tell her! Sakuno
Where are you! Sa-ku-no Sakuno? Sakuno!
translated: 话说回来，樱乃在哪儿？我有很多话要和她说呢。樱乃~樱乃~樱乃~你在哪儿~

original: Ayame!
translated: 菖蒲！

original: Eee! Sakuno! hee hee, how have you been? I MISSED YOU SO MUCH!
translated: 啊！樱乃。哈哈，樱乃，你还好吗？我可想死你了！
听说你回来了……我……我…………

original: I heard you were back and I... I...
translated: 哎~哎？别哭啊，樱乃。我这不是回来了吗！

original: Please accept my gratitude for the medicine. Thanks to you I am able to see Ayame once again.
translated: 谢谢你做了药。多亏了你，我才能看到菖蒲平安无事的样子，真是太好了。

original: You must have been suprised to see me like that. The truth is I have been indebted to Ayame.
translated: 让你看到我这么失态的样子，吓到你了吧。其实我一直很担心菖蒲。

original: Would you like to hear the whole story?
translated: 你要听听我说的话吗？

original: ... How did I get here? It's a long story and I'm pretty tired... Are you SURE you wanna hear it now?
translated: 你想知道我来这里的过程？说来话长……啊，真是麻烦……你要听吗？

original: Thanks for finding this!
translated: 谢谢你帮我找到松山家族的信物！

original: Good thing the Demon King couldn't be summoned completely... But y'know, I'm actually a little sad Princess No lost herself like that.
translated: 幸好魔王没有降临……不过她竟然迷失了自我，变成了妖怪。她……真是可怜。

original: Please defeat her for me. It's all we can do now.
translated: 请你代替我阻止她。

original: To stop Princess No, you need the key to Hieizan Temple. That's where she's holed up.
translated: 为了阻止浓姬，必须获得她所在的比睿山大殿的钥匙。

original: She left traces of herself at the small shrine of Hieizan when she ran. Her alter ego will drop the key to the real Princess No.
translated: 她在逃跑时，把自己的分身留在了比睿山的小祠堂。从那个分身那里就能获得可以找到真正浓姬的钥匙。

original: I managed to sneak a copy of the key. Let me know if you want to use it to go to Princess No.
translated: 我在之前已经潜入到本阵，拿到了钥匙。和我对话的话，我会给你去往真浓姬的钥匙。

original: When I was here a long time ago, I saw a small temple at the very end of Hieizan. Only Princess No was allowed to enter.
translated: 我以前在这的时候，比睿山的深处有一个小祠堂。除了浓姬，谁也不能进去那里。

original: Did you really find my bag?
translated: 谢谢你！真的太感谢你了！

original: Thank you! Thank you so much.
translated: 你帮我找到包裹了吗？

original: *Sniff*
(A boy in a place like this? Quite suspicious. And crying at that. I should just... pretend I didn't see.)
translated: (在这里居然有这样的少年。太奇怪了。而且还在哭……还是不要管他为好。)

original: *Sniff* WAHHHH.... Wait, is that... Is somebody there? Please, help me!
translated: 呜……呜呜……嗯？人……人……！请你帮帮我！

original: Ergh... What's wrong?
translated: ((真是的……) 怎么了？

original: I used to serve the alliance military. I took care of the horses. We were led here from the guard post and... I guess passed out in all the chaos.
translated: 呜呜，我是照看盟军马的侍童，被人从哨所带到了这里。我因为受到冲击，昏了过去，一睁眼就在这儿了。

original: Where are the other alliance soldiers?
translated: (盟军在这里？)……其他盟军士兵去哪里了？

original: All the soldiers went... I don't know. They're strange now. I-I'm scared. I want to get out of here. Could you find my sack for me?
translated: 士兵们都变得好奇怪……好……好可怕。我想离开这里，请你帮我找找我的行李吧。

original: It's the only thing I have to remember my father by. I'm pretty sure I dropped it somewhere close by but I can't see, it's too dark.
translated: 那是我父亲最后留下的遗物。应该是掉在这附近了……但是因为太黑了，看不清在哪儿。

original: All the soldiers went... I don't know. They're strange now. I-I'm scared. I want to get out of here. Could you find my sack for me?
translated: 那是个非常漂亮有花纹的包裹。

original: What...? The soldiers are being brainwashed?
translated: 啊……？你说士兵的精神都被操控了？

original: The alliance men? Last I saw, the Spirit Walkers were giving them some weird potions and casting spells, then they turned strange. What could have happened?
translated: 盟军士兵？我最后看见的是阴阳师让他们吃了什么药，然后念了咒术，他们就变得很奇怪。

original: Please save them. They were so good to me, almost like fathers.
translated: 请你找到那些士兵吧。他们对于失去了父亲的我，十分照顾……

original: I saw the Oda Spirit Walkers nearby. Maybe we can get some information from them.
translated: 我看见了附近有织田军的阴阳师。从他们那里应该能得到什么情报吧。

original: Thank you for your help! I think defeating about 100 Oda Spirit Walkers will give you enough leads.
translated: 谢谢你能帮我！消灭100个织田军的阴阳师，应该就能找到线索了吧？

original: Yes, that's it. That's the jar I saw.
translated: 没错，我看到的坛子就是这个。

original: Do you think that this will help turn the soldiers back to normal?
translated: 难道……这个就能帮助恢复士兵吗？

original: What's this?
translated: 这是什么？

original: Before I passed out, one of the soldiers gave me this note.
translated: 在我昏迷之前……有位一起被抓的士兵给我的纸条。

original: (You open the note.) 'The Oda Spirit Walker Jars can hold innocent souls. Ask someone to do that for our souls.'
translated: (打开纸条)“织田军阴阳师的三色坛子据说可以装进纯粹的灵魂。请拜托别人把我们的灵魂装进那个坛子里。’

original: ...Welp, I guess there isn't actually a way to turn them back.
translated: ……看来终究是没办法恢复了。

original: I saw an Oda Spirit Walker carrying a suspicious jar. I think that might be what they are referring to. Can you get some for me, please?
translated: 我看到了织田军的阴阳师从袖子里拿出了坛子，纸条上说的似乎就是那个。你能把那个带给我吗？

original: They were such good people... I'm sad that this is the only thing we can do.
translated: 他们真的都很好……我却不能为他们做些什么，好难过。

original: Thank you for all your help. Even brainwashed, it couldn't have been easy taking their souls...
translated: 辛苦你了，即使精神被操纵了，要把同为盟军的士兵灵魂装进坛子里也不是件容易的事情啊……

original: But thanks to your bravery, their souls can be free now.
translated: 但是，正因为你勇敢的行动，他们的灵魂才能得到安息。

original: A jar of souls... It sounds terrible, but I guess it's the best we can do.
translated: 这个坛子原来可以聚集灵魂啊……虽然很可怕……但也没办法了。

original: Would you please help me gather those poor souls?
translated: 你能帮我把可怜的盟军士兵的灵魂装到里面去吗？

original: Thank you. I feel a lot better.
translated: 谢谢你，多亏了你，我总算能轻松一点了。

original: Eliminate 100 #o9450031:# monsters in #m811000015:# to fill this jar.
Woo! It's quite heavy now. Feel all those souls...
translated: 这个有150人的坛子还真的有点重呢。

original: It's VERY full!
translated: 好~满~啊

original: You did a great job filling up this red jar! I just know that you will do the same with the blue jar.
translated: 红色坛子已经装满了，蓝色坛子也应该很快就能装满的。

original: Hope you can still help with filling the jar... This is all for the souls of those men...
translated: 你会继续帮我的吧？这都是为了盟军士兵们……

original: The second jar will fill if you eliminate about 150 #o9450032:# monsters in #m811000016:#.
translated: 第二个的坛子，只要消灭150个#m811000016:#的#o9450032:#应该就能装满了。

original: Please hurry to get this job done.
translated: 请快点处理吧。

original: Thank you! This jar looks good, #h0#.
translated: 谢谢！多亏了#h0#，坛子都装满了。

original: Now we just have to wrap them up...
translated: 现在我们得好好保管这些坛子。

original: Give me a second, okay?
translated: 请你等一下再和我对话。

original: The last one is the yellow jar, heh.
translated: 最后就剩下黄色坛子了。

original: Thank you for all your hard work, but could you please help me just ONCE more?
translated: 之前已经很辛苦了……不过你能最后帮我一次吗？

original: I promise, I SWEAR this is the last one! After this, the alliance men can truly rest...
translated: 真的……绝对是……最后一次。只要这次做完，盟军士兵们就都能得到安息了。

original: The third jar will fill up after you take down 200 #o9450033:# monsters of #m811000017:#...
Woo, I know. I also wonder how so many alliance soldiers ended up like this.
translated: 咻，真不知道盟军士兵怎么就变成这样了。

original: You got here faster than I thought. Figures, since you aren't carrying anything.
translated: 你来得真快啊。也是，因为你是空手来的嘛。

original: Whoof! As for me, I'm all worn out from carrying ALL these jars. My arms are about to FALL OFF!
translated: 咻，坛子实在太重了，我本来想叫你拿来的，我的手臂现在好痛。

original: ...Which means you should offer to carry these for me. Here.
translated: 所以，请你赶紧拿着这坛子吧。

original: Here, I wrapped up the jars you gave me with my bag cloth.
translated: 我把#h0#装满的坛子都包好了。

original: Isn't this cloth nice? My mother made it herself, hee hee.
translated: 这个包裹皮很漂亮吧？这是我妈妈亲自做的。

original: (You felt it earlier, too... The floral prints are actually kind of unpleasant. Ugly. But you hold your tongue.)
translated: (这个包裹皮的花纹也太土了，真不好看。不过还是别说了。)

original: Now, I'll meet you at #m811000018:#. That's where you want to place the jars.
translated: 让我们在 #m811000018:#见吧。把这些坛子放在那里应该就行。

original: #m811000018:# is just past #m811000017:#. I'll see you there.

Just place these jars on the stone altar in front of the east tower over there.
Simple, right? I've heard that that area is the best spot...
translated: 把这些坛子放在东塔前面的石阶上就行。简单吧？那里可是风水宝地……

original: Did you know? There are a lot of souls floating around in this temple.
translated: 你知道吗？这个废弃寺院里游荡着很多灵魂。

original: (You feel something strange. He doesn't seem like the same boy you met earlier.)
translated: (感觉到了奇怪的气息，眼前的人和一开始的少年似乎不是一个人。)

original: Now, go on. Place the jars on that altar.
translated: 请你把这些坛子放在石阶上吧。

original: Simply click the altar.
translated: 点击石阶就能放上去了。

original: Whew, I guess things won't get any worse.
translated: 咻，先得阻止精神操纵才行。

original: The boy must be outside, I should follow him.
translated: 少年似乎不在这里，去外面看看吧。

original: Hm? What is this place? I should check it out.
translated: 嗯？那个入口是什么。去那里看看吧。

original: Maybe he went in that way.
translated: 总感觉能进去那里。

original: Looks like the boy went deeper into Hieizan.
translated: 为了寻找少年，似乎得离开这里，前往比睿山更深的地方。

original: Why is everyone gathered here? She is definitely scheming something.
translated: 为什么大家都在这里呢……她分明是有什么阴谋。

original: Enter the building.
translated: 进入建筑里面看看。

original: Where did she go? Something must be up, otherwise she wouldn't have left in such a hurry.
translated: 去哪儿了呢……似乎发生了什么事情，不然他也不会那么快就逃走。

original: I have to stop them.
translated: 我得尽快追上去阻止他。

original: Was it you who summoned me...
translated: ……真是太蠢了，虽然我已经想到你们会跟来的。

original: ...You're quite weak to summon one such as myself.
translated: 你难道认为至今你看到的都是真的？怎么可能。

original: I will not accept such a weak body... But I will reward you for summoning me... Muahaha.
translated: 这里是我创造的空间，从你进来的那一刻开始，这一切都是假的。

original: My wickedness shall strengthen your body.
translated: 这只不过是为了魔王降临，需要祭品，把盟军骗进来而已，哈哈。

original: She has already become...too wicked.
translated: 她已经……变成了非常强大的妖怪。

original: ...I should get the mirror to Ayame first.
translated: ……先把这个镜子交给菖蒲吧。

original: ...Everything was an illusion? Perhaps that's not the worst thing that's happened. But what was she trying to show me?
translated: ……所有的东西居然都是幻影。虽然这样也好，但是她究竟要做什么呢。

original: I still haven't found the shrine that Ayame talked about. Princess No must be there.
translated: 还没找到祠堂。浓姬肯定在那里。

original: The shrine is a little bit west of here.
translated: 祠堂在西边。

original: Did you really find my bag?
translated: 你帮我找到包裹了吗？

original: Thank you! Thank you so much.
translated: 谢谢你！真的太感谢你了！

original: *Sniff*
(A boy in a place like this? Quite suspicious. And crying at that. I should just... pretend I didn't see.)
translated: (在这里居然有这样的少年。太奇怪了。而且还在哭……还是不要管他为好。)

original: *Sniff* WAHHHH.... Wait, is that... Is somebody there? Please, help me!
translated: 呜……呜呜……嗯？人……人……！请你帮帮我！

original: Ergh... What's wrong?
translated: (真是的……) 怎么了？

original: I used to serve the alliance military. I took care of the horses. We were led here from the guard post and... I guess passed out in all the chaos.
translated: 呜呜，我是照看盟军马的侍童，被人从哨所带到了这里。我因为受到冲击，昏了过去，一睁眼就在这儿了。

original: Where are the other alliance soldiers?
translated: (盟军在这里？)……其他盟军士兵去哪里了？

original: All the soldiers went... I don't know. They're strange now. I-I'm scared. I want to get out of here. Could you find my sack for me?
translated: 士兵们都变得好奇怪……好……好可怕。我想离开这里，请你帮我找找我的行李吧。

original: It's the only thing I have to remember my father by. I'm pretty sure I dropped it somewhere close by but I can't see, it's too dark.
translated: 那是我父亲最后留下的遗物。应该是掉在这附近了……但是因为太黑了，看不清在哪儿。

original: What...? The soldiers are being brainwashed?
translated: 啊……？你说士兵的精神都被操控了？

original: The alliance men? Last I saw, the Spirit Walkers were giving them some weird potions and casting spells, then they turned strange. What could have happened?
translated: 盟军士兵？我最后看见的是阴阳师让他们吃了什么药，然后念了咒术，他们就变得很奇怪。

original: Please save them. They were so good to me, almost like fathers.
translated: 请你找到那些士兵吧。他们对于失去了父亲的我，十分照顾……

original: I saw the Oda Spirit Walkers nearby. Maybe we can get some information from them.
translated: 我看见了附近有织田军的阴阳师。从他们那里应该能得到什么情报吧。

original: Thank you for your help! I think defeating about 100 Oda Spirit Walkers will give you enough leads.
translated: 谢谢你能帮我！消灭100个织田军的阴阳师，应该就能找到线索了吧？

original: Yes, that's it. That's the jar I saw.
translated: 没错，我看到的坛子就是这个。

original: Do you think that this will help turn the soldiers back to normal?
translated: 难道……这个就能帮助恢复士兵吗？

original: What's this?
translated: 这是什么？

original: Before I passed out, one of the soldiers gave me this note.
translated: 在我昏迷之前……有位一起被抓的士兵给我的纸条。

original: (You open the note.) 'The Oda Spirit Walker Jars can hold innocent souls. Ask someone to do that for our souls.'
translated: (打开纸条)“织田军阴阳师的三色坛子据说可以装进纯粹的灵魂。请拜托别人把我们的灵魂装进那个坛子里。’

original: ...Welp, I guess there isn't actually a way to turn them back.
translated: ……看来终究是没办法恢复了。

original: I saw an Oda Spirit Walker carrying a suspicious jar. I think that might be what they are referring to.
translated: 我看到了织田军的阴阳师从袖子里拿出了坛子，纸条上说的似乎就是那个。

original: They were such good people... I'm sad that this is the only thing we can do.
translated: 他们真的都很好……我却不能为他们做些什么，好难过。

original: Thank you for all your help. Even brainwashed, it couldn't have been easy taking their souls...
translated: 辛苦你了，即使精神被操纵了，要把同为盟军的士兵灵魂装进坛子里也不是件容易的事情啊……

original: But thanks to your bravery, their souls can be free now.
translated: 但是，正因为你勇敢的行动，他们的灵魂才能得到安息。

original: A jar of souls... It sounds terrible, but I guess it's the best we can do.
translated: 这个坛子原来可以聚集灵魂啊……虽然很可怕……但也没办法了。

original: Would you please help me gather those poor souls?
translated: 你能帮我把可怜的盟军士兵的灵魂装到里面去吗？

original: Thank you. I feel a lot better.
translated: 谢谢你，多亏了你，我总算能轻松一点了。

original: Eliminate 100 #o9450031:# monsters in #m811000015:# to fill this jar.
Woo! It's quite heavy now. Feel all those souls...
translated: 这个有150人的坛子还真的有点重呢。

original: It's VERY full!
translated: 好~满~啊

original: You did a great job filling up this red jar! I just know that you will do the same with the blue jar.
translated: 红色坛子已经装满了，蓝色坛子也应该很快就能装满的。

original: Hope you can still help with filling the jar... This is all for the souls of those men...
translated: 你会继续帮我的吧？这都是为了盟军士兵们……

original: The second jar will fill if you eliminate about 150 #o9450032:# monsters in #m811000016:#.

original: Please hurry to get this job done.

original: Thank you! This jar looks good, #h0#.
translated: 谢谢！多亏了#h0#，坛子都装满了。

original: Now we just have to wrap them up...

Woo, I know. I also wonder how so many alliance soldiers ended up like this.
translated: 咻，真不知道盟军士兵怎么就变成这样了。

original: You got here faster than I thought. Figures, since you aren't carrying anything.
translated: 你来得真快啊。也是，因为你是空手来的嘛。

original: Whoof! As for me, I'm all worn out from carrying ALL these jars. My arms are about to FALL OFF!
translated: 咻，坛子实在太重了，我本来想叫你拿来的，我的手臂现在好痛。

original: ...Which means you should offer to carry these for me. Here.
translated: 所以，请你赶紧拿着这坛子吧。

original: Here, I wrapped up the jars you gave me with my bag cloth.

original: Isn't this cloth nice? My mother made it herself, hee hee.
translated: 这个包裹皮很漂亮吧？这是我妈妈亲自做的。

original: (You felt it earlier, too... The floral prints are actually kind of unpleasant. Ugly. But you hold your tongue.)
translated: (这个包裹皮的花纹也太土了，真不好看。不过还是别说了。)

original: Now, I'll meet you at #m811000018:#. That's where you want to place the jars.
translated: 让我们在 #m811000018:#见吧。把这些坛子放在那里应该就行。

original: #m811000018:# is just past #m811000017:#. I'll see you there.

Just place these jars on the stone altar in front of the east tower over there.
Simple, right? I've heard that that area is the best spot...

original: (You feel something strange. He doesn't seem like the same boy you met earlier.)

translated: 咻，先得阻止精神操纵才行。

translated: 少年似乎不在这里，去外面看看吧。

original: Hm? What is this place? I should check it out.
translated: 嗯？那个入口是什么。去那里看看吧。

original: Maybe he went in that way.
translated: 总感觉能进去那里。

original: Looks like the boy went deeper into Hieizan.
translated: 为了寻找少年，似乎得离开这里，前往比睿山更深的地方。

original: Is that a carp...?
translated: 为什么奇怪的鲤鱼……

original: Is the boy in there? Maybe he no longer matters... I'll find out when I enter.
translated: 那个少年会在建筑里吗？其实那个少年可能不重要……总之先进去看看吧。

original: Where did he go? Something must be up, otherwise he wouldn't have left in such a hurry.
translated: 去哪儿了呢……似乎发生了什么事情，不然他也不会那么快就逃走。

original: I have to stop them.
translated: 我得尽快追上去阻止他。

original: Was it you who summoned me...
translated: ……真是太蠢了，虽然我已经想到你们会跟来的。

original: ...You're quite weak to summon one such as myself.
translated: 你难道认为至今你看到的都是真的？怎么可能。

original: I will not accept such a weak body... But I will reward you for summoning me... Muahaha.
translated: 这里是我创造的空间，从你进来的那一刻开始，这一切都是假的。

translated: 这只不过是为了魔王降临，需要祭品，把盟军骗进来而已，哈哈。

original: ...Everything was an illusion? Perhaps that's not the worst thing that's happened. But what was she trying to show me?

original: I still haven't found the shrine that Ayame talked about. Princess No must be there.
translated: 还没找到菖蒲说的祠堂。浓姬肯定在那里。

original: The shrine is a little bit west of here.
translated: 祠堂在西边。

original: Did you really find my bag?
translated: 谢谢你！真的太感谢你了！

original: Thank you! Thank you so much.
translated: 你帮我找到包裹了吗？

original: *Sniff*
(A boy in a place like this? Quite suspicious. And crying at that. I should just... pretend I didn't see.)
translated: (在这里居然有这样的少年。太奇怪了。而且还在哭……还是不要管他为好。)

original: *Sniff* WAHHHH.... Wait, is that... Is somebody there? Please, help me!
translated: 呜……呜呜……嗯？人……人……！请你帮帮我！

original: Ergh... What's wrong?
translated: (真是的……) 怎么了？

original: I used to serve the alliance military. I took care of the horses. We were led here from the guard post and... I guess passed out in all the chaos.
translated: 呜呜，我是照看盟军马的侍童，被人从哨所带到了这里。我因为受到冲击，昏了过去，一睁眼就在这儿了。

original: The alliance army is here? ...Where are the other alliance soldiers?
translated: (盟军在这里？)……其他盟军士兵去哪里了？

original: All the soldiers went... I don't know. They're strange now. I-I'm scared. I want to get out of here. Could you find my sack for me?
translated: 士兵们都变得好奇怪……好……好可怕。我想离开这里，请你帮我找找我的行李吧。

original: It's the only thing I have to remember my father by. I'm pretty sure I dropped it somewhere close by but I can't see, it's too dark.
translated: 那是我父亲最后留下的遗物。应该是掉在这附近了……但是因为太黑了，看不清在哪儿。

original: What...? The soldiers are being brainwashed?
translated: 啊……？你说士兵的精神都被操控了？

original: The alliance men? Last I saw, the Spirit Walkers were giving them some weird potions and casting spells, then they turned strange. What could have happened?
translated: 盟军士兵？我最后看见的是阴阳师让他们吃了什么药，然后念了咒术，他们就变得很奇怪。

original: Please save them. They were so good to me, almost like fathers.
translated: 请你找到那些士兵吧。他们对于失去了父亲的我，十分照顾……

original: I saw the Oda Spirit Walkers nearby. Maybe we can get some information from them.
translated: 我看见了附近有织田军的阴阳师。从他们那里应该能得到什么情报吧。

original: Thank you for your help! I think defeating about 100 Oda Spirit Walkers will give you enough leads.
translated: 谢谢你能帮我！消灭100个织田军的阴阳师，应该就能找到线索了吧？

original: Yes, that's it. That's the jar I saw.
translated: 没错，我看到的坛子就是这个。

original: Do you think that this will help turn the soldiers back to normal?
translated: 难道……这个就能帮助恢复士兵吗？

original: What's this?

translated: 在我昏迷之前……有位一起被抓的士兵给我的纸条。

original: They were such good people... I'm sad that this is the only thing we can do.
translated: 他们真的都很好……我却不能为他们做些什么，好难过。

original: Thank you for all your help. Even brainwashed, it couldn't have been easy taking their souls...
translated: 辛苦你了，即使精神被操纵了，要把同为盟军的士兵灵魂装进坛子里也不是件容易的事情啊……

original: But thanks to your bravery, their souls can be free now.
translated: 但是，正因为你勇敢的行动，他们的灵魂才能得到安息。

original: A jar of souls... It sounds terrible, but I guess it's the best we can do.
translated: 这个坛子原来可以聚集灵魂啊……虽然很可怕……但也没办法了。

original: Would you please help me gather those poor souls?
translated: 你能帮我把可怜的盟军士兵的灵魂装到里面去吗？

original: Thank you. I feel a lot better.
translated: 谢谢你，多亏了你，我总算能轻松一点了。

original: Eliminate 100 #o9450031:# monsters in #m811000015:# to fill this jar.

translated: 第二个的坛子，只要消灭150个#m811000016:#的#o9450032:#应该就能装满了。

translated: 之前已经很辛苦了……不过你能最后帮我一次吗？

original: I promise, I SWEAR this is the last one! After this, the alliance men can truly rest...
translated: 真的……绝对是……最后一次。只要这次做完，盟军士兵们就都能得到安息了。

original: The third jar will fill up after you take down 200 #o9450033:# monsters of #m811000017:#...
Woo, I know. I also wonder how so many alliance soldiers ended up like this.
translated: 咻，真不知道盟军士兵怎么就变成这样了。

original: You got here faster than I thought. Figures, since you aren't carrying anything.
translated: 你来得真快啊。也是，因为你是空手来的嘛。

original: Whoof! As for me, I'm all worn out from carrying ALL these jars. My arms are about to FALL OFF!
translated: 咻，坛子实在太重了，我本来想叫你拿来的，我的手臂现在好痛。

original: ...Which means you should offer to carry these for me. Here.
translated: 所以，请你赶紧拿着这坛子吧。

original: Here, I wrapped up the jars you gave me with my bag cloth.
translated: 我把#h0#装满的坛子都包好了。

original: Isn't this cloth nice? My mother made it herself, hee hee.
translated: 这个包裹皮很漂亮吧？这是我妈妈亲自做的。

original: (You felt it earlier, too... The floral prints are actually kind of unpleasant. Ugly. But you hold your tongue.)
translated: (这个包裹皮的花纹也太土了，真不好看。不过还是别说了。)

original: Now, I'll meet you at #m811000018:#. That's where you want to place the jars.
translated: 让我们在 #m811000018:#见吧。把这些坛子放在那里应该就行。

original: #m811000018:# is just past #m811000017:#. I'll see you there.
...Something very regrettable is happening.
translated: …....发生了一件非常遗憾的事情。

original: What is it?
translated: 怎么了？

original: An ominous force has come in the wake of Oda Nobunaga and Princess No's attempts to cross dimensions. At this rate, we may be thrown fully into Maple World and disappear.
translated: 因为织田信长和浓姬的第二次时空转移，正在产生不稳定的气息。再这样下去，冒险岛世界终究会被时空转移，我们可能都会消失的。

original: Is there any way to stop that from happening?
translated: 难道没有办法能阻止他们吗？

original: The Demon King refused to cooperate with Princess No, but he also did not return to his domain. To send him back, we must eliminate Princess No, the summoner.
translated: 为了第二次时空转移而召唤的魔王既没有进浓姬体内，也没有回自己原来的所在之地。为了把魔王送回去，必须消灭召唤者浓姬。

original: The will of the five planets sent us a message. This should help us eliminate Princess No.
translated: 五星的意志……为了帮助我们，留下了口信。这应该有助于我们消灭浓姬。

original: Warriors shall inherit Mars's message, Magicians inherit Mercury's, Bowmen inherit Jupiter's, Thieves inherit Venus's, and Pirates inherit Saturn's.
translated: 战士要维承火之言灵，法师是水之言灵，弓箭手是木之言灵，盗贼是金之言灵，海盗是土之言灵。

original: We now have a solid reason to eliminate Princess No.
translated: 这下我们必须消灭浓姬的理由就变得更加明确了。

original:
Just place these jars on the stone altar in front of the east tower over there.
Simple, right? I've heard that that area is the best spot...
translated: 把这些坛子放在东塔前面的石阶上就行。简单吧？那里可是风水宝地……

original: Did you know? There are a lot of souls floating around in this temple.
translated: 你知道吗？这个废弃寺院里游荡着很多灵魂。

original: (You feel something strange. He doesn't seem like the same boy you met earlier.)
translated: (感觉到了奇怪的气息，眼前的人和一开始的少年似乎不是一个人。)

original: Now, go on. Place the jars on that altar.
translated: 请你把这些坛子放在石阶上吧。

original: Simply click the altar.
translated: 点击石阶就能放上去了。

original: Whew, I guess things won't get any worse.
translated: 咻，先得阻止精神操纵才行。

original: The boy must be outside, I should follow him.
translated: 少年似乎不在这里，去外面看看吧。

original: Hm? What is this place? I should check it out.
translated: 嗯？那个入口是什么。去那里看看吧。

original: Maybe he went in that way.
translated: 总感觉能进去那里。

original: Looks like the boy went deeper into Hieizan.
translated: 为了寻找少年，似乎得离开这里，前往比睿山更深的地方。

original: Hm, Princess No has some weird tastes.
translated: 嗯，看来浓姬的品味真是奇怪啊。

original: Is the boy in there? Maybe he no longer matters... I'll find out when I enter.
translated: 那个少年会在建筑里吗？其实那个少年可能不重要……总之先进去看看吧。

original: Where did he go? Something must be up, otherwise he wouldn't have left in such a hurry.
translated: 去哪儿了呢……似乎发生了什么事情，不然他也不会那么快就逃走。

original: I have to stop them.
translated: 我得尽快追上去阻止他。

original: Was it you who summoned me...
translated: ……真是太蠢了，虽然我已经想到你们会跟来的。

original: ...You're quite weak to summon one such as myself.
translated: 你难道认为至今你看到的都是真的？怎么可能。

original: I will not accept such a weak body... But I will reward you for summoning me... Muahaha.
translated: 这里是我创造的空间，从你进来的那一刻开始，这一切都是假的。

original: My wickedness shall strengthen your body.
translated: 这只不过是为了魔王降临，需要祭品，把盟军骗进来而已，哈哈。

original: She has already become...too wicked.
translated: 她已经……变成了非常强大的妖怪。

original: ...I should get the mirror to Ayame first.
translated: ……先把这个镜子交给菖蒲吧。

original: ...Everything was an illusion? Perhaps that's not the worst thing that's happened. But what was she trying to show me?
translated: ……所有的东西居然都是幻影。虽然这样也好，但是她究竟要做什么呢。

original: I still haven't found the shrine that Ayame talked about. Princess No must be there.
translated: 还没找到菖蒲说的祠堂。浓姬肯定在那里。

original: The shrine is a little bit west of here.
translated: 祠堂在西边。

original: Hilga, I am truly, deeply, totally, completely sorry.
translated: 赫卡大嫂,对不起……

original: You pulled this prank on me, #h #?
translated: 你这捣什么蛋啦?

original: I thought everyone would find it entertaining, but I was wrong. I'm epically heroically massively sorry. Will you forgive me?
translated: 是,对不起。我只是想让大家快乐……

original: Sigh. You're still young, so I suppose I have to let it slide. Don't do it again, okay?
translated: 哎,每天都吊儿郎当的……好吧,这次我就放过你,不过绝对不会有下次咯?

original: #b#h ##k, are you responsible for this? I know it's fun to pick on #b#p9390305##k, but it's really not very nice.
translated:
那是你做的吧?
这会让#b#p9390305##k很为难的。

original: I'm ashamed of you. Go apologise to #b#p9390305##k!
translated: 赶紧过去和#b#p9390305##k道歉吧。

original: A true hero is never afraid to apologise!
translated: 知错能改,也是作为英雄的一个条件哦。

original: I'm going to give the most epic apology ever!
translated:
英雄的条件!
是!那我赶紧回去道歉。

original: Hi, Bran... I'm really sorry...
translated: 布兰，对不起……

original: I knew it was you...
translated: 切,我就知道是你干的。

original: I'm super sorry. I solemnly swear I will never pull another prank on you, upon my honor as an aspiring hero.
translated:
嘿嘿,抱歉。以后我不会再调皮了。
因为我要成为英雄嘛!

original: Also, I saw #b#p9390306##k crying... Do you know anything about that?
translated: 那个#b#p9390306##k好像在哭，不知道是不是因为我的那个玩笑而哭的？

original: Well...
translated: 不行!得懂得珍惜朋友啊。赶紧去给#b#p9390306##k道歉吧。

original: #b#h ##k! You have to treat your friends better! Apologise to #b#p9390306##k!
translated: 是!珍惜朋友也是成为英雄的条件之一啊!

original: What is this with you and that hero thing? Do you really think you're cut out to be a hero?
translated: 等等,你刚才说,你会成为英雄?

original: Sure, I'm going to be a legend, just like the five Maple Heroes!
translated: 嗯!我一定会成为冒险岛5大英雄一样的大英雄!

original: Yeah. *snort* Sure.
translated:
切!!我一定会成为英雄的!
你怎么才会相信我呢?

original: You don't believe me? That's okay. What can I do to prove it to you?
translated:
若你敢进入村东#b野狼森林#k的话,我就相信你。
知道吗?那里危险的连大人们都不敢轻易进去呢!

original: You know #bWolf Forest#k to the east? The place even grown-ups are afraid of? Go there... ALONE. Then maybe I'll believe you'll be a hero someday.
translated: 好,我去去就来!

original: You got it! Be back in a jiffy!
translated: 哇,真的?不要勉强啊。

original: W-wait! Really? Are you sure?
translated: 哼,要想当英雄,这点程度就应该不在话下才是!

original: Bah, a hero like me ain't scared of no forest!
translated: 可笑啊,你怎么可能?

original: #fs 24#(You've received a letter from #b#p##k from Mount Song Hamlet.)
translated: #fs25#(嵩山镇的#b#p9310049##k寄来了书信。)

original: I hope this finds you well, #h0#. I am the elder of #b#m##k. We have have of your great deeds for other realms. We are in dire need of your assistance.
translated: 你可能记不得我和#b#m701210000##k了。但是，现在能够帮助我们的人就只有#h0#了。

original: The details are sensitive. I would like to discuss them in person. Will you join me at #b#m##k?
translated: 我希望能够当面和你说说详细情况，你能来#b#m701210000##k吗？

original: Thank you. I await you at #b#m##k.
translated: 谢谢你能这么爽快地答应下来。情况紧急，请你现在就出发吧。请你到#b#m701210000##k来找我吧。

original: You bear a message from #b#p##k?
translated: 你带来了#b#p9310049##k的书信啊。

original: So, demons have spread as far as Mount Song Hamlet... Something must be done...
translated: 这……妖怪居然都已经到了嵩山镇。嗯……嗯……问题很严重啊……

original: While the outside world moves and sways to its own rhythm, things here in the depths of Mount Song stay the same. Every tree, every blade of grass, we are still.
translated: 哦，谢谢你能这么快就赶来。看来你已经不记得嵩山镇了吧……真是不知道外面的世界发生了怎样的变化。这里还是没变，一草一木，都还是原来的样子。

original: But disturbing rumors have arisen lately... Of demons and petty theft. By which I mean, demons stealing children's shoes.
translated: 但是，最近村子里开始流传一些不祥的传闻。说什么有鬼怪出现，偷走了童鞋，这不是童话里才有的故事吗？

original: I knew things had truly gone amiss when I saw the wild-haired Nine-Tailed Fox lurking in the woods.
translated: 我一开始也不相信……但是，我在树林里亲眼看见了披头散发的九尾狐。

original: I've sent several messages tot he Shaolin Temple. It's their job to protect Mount Song, after all. But bandits keep intercepting the messages.
translated: 我们不能就这么束手待毙，所以我给保护嵩山镇的嵩山少林寺送了几次信，但都被盗贼中途抢走了，这可怎么办？

original: That is why I sent for you... Will you retrieve my messages from the bandits and deliver them to my old friend, the #r#p##k of Shaolin Temple?
translated: 我希望你能帮我从盗贼手里抢回书信，交给我的老友--#r嵩山少林寺的方丈大师#k。这样的话，我们应该就能知道如何应对现在这个情况了。你能帮帮我们吗？

original: Thank you. I will be here meditating until you return with good news.
translated: 谢谢你，希望你回来的时候能带来好消息。

original: Well, then. I suppose are YOU human. How unexpected.
translated: 我之前还对你有所怀疑，对不起。现在这里的情况不妙，请进吧。

original: These demons are really becoming a problem.
translated: 你的脸色看上去不太好啊。这可怎么办……我希望你能在这里多留一会，帮助我们消灭妖怪。

original: This is troubling... The demons have extended their reach to Mount Song Hamlet...
translated: 这……妖怪已经到了嵩山镇，大事不妙啊！

original: Yeah, you know I thought you guys were supposed to be professional demon slayers or something, but things look ever worse here than back in town.
translated: 郑长老说，#b#p9310053##k知道村子里发生那些怪事的原因。不过，这里的情况看上去更糟……这是怎么回事？

original: It is a sad tale... Long ago, the demons were sealed within the Sutra Depository. Now and then, a few would break free and play pranks on the towns people...
translated: 其实，在很久之前，藏经阁里的妖怪解除了封印。那时，我们少林寺虽然成功地重新封印了妖怪，但偶尔还是会有妖怪逃出去袭击村民。

original: But we of the Shaolin Temple would suppress them, using the power of zen and prayer beads.
translated: 即便如此，在我的佛珠和人们的祈祷作用下，事情都很快得到了解决。

original: But lately, the demon presence has been overwhelming. Could there be a problem with the Sutra Depository?
translated: 可是最近，有无数妖怪解开了封印，从这里逃了出去。在我看来，还是藏经阁出了问题。你看到我的身后了吗？妖怪们的气息就像烟雾一样到处蔓延。

original: Why don't you go investigate the Mahavira Hall?
translated: 百闻不如一见。你去大雄宝殿看看吧。

original: So, how'd everything go?
translated: 秘药有效吗？

original: You said the demons were going to disappear but MORE of them appeared! I almost died!
translated: 别说消灭妖怪了，那个药一下子引来了几十只妖怪！！

original: Yeah, that's what I was afraid of. I'll alter some ingredients... Maybe add in some extra bananas...
translated: 啊，这个……我还以为这次能行呢。嗯……那要试试这个秘药吗……？？

original: (You don't want to be the one to test the new potion after what just happened. Maybe it's time to go talk to the #b#p9310053##k...)
translated: ……(这不是驱散妖怪的秘药，而是聚集妖怪的秘药吧。回去找#b#p9310053##k吧。)

original: Let me guess. You were sent to help me. Why do they always send me the runts?
translated: 你就是我的新弟子？嗯，虽然看上去有点弱，不过也没得选了！

original: I've spent many sleepless nights concocting this #v##t#. Go test it out. If my calculations are correct, the result will be miraculous
translated: 我可是熬了好几个夜晚才制作出了#i2434568#  #t2434568#，你能帮我进行一下测试吗？由于还没到完成阶段，因此需要进行很多测试才行。

original: Please make some space in your inventory.
translated: 你到没人去的#b#m701210160##k那边试试吧。

original: Try it out at #b#m##k.
translated: #b#m701210160##k是人们进行祭祀的神圣之地，而现在却成了一个灵魂乐园。你前往#b#m701210160##k，在那些怪物身上使用秘药吧。顺利的话，它们就会化作一缕青烟，消失殆尽。你能做到吧？

original: #b#m##k was once a sacred spot where we performed holy rituals. Now it's become a playground for demons. Spritz my potion there to get rid of them.
translated: 这个……应该不会有副作用吧？

original: Uh, will there be any side effects?
translated: 这个嘛……我倒还没想过呢。好了，你快去吧，没时间磨蹭了！

original: Oh! The #bBook of Demons#k! You didn't... You didn't open the book, did you?
translated: #fs20#哦哦……！！！你终于找到了#b#t4034637##k！你看过这本书了吗？

original: I didn't have time. I was too busy rushing back here so we can save the world!
translated: 没有，我一拿到手就赶了过来，没有打开。难道有什么问题……？

original: Wonderful. You did beautifully. Now, off with you. Rest Up. You've earned it. I have things do.
translated:
啊，没什么，太，太好了……太好了，哈哈哈。
那你现在可以回去了。剩下的事情就交给我来处理吧。

original: (Whoa. the #b#p##k rushed out of here. That book must be filled with really great info. His eyes lit up when he opened it.
translated: (#b#p9310053##k急忙离开了。难道那本书里真的有能够消灭妖怪的妙计？他看到书的时候，似乎非常高兴。)

original: (Well, another job well done. Time to say goodbye to my favourite demon trio back at the #rSutra Depository Secret Library#k.)
translated:
(反正我该做的事情已经做完了，还是去和#b妖怪三人帮#k道个别吧。去
#r藏经阁秘密书库#k看看吧。)

original: Say farewell to the demons at the Sutra Depository Secret Library
translated: 去到[藏经阁秘密书库]和妖怪们说再见吧.

original: So the Demon B Gone didn't work? Oh well! Now, there's one other way...
translated: 这……妖怪驱散秘药没有什么效果？嗯，看来只剩下那个方法了。

original: (Why did the Head Priest send me to #b#p##k if he had so little faith in him?! What a waste of time!)
translated: (他看起来一点也不惊讶，似乎从一开始就没抱希望。#b#p9310046##k知道吗……

original: I hope your next idea is better than your last. You better fill me in.
translated: 那个方法？您还有什么妙计吗？

original: Long ago, my master, #bMonk Laomo#k, researched demons. He knew more about them than anyone He was the first to successfully seal the demons at the Sutra Depository.
translated: 从很久以前开始，我的师父#b老魔僧#k就在研究妖怪。师父比任何人都要了解妖怪。第一个成功在藏经阁设下封印的就是师父。

original: Let's ask HIM to help us!
translated: 那您的师父现在在哪里呢？我们能得到他的帮助就好了。

original: We can't. He left a long time ago to train and has never returned. But he did write a book about his research before he left, called #v##b#t##k.
translated: 他在很久以前就出发去修炼，再也没回来。师父研究妖怪，写下了#b#i4034637##t4034637##k。那本书就应该保存在藏经阁。

original: Can I entrust you with the task of searching for that book, #h0#?
translated: #h0#能帮我去找一找吗？我相信你。

original: The #v##b#t##k must hold some clue about how to get rid of the demons. Locate that book as soon as possible. The fate of the entire world is at stake!
translated: 谢谢。在#b#i4034637##t4034637##k里似乎有能够消灭妖怪的线索。请你尽快找到它。如果放任妖怪继续兴风作浪，不光是嵩山镇，整个世界都会遭殃。

original: Hey, #b#p##k... Why didn't your teacher impart any of his knowledge on you before he left?
translated: 但是，#b#p9310053##k为什么没有继承师父的研究呢？

original: That's exactly what I intend to ask him, should we and I ever meet again.
translated: #fs20#我如果能再见到师父，最想问的问题就是这个。

original: I've lived my entire life in #bMonk Laomo's#k shadow, but he didn't teach me even a single one of his lofty secrets.
translated: #fs20#我一生都活在师父#b老魔僧#k的阴影下！但是，#b师父#k什么都没留给我。也许他根本没把我当做弟子来看。

original: But that has nothing to do with any of this. Hurry and find the #b#t##k.
translated: 啊……请你把我刚才那些话都忘了，快去找#b妖怪之书#k吧。

original: Oh. Huh. You really came back, and you brought the #bAntidote#k, too.
translated: 你真的帮我带来#b#t2050000##k了啊！

original: Well, I am pretty thirsty. (He gulps it down.)
translated: (咕咚 咕咚……咕咚。)

original: Shoo, shoo! You don't belong here! I'm trying to clean!
translated: 这里非常危险！你最好马上离开。不然的话……不然的话……

original: (Huh? Is that demon wearing monk robes?)
translated: (这的确是大师的衣服，可怎么长了一个妖怪的脸。大师到底怎么了！？)

original: Oh, wipe that dopey expression off your face. The demons played a trick on me, okay? I'm the temple janitor, a HUMAN, and they thought it'd be soooo funny to give me a demon face. Now shoo, I have floors to sweep.
translated: 呜呜……前几天，为了冲洗一下清扫工具，我到井边去打水，可我被水中自己的模样吓了一跳。我那张原本帅气、帅气无比的脸！！！！居然变得如此丑陋。这肯定是这里的妖怪搞的鬼。如果你也不想变成这样，最好马上离开。

original: The #b#p##k sent me. I'm here to find a #bbook#k. But... your poor face. What can I do to help?
translated: 我是受#b#p9310053##k之托而来的。我需要在这里找一本#b书#k……不过，大师你的脸变成这样，我也不能置之不理。有什么我可以帮助你的吗？

original: You can move and let me sweep! Oh, fine. Why don't you get me some #v# #b#t##k from the General Store? Take your time, and make sure you don't track mud on your way back!
translated: 那你去杂货商店帮我带来#i2050000#  #b#t2050000##k吧？我怕别人把我误当成妖怪，所以我还是不出去为好。

original: Why are you still here? I can't sweep with you here! Go get me 1 #v# #b#t##k
translated: 你可真是个好人啊！你帮我带来1个#i2050000#  #b#t2050000##k就可以了。拜托你了。

original: You've thinned them out a bit. Hurry up to #r#m##k! #rUse the portal on the upper right to get there.

original: Research? What kind of research?
translated: 我正在研究入侵这里的妖怪。像你这么有实力的人，应该能够找到有助于我研究的#b妖怪宝珠#k吧。

original: I'm studying demons. With your combat prowess, I think you can get me the #bdemon orbs#k that I need.
translated: 如果你打算为我的研究提供帮助，就再次和我对话吧。要是你能找到#b妖怪宝珠#k，我就会用珍贵的物品和你交换。

original: Hey. You have the orb I asked for?
translated: 你找到我之前说起过的妖怪宝珠了吗？

original: Oh yeah, this'll help with my research. Come to me, demon orb.
translated: 哦哦，原来是小巧玲珑又散发着美丽光泽的宝珠啊。这应该会对研究很有帮助的。
