original: Oh yeah, this'll help with my research. Come to me, demon orb.
translated: 哦哦，原来是小巧玲珑又散发着美丽光泽的宝珠啊。这应该会对研究很有帮助的。

original: The orbs you've gathered have proven invaluable. Here, take this. You've earned it!
translated: 多亏了你的帮助，妖怪宝珠的研究大大加速。这是一点礼物，请你收下。

original: The mountain weeps this day. My old friend has become a demon... What pain must he have been hiding to have come to this?
translated: 我的老朋友#p9310053#居然变成了妖怪……他为何什么都不告诉我。他肯定非常痛苦。

original: It goes to show... A tiny grain of greed can snowball into something huge and monstrous
translated: #p9310053#肯定也没想到会变成这样。他肯定没料到微小的野心和恶行在不断堆积后竟把自己变成了妖怪。

original: My friend's body has disappeared, but his spirit remains. It must be exorcised, over and over, until the temple is clean. You can encounter <Boss: Chief Priest> by talking to #p# at the Sutra Depository entrance. We will reward you as best we can.
translated:
妖怪现在依然侵扰着藏经阁内部。虽然方丈大师的肉身消失了，但妖怪依旧以鬼魂的形态在此徘徊。
以后，你可以通过守卫在藏经阁入口处的#p9310051#，进入<首领怪：方丈大师>。当然了，如果你挑战时足够努力，就可以获得与之相对应的奖励。

original: I will remain here, working humbly and tirelessly to restore Shaolin Temple to its former purity. You are welcome at any time.
translated: 我会暂时待在这里，并努力帮助少林寺变回从前的样子。你可以随时来这里找我。

original: I'm so sorry to bother you, but could you tell me why you're here?
translated: 我从没见过你啊！你从哪里来的？来上海做什么？

original: I'm so sorry to ask, but do you usually do favors for people in dangerous places just because they asked you to?
translated: 啊，我受神木村#p2081000#的委托，来寻找一个叫#p9310538#的哈夫林……

original: Between you and me, I think that's the only reason people talk to me anymore.
translated: 嗯，这个理由太牵强了吧！你的意思是说，你是受人之托才到上海这座危险的城市来吗？

original: Will you... maybe... could I trouble you to take the test?
translated: 帮助陷入危机的人，是我义不容辞的责任……

original: Thank you for being so wonderfully cooperative! Talk to me again to take the test!
translated: 虽然你看上去很可疑，但我还是暂且相信你吧。不过，要是你想留在#m701100000#的话，就必须先经受一项测试。如果无法通过测试，别说待在#m701100000#了，就连一秒钟都别想逗留！

original: I can't just let you wander around here as you please if you don't take the test...
translated: 很好，等你准备好接受测试后，再来和我说话吧。

original: Hello, stranger. I'd welcome you to Yu Garden, except I'm not sure just yet if you're actually welcome.
translated: 我从来没见过你啊，你是第一次来豫园吧。

original: If you stay, you'll be eating at my restaurant. I'm the only cook in town. Everyone eats here. If you DON'T eat here, that means you don't eat, and that's trouble. Not for you, though. Someone will probably just kill you.
translated: 啊啊-你问我为何会知道？呵呵，我可是豫园唯一的厨师啊。住在豫园的人，没有一个没在我的餐厅吃过饭！所以说，你要么是僵尸，不吃饭就能存活。要么就是头一次来豫园，我分析得没错吗？

original: This town is officially weirding me out. You guys are all freaks.
What in the heck?! That was the dumbest-- You guys are the most-- Ugh! I can't even talk right now!
translated: 我都还没说呢，你怎么就已经猜到了？

original: Hey, I'm taking those back. Talk to me again after you free up 2 slots in your Etc. inventory.
translated: 不用猜都知道！这肯定是#p9310532#给你这个头一回来豫园的异邦人准备的测试吧。#p9310532#真是太刻板了！你一看就是个正常的人类啊，居然还给你做这种测试。

original: Oh, you're a wonderful human being for not giving me any trouble! At least, I hope you are...
translated: 你想进行测试？嗯 ，好吧！不过，如果你不是人类，而是僵尸或者鬼怪的话，我劝你还是放弃吧。

original: That's... the test? Isn't that a little too easy?
translated: 测试很简单。去找豫园的厨师#p9310536#大叔，带来红豆粥和蒜就可以了。很简单吧？

original: I know, it is. It IS too easy. I'm so sorry!
translated: 那也算测试？是不是太简单了啊？

original: I'm so sorry, but do you have the red bean porridge and the garlic?
translated: 你带来红豆粥和蒜了吗？

original: Oh, thank goodness! I knew it. I knew it from the moment I looked at you. But the test is required, and I am SO sorry for troubling you, but everything worked out!
translated: 嗯……你还真把红豆粥和蒜带来了啊。很抱歉我怀疑了你。不过这测试非做不可。

original: Pardon me for asking, but why do you look so confused?
translated: 呼……我不知道你对上海有多少了解。

original: The chef promised that you'd fill me in, but you're just talking in circles. WHAT IS GOING ON IN THIS STUPID GARDEN?!
translated: 上海是著名的旅游城市！我听说上海有美丽的夜景和漂亮的街道。

original: Well... A while back, black clouds rolled in over the city, and they've been looming over us. It's been non-stop night ever since.
translated: 哎……那已经是过去的事情了。因为就在平凡的某一天，上海的上空突然出现了黑云。笼罩着天空的黑云让人无法分辨早晨和夜晚，那黑云甚至都没有散去的迹象。

original: It was great at first. Tourists poured in to party in the Pearl of the Night, but...
translated: 事实上，一开始并没有什么大问题，这样反倒还更好了。上海是有名的夜都，这样一来旅客就更多了，不过……

original: But...?
translated: 不过？

original: About a hundred days after the sun disappeared, weird things started happening. Animals went haywire, and inanimate objects started malfunctioning. They seemed to have come to life. But the worst part was...
translated: 因为黑云的影响，已经有100多天没看到太阳了，上海还开始出现异常现象。很多动物都发疯似地乱蹦乱跳，街上的招牌和信号灯也像有生命似的开始动起来了。而且……

original: The worst part was when the jiangshi appeared...
translated: 而且……还出现了僵尸。

original: Jiangshi? What's that?
translated: 僵尸？！？

original: They're the living dead. Animate corpses. They were a creature of legend, or so we all thought. They have the most frightening hop...
translated: 没错，僵尸。就是会动的尸体。传说中的那种僵尸在上海出现了。

original: Those of us who escaped with our lives fled here to Yu Garden. Legend says that the jiangshi are physically incapable of crossing the zigzag bridge...
translated: 出现僵尸后，人们便纷纷往豫园避难。通往豫园的入口处有一座九曲桥，据说僵尸无法通过那座桥。

original: Luckily, it seems to be true... for now. But I've heard rumors of jiangshi who can talk like us and bend their arms and legs... That's why I thought of that test.
translated: 幸运的是，那个传说是真的。这座桥需要拐九个弯才能通过，那些僵尸当然无法做到吧。不过我们也不能放松警惕。根据传闻，有一些僵尸关节灵活、能学人说话……所以，需要对初来豫园的陌生人进行一下测试。

original: Are the jiangshi allergic to red bean porridge and garlic or something?
translated: 可你为什么要让我去搜集红豆粥和蒜呢？

original: According to legend, yes, they are.
translated: 啊 ，这是因为，僵尸讨厌红豆粥和蒜。不过，这也只是传说罢了……
啊！对了，既然你通过了测试，那我就给你一个证物吧。我现在就去找证物，你能不能稍后再跟我说话呢？

original: Now I can officially welcome you to Shanghai. We just have that teeny-weeny jiangshi problem right now. Sorry about that. But I hope you enjoy your stay!
I'm so sorry, I think I see another traveler. I hope you have a fun, happy, and SAFE stay at Yu Garden!
translated: 我现在真是焦头烂额，所以都没能好好欢迎你。虽然这里有些危险，还充满了僵尸……但还是欢迎你来上海！希望你能在上海度过快乐的时光！要是你有什么疑问或困难，可以随时来找我！

original: I'm sorry, but can you make some room in your Set-up inventory first?
translated: 啊……对了，你是否知道一个叫#p9310538#的哈夫林旅客呢？

original: What are you looking at? You want to buy something?
translated: 嗯？你看什么？想买什么啊？

original: I found this #eTang Dynasty Horseback Riding Doll#n while hunting!
translated: 我在狩猎过程中捡到了#e唐代骑马像#n陶器！

original: If it's what you say it is, you've hit the jackpot! Let me take a look!
translated: 要是真如你所说，那可就要赚大发了！让我先瞧瞧！

original: Wait a second... Could this really be...?!
translated: 啊……这是……

original: It's real, isn't it? It's really a #eHorseback Riding Doll from the Tang Dynasty#n, right?!
translated: 这个？是#e唐代骑马像#n吧？！

original:
I'm pretty sure they sell these knockoffs at the museum gift shop. 
You did try really hard, so I'll make it into something useful.
translated:
这个骑马像应该是上海博物馆里出售的纪念品。
嗯……你别太失望。既然你这么有诚意，那我就帮你制成有用的东西吧。

original: Ha, kidding, kidding. Now you get back out there, and if you find something rare, you bring it to ME, got it?
translated: 吓尿了？玩笑而已啦。好啦，免费送你啦。下次再找到稀有的东西再来找我。

original: WHOA! No way! Could this really be...?!
translated: #fs16#啊？！难道！！这是？！

original:
Whoa! Is this a #eTang Dynasty Horseback Riding Doll circa 650 A.D.?!#n It's so realistic! It must be real! 
Maybe a little Tang prince played with it!
translated:
#e公元650年制造的骑马像？！#n看这栩栩如生的形态，漂亮的色彩！
这准是唐代皇室的王子拿在手里把玩的骑马像陶器！

original: #p# will be so excited to see this!
What are you looking at? You want to buy something?
translated: 嗯？你看什么？想买什么啊？

original: I picked up this #eQing Dynasty Jade Kettle#n while hunting!
translated: 我在狩猎过程中捡到了#e清朝玉壶#n陶器！

original: If it's what you say it is, you've hit the jackpot! Let me take a look!
translated: 要是真如你所说，那可就要赚大发了！让我先瞧瞧！

original: Wait a second... Could this really be...?!
translated: 啊……这是……

original: It's authentic, isn't it? It's a #eJade Kettle from the great Qing Empire#n, right?!
translated: 这个？是#e清朝玉壶#n吧？！

original: I think this is a knockoff kettle from the traditional eatery on Nanjing Road. Don't feel too bad. That place is delicious. And I'll make it into something useful...
translated:
这个玉壶应该是上海博物馆里出售的纪念品。
嗯……你别太失望。既然你这么有诚意，那我就帮你制成有用的东西吧。

original: Ha, kidding, kidding. Now you get back out there, and if you find something rare, you bring it to ME, got it?
translated: 吓尿了？玩笑而已啦。好啦，免费送你啦。下次再找到稀有的东西再来找我。

original: WHOA! No way! Could this really be...?!
translated: #fs16#啊？！难道！！这是？！

original:
Whoa! Is this a #eJade Kettle made in the great Qing Dynasty?!#n The glow, the detail! It must be real! 
Maybe a Qing princess drank tea made from this!
translated:
#e公元1750年制造的玉壶？！#n看这栩栩如生的形态，漂亮的色彩！
这准是清朝皇室的王子拿在手里把玩的玉壶！

original: #p# will be so excited to see this!
What are you looking at? You want to buy something?
translated: 嗯？你看什么？想买什么啊？

original: I found this #eMing Dynasty Bronze Incense Burner#n while hunting!
translated: 我在狩猎过程中捡到了#e明朝青铜香炉#n陶器！

original: If it's what you say it is, you've hit the jackpot! Let me take a look!
translated: 要是真如你所说，那可就要赚大发了！让我先瞧瞧！

original: Wait a second... Could this really be...?!
translated: 啊……这是……

original: It's real, isn't it? It's a #eBronze Incense Burner from the Ming Dynasty#n, right?!
translated: 这个？是#e明朝青铜香炉#n吧？！

original:
Well, actually, it appears to be an incense burner from a high-class hotel on the Bund. They use them as decor for their hallways. 
Don't be too sad, though. I'll turn it into something useful.
translated:
这个香炉应该是上海博物馆里出售的纪念品。
嗯……你别太失望。既然你这么有诚意，那我就帮你制成有用的东西吧。

original: Ha, kidding, kidding. Now you get back out there, and if you find something rare, you bring it to ME, got it?
translated: 吓尿了？玩笑而已啦。好啦，免费送你啦。下次再找到稀有的东西再来找我。

original: WHOA! No way! Could this really be...?!
translated: #fs16#啊？！难道！！这是？！

original:
#eA Bronze Incense Burner from the great Ming Dynasty?!#n The exquisite sculpting, the attention to detail! It must be real! 
Maybe a Ming emperor used this in his bedroom!
translated:
#e公元150年制造的青铜香炉？！#n看这栩栩如生的形态，漂亮的色彩！
这准是明朝皇室的王子拿在手里把玩的香炉！

original: #p# will be so excited to see this!
#b...A letter?
translated: #b……书信？

original:
#b(Something seems off...)
#L0#The situation sounds grim! I should start my journey from El Nath.#l
#L1#I need to get on this as soon as possible, but I have a few things to finish up first...#l
translated: #fn黑体##fs35#此地是位于冰峰雪域山脉另一面的阿布鲁盆地。

original: Daughter... My daughter...
translated: ……女儿……我的女儿……

original: Thank you... Sniff...
translated: 谢谢你……呜……。呜呜……

original: #face0#Ah, you're here!
translated: #face0#你们来啦！

original: #face0#How did you get here before us?
translated: #face0#你比我们到得还快啊？

original: #face0#Hah, since there was nowhere to lay him down, I brought him here.
translated: #face0#嗬嗬-我找不到合适的地方安置他，就给他带到这里来了。

original: #face1##h0#, thanks for working so hard out there in the cold.
translated: #face0##h0#，这么冷的天，辛苦你了。

original: #face0#What about me?!
translated: #face0#怎么不说我也辛苦了！

original: #bNot at all.
translated: #b佩图尔，给你木材。

original: #bPeytour, take the wood.
translated: #face0#好！那我们开始吧？

original: #face0#So! Shall we start?
translated: #face0#哎呀呀，#h0#，我能再麻烦你一件事吗？

original: #face0#Ah, right. #h0#, can I ask you for one more favor?
translated: #face0#我之前委托斯洛克帮忙搓绳子，可他到现在都没跟我联络。

original: #face0#I asked Slaka to make some rope, but he hasn't gotten back to me.
translated: #face0#你代我去找他取绳子好吗？

original: #face0#Can you get the rope from him for me?
translated: #b是的。

original: #bOf course.
translated: #face0#他应该在村子入口。一有人靠近他就会一副不高兴的表情横着眼看人，很好找的。

original: #face0#He should be at the entrance of town. He'll be the sour-looking one, so you should have no trouble finding him.
translated: 去找斯洛克取绳子。

original: #face0#Ah, perfect timing!
translated: #face0#你回来得正是时候，辛苦了！

original: #face0#With the snow cleared away, this cart looks better than I remember. Maybe it won't need so much work...
translated: #face0#我把车上的雪清掉后，看着还不错，现在开始修理吧……

original: #face0#While I'm doing this you should grab whatever you've got left in town. Gold, jewels, priceless works of art...
translated: #face0#啊~~你在卡夫塔佩没有要带的行李吧？比如地契或者金器啥的。
#face0#……开玩笑的。我是想问你，要是现在不忙，能不能去巡视一下看村民们准备得怎么样。

original: #face0#...That was a joke. If you can, I'd just like you to check and see how preparations are going.
translated: #b啊……好的。

original: #bAh. Not a problem.
translated: #face0#多谢，那待会儿见。

original: #face0#Ah, #h0#.
translated: ……我当然想所有人都救……可万一这样让大家都陷入危险……

original: #face0#...
translated: 你这是身为村长说的话吗？！得想办法啊！

original: #bWhat is it? Is something wrong?
translated: 在其他人面前你可千万别这么说。

original: #face0#Ah... No, we were just... discussing how to carry the injured.
translated: #b怎么回事？有什么问题吗？

original: #face0#I'm sure you've seen, but all of our wagons in town were destroyed in the attack.
translated: #face0#啊……我们在讨论怎么带负伤者上路。

original: #bHmm...
translated: #face0#相信你也看到了，村里使用的大篷车全都被火烧毁，用不了了。

original: #face0#What about the wagon outside of town? It was probably missed in the attack and shouldn't be hard to patch up.
translated: #face0#……把丢弃在村外的大篷车修理一下怎么样？时间来得及吗？

original: #face0#The wagon Aruhi used to move leather with? It's too small, even for our belongings.
translated: #face0#你说阿尔西拿来运皮革的那辆吗？那辆大篷车太小了，装行李都够呛……

original: #bCould we modify it while making repairs? You know, add some parts for the injured to ride on.
translated: #b在修理的同时做些改造怎么样？至少首先让它能搭载负伤者。

original: #face0#As long as we can get the wood, it should be doable. Seems like our best plan at the moment.
translated: #face0#虽不知能否来得及收集木材进行改造……但这的确是最佳的方法。

original: #bI'll take care of the wood.
translated: #face0#噢！你愿意帮忙吗？

original: #face0#Oh! That would be terrific.
translated: #b是的。

original: #bOf course.
translated: #face0#刚才去过的后山，记得吧？

original: #face0#Do you remember the mountain that we just came back from?
translated: #face0#你去那里再收集50个木材，很抱歉老是给你添麻烦，#h0#。

original: #face0#I think 50 more pieces should be enough. I'm sorry to work you so hard, #h0#.
translated: #b没事，我很快就回来。

original: #bThink nothing of it. I'll be back in a jiffy.
translated: #face0#……谢谢你。

original: #face0##h0#!
translated: #b你太客气了。

original: #face0#Thank you.
translated: #b我去收集木材。

original: #bAre we all set to move out? I'm wondering if there's anything more I can do to help.
translated: 可恶，又擅自做决定！我受够他了！！

original: I am... There is not much for me to pack... As you can see...
translated: 这次也不是可汗自己的决定，再说了，也就那个方法可行……

original: Tsk, what is Kan doing? Making you run around like this...
translated: 我只是计较这次事情吗？他最近一直都这副德行！

original: #bChief Kan is preparing a wagon to carry the injured.
translated: ……可汗向来就很有决断力。

original: I'm sure Peytour is preparing the wagon, not Kan.
translated: 哎呦喂，你这糊涂虫，决断和专断能一样吗？
#b你准备好了吗？有没有需要我帮忙的。

original: Cut it out. He's still our chief.
translated: 嗯……也没什么好带的。剩下的东西……你都看到了……

original: ...For how long, do you think?
translated: 嘁，可汗干嘛去了，就让你一个人跑来跑去的？

original: #b(Seems like a lot of people have issues with Chief Kan...)
translated: #b可汗村长在修理用来搭载负伤者的大篷车。

original: There is nothing we need help with. You can go check on the other villagers.
translated: 不是可汗，是佩图尔在修吧。

original: #face0#Why are you working on your house? We have no time to waste!
translated: #face0#你怎么还在修房子？要我说多少遍，现在不是搞这些 的时候？！

original: Didn't you say we'd be coming back...? That's why...
translated: 不是说会再回来的吗……所以……我就想……

original: #face0#You can make repairs when you return. Right now, we have to leave before the snowstorm reaches us!
translated: #face0#回来再修也不迟。当务之急是准备起程。你不会没看见暴风雪正在涌来吧？

original: But I have nothing to pack... And no family to tend to.
translated: 可我既没有要收拾的行李……也没有家人。

original: #face0#Then help the others prepare. We have to work together.
translated: #face0#那你去帮帮其他人。现在没工夫干别的。

original: Chief Kan... I don't want to leave.
translated: ……可汗村长……我不想离开村子……

original: #face0#There are no exceptions. All Kaptafel villagers must evacuate to the town across the river. Every single one.
translated: #face0#这事没得商量，卡夫塔佩的村民将一个不少地前往河对岸的村子。

original: I'm not saying I will stay. I want to explain... I don't agree with your decision, Chief Kan, but I will comply.
translated: 我的意思不是要留下来。尽管不愿离开村子，但村长你已经做了决定，我正在努力遵从……可是，……

original: It pains me to do this, to abandon my home. So I thought, if I fixed it up a little, that would help me cope with the loss. But now you're saying I can't even do that...
translated: 我只是在想如何才能填补心里空落落的感受，把倒塌的屋子重新搭起来或许会好受些！所以……所以我才这么做。出发之前连这点时间都不能让我自己支配的话……我真是……

original: #face0#It cannot be helped. I can't risk others following your example and wasting time. If you don't want to help, rest up for the journey ahead.
translated: #face0#既然你一意孤行就没办法了，我不能让你这颗老鼠屎影响到其他人，你不用做事了，歇着吧。

original: Do you really have to take it so far?
translated: 天啊……有必要说得这么难听吗？

original: ...I had no idea you were so cold.
translated: ……嘴太毒了。

original: #bChief Kan.
translated: #b可汗村长。
#face0#我知道你在想什么，觉得我很过分吧。
#face0#我也是无奈。留在这里的话，将没法保障安全。我的职责就是无论如何都要把所有人带到下个村子。

original: #face1#I know what you're thinking. You think I am too harsh.
translated: #face0#我是在执行身为村长的职责……请你不要多管。

original: #face1#But I don't have a choice. I'm responsible for these people. For everyone. If even one ignores my orders, everything falls apart.
translated: #b可汗村长现在也在伤心吧？

original: #face1#Do not mind me... I'm just doing what I can as chief of this poor town.
translated: #face0#……我没这种闲工夫。

original: #b(This was burnt to cinders. No way anyone's eating it now.)
translated: #b（……这都被火烧焦了，还沾满了灰，不能吃了……）

original: #b(Might need to think of another way to get food.)
translated: #b（得想个其他办法弄到食物。）

original: #b(Time to talk to Peytour.)
translated: #b（去找佩图尔商量一下。）

original: #bShulla, what are you looking for this time?
translated: #b述拉，你又在找什么？
……村长说得没错，现在不是沉浸在悲伤之中的时候。

original: The chief was right. I can't let myself be consumed by despair. Not now.
translated: 去下个村庄得走上大半天才能到达。
途中肯定会有人肚子饿，不管怎样都得吃点，才有力气赶路啊

original: It's a long way to the next village, you know. Almost a full day's walk.
translated: #b（帮助述拉搜寻粮食）

original: The weak and wounded are going to have a tough time with it. So I want to prepare some food for the long journey.
translated: 帮助述拉在坍塌的房屋底下搜寻食物。

original: #face0#There! That's it! Hunting over, let's go!
translated: #face0#都收集齐了！咱们快回去吧。
#face0#我承认，你是位有能力，又胆识过人的勇士，但你太缺乏经验了。

original: #bYes?
translated: #face0#正如可汗村长身边有佩图尔那么优秀的顾问兼人生前辈，我觉得你也很需要一个可以毫不吝啬地给你忠告的建议者。

original: #face0#I know that you are a capable and brave warrior. But you lack the experience needed to command.
translated: #face0#……你真觉得休息一下再走是明智的选择吗？

original: #face0#It's not your fault, of course. You just need a trusted advisor, just as Peytour is to Chief Kan.
translated: #b身后有暴风雪在追赶，四面八方还不知何时会有怪物来袭……我很明白这是个有风险的选择。

original: #face0#Now, then... Do you really think it wise to spend time resting before we move out?
translated: #b但正如艾丽卡所说，如果强行前进，将会有些太疲倦的人掉队。

original: #bI'm aware that the snowstorm is approaching, and also that we are vulnerable to monsters. There are certainly risks.
translated: #face1#不，你错了。现在就应该强行前进。

original: #bBut as Alika said, if we push on without rest, there are those who will not be able to keep up. We're sure to lose people.
translated: #face1#在疲惫的情况下让他们有时间思考只会令他们更加绝望。

original: #face1#You're allowing your emotions to cloud your judgment. The correct decision is clearly to push onward.
translated: #face1#根本不要给他们时间和余裕去思考！你得让他们脑海中只想着“我得去下个村庄！”这一目标。

original: #face1#You want to give people time to think, when they're already tired and disappointed? That can only lead to further despair.
translated: #b这个方法或许对骑士们有效，可这些人大部分只是普通的村民啊。

original: #face1#Give them a goal. Push them to keep moving forward. If they're too busy to think, they're too busy to complain.
translated: #face0#我在成为骑士之前，也曾做过很长时间的佣兵，就像你一样。

original: #bThat may work for trained knights, but these are ordinary people.
translated: #face0#换句话说，我跟这种普通百姓相处的时间比跟那些训练有素的骑士多得多。你不要忽视我的经验之谈。

original: #face0#Before I became a knight, I was a wandering mercenary for years. Just like you.
translated: #face0#很快你就会发现目前的选择是错误的，到时再后悔可就晚了。

original: #face0#I've spent more of my life with the commoners than with trained knights. I know how they think, and what they're capable of. Do not dismiss the wisdom I've gained.
translated: #b……谢谢你的忠告。

original: #face0#You will soon see that your decision was wrong. I only hope you'll have the chance to recover from it.
translated: #face0#你要记住，谁才是给你提供所需建议和忠告的人。

original: #b...Thank you for the advice.
translated: #face0#啊-，还有一件事。你要是觉得担不起这个需要负责任的位置，随时可以让给我。

original: #b(Vice Captain Butler makes a strong argument.)
translated: #b（……也许巴特勒副团长说的没错。）

original: #b(But I chose to rest. I chose to make this an opportunity to recover, rather than despair.)
translated: #b（但我已经选择了歇会儿再走，我得努力让人们在这段时间得以恢复，而不是陷入绝望。）

original: #b(It might be nice to find branches for a fire, and some meat to eat.)
translated: #b（先去收集些生火的树枝，还有能吃的肉吧。）

original: #face0#Here, we brought Hellfang meat. This should last quite a while if you slice it thin and store it.
translated: #face0#给，这是野狼肉。切成薄片保存的话，够吃很长时间的。

original: #face0#Eh? Hellfang meat?
translated: #face0#嗯？野狼肉？

original: #face0#Surely you don't expect us to eat this tough, tasteless meat, right?
translated: #face0#这又老又难吃的肉，是给人吃的吗？

original: #face0#Ahh! No, of course not. This is your food. Providing for yourself, as expected. Good, good.
translated: #face0#啊！抱歉，我搞错了。是因为我叫你们自带食物，所以你们弄来了野狼肉。是你们吃的~？我理解错了。

original: #face0#Since we're on the topic, though... how about bringing back something for the rest of us to eat?
translated: #face0#那么，这回你们去找些我们能吃的东西来吧？

original: #face0#...
translated: #face0#知道了。给你们打只花花象可以吗？
#face0#嗯，比野狼肉好多了。

original: #face0#Hmm, hmm. Let's see what we have here...
translated: #face0#咳咳，都收集来了？我看看

original: #face0#Not bad, not bad... I suppose your people do have a reputation for hunting. Now... Say, why are Chief Kan's eyes swollen?
translated: #face0#嗯……不错！你们不愧是猎人~！咦，可汗村长眼睛怎么肿了？

original: #face0#...Will you take us in now?
translated: #face0#……现在可以收留我们了吗？

original: #face0#Ah, not so fast! We have matters to discuss first.
translated: #face0#咳嗯~~~咳！且慢！

original: #face0#I don't like the sound of this.
translated: #face0#有种不妙的预感。

original: #face4#What a disappointing person...
translated: #face4#这人……真没教养。

original: #bWe need shelter before night falls...
translated: #b……得趁夜幕降临之前赶紧进去啊……

original: #face0#Now then, we don't seem to have much space for you lot to sleep.
translated: #face0#我看了一下，我们这儿没地方给你们睡啊？

original: #face0#If you don't want to freeze tonight, you'll need something to keep you warm, won't you?
translated: #face0#夜晚这么寒冷，总得在地上铺点什么才行吧？咳咳

original: #face0#Gather Werebeast Furs for your people. Once that's done, I'll let you in.
translated: #face0#你们去收集些狼人的厚实毛发，弄到了我就让你们进来。

original: #face0#...What do you think you're doing?
translated: #face0#……你这是在得寸进尺吗？

original: #face0#What happened to common decency? How can you sleep at night, using suffering refugees to do your chores?!
translated: #face0#你有没有点人性？大难当头，就只顾自己保命！！！！！！！

original: #face4#Chief Kan, I completely agree but I don't think we can afford to lose our tempers right now.
translated: #face4#……可汗村长，我也很气愤……但现在不是发火的时候。

original: #face4#A common struggle might not be enough to restore a strained relationship. If you truly want things to be different, we should prove how different we are now.
translated: #face4#你们彼此斗了那么久，自然不可能因为有了共同的敌人，就一下子变得和睦起来。如果想改善相互的关系，我们就必须拿出和之前不同的态度来。

original: #face4#If you lose your temper now...
translated: #face4#像现在这样意气用事的话……

original: #face0#Alika is right.
translated: #face0#说得对……艾丽卡学者的话很有道理。

original: #face0#We must take responsibility for our dealings. Blaming the other side accomplishes nothing.
translated: #face0#目前这种不和睦，也是我们自己造成的，不能全怪他们。

original: #face0#They act as they always have. If we do the same, nothing will change.
translated: #face0#眼下他们抱着这样不友好的态度，如果我们也同样予以回击，就无法指望有任何改变。

original: #face0#Ahem!
translated: #face0#我说，斯巴乐缇村长，你真有心收留我们吗？

original: #face0#...
translated: #face0#嘁，这还用问吗？！真无语，你的意思是我现在在撒谎耍你们？

original: #face0#Honored chief of Svarti... You do intend to take us in, yes?
translated: #face0#知道了。只要你真有心，我们去收集狼人毛发，这次希望你遵守约定。

original: #face0#Why, that should be obvious by now! Why else would I waste my time with these dealings?
translated: #face0#咳咳，好。

original: #face0#Understood. We'll bring back the Werebeast Fur, as promised.
translated: #face0#骑士们已经很辛苦了，先歇会儿吧。我去收集。

original: #face0#Hmm, hmm. Indeed.
translated: #b我也一起去！

original: W-wait a second!
translated: 勇，勇士！等一下！

original: #bWhat?
translated: 我们曾经是捕鱼的渔夫。那个……在我们村子里出现的怪物……

original: You know, we're a village of fishermen. Er, harpooners, or whatever you call it. Uh... the monster that showed up in town...
translated: #b剧毒打嗝怪？

original: #bThe toxic beast?
translated: 啊！你是这么叫那个怪物的！？

original: Oh! Is that what you call it?
translated: #b啊……没，有个话唠骑士是这么叫它的。

original: #bAh... not really. One of our knights likes calling it that.
translated: #b那个？

original: I think that monster is...
translated: 它似乎是我们以前抓到的埃特金森！
啊！埃特金森是连血都是透明的鱼！虽然长得很恶心，但是作为阿布鲁地区的特产，味道很棒！

original: The fish we used to catch! Actinops!
translated: #b但那是粉红色的……大小也不像是鱼啊。

original: #bThat monster... was a fish?
translated: 我也看到了！如果是吃了粉红色的什么……可能就会变色。但是移动的时候就会变透明了。啊，不只是这样！

original: Yes! Actinops are transparent, down to their blood! It looks a bit gross, but tastes real good. It's Abrup's local specialty!
translated: 埃特金森本来再生能力就很强！甚至在自己觉得安全的时候还会继续长大，总之它能自由地延展身体。

original: #bI don't know... fish aren't usually pink. Or huge. Or attack people.
translated: 你看到……它把右手伸长的样子了吗？

original: Yeah, very true. Maybe it ate something pink? Oh, but that's not all!
translated: 你还不相信吗？还有！

original: Actinops can regenerate really fast. It can also puff itself up real big, so with its regeneration it can do that as long as it wants.
translated: 正是那个毒！那个毒！埃特金森也是有毒的鱼！

original: Didn't you see how it stretched its arm out?
translated: 如果，那个真的是埃特金森……

original: #bHmm...
translated: #b如果是埃特金森？

original: Okay, if you still don't believe me, there's another clue!
translated: 如果是埃特金森……

original: Poison! Actinops are poisonous!
translated: 为了再生而集中的那个时候！如果在那时行动的话，它是不会攻击的。我们应该要抓住那个时机！

original: If that monster really is Actinops...
translated: #b(……确实在它伸长手臂攻击后，有一段时间它是没有任何动静的……)

original: #bThen...?
translated: 但，其实……我虽然这么说，但这事儿其实有点奇怪。

original: If it is Actinops...
translated: 明明看起来很像埃特金森，但是那么小一条鱼是怎么变成那样的怪物的呢。

original: It will focus when it regenerates! And it won't move or attack during that brief time. That's your chance!
translated: #b谢谢你能告诉我这些。

original: #b(Thinking back, the monster did pause for a moment after stretching its arm.)
translated: 啊，没事！如果能帮上忙那就太好了！

original: But to be honest... it does sound weird saying it out loud.
translated: 如果你有什么想知道的事情，请随时来问我！

original: It really is Actinops, I'm sure of it... but I have no idea how a small fish turned into such a monster.
translated: 那个……

original: #bWell, thanks for clearing that up.
translated: #b……那是？

original: N-n-not at all! I'm honored to be of help!
translated: #b好的，我知道了。

original: Hawalu!
translated: 哈瓦尔！

original: I'm so sorry, #h0#. Was Hawalu bothering you?
translated: #h0#……哈瓦尔要是打扰了你们……

original: #bNot at all. In fact, Hawalu was singing to cheer me up.
translated: #b哪里，反而哈瓦尔给我唱了歌，让我加油呢。

original: That's right, Mommy! I sang!
translated: 没错，妈妈！我给唱了歌哦！

original: Thank you, #h0#. I know that makes Hawalu happy too.
translated: 谢谢……哈瓦尔看起来很开心……谢谢，#h0#。

original: When I drum my belly, happy and round
translated: 在鼓鼓的肚子上敲打

original: I feel so happy with that full belly sound!
translated: #b哈瓦尔，你唱歌真好听啊。

original: #bHawalu, you sing really well.
translated: 嘿嘿，谢谢。我是跟妈妈学的。妈妈说哈瓦尔唱歌能让她充满力量！

original: Hee hee hee, thank you! I learned it from Mom! She said she feels so happy whenever I sing.
translated:
要唱歌给你听吗，勇士？#b
#L0# 谁生活在沉睡森林里呢#l
#L1# 好吃的肉#l
#L2# 雪原阿布鲁#l
#L3# 吹着小风#l
#L20# 现在不用了，以后再说吧。#l

original:
Do you want me to sing you a song?#b
#L0# Who Lives in Windsleep Forest#l
#L1# Yummy Meat#l
#L2# Abrup, Land of Snow#l
#L3# The Wind Blows#l
#L20# I'm okay right now. Maybe later.#l
translated: 真是开心，我很幸福

original: #h0#! You're back. I hope it wasn't any trouble.
translated: #h0#！你来了啊，没受伤吧？

original: #bNo problem at all. You don't need to worry.
translated: 多亏了你，我们才休息了下。来了阿布鲁之后，还是第一次这么放心地休息呢。

original: We were finally able to rest up, thanks to you. Honestly, this is the best rest I've gotten since we came to Abrup.
translated: 虽然我们也很辛苦，但骑士们……真是连觉都睡不了。特别是吉莉，考虑到我们的情况，连粗活都干了……她虽然还年轻，但真的很棒！

original: I'd never say we have it easy, but the knights... it seems like they don't even get to sleep. Gillie especially takes so much on herself to help us out. She's the best!
translated: 没错，虽然我们现在只是士兵，但是总有一天也会变成披着帅气披风的亚皮纳斯骑士的！

original: That's right. We may just be soldiers now, but we're all working hard to become knights one day!
translated: #face0#你现在在这干嘛呢？

original: #face0#What are you all doing here?
translated: 派……派遣团团长大人！

original: Di-dispatch Commander!
translated: #face0#什么？寻求帮助？

original: #face0#What? You asked for help?!
translated: #face0#这么涣散松懈，你还想保护谁？

original: #face0#How dare you give your sacred duty to another... How can you expect to be trusted with the safety of others now?
translated: 对不起。

original: Sorry, sir.
translated: #b是我太想帮助他们了……

original: #bButler, I insisted. I wanted to help them...
translated: #face0#你没必要帮他们说话，立正！

original: #face0#There is no need to speak for soldiers. They answer for their actions. To your posts, now!
translated: #b是的，请别担心。

original: Yes, Dispatch Commander, sir!
translated: 是，派遣团团长！

original: #bWhat is it?
translated: 别喘气了……居民们要听见了……哈……

original: Oh! #h0#! It's nothing!
translated: 你也别喘气啊……哈……

original: It's nothing at all. Well, I suppose we got a bit concerned about the monsters we saw on our way here. So we were on our way to take care of them.
translated: 好吧……知道了……大家都出发吧……

original: #bBut we just got here...
translated: 没错……没错……出发吧……

original: We're a bit tired, but it's okay. We're doing this for the villagers. It's what we do for Afinas!
translated: #b怎么了？

original: Right. Who would help them, if not us?
translated: 啊！#h0#！没什么！

original: #bMay I lend a hand?
translated: 嗯，没什么事儿。我有些在意在我来的时候看到的怪物，所以打算去消灭他们。

original: No, we've got it under control. But thank you for asking!
translated: #b刚来就去了？

original: Last chance, monsters! Better run away
translated: ……虽然很辛苦，但这都是为了居民们！这是我们亚皮纳斯该做的事情！

original: The Afinas Knights will blow you all away!
translated: 没错，如果我们都不帮忙，还有谁能帮忙呢？

original: Isn't he adorable? We'll do everything that we can to keep him safe.
translated: #b需要我来帮忙吗？

original: That's right. There's no time for us to rest! We have a duty to our people.
translated: 不用了，但谢谢你能有这个心意！

original: Okay, then. Let's go!
translated: 逃跑吧，怪物啊，这是最后的机会了

original: Hey, what's wrong?
translated: 亚皮纳斯骑士团来帮助我们了

original: I felt strange for a second...
translated: 是不是很可爱？我们一定会守护那个笑容的。

original: You should rest. We'll go ahead on our own.
translated: 没错。只要是为了弱者！没有时间休息！

original:
#b(Everyone seems to be exhausted.)
#L0# All of you, please rest. I'll go. It's just monsters beyond the wall, right?#l
#L1# Good luck, then.#l
translated: 那就出发吧！

original: Well, I can't really keep refusing you, can I? If you could take care of those monsters, that would be great, yeah.
translated: 你怎么了！

original: #bOf course. You have a lot of battles ahead of you. Rest up and save your energy for now.
translated: 你先休息吧，我们去就行了。

original: Thank you, #h0#. We're so used to helping others out... it feels strange having someone help us. Strange and good.
translated:
#b(……看来大家都已经很累了。)
#L0#你们都休息下吧。我去就可以了。把木栅栏外面的怪物都消灭就行了吧？#l
#L1#那就拜托你了。#l

original: This must be how the villagers feel when we help them, right? Now I feel even better about our work.
translated: ……总是让来让去也不好……嗯，那就拜托你了？

original:
All right, enough of that! 
#h0#, please take care of 50 Raging Werebeast monsters!
translated: #b当然了，今后还有很多战斗……现在请你们先保存下体力吧……

original: #bWilliams?
translated: 啊，#h0#！派遣团团长是不是骂了你……？都是因为我们，抱歉……

original: Oh, hey #h0#! I hope you didn't get in trouble with the Dispatch Commander? Sorry, that was our fault...
translated: #b没有，巴特勒副团长说了关于“巨大的影子”的事情……

original: #bNot at all. Vice Captain Butler mentioned you saw a massive shadow back at...
translated: 啊！没有！那都是因为我太累了才会看见那种东西，真的！

original: Ah! It's nothing! I was just tired and hallucinating. Really, it was nothing!
translated: #b啊……我也看到了类似的东西，你可以跟我说实话的。

original: #bWell, the thing is... I saw something similar. I'd like to know what you saw.
translated: 不不，那真的是我的错觉。

original: No... I really was mistaken.
translated: #face0#……在居民中也有很多人说起那个影子。

original: #face0#...There are quite a few villagers talking about that shadow as well.
translated: #face0#人们把它叫做“雾中黑影”。虽然不知道那个是活着的……还是从地狱中冒出的烟雾形成的虚影……

original: #face0#People are calling it the 'smoke shadow'. Of course, no one knows if it was just a strange cloud... or an actual creature.
translated: #face0#但是大家都不愿相信它是真实存在的。

original: #face0#But I am certain that no one wants to believe it.
translated: #b……究竟……那个……

original: Err...
translated: #face0#在现在这种情况下，我希望那是个幻影。因为现在还没人看到它的实体。

original: #bWhat could it be...
translated: #face0#总是在刮着暴风雪……或者有烟雾的时候才能看到它。不过我也希望那只是人们在恐惧中……想象出来的幻影。如果那样的东西真的存在……

original: #face0#For now, I choose to believe it was an illusion. It's a... more comforting thought, since no one knows for sure.
translated: #b……（看来还得再调查下。)

original: #face0#The truth is that we've all seen it many times, every time there was a snowstorm, or smoke, or thick fog. The people assume it's the shadow of a mountain or an odd cloud.
translated: #b威尔森？

original: #face0#Unbelievable. To ask a civilian for help...
translated: #face0#真是难以置信，就算再怎么累，居然向普通人寻求帮助。

original: #bThey need time to get their strength back.
translated: #b……我觉得他们需要恢复体力的时间。

original: #face0#In wartime, a lack of discipline means certain defeat.
translated: #face0#在现在这种紧急的战时情况下，松懈就等于失败。

original: #face0#When I was younger, I fought for days at a time without sleeping or eating. These layabouts get full meals and sleep by warm fires, and still have the nerve to complain? Unacceptable!
translated: #face0#我年轻的时候，为了追击敌人，好几天不吃不睡。但是你们三餐都好好吃着，每天还能睡在火堆旁边，居然还敢说出这种话！我无法容忍。

original: #face0#I've already had to deal with rumors among the soldiers of a massive shadow during the battle at Kaptafel, and now this.
translated: #face0#本来我就因为在士兵间流传着在卡夫塔佩战斗时见到了巨大影子的传闻而头疼来着……

original: #bWait, a massive shadow?
translated: #b巨大的影子？

original: #face0#Yeah. Ridiculous rumors like that can be bad for morale, you know.
translated: #face0#是啊，你不会也害怕吧？

original: #bWho started the rumor?
translated: #b这是谁说的？

original: #face0#It was Williams, one of the soldiers resting here earlier. That's how undisciplined they've become. You see what happens when you go easy on them?
translated: #face0#之前在这里休息的士兵威尔森说的。这就说明他精神松懈到了那种程度了。你现在明白了吗？

original: #b(Might be worth asking Williams about what he saw.)
translated: #b(……又一个目击者！和他谈谈吧。)

original: #face0##h0#?
translated: #b谢谢，巴特勒副团长。我先走了……

original: #bThank you, Vice Captain Butler. Please excuse me...
translated: #face0#我还没说完呢，你去哪……

original: #bHere you go, Alika. Leatty crystals.
translated: #b艾丽卡，这是小白雪鬼结晶。

original: #face0#I got most of them. Just so you know.
translated: #face0#我找到的更多！

original: #face1#Thank you! Thank you.
translated: #face0#谢谢-谢谢你们。
#b扎奈特，你能治疗这么多人，真是太厉害了，你不累吗？

original: #bJanyt, it's truly amazing that you healed all these people. Aren't you tired?
translated: #face0#没错，真是好厉害啊！坚定的信念和使命感……她真是个特别的人。

original: #face0#...
translated: #face0#……我只是将从亚皮纳斯那里获得的祝福分享给别人罢了。

original: #face1#Indeed, truly amazing! Firm beliefs and unwavering commitment... She is quite special.
translated: #face0#凯恩，你先休息吧。如果还需要什么我会叫你的。

original: #face0#I merely share the blessings I receive from Afinas.
translated: #face0##h0#也是，请烤烤火，休息下吧。

original: #b(Alika and Janyt are busy taking care of the injured.)
translated: #b(……看来她正忙着照顾伤员。)

original: #b(Wonder if there's anything I can help with.)
translated: #b(没什么我能帮忙做的吗……)

original: #bJanyt, can I help with anything?
translated: #b扎奈特，我能帮你什么吗？

original: #face0#Ah... No. The blessings of Afinas suffice.
translated: #face0#啊……不用了，我只要有亚皮纳斯的祝福就够了。

original: #bBut there should be something.
translated: #b但是你需不需要……

original: #face1#No.
translated: #face0#不需要。

original: #face0##h0#?
translated: #b啊，艾丽卡，我在想有没有什么我能帮得上忙的地方。

original: #bOh, Alika. I wanted to see if there is anything I could help with.
translated: #face0#那可就多了！

original: #face1#Of course! There's always plenty to do.
translated: #face0#你能先去帮我找来一些治疗需要的材料吗？

original: #face1#Can you find us some supplies for treating injuries?
translated: #face0#你也看到了，我们救护队和扎奈特的治愈能力都有限……我们都已经很累了，药物也有些不足……

original: #face1#As you can see, there is a limit to Devata Janyt's healing powers. She needs some time to recover, but we don't have enough medicine to treat everyone.
translated: #b当然了，但是这里有能作为药材的东西吗？

original: #bI'd love to help. What can be used for medicine around here?
translated: #face0#幸好在阿布鲁的民间疗法中，有用小白雪鬼的结晶融化后来涂抹的方法。虽然这个方法的疗效尚未得到证实，但是受伤的猎人都那么说，我也只能试一试了。

original: #face1#The Abrup people have a traditional remedy made from melted Leatty Crystals. I haven't tested it myself, but it's worth a try, right?
translated: #face0#据说在江附近的雪原就有小白雪鬼，凯恩也已经过去了，你应该很容易就能找到的。

original: #b(Looks like I have some time now.)
translated: #b(现在好像有点明白了……)

original: #b(I wonder if the old lady might have stopped by this town, too.)
translated: #b(老婆婆也来到了这个村子吗？)

original: #b(I should ask Thorson.)
translated: #b(最好问问托尔逊吧。)

original: H-hero! Are you really leaving?
translated: 勇，勇士！你真的要去吗？！

original: #bYes, there's something I need to take care of.
translated: #b是的，我正打算去呢。

original: But, the forest... it's so dangerous right now!
translated: 哎呀！真的……现在森林里真的很危险啊……

original: Don't tell the chief about this, but... please, take this!
translated: 如果村长知道了，可能会杀了我，但是……哎呀！请你拿着这个。

original: This is a relic that has been passed down in our village for generations.
translated: #b你要把这个给我……？

original: #bBy giving this to me...
translated: 比起我们，勇士应该更需要这个吧！我一直在等着这一天，我也想帮助勇士！

original: You'll need it more than we do! I've been waiting for this day, to do some real good for someone!
translated: #b谢谢你，托尔逊。我更希望我用不上这个呢。等我回来后再还给你。

original: #bThank you, Thorson. I hope I won't have to use it, so I can return it when I come back.
translated: 好的，那就请你早去早回吧！希望沉睡森林的呼吸与你同在！

original: Sounds good! So, may the breath of Windsleep Forest be with you!
translated: 副本_莫奈德_Act2_探索森林

original: #b(Now that I know where the cabin is, I should head out soon.)
translated: #b(托尔逊好像有话要说，先问问他吧。)

original:
#b(In the end, perhaps it would be best to just get going right away.)
#L0# 'I'd better get going.'#l
translated: #b(士兵们好像有话要说，先问问他们吧。)

original: #face1#Back already?
translated: #face0#你回来了？

original: #bWow, that's quite a fire you built.
translated: #b你一个人生了火？

original: #face2#I have you to thank for it. You taught me, after all!
translated: #face2#嘿嘿，之前#h0#不是告诉了我怎么做嘛。

original: #bOh, when we were making soup? Yeah, good point...
translated: #b啊，在煮汤的时候？……一个人生火还挺难的呢……

original: #bWait, your hands are all scratched up!
translated: #b啊，你的手都受伤了啊！

original: #face1#Well, I never said I was good at it. Don't worry, #h0#. Let's get some rest.
translated: #face0#没关系，#h0#应该也累了……我们快休息下吧。

original: #bThanks, Alika.
translated: #b……谢谢你，你做得很好。

original: #face3#Uh... is that...?
translated: #face3#啊……难道那是……

original: #face3#Pete, don't look...
translated: #face3#小石啊，闭上眼……

original: #face0#Shall we head out, then?
translated: #face0#那就出发吧？

original: #bYeah. Let's get going.
translated: #b好的，今天也请多多关照啦。

original: #face0#Oh, I was thinking... it might be better to leave Pete here. The roads are getting more dangerous, and I'd hate to lose him with monsters around.
translated: #face0#当然了。啊！小石还是就留在这里吧。前面的路越来越危险了，我担心它可能会走丢。

original: #face1#Let's go!
translated: #face0#现在出发吧！

original: #bBe careful when climbing up!
translated: #b你上来的时候小心点！

original: #face1#Thanks, #h0#!
translated: #face0#谢谢你，#h0#！

original: #face5#Ahh! Are you serious?!
translated: #face0#啊啊啊！吓死我了。

original: #face5#Ugh... I'm coming.
translated: #face0#呃……我在上去了。

original: #face5#You should have warned me!
translated: #face0#你先跟我说一声啊！

original: #face3#It was too dark for me to see what it was. The moment I realized it was a Jellyrash, I almost lost my grip!
translated: #face3#本来因为太黑了，所以看不到是什么，到了中间我就感觉到了这是粉红触手，差点就要松手了。

original: #face0#Bleh! Thanks... I guess.
translated: #face0#哎~！总之……谢……谢谢你。

original: #bI'm sorry! There really wasn't anything else rope-like around here.
translated: #b这周围能用来当绳子的就只有这个了。

original: #face1#It's okay. It was a bit... sticky, but it got the job done.
translated: #face0#没事，虽然有点滑，但是还是能抓住的。

original: #face1#Anyway! The important thing is...
translated: #face0#总之！这个不重要！

original: #face1#This hole must have been dug by someone! That means someone's living nearby, right?
translated: #face0#这肯定是人为挖的洞！这代表着有人生活在附近吧？

original: #face2#It could be the old lady's cabin. Let's go look for it!
translated: #face2#如果是老婆婆的小屋就好了，快点找找吧！

original: #bAlika, take these.
translated: #b艾丽卡，拿着这个。

original: #face0#What are they?
translated: #face0#这是什么？

original: #face1#Wait... are these...?
translated: #face0#难道……这是？

original: #face2#Wow! Transparent Actinops skin... giant Fembris fangs... hard Frostflail Yeti horns... Did you gather these for my research?
translated: #face2#啊！透明的埃特金森的皮肤组织……？难道是因为我在森林里说的那些……？

original: #bI hope they lead to a big breakthrough for you!
translated: #b希望这能有助于你的研究。

original: #face1#Oh, thank you so much! To be honest, I was starting to worry that I'd have to return to Afinas without any personal achievements.
translated: #face0#真的谢谢你！其实我本来觉得就这么空手回到亚皮纳斯，有些不好意思，也有些遗憾。

original: #face1#I couldn't worry about that, since there's so much at stake here, but... you really came through for me. How can I ever repay you?
translated: #face0#虽然因为还有更重要的事情，所以没能说出口……但是真的没想到啊，我该怎么报答你呢？

original: #bDon't worry about that, it was no trouble at all.
translated: #b不需要报答，这也不是什么困难的事情。

original: #face3#Really? Because I remember that Frostflail Yeti giving us some trouble...
translated: #face3#真的？明明在森林里消灭冰霜巨人就很困难……

original: #bHey, as long as you're happy, I'm happy.
translated: #b……艾丽卡能开心就好了。

original: #bAlika! They're heading to Svarti!
translated: #b艾丽卡！它们的目的地是斯巴乐缇！

original: #face5#No! We've got to do something... Everyone is recovering, they're not ready for another fight!
translated: #face0#不行！我们必须阻止它们！那里还有很多正在接受治疗的伤者……！

original: #face5#What should we do?!
translated: #face0#怎么办？！

original: #bThere are way too many for us to fight. Even if we return to Svarti right now and fight together...
translated: #b但是它们数量太多了，我们两个无法消灭所有怪物。就算现在我们一起去斯巴乐缇战斗……

original: #face4#We need to stop them... keep them from getting to Svarti somehow.
translated: #face4#我们必须阻止它们进入斯巴乐缇。

original: #bBut what could we do to stop...
translated: #b但是，没有能阻拦它们的方法……
#face4#如果能破坏这个……
#b就能阻止怪物！

original: #face4#If we destroy these...
translated: #face0#就是这个！

original: #b...They can't get past!
translated: #b好的，还有其他的……

original: #face0#That's it!
translated: #face4#为什么和那时不同呢……

original: #bOkay, so the other ones too...
translated: #b……它们好像会来追我们啊？

original: #face4#Why is it different from last time...?
translated: #face0#那正好！比起让它们去村子里，不如让它们追着我们！

original: #bAre they following us?
translated: #b……好的！开始诱引作战！

original: #face1#Good! Let them chase us instead of closing in on the town!
translated: 副本_莫奈德_Act2_探索森林六

original: #h0#, I listened to your speech...
translated: #h0#，感谢你的演说。

original: Don't concern yourself with the naysayers. You understand what is needed for us to triumph here.
translated: 您也别太在意。

original: #bThank you, Chief Birna. And thank you for arranging this meeting.
translated: #b感谢维尔纳村长，为我们提供庇护。

original: With this many people working together, the greatest challenge is focusing on one goal.
translated: 这么多的人聚在一起，最困难的事情就是定相同的目标。

original: For us, we all desperately want the same thing. That gives a bit of an advantage right there.
translated: 但是我们大家的迫切心情都是一样的，所以我觉得已经达到一半的目的了。

original: Skuas has taken in many refugees in the past. It's not the first time we've faced such hardships.
translated: 过去斯库亚斯也同样收容了很多遇难者，这种事情经常有。

original: History has taught me that meetings like this are necessary to unite our people. What we've done today will be told of in stories for generations.
translated: 我们从历史中学到过，要让人们团结起来就得向这样把大家聚在一起。我们今天的事迹也许会载入史册，被后代所传颂。

original: #bSkuas remembers its history, then.
translated: #b斯库亚斯是不会忘记历史的。

original: #face0#Finished! ... Will this be enough?
translated: #face0#结束！这么多应该足够了吧？

original: #bYes, that looks good. Alright, let's head back!
translated: #b足够了。我们也快点回去吧！

original: #bUllan?
translated: #b郁兰？

original: Hero... W-waaah...
translated: …勇士…呜呜…

original: #bUllan! What happened?
translated: #b郁兰！出什么事了？

original: Waahh... I was so immature...
translated: 呜呜… 都怪我太不懂事…

original: It happened when I was so young...
translated: 但那都是我很小的时候做的事情…

original: #bWhat are you trying to say, Ullan? Slow down.
translated: #b郁兰，你到底在说什么，能不能慢慢的告诉我。

original: ...It's all our fault that Blanche is gone.
translated: … 布兰茜姐姐的失踪都是我的错…

original: #bWhat do you mean?
translated: #b那是什么意思？

original: Sniff... Blanche and Granny Sanaan lived in town when I was little...
translated: 呜呜… 小时候我和布兰茜姐姐，还有莎娜安婆婆一起生活在一个村子里…

original: I remember playing in the forest with Blanche and the other kids...
translated: 我记得和布兰茜姐姐… 还有其他的朋友们… 一起在森林里玩耍…

original: And...
translated: 然后…

original: Blanche... her skin color was different than ours... and she was really strong...
translated: 布兰茜姐姐… 肤色和我们不一样… 而且力量也很大…

original: We started being mean to her. I don't know if we were jealous, or scared... We called her a monster...
translated: 不知道从几何时我们开始害怕那样的姐姐… 我还记得大家都在取笑姐姐是个怪物…

original: #b...I see.
translated: #b… 也许吧。

original: After that, Granny Sanaan and Blanche left town. They never came back.
translated: 之后莎娜安婆婆和布兰茜姐姐就离开了我们的村子。

original: I forgot about them. I even forgot why they left... what I did...
translated: 后来这件事情我忘得一干二净，也从不知道是因为我们才让姐姐和婆婆离开了村子…

original: Sniff... I can't imagine how scared and lonely Sanaan and Blanche must have been in the forest.
translated: 呜呜… 莎娜安婆婆和布兰茜姐姐在森林里会多么害怕啊？

original: If they'd stayed in the village, if they'd never gone into the forest... Blanche would have gone hunting with others that day, and she never would've gone missing!
translated: 如果他们不在森林里… 而是在村子里一起生活的话… 姐姐也不会就这么失踪了！

original: I'm so sorry... Waaahhh...
translated: 呜呜呜… 我感到太愧疚了…

original: And I hate that my dad didn't tell me Granny Sanaan came looking for Blanche! I hate that he just let her leave like that!
translated: … 我讨厌爸爸，他没有跟我说过婆婆为了找布兰茜姐姐来到了村子！不，更讨厌他让婆婆离开了村子！

original: #bI'm sure Chief Kan had your best interests at heart, Ullan.
translated: #b郁兰，可汗村长是为了郁兰才那样做的。

original: Ohhh... He's just gonna say it was for the greater good again! I can't stand it!
translated: 呜呜… 肯定会说为了大多数人只能那样做！我真的没法理解爸爸！

original: #bUllan, why not come with me to apologize to Sanaan? It's never too late.
translated: #b… 郁兰，现在你用真心向莎娜安道歉的话，也不迟啊？

original: Do you think... she'd even listen to me?
translated: 婆婆… 会原谅我吗？

original: #bI'm sure she will.
translated: #b反而会说你勇气可嘉。

original: #bIn fact, I bet she'll respect you for being so brave.
translated: 真… 真的吗？呜…

original: You... you really think so? Sniff...
translated: #b真的，你相信我。

original: #bI'm sure of it. Trust me.
translated: … 让我再想一想… 不！肯定会道歉的… 只是… 想一想该如何道歉…

original: Well... okay. But what do I say? I mean, I know how to apologize, but... I just...
translated: #b如果需要我帮忙的话，可以随时来找我。

original: #bJust be honest. And if you need my help, I'm always right here.
translated: 呜呜… 是，勇士！谢谢你…！

original: Oh, I can't thank you enough, hero!
translated: #b(… 阿尔西说的话不像是假的，能体会到他的真心。)

original: #b(Aruhi sounded so sincere... like he was really telling the truth.)
translated: #b(…在森林里待过的莎娜安说不定看到过什么吧？)

original: #bHm...
translated: #b(比起郁兰我得先去找她了。)

original: #b(Since Sanaan has been living in the forest all this time, maybe she's seen something.)
translated: #b(莎娜安好像在杂货店里。)

original: #b(I'll probably see her before Ullan does.)
translated: #b肯定会。

original: #bSanaan!
translated: #b我正要去找你呢，你在这里做什么？

original: #bI was on my way to meet you! What are you doing here?
translated: 啊，#h0#…… 这房子里的家伙又惹事了，好几天都没有开门…

original: Oh, #h0#... The child that lives here gives me such grief. He's held the doors shut on me for days...
translated: #b这个房子？

original: #bIn this house?
translated: 住在里边的家伙非常让人头痛，不知道这次又有什么事情让他不开心…

original: Yes! Such a nuisance... nothing but skin and bones! I wonder what's made him shut us out this time?
translated: 莎娜安，艾伊纳尔会听到的。

original: Shh, Sanaan. Einar might hear you.
translated: 对了，你找我有什么事？

original: I hope he does!
translated: #b你在森林里居住的时候… 有没有看到过外人？或者说形迹可疑的人…

original: Now then, what did you need me for?
translated: 外地人我倒是看到过几个，大概什么时候？

original: #bI wanted to ask you a question. Did you see any outsiders while you were living in the forest? Or anyone suspicious?
translated: #b嗯… 6个月前…

original: I've seen several outsiders. Anything more specific?
translated: … 可惜那时候没有。

original: #bHmm... Did you see any around 6 months ago?
translated: #b原来如此，不知道我是不是又让你回忆起伤心的往事。

original: ...No. I didn't see who took the townsfolk.
translated: 没什么，过去的事情罢了。如果这些能找回布兰茜的话，你们随时都可以来找我。

original: #bAh, yeah. Sorry if that's a painful memory for you.
translated: 啊！对了，我没有告诉你这个！

original: No, I'm fine. It's all in the past. Ask me anything that you think might help us find my Blanche.
translated: … 你去森林的时候… 看到过粉色的很粘稠的… 东西了吧？

original: That reminds me. I wanted to tell you something.
translated: 在小屋附近是不是有很多！

original: #bWhat would that be?
translated: #b是的，我看到了。我和艾丽卡称之为… ‘恶心的粉红触手’。

original: I'm sure you saw them when you were in the forest. Those sticky pink things?
translated: 呵呵，名字起的到不错！

original: They're everywhere, even around my cabin!
translated: 我在森林里等着孙女的时候，无意间看到了那奇怪的东西。

original: #bYes, we've seen them. Alika and I call them Jellyrashes.
translated: ‘那家伙’ 好像通过你们所说的‘恶心的粉红触手’来控制其他的怪物。

original: Ha! Quite a fitting name.
translated: #b… 果不其然，和我们的猜测完全相同。

original: Living out there on my own, I had plenty of time to observe those bizarre things.
translated: 那… 你们知道这个吗？

original: It would seem the giant creature controls all the monsters of the forest through the Jellyrashes.
translated: 就是‘那家伙’产生恶心粉色的事情… ？

original: #bI knew it! We were on the right track...
translated: #b… 我们只是猜测肯定会有某种关联…

original: Then I assume you know where the Jellyrashes come from?
translated: 只要‘那家伙’一出现，天空即刻变灰，然后就开始下起了雪。他那庞大的身躯每每移动时，地上的积雪全部会弹起。

original: #bWhere they come from?
translated: 下雪的时候‘那家伙’好像喷出什么奇怪的粉末，感觉空中飘落下来红色的雪一样。

original: The same giant creature is creating them.
translated: 然后那个巨大的身影，我用这双眼睛看的非常清楚！它好像在斩断身体的一部分！

original: #bWe did suspect there might be a connection...
translated: … 不知道是不是因为那个缘故，它每次能制作的数量有一定的上限。

original: When the giant appears, it fills the sky with its strange snow. It doesn't make snow, but its huge feet kick up great clouds of it.
translated: 如果‘那家伙’真的能用恶心的粉红触手来控制怪物的话…

original: What the beast makes is a strange red powder that mixes with the snow, which is what makes the storm look red.
translated: #b如果我们消灭的速度比制作的速度快的话，它就会到极限了吧。

original: I only saw the creature itself once, and it was strange... it seemed to be tearing parts of its own body off.
translated: 正是！

original: If that's how it creates Jellyrashes, that would mean it can only create so many at once.
translated: #b不过… 上一次在森林里，当我把恶心的粉红触手全都消灭之后… ‘那家伙’一过来，触手们又开始活过来了。照那样看来…

original: #bAre you sure?
translated: … ‘那家伙’自己好像也有控制能力。

original: I am.
translated: #b对，不过他每次制作的数量有限制的话，说不定真能帮上大忙。

original: If the beast is really using those Jellyrashes to control the monsters...
translated: 如果那样可真是太好了，我这把老骨头也算没有枉费在小屋里生活的日子啦。

original: #bThat means if we take them out faster than it can make them, at some point it won't be able to keep up.
translated: 还有件事要告诉你…

original: Exactly!
translated: 也对，你来到阿布鲁的时间也不短，而且也进过森林，能看到的应该都看到了吧。

original: #bThat alone won't solve our problem, though. When we destroyed some of the Jellyrashes the monsters calmed down, but they fell back under its control when the creature came near.
translated: 如果我还能记起什么，到时候再告诉你。

original: So the beast can control the monsters directly as well.
translated: #b谢谢你，莎娜安。

original: #bRight. But I'm sure clearing its Jellyrashes would make it easier to combat.
translated: #b莎娜安！

original: Good, good. I'm glad I did something useful with my time out there in my cabin.
translated: 我就是要让他听到。

original: Is there anything else you need?
translated: #b这个？是什么？

original: Considering you've been surviving the harsh realities of Abrup for some time now, I would think there isn't much you don't know already.
translated: #b哪个？

original: I'll let you know if anything else comes to mind.
translated: #b这是真的吗？！

original: #bGreat. Thank you, Sanaan.
translated: 对，是真的。

original: Ah...
translated: 那个…

original: Greetings. I'm Elva, and run the general store here in Skuas.
translated: 你好，我是这家商店的主人，我叫艾尔巴。

original: As I said, this fine young lady here was the one that brought me back to town.
translated: 上次也介绍过，是把我带到这里的恩人。

original: While I was living out there in my cabin, I'd come to the general store here in Skuas to pick up supplies.
translated: 我住在森林小屋，经常来往与斯库亚斯的杂货店，买很多东西。

original: But when I stopped coming around, she came looking for me.
translated: 后来我有好几个月没来，是他记得我并过来找到我的。

original: #bHow considerate!
translated: #b真是了不起。

original: Oh, a store owner should always remember her customers.
translated: 作为商店的主人，记住每位顾客的脸，那是理所当然的事情。

original: Many, many people come by the store, often with news or gossip to share.
translated: 有很多人来我们的商店… 这里就像是一个各种消息的集散中心一样。

original: And that's why I think I might be able to answer your earlier question, #h0#.
translated: 所以… 我可以对刚才 #h0# 勇士的问题作出回答。

original: #bDo you mean when I asked about seeing anyone suspicious?
translated: #b刚才的问题… 你是说可疑的人？

original: Yes, although I didn't see anyone myself.
translated: 当然，不是我亲眼看到的。

original: Around 6 months ago, one of our herb gatherers told me they saw someone suspicious out in the forest.
translated: 大概6个月前，有个人去森林里采药，说是发现了一个可疑的人。

original: I hadn't thought much of it since it was such an odd tale, but what you said reminded me, #h0#.
translated: 这仿佛是个非常遥远的故事，我都差点忘记了。不过刚才听到 #h0# 的问题，就突然想起来了。

original: #bCould you elaborate?
translated: #b能告诉我详细的情况吗？

original: Let's see... they said they saw someone in white steel armor, completely closed. Even their face was covered... I remember them saying you would lose them in a blizzard.
translated: 嗯… 听说是穿着一套白色的盔甲，没有漏出一丝皮肤。看到的人都羡慕的说，貌似能穿透暴风雪一样。

original: At first they thought the person was blinking around the forest, but they realized there were many of them moving around.
translated: 但是他们不是一个人。原以为他们会瞬间移动，但是实际上是几个穿着相同的人。

original: #bIt's the same story...
translated: #b… 一模一样啊…

original: Pardon?
translated: #b还有一个人也见过。

original: #bWe have another witness who saw the exact same thing.
translated: #b能否知道是谁告诉你这个故事吗？

original: Is that so? That's... chilling.
translated: 是去森林寻找妻子的人，但现在还没回来。

original: #bWho did you hear this from?
translated: #b感谢你，艾尔巴。

original: An herb gatherer... he went into the forest to find his missing wife, and never came back.
translated: #b(…阿尔西说的话原来是真的啊。)

original: #bI see...
translated: 真的吗？

original: #h0#, you're back. Did you get the ingredients?
translated: #h0#，你回来了。材料呢…

original: #bI sure did. Here you go!
translated: #b在这里。

original: Eyeful antennae... one, two, three... Optusa leaves... It's all there!
translated: 独眼触须怪的触须…一个…两个…三…扁柏树叶…都对！

original: Thank you. Oh, and did you bring me my notes? You can keep them if you like, I made copies.
translated: 非常感谢。我的笔记能给我话？或者你想要的话，也可以送给你。

original: While we're on the subject of paying thanks, #h0#...
translated: #h0#，你说要谢我？

original: Do you think you might be able to do me a small favor?
translated: 那么… 可否帮我一个忙？

original: I mean... Oh, I hope I don't come off as just being greedy. I know you're so busy... Ahh, how can I say this...
translated: 啊啊，我说的话听起来是否在向你索取什么回报？噢，不是那样的。我怕你太忙了，所以不知道能不能拜托你……

original: #bPlease, it's no trouble. Tell me what you need.
translated: #b不，没关系。你尽管说。

original: Thank you. You see, I may be a simple merchant but I'm very dedicated to my work. And my work is to make sure I always have what people need.
translated: 好好。我只是一介商人，但是作为商人我也有自己的使命。那就是我要常备人们所需要的所有物品。

original: Some people might laugh at the idea of a shopkeeper being so dedicated, but...
translated: 别人可能会笑我那算什么使命…

original: #bNo one thinks that.
translated: #b不，没人会那么认为。

original: Who would think such a thing? Everyone I know adores you.
translated: 谁会那么想？我所看到的人都在感谢艾尔巴。

original: Oh, goodness...
translated: 那真是太好了。

original: You see, we haven't been able to trade with other villages or El Nath for a while because of the chaos, and that's left me light on supplies.
translated: 但是最近村子和冰峰雪域断了联系之后，很多物品都需要补给。

original: I'm not worried about luxuries or entertainment, mind you, I mean basics like potions. Considering the situation, that could be a problem.
translated: 其他的倒是无所谓… 但是现在这种情况下，药水也快要断货了…

original: I hate to trouble you, but this is for everyone's sake.
translated: 虽然厚颜无耻，但还是要拜托你。

original: #bDon't sweat it. We could all use more potions. I'll help in anyway way I can.
translated: #b不不，药水是我们大家都需要的。反而要感谢你，是你提醒到了我。

original: Thank you. That really puts my mind at ease.
translated: 真的吗？哇噢，那我就可以放下心头的这块石头了。

original: I'm no alchemist but I can brew decent potions. I just need a few ingredients.
translated: 虽然实力不怎么样，但是我会调制药水。只要有几个材料的话…

original: #bSure. What do you need?
translated: #b需要什么材料？

original: Hold on. I had them written down somewhere... Ah! Here they are.
translated: 等下… 我记在哪里了呢… 啊！在这里。

original: Twenty Eyeful antennae, ten Optusa leaves, ten Leatty Crystals, ten vials of the clear Actinops blood...
translated: 需要独眼触须怪的触须20个，扁柏树叶10个，小白雪鬼结晶10个，埃特金森透明的血10ml…

original: Oh. It's a bit more than a few, actually...
translated: 啊… 太多了吗？

original: #bHa, that's okay, I'm used to it. Twenty Eyeful antennae, ten Optusa leaves... What was the rest?
translated: #b…不… 没有。独眼触须怪的触须20个，扁柏树叶10个… 还有呢…

original: Ten Leatty Crystals and ten vials of the clear Actinops blood!
translated: 小白雪鬼结晶10个，埃特金森透明的血10ml！

original: You know what? Just take the note. It includes how to get each ingredient as well.
translated: 我把这个笔记借给你吧，里边也写了寻找材料的方法，肯定会有帮助的。

original: All right. Here on page ten: How to Make a Super Elixir!
translated: 打开艾尔巴的药水笔记。

original: #bAlright. I'll be back soon.
translated: 看… 是第10页的特级药水制作方法！

original: I was just helping Granny Sanaan make some armor.
translated: 我正在帮莎娜安婆婆制作盔甲呢。

original: I wouldn't say make, dear. We're more mending. Taking old pieces and putting them together into new armor.
translated: 不过也就修理而已… 收集了全部盔甲碎片。

original: #bArmor?
translated: #b盔甲？

original: Yes, I know someone who's in desperate need of some armor.
translated: 啊！你也知道，我打算送给那个麻烦的家伙。

original: You know who. It's that little nuisance I was telling you about earlier.
translated:
话说，能给我一下不用的盔甲吗？因为我这里少一条胳膊…#b
#L0#没有。#l
#L1#查看背包。#l

original:
While we're on the topic of armor... do you have any extra lying around that you're not using? I need something to cover the arm here...#b
#L0# I don't have anything.#l
#L1# Let me check... #l
translated: 那也没办法…

original: Oh, well, that's too bad...
translated: 做的差不多了。怎么样？

original: It needs some finishing touches... What do you think?
translated: 对你来说这个恐怕没什么用，但对那家伙就是必不可少的。

original: Armorsmithing isn't my specialty, but it should work better than it looks.
translated: 他和我有很多共同点。

original: He's a lot like me.
translated: 我希望他能穿上这件盔甲之后，能走出屋子… 但是我不敢确定。

original: I'm hoping this armor will give the boy the courage to venture outside... But I suppose it's up to him in the end.
translated: 不过有一点可以肯定… 至少我也在努力地去做一些我力所能及的事情…

original: Still, it's always better to do what little you can than do nothing at all.
translated: 看这个！有两个犄角，是不是很酷？

original: Here, take a look at this helmet! I'm rather proud of the horns here.
translated: #b是的。

original: #bImpressive.
translated: 那当然，一想到艾伊纳尔能带着这个头盔出门… 想想都很酷…

original: I can imagine Einar striding out of his house wearing this. Magnificent!
translated: 如果真能那样就好了…

original: I hope he's ready for magnificence...
translated: 你也别太担心了。不过这个嘈杂声音是怎么回事？

original: I'm sure he'll... Hey, what is that noise? What's going on?
translated: 好像有骚乱。

original: Sounds to me like someone's getting a bit rowdy.
translated: #b我们最好去看一下。

original: #bWe'd better head over and check it out.
translated: 啊！差点忘记了，这个是送给你的。虽然和你身上的根本没法相比，但这是我这老太婆的心意。

original: Yes, let's go.
translated: 但是没人送。

original: Ah, before we go... This is for you. It's nothing compared to what you're wearing, but humor an old woman and take it.
translated: 快去看一下。

original: #face0#Einar, you should have blocked that last attack.
translated: #face0#艾伊纳尔，刚才那个方向你可以挡住的。

original: #face3#...I'm sorry.
translated: #face0#… 对不起。

original: #face0#It's fine, but you should always treat training like an actual battle.
translated: #face0#没什么可对不起的，但是要把训练当成实战。

original: #face3#Okay...
translated: #face0#我们先休息一会儿。

original: #face0#Let's break for a moment and then try one more time.
translated: #face0#艾丽卡的表情看来很严重？有什么事情吗…

original: #face0#Alika still looks so serious. I wonder what's going on...
translated: #b是啊，从刚才我们训练开始的时候就开始在谈了。

original: #b(I've gathered enough. I should get back.)
translated: #b(收集好了，赶快回去。)

original: #bAlika, what's the matter?
translated: #b艾丽卡，有什么事吗？
#face0#因为投石器的问题。

original: #face0#It's the catapult.
translated: #b是之前造了一般的那个投石器吗？有什么问题

original: #bThe catapult? The one you've been working on? Is something wrong?
translated: #face0#投石器的框架都做好了，而且巨石也都准备好了。

original: #face0#Just a minor thing. We've built the frame, and stocked up on rocks to launch.
translated: #face0#问题是… 斯库亚斯内找不到可以支撑那巨石的绳索。

original: #face4#The problem is that we can't find any rope in Skuas that's strong enough to strap the rocks into.
translated: #b那我们快去找绳索吧？

original: #bWell, we just need to go out and get some!
translated: #face0#发现芬里斯也已经过去很久了，怪物们马上就要攻过来了。

original: #face4#Remember, Fembris were spotted near the village not long ago. That means an attack could be coming at any moment.
translated: #face0#这么危机的时刻… 谁也不能冒险出城。

original: #face4#With that threat out there, I can't let anyone leave the town. Not even you.
translated: #b(怎么办… 我一个人快去快回行不行？)

original: #bHm...
translated: #b… 需要多么强力的绳索？

original: #b(I could probably slip out and come right back.)
translated: #face0##h0#，别想着出城，那很危险。

original: #b...How strong does the rope need to be?
translated: #b如果能完成投石器的话，我可以快去快回。万一碰到怪物了，我一个人也好脱身。

original: #face5##h0#, don't you even think about leaving. It's too dangerous.
translated: #face0#不，当然不能让你一个人去那么危险的地方。

original: #bLook, the catapult could make a huge difference for our defenses. If I go alone, I can find what you need and be back in a flash.
translated: #face0#就当我没听见吧，应该还有别的方法。

original: #face5#No, I can't let you go alone. It's too risky.
translated: #b(… 我还是去一趟吧。)

original: Hi!
translated: 你好，勇士！

original: My mommy, Ullan, and some other villagers prepared this for you.
translated: 瞧~~！这是我、妈妈、郁兰姐姐还有叔叔们一起为你准备的。

original: Hawalu, what are you doing over there?
translated: 哈瓦尔？你在那儿做什么呢！

original: I wanna tell them about the Mission Board!
translated: 我想告诉勇士任务板的用处！

original: You're not old enough to explain well yet. I'll take it from here.
translated: 你没长门牙，说不清楚的，这东西很重要，要是人家勇士听不懂该怎么办？还是姐姐来吧。

original:
Thank you for helping us so much.
We all got together to think of a way to pay you back and prepared this #eMission Board#n!
translated:
勇士！你好。
这段时间真的谢谢你了……
我们一直在想到底该怎么报答你，阿布鲁的所有居民绞尽脑汁，为你准备了这个#e[任务板]#n！

original: The #eMission Board#n has #bDaily Missions#k, #bWeekly Missions#k, and #bAchievement Missions#k.
translated: #e[任务板]#n上有#b[每日任务]#k、#b[每周任务]#k还有#b[成就任务]#k。

original: #bDaily Missions#k are tasks that can be completed every day. Just don't forget that they #breset at midnight#k!
translated:
#b[每日任务]#k是每天都可以做的事，只要通关一次“阿布鲁的大篷车”就可以获得礼物了！
对了，每日任务会在#b每天午夜重置#k，你可别忘了哦！

original:
#bWeekly Missions#k can be done once a week. You'll have no trouble completing them if you visit Abrup every day! 
Weekly missions are#b reset every Wednesday#k, so make sure you claim your gift before then!
translated:
#b[每周任务]#k是每周可以进行一次的事，每天来阿布鲁玩，就能自然而然地完成了哦！
#每周任务会在#b每周三重置#k，在此之前一定要记得拿好礼物哦！

original: #bAchievement Missions#k are missions that can only be completed once. We really wanted to repay you for your hard work, so we prepared amazing gifts for you!
translated: #b[成就任务]#k是只能进行一次的事，为了报答勇士你对我们的付出，我们真的是超认真地在准备礼物哦！你可不能被吓到哦！

original: You can view the gift you'll receive for completing each mission when you place your cursor above the gift box icon for it.
translated: 鼠标悬停在各个任务的礼物箱图标上，就能看到完成时可以领取的道具了。

original: There are also great titles like #i3700493:# #t3700493#, #i3700502:# #t3700502#, and #i3700496:# #t3700496#, and there are useful items like #i2048724:# #t2048724# and #i2028372:# #t2028372#, so don't forget to take them with you!
Don't forget to take them!
translated: 别忘了，一定要记得拿哦！

original: See you later!
translated: 那……再见咯，勇士！

original: See you later!
translated: 再见哦，勇士！

original: I've added your link skill, enjoy!.
translated: 点击画面左侧的相关图标，可以随时指定被传授的角色。

original: Have you come to try your strength against Crumbling Zakum?
translated: 你来了啊? 看来你想要挑战扎昆啊。

original: I'd heard you were improving. You look well.
translated: 你好, 最近, 我一直听说你的成长速度非常惊人啊。

original:
Are you ready to face Crumbling Zakum? 
 #r<<Click Yes to teleport to the #bChief's Residence in El Nath>>
translated: 也没别的事, 我找你来只是想看看, 身为一位名声大噪的战士是如何挑战扎昆的。

original: I'll take you to the chief's residence.
translated:
怎么样? 你想挑战扎昆吗? 
#r<< 接受后, 将会移动到#b冰峰雪域山脉长老的公馆#r。>>
